story:
THE CAMPAIGN KICKSTARTER DIDN'T WANT YOU TO SEE!



We Invented a New Kind of Bondage Cuff  

With the dawn of fetish and kink lifestyles entering the mainstream, it is quickly becoming apparent that the current standard of quality for most mass produced bondage equipment leaves much to be desired. House of Wolfram intends to change that standard dramatically by introducing completely original designs of leather bondage gear.



Welcome to House of Wolfram

The concept for House of Wolfram was created by a leatherworker in the pacific northwest who noticed a significant quality gap in mainstream mass produced bondage gear. Most of the items were greatly overpriced for their poor design and made from cheap materials which he saw as not only unfair to their buyers, but also as dangerous since a poor and cheap design is more prone to breaking or improperly fitting; the last thing you want when your life hangs in the balance. While some good quality equipment was available through custom makers, it was very expensive, and sometimes took weeks or months to complete.  

This inspired him to found a company whose goal is to bring an incredibly high standard of quality gear to the BDSM community both in aesthetic and function that featured original designs and innovative concepts.


Completely Handmade

This new design boasts of several unique features often lacking in typical bondage cuffs.

  • This new kind of cuff features a rare one-size-fits-all attribute. We've put the same cuff on every body type from a 5.5" wrist to an 8.5" wrist and were pleased with how comfortable they all felt in it. 

Oxblood
  • They also go on exceptionally fast. No more struggling with cheap buckles, this new design features a heavy duty industrial snap which can be easily substituted for a locking device. 

Coming soon! Substituting clasp with a locking device.

One of the improvements we plan on making to this design is the ability to substitute the industrial snap with a locking clasp that only opens with a key or numerical combination but still fastens just as quickly.

Single hand fastening

Chocolate
  • With the adjustment device in the middle of the cuff itself, no matter what size it is adjusted to, there will never be any extra belt hanging off. The design will always look compact and like it was made to fit the wearer. 

Onyx
  • A ballistic nylon core and steel plate make these cuffs not only exceptionally strong, but also surprisingly lightweight, making them comfortable and not bulky.


We Need Your Support To Make It Even Better and Develop More Stuff

The staggering potential of this design drove us to come up with even more ideas following the principles of simplicity, speed, and beauty. We are in the process of developing collars and harnesses and plan to expand into more avenues of BDSM.

The Hydra


And we are even moving in the direction of hybridizing rope and leather to create self tying interactive devices such as the self tying harness and much more.

The Angelus 


Quick Locking Mechanism


The Skeleton


Our Pursuit of Perfection Involves Our Community

This company understands that in order for it to truly fulfil the needs of its community, it must involve the community. We at House of Wolfram believe that the pursuit of perfection must be a collaborative effort, therefore we intend to provide education in the art of bondage craft with the intention of improving the resources our community has to come up with new ideas of their own. Additionally we plan on supporting improvements to the field by not treating other bondage artists and crafters as competition, but rather as innovators and have every intention of applauding and supporting new and brilliant developments.


Our Goal

The cuffs are so close to being perfect we can almost taste it. But it has come to the point where we cannot afford to put much more of our own money in for development as handmade items, while exceptionally high quality, are also very time consuming and expensive. 


We are well on our way with plenty of ideas, but it quickly became apparent that we needed funding to make them a reality as designing  these devices is very expensive, especially given the amount of engineering, obsessive perfectionism, and testing we put into them. We calculated that we need no less than $10,000 to both make these designs a reality and to fund the creation of a business that could feasibly compete. Your support will help give us the funding we need to buy better equipment and resources to not only finish developing these cuffs, but also to be able to meet production demand.



Stretch Goals

1) As soon as we reach the $10,000 mark we will be opening up new combination or customizable options for the rewards.


Risks and challenges

Once our project is funded we can almost get to work on the cuffs right away as their design is nearly perfected. However, not everything comes so quickly and sometimes unexpected setbacks due to design conundrums happen during development since we are still working on the collar and harness.

While the risk of this happening is always present, our combined skills have not yet encountered a problem we could not solve. In the event of a setback, we will keep everyone up to date with our progress, thanking you every step of the way for your patience with the assurance that it will be well worth the wait.

story:
Who we are

Roi de Luxe is the combination of young driven entrepreneurs and fashion conscious men. We have created this company with the drive and passion to make it one of the largest fashion retailers in the world. We are starting small with just wrist wear but will be continually growing into other markets. Roi de Luxe will be the ultimate go to site for classy, unique, affordable brands that will make you stand out from the crowd. Our goal is to bring to the public brands that care about the quality of their products. This will allow our customers to discovery growing brands before anyone else does. 

Raising $20,000 will be a tremendous step forward for Roi de Luxe. The money will give us the push we need to launch and to succeed.

What We Need

Funding needed to launch Roi de Luxe will be $20,000 to design our website and establish our brand. Also to purchase majority of our first inventory from predetermined vendors.

The Impact

Roi de Luxe will provide every man with a place to find wrist wear that not only looks incredible but that is also high quality and that will last. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If money is tight, do not contribute! The only way to help others up is to already be on top. So use your money to benefit you and grow your ideas. If you still want to contribute to Roi de Luxe, spread the word! If you have family members or friends who are into watches and high end fashion tell them about us! Any effort to spread the word would be deeply appreciated. You can follow us on Instagram @roi.de.luxe.

story:
THE STORY

House of Tomorrow is a creative vision which embraces a life of travel and the never ending art of discovery...our brand was created with the modern spirit of adventure in mind. We aim to bring luxury swim and resort wear to the woman who believes that her home is wherever she hangs her suits to dry...she is the the restless wanderer, the dreamer, the ocean soul seeker in all of us. House Of Tomorrow is *Wanderluxe for the Modern Vagabond.


WHY INDIE GOGO?
After almost two years of research, design, and product testing we are ready and proud to present our debut collection and we need your help!

The collection is inspired by the energy and fertile spirit of the Hawaiian Islands and the Goddesses that watch over them. Haumea is believed to be the mother of the islands as well as the goddess of chilbirth and fertility...Her children include the goddesses Pele, Namaka, Hi'i'aka, and Kapo among many others. All of our styles, fabrics, colors, and classic prints were chosen with these goddesses in mind.

The collection is a true reflection of classic beauty with a modern edge...our view of Hawaii as it is today. Shot with the island of Maui as the perfect backdrop, the campaign tells the story of the modern goddess in all of us. We are proud to present The Moons Of Haumea and hope you love it!


THE GOOD NEWS

We have been fortunate to have placement in photoshoots and editorial for amazing publications and social media outlets such as these... This exposure not only make us smile but also validates our future in the world of luxury swim!

We are also pleased to announce the we have been invited to participate in Miami Swim Week at Swim Show 2016! 

With more than three decades of SwimShow expertise, The Swimwear Association of Florida is recognized as the leader in swimwear exhibitions worldwide. As the industry’s most celebrated and established exhibition, Swim Show is the premier global trade show where the best of the best gather to network, exhibit and purchase next year’s trends. 

Campaign backers will help to send us to Miami in 2016 where we will have exposure to industry experts in the swimwear world! Lets do it!


THE PRODUCT


OUR WANDERLUXE SWIMWEAR IS DESIGNED TO LAST AND FIT LIKE A SECOND SKIN

When we use the term Wanderluxe, we refer not only our final products and the lifestyle they embody, but also to the materials and craftsmanship that goes into making them...

Our pattern makers are INDUSTRY EXPERTS |  creating the most flattering, sexy fits to make any woman feel beautiful. 

We use only the FINEST FABRICS |  Our suits are made with imported Italian Lycra as well as ultra lightweight Neoprene for all of our designer styles. 

Flawless SEAMLESS DESIGN | Our supportive suits are double-lined and seamless resulting in the most beautiful swimwear that hugs in all the right places and flatters every curve. 



THE PERKS!

Every penny counts! Our $1 - $15 perks offer something for everyone! Choose anywhere from a from a huge thank you (MAHALO) and virtual shaka , to downloadable tunes, our 2016  Swim Calendar, and artwork from our Contributing Artist Ohana donated by Jamie Carney!!

Cheers to you! To thank you for your support we will send you a House Of Tomorrow beverage coozie! You will also receive all of our $1-$15  rewards.

Give a friend or loved one a 20% discount towards the swimsuit of their dreams! This is a perfect gift or stocking stuffer for the special ladies in your life this holiday season!  You will recieve a special discount code to use on our website for yourself or to pass along...Happy Holidays! *Discount good till April 1st, 2016.You will also receive all $1-$15 rewards.

Get your hands on our hand screened Signature Wanderluxe Graphic Tee to accent your beach loving, sun seeking lifestyle! Printed on super soft 100% cotton and sure to be your new wardrobe staple for the beach and beyond. You will also receive all $1-$30 rewards!

Be the first to get your hands on our favorite graphic tee...because a life lived Sans Pants is a life worth living! You will also receive all $1-$30 rewards!

Thank you for showing your Aloha! You will get our limited edition Authentic Aloha Graphic Tee ( Men's and Women's styles available) + a beautiful hand dyed, one-of-a-kind shibori beach throw from our friends at Warp & Weft Dye Co., an LA based Dye Collective. To see more of their amzing work visit  http://www.warpandweftdyeco.com/

Thank you for showing your Aloha! You will get our limited edition Authentic Aloha Graphic Sweatshirt (printed on Unnisex Super Soft French Terry) + a beautiful hand dyed, one-of-a-kind shibori beach throw from our friends at Warp & Weft Dye Co., an LA based Dye Collective. To see more of their amzing work visit  http://www.warpandweftdyeco.com/


Everyone woman needs The LBB ( Little Black Bikini) in their arsenal. Chose your favorite *Wanderluxe Lycra bikini separates in VANA (our classic black) for the perfect set to add to your collection. 20-25% discount off of retail pricing depending on combination of styles. Choose from the Laka or Hina tops and the Lani or Mikala bottoms! You will also get All $1-$20 Rewards ! We are offering Early Bird ( limited quantity)  and Standard SS16 delivery options!


Grab our bestselling style The Pele, named after the Hawaiian Goddess of Fire. Offered in VANA (our classic black) and limited quantities of Haumea (burgundy). The Pele can be rocked on the beach or on the street as a killer bodysuit. Keep the legend alive and embody Pele wherever you choose. 20% savings off retail price. You will aslo get all $1-$30 Rewards! Early Bird and Standard delivery options.

Tis the Season! Give a friend or loved one a 30% discount towards the swimsuits of their dreams...This is the stocking stuffer you are looking for this season! 

Tis the Season! Give a friend or loved one a 30% discount towards the swimsuits of their dreams...This is the stocking stuffer you are looking for this season! 

This package truely has everything for the beach lover at heart! You will get a Sans Pants graphic tee, a bikini set of your choice, a shibori beach throw from Warp & Weft Dye Co and all $1-$30 rewards sent to you in a very special House Of Tomorrow beach tote!

Wholesale stockist package of 5 of our BESTSELLING Fullpiece, The Pele in classic black (Vana). Delivery dates negotiable.


THE POINT:  

What We Need & What You Get

Help us to make our dream world of Wanderluxe Swimwear a reality! House of Tomorrow needs to meet or exceed our goal of $25k to cover costing for the following key elements for our 2016 collections:

-Pattern Making. We employ freelance fit specialists to perfect each design's level of support and comfort.

-Fabrics and Trims. We carefully select high quality imported Italian Lycra, ultra fine gauge Neoprene, and super soft elastic trim.

-Cutting. Believe it or not, cutting is an art and business of its own. Factories cut the fabric with electronic rotary blades, quickly, and consistently to scale.

-Sewing. Our sewing operators are hardworking Angelenos  who love California the way we do, and we're proud to support their dreams, too!

- Printing. We truly believe in the beauty and importance of vibrant, original prints in any swimwear line. Your donations will help us bring the print portion of our SS16 collection to life. Money will go to the development of artwork as well as the cost of sublimation and screen printing. Our backers will have first dibs on all printed styles for SS16!

-Marketing. At House Of Tomorrow we believe that clear and beautiful storytelling are the keys to success. We have invested in models, photographers, brand ambassadors, graphic designers, and cinematographers in order to present a unique and powerful SS16 campaign...Our backers will be helping to bring our stunning story to the eyes of future customers as well as retailers.

-The Website. Startup costs add up, and we have spent a pretty penny perfecting the look, feel, and functionality of our web-store. Your donations will help us cover the costs to bring our primary retail point of sale to life and to the world!

-Indie GoGo fees and rewards. Crowdfunding isn't free, so a percentage of all donations goes to Indie GoGo. The campaign and our carefully curated rewards will factor into the goal amount. We appreciate your support and want to reward our backers with interesting and creative gifts to say thanks!


The Impact

By supporting our project you automatically become a member of our community or Ohana, the Hawaiian word for family. We promise to keep our family of backers up to date on progress, rewards and anything else we have up our sleeves!

Join our newsletter here:  http://www.shophouseoftomorrow.com/#community

Community is a concept we strongly believe in and strive to bring to life. We aim to do this by sharing the the talents and passions of our growing group of creative contributors. Our inspiring rewards would not be possible without them! We have collaborated with amazing artists, designers, and taste-makers to offer something for everyone. Our collaborations will continue on into future seasons ensuring inspiring and original product will always be offered. We look forward to an open door of creativity in our house!

The Bonus. As a part of our ohana, backers will be helping each and every woman who shares our spirit of adventure live out her dreams in the highest quality, most beautiful swimwear...who doesn't love happy beach babes and amazing bikinis?

Giving back is in our future. As lovers of the ocean we consider it our duty to promote sustainable swimwear... We have seen the wrath of plastic on the beaches of Bali and beyond and it isn't pretty. It is time to do our part. Upcoming styles later in 2016 will be made of a recycled version of our *Wanderluxe Italian Lycra. A portion of proceeds will go towards hands on care for our fragile coastlines and cleaner oceans through organizations such as Sustainable Coastlines Hawaii.

If you are interested in how fashion can play a part in preserving the Earth's oceans please watch this short documentary for an amazing example, a movement we look forward to joining.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pt6KlPCX1BU

If we meet our stretch goal of $50k during this campaign we will be able to add  Econel® ( made from %100 recycled polyamide yarns ) into our assortment much faster... Let the give back begin!


Meet The Team

Rachel Blevins | CEO & Chief Of Design

Rachel was born in Hawaii and raised on the island of Maui. She studied Communications at Otis College of Art and Design and graduated with a BFA in Graphic Design. After college, her combined love for fashion, illustration and pop culture aesthetics quickly led her into a successful career designing for companies such as Ocean Pacific, Quicksilver, Roxy, Juicy Couture, and most recently Levis.

Kelly Carstensen | Fit Specialist and Pattern Designer

Kelly has over four decades of experience as a couture seamstress and designer. She has been the in-house Tailor at both Barney’s New York and Nordstroms. Kelly has worked both domestically and Internationally as an independent tailor for diplomats and other high end high clients. She currently runs her busy studio in Oakland, CA.

Ali Zacharias | Director Of Production

Ali is an LA native who has found herself at home working in the fashion industry since 2002.  After working for big corporations such as Ocean Pacific (Op) by Warnaco and Juicy Couture by Liz Claiborne, Ali founded Udesign4u to help new designers develop and build their brands. Her true specialty and passion is consulting with designers and artists of all kinds and helping them find profitability in their art.      

http://udesign4u.com/

Suez Taylor | Business Strategist
Suez Taylor is a business strategist, journalist and multimedia director/ producer with Blackbeard Films. In 2012 she spearheaded an initiative to fuse legendary Designer Tory Burch and American entrepreneur Faisun Kamal with Bengali silk artisan, Muni Ahmed, for international market. In 2013 she co-produced media content for the LA based label APOLIS, a socially motivated lifestyle brand, to portray the power of conscious consumption and responsible sourcing. 

Jenn Hunt | Director of Fulfillment 
Jenn Hunt is a Maui mom-preneur and the creator of Reiko Rose, a subscription box company for girls and women. She received her B.A. in Anthropology from UC Santa Cruz and went on to become an archaeologist on her home island of Maui. She is a nature lover and mother and enjoys sharing her love of Hawaii through her budding business..
http://reikorose.com/


Special Thanks 

We want to take this opportunity to sincerely thank and applaud each and every individual who has been a part of our journey to date...you know who you are. Your hard work, creativity and kindness have made House Of Tomorrow what it is today!

An extra special shout out to our amazing Wanderluxe video crew:

Alan Matthew Sanchez | Producer

Michael Nguyen | Filming and Editing

Suez Taylor | Guest Director

Leilani Siosan | Model

Niko Elaine | Hair and MUA

Social Studies | Music ( Thank you to Tom Smith for letting us edit to your incredible work ) Track: Terracur from  Developer 2012

Adeline Arts Compound | Set Design and support


Risks & Challenges

We have spent the last year and a half refining our swimwear designs and patterns so that we could take most of the risk out of the manufacturing process. Our styles have been fit tested on body types of all kinds... professional fit models, professional athletes, and of course all of our beautiful friends and family members. The jury is in and our fit is more than approved!

We have also solved production and sourcing issues working both domestically in Los Angeles and internationally on the beautiful island of Bali. Our fabric vendors are secured and provide us with the best qualities in the market today.

We are excited to run this campaign and bring House Of Tomorrow 2016 to our backers...Let the games begin!


Other Ways You Can Help

WE ARE TRUELY THRILLED to share this story of a lifestyle rooted in both the ocean and the sand with you through our products, contributing artists collaborations, as well as the causes we support...we ask you kindly to pass the word along to your own OHANA and share the campaign throughout your own social media networks!

THANK YOU FOR BEING A PART OF OUR JOURNEY...WE LOOK FORWARD TO BECOMING A PART OF YOURS!  MAHALO! \m/

Follow us !

IG | @houseoftomorrow

FB| https://www.facebook.com/shophouseoftomorrow

This package truely has everything for the beach lover at heart! You will get a Sans Pants graphic tee, a bikini set of your choice, a shibori beach throw from Warp & Weft Dye Co and all $1-$30 rewards sent to you in a very special House Of Tomorrow beach tote!


Wholesale stockist package of 5 of our BESTSELLING Fullpiece, The Pele in classic black (Vana). Delivery dates negotiable.


THE POINT:  


What We Need & What You Get

 



Help us to make our dream world of Wanderluxe Swimwear a reality! House of Tomorrow needs to meet or exceed our goal of $25k to cover costing for the following key elements for our 2016 collections:


-Pattern Making. We employ freelance fit specialists to perfect each design's level of support and comfort.
-Fabrics and Trims. We carefully select high quality imported Italian Lycra, ultra fine gauge Neoprene, and super soft elastic trim.
-Cutting. Believe it or not, cutting is an art and business of its own. Factories cut the fabric with electronic rotary blades, quickly, and consistently to scale.
-Sewing. Our sewing operators are hardworking Angelenos  who love California the way we do, and we're proud to support their dreams, too!
- Printing. We truly believe in the beauty and importance of vibrant, original prints in any swimwear line. Your donations will help us bring the print portion of our SS16 collection to life. Money will go to the development of artwork as well as the cost of sublimation and screen printing. Our backers will have first dibs on all printed styles for SS16!
-Marketing. At House Of Tomorrow we believe that clear and beautiful storytelling are the keys to success. We have invested in models, photographers, brand ambassadors, graphic designers, and cinematographers in order to present a unique and powerful SS16 campaign...Our backers will be helping to bring our stunning story to the eyes of future customers as well as retailers.
-The Website. Startup costs add up, and we have spent a pretty penny perfecting the look, feel, and functionality of our web-store. Your donations will help us cover the costs to bring our primary retail point of sale to life and to the world!
-Indie GoGo fees and rewards. Crowdfunding isn't free, so a percentage of all donations goes to Indie GoGo. The campaign and our carefully curated rewards will factor into the goal amount. We appreciate your support and want to reward our backers with interesting and creative gifts to say thanks!





The Impact
By supporting our project you automatically become a member of our community or Ohana, the Hawaiian word for family. We promise to keep our family of backers up to date on progress, rewards and anything else we have up our sleeves!
Join our newsletter here:  http://www.shophouseoftomorrow.com/#community
Community is a concept we strongly believe in and strive to bring to life. We aim to do this by sharing the the talents and passions of our growing group of creative contributors. Our inspiring rewards would not be possible without them! We have collaborated with amazing artists, designers, and taste-makers to offer something for everyone. Our collaborations will continue on into future seasons ensuring inspiring and original product will always be offered. We look forward to an open door of creativity in our house!
The Bonus. As a part of our ohana, backers will be helping each and every woman who shares our spirit of adventure live out her dreams in the highest quality, most beautiful swimwear...who doesn't love happy beach babes and amazing bikinis?
Giving back is in our future. As lovers of the ocean we consider it our duty to promote sustainable swimwear... We have seen the wrath of plastic on the beaches of Bali and beyond and it isn't pretty. It is time to do our part. Upcoming styles later in 2016 will be made of a recycled version of our *Wanderluxe Italian Lycra. A portion of proceeds will go towards hands on care for our fragile coastlines and cleaner oceans through organizations such as Sustainable Coastlines Hawaii.

If you are interested in how fashion can play a part in preserving the Earth's oceans please watch this short documentary for an amazing example, a movement we look forward to joining.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pt6KlPCX1BU
If we meet our stretch goal of $50k during this campaign we will be able to add  Econel® ( made from %100 recycled polyamide yarns ) into our assortment much faster... Let the give back begin!


Meet The Team






Rachel Blevins | CEO & Chief Of DesignRachel was born in Hawaii and raised on the island of Maui. She studied Communications at Otis College of Art and Design and graduated with a BFA in Graphic Design. After college, her combined love for fashion, illustration and pop culture aesthetics quickly led her into a successful career designing for companies such as Ocean Pacific, Quicksilver, Roxy, Juicy Couture, and most recently Levis.


Kelly Carstensen | Fit Specialist and Pattern DesignerKelly has over four decades of experience as a couture seamstress and designer. She has been the in-house Tailor at both Barney’s New York and Nordstroms. Kelly has worked both domestically and Internationally as an independent tailor for diplomats and other high end high clients. She currently runs her busy studio in Oakland, CA.


Ali Zacharias | Director Of ProductionAli is an LA native who has found herself at home working in the fashion industry since 2002.  After working for big corporations such as Ocean Pacific (Op) by Warnaco and Juicy Couture by Liz Claiborne, Ali founded Udesign4u to help new designers develop and build their brands. Her true specialty and passion is consulting with designers and artists of all kinds and helping them find profitability in their art.      
http://udesign4u.com/


Suez Taylor | Business Strategist
Suez Taylor is a business strategist, journalist and multimedia director/ producer with Blackbeard Films. In 2012 she spearheaded an initiative to fuse legendary Designer Tory Burch and American entrepreneur Faisun Kamal with Bengali silk artisan, Muni Ahmed, for international market. In 2013 she co-produced media content for the LA based label APOLIS, a socially motivated lifestyle brand, to portray the power of conscious consumption and responsible sourcing. 

Jenn Hunt | Director of Fulfillment 
Jenn Hunt is a Maui mom-preneur and the creator of Reiko Rose, a subscription box company for girls and women. She received her B.A. in Anthropology from UC Santa Cruz and went on to become an archaeologist on her home island of Maui. She is a nature lover and mother and enjoys sharing her love of Hawaii through her budding business..
http://reikorose.com/
Special Thanks 

We want to take this opportunity to sincerely thank and applaud each and every individual who has been a part of our journey to date...you know who you are. Your hard work, creativity and kindness have made House Of Tomorrow what it is today!
An extra special shout out to our amazing Wanderluxe video crew:
Alan Matthew Sanchez | Producer
Michael Nguyen | Filming and Editing
Suez Taylor | Guest Director
Leilani Siosan | Model
Niko Elaine | Hair and MUA
Social Studies | Music ( Thank you to Tom Smith for letting us edit to your incredible work ) Track: Terracur from  Developer 2012
Adeline Arts Compound | Set Design and support

Risks & Challenges

We have spent the last year and a half refining our swimwear designs and patterns so that we could take most of the risk out of the manufacturing process. Our styles have been fit tested on body types of all kinds... professional fit models, professional athletes, and of course all of our beautiful friends and family members. The jury is in and our fit is more than approved!

We have also solved production and sourcing issues working both domestically in Los Angeles and internationally on the beautiful island of Bali. Our fabric vendors are secured and provide us with the best qualities in the market today.
We are excited to run this campaign and bring House Of Tomorrow 2016 to our backers...Let the games begin!


Other Ways You Can Help




WE ARE TRUELY THRILLED to share this story of a lifestyle rooted in both the ocean and the sand with you through our products, contributing artists collaborations, as well as the causes we support...we ask you kindly to pass the word along to your own OHANA and share the campaign throughout your own social media networks!THANK YOU FOR BEING A PART OF OUR JOURNEY...WE LOOK FORWARD TO BECOMING A PART OF YOURS!  MAHALO! \m/
Follow us !
IG | @houseoftomorrow
FB| https://www.facebook.com/shophouseoftomorrow

story:
May your dreams be Golden...

Greetings and Salutations, my name is Mr. Golden, Owner & CEO of Simply Golden Apparel.  I would like to start by saying Thank You for taking the time to read thus far.  Simply Golden is a small, but up and coming apparel company offering personalized clothing using vinyl to customize jeans, t-shirts, and an array of accessories given the materials they are made of.  I created this company after having a major back injury and during rehabilitation having been told by many people "you can't continue this career and active lifestyle."  So while recovering, I looked for things to inspire me to at least get back to where I was physically and to regain my "can do" attitude.  In failing to find anything that inspired me PERSONALLY, I started making my own inspirations on clothing such as words and images that triggered motivation for myself.   Despite the occasional pain, I have made a full recovery and have regained my "Whatness."  Which is the ability to express myself physically through marital arts, lifting weights, and regaining my active lifestyle.   Therefore, Simply Golden was born to help others express their "Whatness."   
So what is your "Whatness?"
My campaign is to help upgrade needed equipment and widen our customer base to get the Simply Golden brand out there and encourage other people to express their "Whatness."  This is important to me because in my recovery I have seen kids being told the same things that hindered their spirit of expressing how they feel on the inside and who they are.  So to kids and grown-ups alike, "Self expression is IMPORTANT and motivation is NECESSARY to achieve anything in EVERYTHING!"  
With your contribution you will help Simply Golden's ability to create and offer a wider range of designs such as images and the type of clothing we can offer.

Please visit our website:  www.simplygoldenapparel.com

Have a look at our gallery/webstore and see some of the completed items that have been requested by others to define their "Whatness."
FUNDS NEEDED:
We need to raise $2,150.00 for the expansion and upgrades as itemized below:
  • $800.00 going towards 15"x15" machine (upgrade from current one)
  • $400.00 going towards Vinyl inventory stock (mixed colors and types)
  • $250.00 going towards Website Maintenance (1-year subscription)
  • $300.00 going towards Adobe illustrator software  (computer upgrade)
  • $300.00 going towards Apparel inventory stock (mixed colors and styles)
  • $100.00 going towards Miscellaneous (shipping fees, etc.)

Unique Perks:

Here are some exciting perks that can be yours with your contribution to Simply Golden Apparel and helping us reach our goals.

  • Personalized Thank You! on our website and copy mailed to you.
  • 1- Free Simply Golden logo t-shirt!
  • 1 -Free Simply Golden logo t-shirt & 2 can koozies (his&hers)!
  • 1- Free Simply Golden design t-shirt & 1 Free personalized t-shirt!

If we do not reach our desired goal, the funds received from this campaign will still go towards purchasing the above items that can be afforded for the company. 
So have you figured out your "Whatness" yet?

What is it about you that makes you who you are...

Is it your family, maybe? Your love for a sport? Your job? Your artistic views or hobby?  or are you just an animal lover?  

Express your "Whatness" with Simply Golden!


Simply Golden Apparel has chosen to use vinyl due to its durability and longevity.   However, sometimes perfection in exact detail can be a challenge.  In personalized pieces we strive to give you exactly what you ask for. Customer Satisfaction is our number one concern, this is why the equipment upgrades and materials listed above are vital to our success.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't financially contribute, but we would ask that you spread the word about Simply Golden Apparel because we also specialize in making family and church event t-shirts, work apparel, creating business logos and more.

Please help make some noise about Simply Golden by sharing with your family and friends on social media to check out our website www.simplygoldenapparel.com and/or contribute to our campaign.  Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

In closing, Thank you very much for helping us keep the World expressing their "Whatness!"  

"Don't forget to express your "Whatness" everyday!"  -Mr. Golden

story: Touche' Mei is a clothing line that I, Solomon D Steeley Jr has closely crafted over many years of designing. Throughout my travels I have been inspired by many things, two most notable are the traditional aspect and appeal of female oriental clothing, and the rich sleek look of Italian (European) female fashion. I met with many designers, trained and went to school at Messiah College for Textile Design, I furthered my work and creativity through local fashion shows, Universities, and regional events. I always wanted to do better and be better. I have been told may times through out my life that my clothing should be in stores. Clothing that is beautiful, artistic form fitting but modest, something everyone would want to wear. I have taught male and female runway and well as hosted fashion events and charity events. Most notably I worked as a intern with RUNE NYC in Manhattan, NY, and closely learned the management side of the fashion industry, distribution, cost, pricing, etc. RUNE NYC Creative Director is still currently assisting me in my endeavors to create a beautiful line. I have met many companies, and people within the fashion industry on the East Coast who are ready and willing to push my line forward after I get the R&D, and my samples made. I have a small but experienced advertising team who are all waiting for my line to be completed so their work can start.

story:
UPDATE: As of 2:30PM EST on July 28th we will have launched a new Indiegogo campaign.

If you missed out on the first chance go grab your Thin Ice tech please find the new campaign HERE: igg.me/at/thinice.com


The first technologically-enhanced weight-loss apparel that hacks your metabolism to help you lose weight.

HEADLINES


1. You WILL still receive your products if our goal is not reached so don't hesitate to buy today!


2. Thin Ice is so cool that Adam Paulin, the Founder, was invited to pitch Thin Ice on CBC's Dragons' Den for their 10th Season!


3. Thin Ice is donating 5% of ALL Indiegogo funding to feeding starving children around the world. Help us balance the global scale by feeding the hungry as you lean out.



THE STORY


How the metabolic hack works

Did you know you can trick your body into thinking it’s in a colder environment than it actually is by stimulating specific regions with cold temperatures? This creates a cascade of responses in your body that kick your metabolism into overdrive, This let's you burn unwanted fat and get leaner, all while letting your body do the work for you!


Wait, won’t I feel cold?

Don’t worry, this stimulation is so mild you’ll forget all about it after just a few seconds of adaptation. The same concept is at play every time you wade into a pool. You feel cold for a few seconds and then the sensation vanishes. The pool doesn’t warm up, it’s your body that warms up from within to counteract its new environment. Besides, if you do feel the chill you can always adjust the temperature of your Thin Ice clothing to accommodate your comfort level. At Thin Ice, we want to have a long-term weight-loss management relationship with you. It's not in our best interest to scare you away by making you uncomfortably cold!

How Does Thin Ice Clothing Harness the Metabolism Hack? 

The Thin Ice insole and vest target regions of your body with high concentrations of thermoreceptors. These neural receptors alert your body to the presence of cold, triggering a metabolic response that generates heat in your core. 

As the core’s blood warms, it then must be pumped all the way to the extremities where the cold influence is being felt. The best part of this process is that your body does all this calorie-expensive work automatically without you even having to think about it. 

The tissue pathway responsible for this heat generation is called the Brown Adipose Tissue (BAT) pathway and it basically functions as your body’s internal thermostat. Even in room temperature, roughly 50% of your daily calories are burnt for no other reason than to keep your body at a comfortable temperature. 

Notice that you don’t undergo shivering in room temperature. This is because the BAT-pathway is completely different than the shivering mechanism. Thin Ice stimulates BAT and will not make you shiver. This allows Thin Ice’s patent-pending weight-loss technology to help you burn excess calories while being hidden discretely in clothing and apparel items.

So how do we know this works?

Thin Ice products might sound too good to be true, but we are proud to say that their underlying concept is based on decades of rigorous peer-reviewed scientific study.

Here are some respected journals and their published findings on the subject:


http://www.scientificamerican.com/article/supercharging-brown-fat-to-battle-obesity/


http://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa0808718

http://www.nrcresearchpress.com/doi/abs/10.1139/y78-015#.VU9x-NpViko


Besides the scientific articles on the subject matter there are also a plethora of anecdotal examples of the same temperature-related weight-loss effects at play. One of the most salient examples is that of Michael Phelps' diet as he trained for the Beijing Olympics. During that time he ate the 12,000 calories seen below on a daily basis:


Phelps was able to eat all of that (6 times more than the average person) while staying ripped. Only about half this calorie intake is explainable by his exercise regime and basal metabolic rate. The thousands of missing calories are accounted for by considering Phelps trained in a pool as opposed to land for 4 hours a day. Water is 14 times more thermally conductive than air is. This means heat was leaving Phelps' body much faster than it would have if he was on land leading to massive calorie burning to create heat to keep him warm. This is the exact same process that is at play with Thin Ice products, albeit without the sogginess!

This weight-loss method has been hiding in plain sight throughout our struggles and failed weight-loss attempts. Don't let it sneak away again!

If you are keen to embrace your inner nerd, there is more science we are happy to share with you. Check out the FAQ, and, if you don’t find the information you’re looking for, just ask us!


Hold on, can’t I just turn down my thermostat?

You can! In fact, many doctors recommend that you should add this to your weight-loss regimes. However, you can’t bring a cold room with you everywhere you go, nor would you want to as cold rooms can cause us to shiver. Imagine how popular you’d be if you tried to keep the entire office cold. 

The brilliant part of the Thin Ice system is that the entire foot/torso doesn’t need to be kept cold, but only strategically chosen areas covered by the cooling chips. This selective targeting means less discomfort while maintaining maximal metabolic response.

Best of all, the cooling you experience is totally adjustable to suit your comfort levels through your smart device. This effect will also persist for as long as you want - at the times you want - anywhere you go. So, yes you can turn down your thermostat but remember there’s no need to shiver at home to lose weight. Thin Ice has your back (and feet).

What comprises Thin Ice Technology?

Thin Ice technology uses specialized Peltier cooling chips to chill specific areas of the body. Peltier chips are also found in other technologies with compact cooling requirements such as microprocessors and various electronics. They essentially act as heat pumps, forcing heat to one side and leaving the other side cool. 

These chips are powered by an unobtrusive battery that's located under the arch that simultaneously helps to provide arch support.

The warmed sides of the Peltier chips are located on the bottom of the insole. The warmth generated by the Peltier mechanism can be dissipated through a variety of heat sink materials. There are also technologies that are able to capture heat and convert heat into electricity that are currently being explored by our engineering team. The Thin Ice engineering team is currently hard at work making sure the best possible heat dissipation/capturing mechanisms are combined in the final prototype for maximal comfort and battery efficiency. Hey, that reminds me, meet our engineering team!

The Thin Ice Engineering Team


Thin Ice also worked with a student engineering team from George Brown College on a contract dedicated specifically to exploring mechanism to increase battery life through connect mechanisms and for dissipating the warmth produced by the base of the Peltier chips.

Finally, Thin Ice has project in the works at York University in Toronto through their Innovation York program including 2 engineering specialist professors. The project is in the final stages of its review process. These professors would be exploring the optimal materials to maximize the effectiveness of Thin Ice products.

There is no shortage of talented minds working on the Thin Ice product research and development. For this reason, we expect to surmount all the engineering hurdles remaining in the Thin Ice product development project and to deliver you your very own Thin Ice package in line with our projected dates.

A closer look at our products

The top of the insole is made of a graphite based material perfect for skin contact. At the bottom we have a special heat sink insulating material that works well with the 5 Peltier Chips that reside within, which dissipate heat using power from a rechargeable 4-volt battery located in the arch support. Our engineering team will work to incorporate several kinetic power charging technologies into the final product. The more you walk the more you charge the battery!

Design Specifications 

          Size(s):              Women's 6-10

                                       Men's 7-12

                                       Inquire about children's sizes!

          Weight:               5 ounces

          Battery Life:      4-8 hours

The inner part of the vest is made of a similar graphite based material to the insole which has been designed specifically for skin contact. Outside we have a special heat sink insulating material which works with the Peltier Chips inside to dissipate heat using power from a rechargeable 4-volt battery!

Design Specifications

            Size(s):      Men's S-XXL

                                  Women's S-XXL

                                 Inquire about children's sizes!

            Weight:       ~2 lbs

            Battery:      6-8 hours




Wireless Connectivity

Thin Ice products use Bluetooth to connect with your smart device. 

Using your smartphone and the Thin Ice App you can change the temperature of your clothing to suit your comfort level, track how many calories you’ve burnt on a second by second basis, and set a delayed onset timer to activate the devices when you’re ready.

Battery

Thin ice insole features a removable battery that quickly snaps into place and is rechargeable through mechanisms within the technology that harness the kinetics of you just walking around as well as the use of a charging plate.


The Thin Ice Story

Thin Ice was created by personal trainer, former NCAA Athlete, University of Toronto Alumni in Neuroscience and Psychology, Adam Paulin, who is passionate about fitness and human performance. Here is his description of his journey:

“I’ve spent a lot of time asking myself how we can hack our bodies into optimal performance using science. There is a certain satisfaction in making your body do your bidding".

In Tim Ferris's revolutionary book, the 4-Hour Body - which everyone should check out - he talks extensively about cold temperatures and their weight-loss effects. I wondered why no one had harnessed this method in product form. There had to be a way to make using cold temperatures for weight-loss more convenient without having to suffer through 20 minutes of hell in an ice bath.

What stood out the most in the book was Tim’s comparison of the effects of ice baths versus stimulation using ice packs. What Tim demonstrated is that simply wearing an ice pack on certain parts of the neck you could expect to see 60% of the weight-loss effects as a 20 minute (torture-worthy) ice bath. Using a method you could implement thoughtlessly while watching Friends, you could see a big portion of the results you would achieve shivering away your calories for 20 minutes.

As a personal trainer at the time, I began to see the biggest factor stopping people from achieving an effective weight-loss regime. Clients would come up with every excuse under the sun to skip a session, but it really came down to one thing: going to the gym was not convenient. I knew this ice pack hack was the way to go, but was distracted from considering the matter further until I finished my studies at the University of Toronto. When I was done with my undergrad I knew I wanted to take at least one year off before braving med school applications so I did the only logical thing: I started inventing products.

This is when I remembered the potential of harnessing the cold temperatures to induce weight-loss. The Thin Ice shoe (the precursor to the Thin Ice insole) came to me quite early but I didn’t see its true potential right away. When I started telling people I was inevitably met with the same look of shock and amazement. “So, what you’re saying is I can lose weight all day and night just by wearing an insole?”. “Yes you can!”, I’d say. I started to realize I had something on my hands worth pursuing, so I learned to be an entrepreneur through many trials and errors, and benefitted from the mentorship of some of the greatest minds I’ve had the privilege to meet. 

I assembled an amazing team and the idea started to materialize. We now have a proof of concept prototype and a pitch in front of the CBC's Dragons under our belt, 


Dragons' Den was a surreal experience. Imagine walking down echoing stairs into the pitch black den only to be confronted with five rich investment giants when the lights are abruptly flicked on. You just have to remember you're one of the few people who will ever get this opportunity and continue with your pitch! I've sworn secrecy of the results of our appearance until the end of the next season but hopefully you'll be able to me on the show next fall or winter!"

What will we do with $50,000?

This is the minimum amount we need when combined with our other sources of financing to develop the product, perform any required modifications, manufacture it and ship it to our backers. 

By helping us get this very valuable funding and voting with your feet, we can put all the pieces of the puzzle together and provide you with your very own Thin Ice system.

Why you should support us

We really think that this product will be a disruptive force in the weight-loss industry. A revolution in convenience, effectiveness and design. We have built several prototype devices and would love to have you be on the front lines with us getting this product to the masses.  That's why were are currently offering 35-50% OFF the projected retail price of our products.  Its our way of saying thank you for supporting us in our infancy.

Here are several reasons why more financing is a better thing for you as a backer:

  • It will allow us finish development and get you the product faster.
  • It will allow us to run trials that help to quantify the results of the product so we can add standardized results to the app. This will let you know how many calories you’re losing using Thin Ice technology on a second-to-second basis!
  • It will allow us to start aggressively marketing our brand globally so we can alert people around the world of our new approach to weight-loss and help them to join the movement.

There are a bunch of discrete milestones we hope we can reach with you and we’ll be sure to keep you updated on which ones we’re approaching next! There will also be something new and exciting we can do with the brand with additional funding.

Another great reason to support this campaign


We will match 5% of all funds raised on Indiegogo with the direct purchase of food that we will send to hungry children around the world. 

We have partnered up with RTG group to make this carry out this task. Together we can balance the global scale of malnourished by leaning out the overfed and feeding the hungry. Every 6 seconds a child dies from malnutrition. Help us re-calibrate that clock, one child at a time while simultaneously investing in your own health. There is a reason "RTG" stands for "Receiving Through Giving".


Timeline


The Thin Ice Lifestyle Book

We are in the process of writing the Thin Ice Lifestyle book and plan to deliver on that by October. This will get your weight-loss results flying out of the gate and set the stage for you to take off once the technology is delivered. In that book we plan to provide you with the most convenient, effective and simple lifestyle guide to help you meet and exceed your weight-loss goals while optimizing your health and keeping your timebank full.

For sneak peeks of some of the strategies outlined in the book feel free to email us at support!

The Product Line

Our goal is to make the last deliveries of the Thin Ice products (insoles and vest) by Christmas. We will be transparent with all our backers about all updates to this schedule, positive or negative. We’ll be honest with you all the way through and will do everything we can to deliver on our projected timeline.

Iceland Getaway 

Our trip to Iceland will be slotted for April when the country is experiencing some of its best weather. The trip will be a retreat to experience the famous Norwegian hot and cold spa treatments which are some of the most ancient applications of the science behind Thin Ice. Join us to celebrate the final deliveries of the Thin Ice products in beautiful surroundings.

During the trip we'll also have top-secret company meetings and reveal to you, before anyone else on the planet, what the winning clothing addition to the Thin Ice line. Don't forget to cast your vote to change the course of Thin Ice history!

Kickstarter Video Service

Our Kickstarter video service will be provided on an ongoing basis starting a month or so after the campaign has subsided and the dust has settled. We’ll help create killer videos for our backers in the order that they purchased the package. The timing will largely depend on the amount of interest. Please take a look at a more detailed description of this perk in our FAQ section.



FAQ

Where do we ship? 

Shipping is available WORLDWIDE and is automatically calculated based on the country you select in the purchasing process. Shipping to Canada and US is 10 USD and shipping internationally is 49 USD.

When should I ideally use the Thin Ice Vest? 

The vest is light and comfortable enough to be slept in and versatile enough to wear under common clothing. It is sleeveless so you can wear it with a variety of outfits. The vest can also be worn safely to bed where you can burn significant calories while you are fast asleep. 

When should I ideally use the Thin Ice Insole? 

The insole is most effective when walking, sitting, commuting, working at a desk, lounging and generally going about your day. The insole can be worn in almost all footwear, including open toe shoes so you can even be burning fat during a night on the town.

What is the warranty?

We offer a 1 year warranty on the mechanical parts. The layer of the product that touches the skin is replaceable however, so you can buy those parts to keep the vest or insole looking and feeling (and smelling) like new. 

Technical FAQ

How do I charge the insole/vest? 

The insole and vest will be fully rechargeable using a charging pad which will be included with the product.  

Does it work with iOS and Android Devices?  

Yes, the app will be available for iOS and Android.

How long does the battery last?  

Around 4-8 hours for the insole, 6-8 for the vest. This may change depending on how much juice we can squeeze out of the kinetic mechanism. Remember, the more you walk the longer the insole battery will last. Walking more never hurt anybody in the weight-loss department either :)

How long does the battery take to charge?  

Around two hours from a fully discharged state.

What temperature range does it work with?

The temperature ranges from very mild to relatively intense. We are still streamlining the exact, optimal range to have you losing the most fat with the most possible comfort.

How safe is the insole for weight bearing?

You can safely wear the insole during low intensity activities like walking, lounging, commuting, working at your desk and doing everyday things. We recommend avoiding weight bearing exercises such as weight lifting, running, or any high impact sports. The vest is a good alternative for weight bearing activities that put pressure on the feet such as jogging.

What is the recommended length of use for the insole/vest?

As long as you feel comfortable with. If you experience any discomfort adjust settings using your smart device.  

How do you wash the product?

For everyday cleaning it is recommended to use an antibiotic wipe. If the material that touches the skin becomes too worn out you can replace just that layer. The rest of the vest or insole is totally reusable and doesn’t need to be replaced.

Other FAQ

Can I get the insole/vest in my size? 

Yes, the insoles come in the standard range of shoes sizes, women’s 6-10, and men’s 8-12. The vests come in sizes ranging from S-XXL for both men and women. If you ask us we can probably also accommodate child sizes. After all, little Jimmy can't run 5K while he's playing video games but he can lose weight wearing Thin Ice.

Who did your movie? 

Our movie was put together by us! If you enjoyed the video and want us to help you create your own please refer to the applicable perk.

The service includes 1.) a consultation session or two to flush out your idea and help craft the script. 2.) The organization of a day long shoot where in we arrange for a videographer to record you talking about your product, filming some b-roll and product demos, and 3.) professional editing, graphics, music and sound mixing. 

Depending on your location, the organization of the shoot will require some negotiation. So please talk to us! We’re a friendly bunch.

Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on Indiegogo are also non-refundable.

How do I get the Early Bird pricing?

You’ll have to hurry as we only offer a limited quantity (20) of Thin Ice products at such a ridiculously low price. What do you want from us!? We're already giving you 35% off for the campaign's set price!

Does the Thin Ice apparel offer different colour choices?

As Henry Ford was fond of saying, “You can choose any colour you’d like - as long as it’s black.” The clothing and insoles are black, but since they will most likely be hidden underneath your clothing, it won’t affect your fashion. However, if we receive a certain amount of requests for a specific colour through support, we’d be more than happy to accommodate those requests. Please feel free to share your ideas.

Will people with chronic diseases be able to use the product?

People with poor circulation or diabetes should consult their physician before using the products. This product does not cure any chronic conditions.

If I have questions, how can I reach your team? 

Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer.

For all unanswered inquiries regarding Thin Ice Products, contact us at  support@thiniceweightloss.com and we'll get back to you in a jiffy!
story_txt:
UPDATE: As of 2:30PM EST on July 28th we will have launched a new Indiegogo campaign.If you missed out on the first chance go grab your Thin Ice tech please find the new campaign HERE: igg.me/at/thinice.comThe first technologically-enhanced weight-loss apparel that hacks your metabolism to help you lose weight.


HEADLINES
1. You WILL still receive your products if our goal is not reached so don't hesitate to buy today!2. Thin Ice is so cool that Adam Paulin, the Founder, was invited to pitch Thin Ice on CBC's Dragons' Den for their 10th Season!3. Thin Ice is donating 5% of ALL Indiegogo funding to feeding starving children around the world. Help us balance the global scale by feeding the hungry as you lean out.THE STORYHow the metabolic hack works

Did you know you can trick your body into thinking it’s in a colder environment than it actually is by stimulating specific regions with cold temperatures? This creates a cascade of responses in your body that kick your metabolism into overdrive, This let's you burn unwanted fat and get leaner, all while letting your body do the work for you!




Wait, won’t I feel cold?

Don’t worry, this stimulation is so mild you’ll forget all about it after just a few seconds of adaptation. The same concept is at play every time you wade into a pool. You feel cold for a few seconds and then the sensation vanishes. The pool doesn’t warm up, it’s your body that warms up from within to counteract its new environment. Besides, if you do feel the chill you can always adjust the temperature of your Thin Ice clothing to accommodate your comfort level. At Thin Ice, we want to have a long-term weight-loss management relationship with you. It's not in our best interest to scare you away by making you uncomfortably cold!


How Does Thin Ice Clothing Harness the Metabolism Hack? 

The Thin Ice insole and vest target regions of your body with high concentrations of thermoreceptors. These neural receptors alert your body to the presence of cold, triggering a metabolic response that generates heat in your core. 

As the core’s blood warms, it then must be pumped all the way to the extremities where the cold influence is being felt. The best part of this process is that your body does all this calorie-expensive work automatically without you even having to think about it. The tissue pathway responsible for this heat generation is called the Brown Adipose Tissue (BAT) pathway and it basically functions as your body’s internal thermostat. Even in room temperature, roughly 50% of your daily calories are burnt for no other reason than to keep your body at a comfortable temperature. Notice that you don’t undergo shivering in room temperature. This is because the BAT-pathway is completely different than the shivering mechanism. Thin Ice stimulates BAT and will not make you shiver. This allows Thin Ice’s patent-pending weight-loss technology to help you burn excess calories while being hidden discretely in clothing and apparel items.


So how do we know this works?Thin Ice products might sound too good to be true, but we are proud to say that their underlying concept is based on decades of rigorous peer-reviewed scientific study. Here are some respected journals and their published findings on the subject:http://www.scientificamerican.com/article/supercharging-brown-fat-to-battle-obesity/http://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa0808718http://www.nrcresearchpress.com/doi/abs/10.1139/y78-015#.VU9x-NpVikoBesides the scientific articles on the subject matter there are also a plethora of anecdotal examples of the same temperature-related weight-loss effects at play. One of the most salient examples is that of Michael Phelps' diet as he trained for the Beijing Olympics. During that time he ate the 12,000 calories seen below on a daily basis:Phelps was able to eat all of that (6 times more than the average person) while staying ripped. Only about half this calorie intake is explainable by his exercise regime and basal metabolic rate. The thousands of missing calories are accounted for by considering Phelps trained in a pool as opposed to land for 4 hours a day. Water is 14 times more thermally conductive than air is. This means heat was leaving Phelps' body much faster than it would have if he was on land leading to massive calorie burning to create heat to keep him warm. This is the exact same process that is at play with Thin Ice products, albeit without the sogginess!This weight-loss method has been hiding in plain sight throughout our struggles and failed weight-loss attempts. Don't let it sneak away again!If you are keen to embrace your inner nerd, there is more science we are happy to share with you. Check out the FAQ, and, if you don’t find the information you’re looking for, just ask us!Hold on, can’t I just turn down my thermostat?

You can! In fact, many doctors recommend that you should add this to your weight-loss regimes. However, you can’t bring a cold room with you everywhere you go, nor would you want to as cold rooms can cause us to shiver. Imagine how popular you’d be if you tried to keep the entire office cold. 

The brilliant part of the Thin Ice system is that the entire foot/torso doesn’t need to be kept cold, but only strategically chosen areas covered by the cooling chips. This selective targeting means less discomfort while maintaining maximal metabolic response.

Best of all, the cooling you experience is totally adjustable to suit your comfort levels through your smart device. This effect will also persist for as long as you want - at the times you want - anywhere you go. So, yes you can turn down your thermostat but remember there’s no need to shiver at home to lose weight. Thin Ice has your back (and feet).


What comprises Thin Ice Technology?

Thin Ice technology uses specialized Peltier cooling chips to chill specific areas of the body. Peltier chips are also found in other technologies with compact cooling requirements such as microprocessors and various electronics. They essentially act as heat pumps, forcing heat to one side and leaving the other side cool. 
These chips are powered by an unobtrusive battery that's located under the arch that simultaneously helps to provide arch support.

The warmed sides of the Peltier chips are located on the bottom of the insole. The warmth generated by the Peltier mechanism can be dissipated through a variety of heat sink materials. There are also technologies that are able to capture heat and convert heat into electricity that are currently being explored by our engineering team. The Thin Ice engineering team is currently hard at work making sure the best possible heat dissipation/capturing mechanisms are combined in the final prototype for maximal comfort and battery efficiency. Hey, that reminds me, meet our engineering team!

The Thin Ice Engineering Team


Thin Ice also worked with a student engineering team from George Brown College on a contract dedicated specifically to exploring mechanism to increase battery life through connect mechanisms and for dissipating the warmth produced by the base of the Peltier chips.Finally, Thin Ice has project in the works at York University in Toronto through their Innovation York program including 2 engineering specialist professors. The project is in the final stages of its review process. These professors would be exploring the optimal materials to maximize the effectiveness of Thin Ice products.

There is no shortage of talented minds working on the Thin Ice product research and development. For this reason, we expect to surmount all the engineering hurdles remaining in the Thin Ice product development project and to deliver you your very own Thin Ice package in line with our projected dates.


A closer look at our productsThe top of the insole is made of a graphite based material perfect for skin contact. At the bottom we have a special heat sink insulating material that works well with the 5 Peltier Chips that reside within, which dissipate heat using power from a rechargeable 4-volt battery located in the arch support. Our engineering team will work to incorporate several kinetic power charging technologies into the final product. The more you walk the more you charge the battery!


Design Specifications 

          Size(s):              Women's 6-10
                                       Men's 7-12                                       Inquire about children's sizes!
          Weight:               5 ounces
          Battery Life:      4-8 hours



The inner part of the vest is made of a similar graphite based material to the insole which has been designed specifically for skin contact. Outside we have a special heat sink insulating material which works with the Peltier Chips inside to dissipate heat using power from a rechargeable 4-volt battery!

Design Specifications
            Size(s):      Men's S-XXL
                                  Women's S-XXL                                 Inquire about children's sizes!
            Weight:       ~2 lbs
            Battery:      6-8 hours


















Wireless Connectivity

Thin Ice products use Bluetooth to connect with your smart device. 
Using your smartphone and the Thin Ice App you can change the temperature of your clothing to suit your comfort level, track how many calories you’ve burnt on a second by second basis, and set a delayed onset timer to activate the devices when you’re ready.

Battery

Thin ice insole features a removable battery that quickly snaps into place and is rechargeable through mechanisms within the technology that harness the kinetics of you just walking around as well as the use of a charging plate.

The Thin Ice Story

Thin Ice was created by personal trainer, former NCAA Athlete, University of Toronto Alumni in Neuroscience and Psychology, Adam Paulin, who is passionate about fitness and human performance. Here is his description of his journey:

“I’ve spent a lot of time asking myself how we can hack our bodies into optimal performance using science. There is a certain satisfaction in making your body do your bidding".
In Tim Ferris's revolutionary book, the 4-Hour Body - which everyone should check out - he talks extensively about cold temperatures and their weight-loss effects. I wondered why no one had harnessed this method in product form. There had to be a way to make using cold temperatures for weight-loss more convenient without having to suffer through 20 minutes of hell in an ice bath.

What stood out the most in the book was Tim’s comparison of the effects of ice baths versus stimulation using ice packs. What Tim demonstrated is that simply wearing an ice pack on certain parts of the neck you could expect to see 60% of the weight-loss effects as a 20 minute (torture-worthy) ice bath. Using a method you could implement thoughtlessly while watching Friends, you could see a big portion of the results you would achieve shivering away your calories for 20 minutes.


As a personal trainer at the time, I began to see the biggest factor stopping people from achieving an effective weight-loss regime. Clients would come up with every excuse under the sun to skip a session, but it really came down to one thing: going to the gym was not convenient. I knew this ice pack hack was the way to go, but was distracted from considering the matter further until I finished my studies at the University of Toronto. When I was done with my undergrad I knew I wanted to take at least one year off before braving med school applications so I did the only logical thing: I started inventing products.
This is when I remembered the potential of harnessing the cold temperatures to induce weight-loss. The Thin Ice shoe (the precursor to the Thin Ice insole) came to me quite early but I didn’t see its true potential right away. When I started telling people I was inevitably met with the same look of shock and amazement. “So, what you’re saying is I can lose weight all day and night just by wearing an insole?”. “Yes you can!”, I’d say. I started to realize I had something on my hands worth pursuing, so I learned to be an entrepreneur through many trials and errors, and benefitted from the mentorship of some of the greatest minds I’ve had the privilege to meet. 

I assembled an amazing team and the idea started to materialize. We now have a proof of concept prototype and a pitch in front of the CBC's Dragons under our belt, Dragons' Den was a surreal experience. Imagine walking down echoing stairs into the pitch black den only to be confronted with five rich investment giants when the lights are abruptly flicked on. You just have to remember you're one of the few people who will ever get this opportunity and continue with your pitch! I've sworn secrecy of the results of our appearance until the end of the next season but hopefully you'll be able to me on the show next fall or winter!"What will we do with $50,000?This is the minimum amount we need when combined with our other sources of financing to develop the product, perform any required modifications, manufacture it and ship it to our backers. By helping us get this very valuable funding and voting with your feet, we can put all the pieces of the puzzle together and provide you with your very own Thin Ice system.Why you should support usWe really think that this product will be a disruptive force in the weight-loss industry. A revolution in convenience, effectiveness and design. We have built several prototype devices and would love to have you be on the front lines with us getting this product to the masses.  That's why were are currently offering 35-50% OFF the projected retail price of our products.  Its our way of saying thank you for supporting us in our infancy.Here are several reasons why more financing is a better thing for you as a backer:

It will allow us to start aggressively marketing our brand globally so we can alert people around the world of our new approach to weight-loss and help them to join the movement.
There are a bunch of discrete milestones we hope we can reach with you and we’ll be sure to keep you updated on which ones we’re approaching next! There will also be something new and exciting we can do with the brand with additional funding.Another great reason to support this campaignWe will match 5% of all funds raised on Indiegogo with the direct purchase of food that we will send to hungry children around the world. We have partnered up with RTG group to make this carry out this task. Together we can balance the global scale of malnourished by leaning out the overfed and feeding the hungry. Every 6 seconds a child dies from malnutrition. Help us re-calibrate that clock, one child at a time while simultaneously investing in your own health. There is a reason "RTG" stands for "Receiving Through Giving".
