story:
Why the Red Frog Sno Boot?

The problem is there have only ever been two kinds of winter boots. Those that are warm, and those that are beautiful. Until now it was a ‘never the twain shall meet’ situation. We're here to offer a solution, The Sno Boot, the warmest winter boot, the most stylish winter boot you'll ever need.

Never again will someone ask where you parked your skidoo, never again will you have to do the I-gotta-pee dance to keep your feet warm when it's 30 below and you're waiting to get inside a club. These boots are warm, these boots are comfy and they're made of 100% sustainable materials. Beat that.

 

Best Grip Possible on Ice, Snow and Tile Floors

These boots are too cool to take off and leave at the door, so we made them to have the best grip on those shiny tile floors that seem to cover every mall, office and bank the world over. Can you think of anything that grips ice and snow better than tire rubber? We can’t. Even better, they're non-scuffing  and won’t mark floors.

This ancient knowledge was lost to a modern world but now has been been reborn with a bit of help from modern science and a bunch of hard working folks who want to make a change for the better.

Felt - The warmest, most natural thing for your feet

100% Natural Merino Wool

All our wool is Merino long fiber wool from Australia and New Zealand, imported to Mexico City where it is processed in one of the few wool factories left in this hemisphere. It's long fibers ensure that warm air is trapped inside and cold air is kept out, ensuring your feet are toasty warm in the worst of conditions.

Water be gone, I command Thee!

Wool has a natural oil called lanolin that makes it water resistant. Our wool is sprayed with the best Spanish made water repellents (three coats no less) to make water bead up and roll away like water off a sheep’s back. It all adds up to boots that winter can’t touch. Ever see a soggy sheep? We think not.

The Process (from Field to Feet)

We use only the finest merino wool, blended, unbleached and 100% natural. Taken from more than willing sheep in Australia and shipped all the way to Mexico where it is cleaned and carded, brushed and pressed into high density felt that traps air between the fibres (trapped air is the best insulator).

It's not the cold air coming in, it's the warm air rushing out....

That's what makes your feet cold, they try to heat up the ground beneath them and it draws the warmth straight out the bottom of your boots, If you use leather or plastic soles it won't matter what's above them, the cold air rushes out the bottom, like water from a faucet.

Upcycle, Repurpose, Take Something Old and Make Something Stunning

Hand made, Custom made, Every pair

Custom made to fit your feet. Yes, we do special requests, one large/one small, one narrow/one wide, a little of this/a little of that. Get creative, each pair is made to order. Custom made, bespoke, made to measure, done up right, your name written all over them, tailor made, call it what you will, these boots are yours and yours alone.

Comfort, Warmth and Beauty

Real Reviews for Red Frog Boots...

Helping the Planet With Style...

The Rewards of Supporting This Campaign

Time Line From Start To Finish

Measurement (this part is important)...

 ALL ABOUT US...
story_txt: Why the Red Frog Sno Boot?The problem is there have only ever been two kinds of winter boots. Those that are warm, and those that are beautiful. Until now it was a ‘never the twain shall meet’ situation. We're here to offer a solution, The Sno Boot, the warmest winter boot, the most stylish winter boot you'll ever need.Never again will someone ask where you parked your skidoo, never again will you have to do the I-gotta-pee dance to keep your feet warm when it's 30 below and you're waiting to get inside a club. These boots are warm, these boots are comfy and they're made of 100% sustainable materials. Beat that. Best Grip Possible on Ice, Snow and Tile FloorsThese boots are too cool to take off and leave at the door, so we made them to have the best grip on those shiny tile floors that seem to cover every mall, office and bank the world over. Can you think of anything that grips ice and snow better than tire rubber? We can’t. Even better, they're non-scuffing  and won’t mark floors.This ancient knowledge was lost to a modern world but now has been been reborn with a bit of help from modern science and a bunch of hard working folks who want to make a change for the better.Felt - The warmest, most natural thing for your feet100% Natural Merino WoolAll our wool is Merino long fiber wool from Australia and New Zealand, imported to Mexico City where it is processed in one of the few wool factories left in this hemisphere. It's long fibers ensure that warm air is trapped inside and cold air is kept out, ensuring your feet are toasty warm in the worst of conditions.Water be gone, I command Thee!Wool has a natural oil called lanolin that makes it water resistant. Our wool is sprayed with the best Spanish made water repellents (three coats no less) to make water bead up and roll away like water off a sheep’s back. It all adds up to boots that winter can’t touch. Ever see a soggy sheep? We think not.The Process (from Field to Feet)We use only the finest merino wool, blended, unbleached and 100% natural. Taken from more than willing sheep in Australia and shipped all the way to Mexico where it is cleaned and carded, brushed and pressed into high density felt that traps air between the fibres (trapped air is the best insulator).It's not the cold air coming in, it's the warm air rushing out....That's what makes your feet cold, they try to heat up the ground beneath them and it draws the warmth straight out the bottom of your boots, If you use leather or plastic soles it won't matter what's above them, the cold air rushes out the bottom, like water from a faucet.Upcycle, Repurpose, Take Something Old and Make Something StunningHand made, Custom made, Every pairCustom made to fit your feet. Yes, we do special requests, one large/one small, one narrow/one wide, a little of this/a little of that. Get creative, each pair is made to order. Custom made, bespoke, made to measure, done up right, your name written all over them, tailor made, call it what you will, these boots are yours and yours alone.Comfort, Warmth and BeautyReal Reviews for Red Frog Boots...Helping the Planet With Style...The Rewards of Supporting This CampaignTime Line From Start To FinishMeasurement (this part is important)... ALL ABOUT US...

story:
About us: 

We are small family business, based in Finland. Our mission is to provide our clients with the finest handcrafted leather products, watch bands and other accessories, for affordable price.

We believe your timepieces deserve the best watch band, that is why all our products are crafted individually, with high attention to details and using the best leathers and hardware. More information about our products can be found at www.finwatchstraps.com

By purchasing our product, you buy unique premium product for the wholesale price, directly from the manufacturing family and thus support small business development in Finland. 

We are happy to provide our customers with 100% satisfaction guarantee - in case the watch band do not fit you well or you do not like it - we will accept it back without any questions or will send you a replacement watch band. 

We know that every timepiece is unique so as their owners' tastes and personalities. Therefore, we provide customization service for each of our clients. Our goal is to make watch owners feel special and unique, able to underline their character and personality, challenge the status quo. Every our customer is a designer of own watch band: you choose the leather, the buckle and the stitching you want to see next to your timepiece. You do not purchase a standard watch band, you build it yourself. 

We believe that customization is a premium service you as a watch owner deserve.

We believe that every watch band is unique  when it is done by hand, without rush and with high attention to details. 

We believe every timepiece deserves a high quality watch strap. That is why we handcraft them with care. 

More information about the leather we use in our blog: https://finwatchstraps.com/blogs/news

Our products: 

For the Indiegogo campaign we offer Classic model of the watch band with 1 leather loop attached. Please, note, that Timex watch is not included into perks, only watch band. 

Please, choose the Horween leather you like: we offer Horween Dublin, Horween Derby, Horween Chromexcel leathers for your choice. The thickness of the leather is 2 mm - 2,2 mm. 

Horween English Tan leather watch bands: 

 

Horween Derby Nut Brown leather watch bands: 

Horween Black Chromexcel leather watch band: 

Horween Tan Chromexcel (horse hide)

Burgundy Chromexcel no.8 

Dark Brown Chromexcel 

Tan Chromexcel 6/7 oz 

Available in different  Horween leather color options: 

 

Choose the buckle: 

Pick the stitching waxed thread color:

 

Let us know the desired

watch band width (16 mm, 17 mm, 18 mm, 19 mm, 20 mm, 21 mm, 22 mm, 23 mm, 24 mm, 25 mm, 26 mm) 

and length: small (110-70 mm), medium (120-80 mm) or large (135-80 mm). 

What You Get

You get customized watch band,  built by yourself and handcrafted by us.  We will carefully craft it and ship to your country, without extra expenses for you.  You get it for the wholesale price in this campaign. We would highly appreciate the image of your watch with our watch band. Send it to us or use instagram hashtag: #finwatchstraps. 

The Impact

We promise to deliver you an excellent customized watch band for your timepiece!

We value your support of our small sustainable business development and encourage handcrafters from all over the world to promote actively their unique products. 

Order fulfillment 

Give us 10-15 business days to finish your order after the Indiegogo campaign ends. 

Shipping 

Shipping via airmail worldwide is included (without tracking code). The shipping will take 3-5 business days within Europe and 7-12 business days worldwide. Please, consider that custom procedures might take a few days in other than EU countries. 

Questions, suggestions and feedback:

finwatchstraps@gmail.com

whatsapp: +358 44 971 32 35 

www.finwatchstraps.com

B2B cooperation:

sales@finwatchstraps.com

story:
We develop a special switch called "Keyswitch" that can replace the conventional switches. Keyswitch is designed to cooperate with the Keycuff System, and it can be installed easily just like conventional switches.

No more tedious buttons and controllers！

No restricted operation space！

You can control your devices at any time, any place！

 

 

 

 

So far, the project is still in the developing stage. Simple prototypes have already been developed, and they can operate in the way we expected.

Controlling end

Three kinds of receiving end

 

For people who support us $299 or more, we will give you one of the follow T-shirt as a gift. You can choose the one you like and then contact us. We will send you the clothes one month after the donation.

 

 

 

 

Patent

The technology behind this product has been applied for national patent.

Patent number: 2017103764951

Please respect the intellectual property rights.

 

Now we are facing financial problem, so we really need your help to further develop the product. Once we get enough money, we will:

 

  • Update the campaign page (including more sophisticated prototype and a excellent product video) to show you the improvement of the project
  • Push the product to the final production stage

 

If you appreciate our project, please get the words out and MAKE SOME NOISE about our campaign!

 

 FAQs

 

It seems the accuracy of the bracelet is not that high. Is this true?

The bracelet is to designed to recognize gestures as accurately as possible. The position between the bracelet and user's hand is fixed, so user's physical features can be easily detected.

 

What is the charging method of Keycuff?

We choose wireless charging as the charging method of Keycuff. 

 

If I paid $299 or more than that, can I receive I gift if the campaign fail?

Yes sure! Doesn't matter the campaign is successful or not, the gift will be sent to you one month after your payment.

 

How can I get the Keyswitch？

For each Keycuff you will get one Keyswitch for free (e.g. 5 Keycuff = 5 Keyswitch), and the Keyswitch will be delivered together with your Keycuff.

 

 

 

Contact Information

Please contact us if you have any question or are interested in our project.

1. Send us a direct message on Indiegogo.

2. Contact xavierliu010@hotmail.com

story:
Where does my story begin?  Well actually it begins with the death of my father.  Then a few months later my house burned down.  Lastly, a couple of months later my mother passed away.  

So one morning I was out walking my dog thinking about life and I realized my ears are cold and I wished I had a hood.  Then I remember all of the times I was wearing my trench coat because it was raining or just cold outside and that it did not have a hood.

So this I call my V-8 moment for all of you who remember the V-8 commercial where they slap their head because they just realized the simplest concept.  So I started playing through my mind all of the stores, Target, Sears, Walmart, Macy’s, Mens Warehouse.  I realized that there is no such thing as a universably attachable hood. I went into the stores to double check and could not find it.  I did a patent search, nope not there. So right away I filed for the patent.

So now we have the INSTAHOOD!!!! The first universally attachable hood!!!!!

I think you will like what we have come up with.  We have sizes to fit everyone from age 5 to adult in men's and women's styles. 

We have two versions for connecting to your garment.

Magnet version for shirts, sweaters, light jackets.

Clip version for heavier garments and coats and physical activity.  (Use the clip version for jogging and sports activities)

We have hoods for every day. We have Rain hoods.  We have hoods for camping or hunting.  Lastly, our newest creation, the masked hood or the Ninja hood, a hood with a retractable piece to cover your face for those especially cold or windy days.

We can customize the hood with family pictures or your favorite saying.  We will be marketing to all the high schools,  universities, sports teams, corporations and we hope to have it in all of your favorite department stores. 


Or if you want to purchase it from home, visit our website INSTAHOOD.NET  and purchase it directly starting in July.


It will make FANTASTIC CHRISTMAS GIFTS!

What are they good for? Use your imagination!

Walking the dog

Hiking,

Camping

Jogging

Casually walking

For rainy days

For costume party or Halloween

For gifts and presents

Supporting your local high school or university

Supporting your local sports team

Gifts showing the company logo

And my favorite just looking cool.

We use high quality a materials for lasting comfortable wear.

If you would like, come visit our web page INSTAHOOD.NET to see more.

With your contributions we will rent a facility, hire employees and begin production.

Please contribute to the Instahood campaign and be proud that your were there to help this launch this new and innovative product.

story:
Twisted Whimsy Designs

Twisted Whimsy is a small brand with big heart. Designed by me, owner and maker, Joanna Otten. With a love to create and passion for spreading kindness, Twisted Whimsy's mission is to create with only vegan and cruelty-free materials.

I wanted a place where people could go, to find a beautiful wearable alchemy of strength and compassionate living. Where everything is handcrafted with care and when the wearer puts their jewelry on, they are reminded of our connection, their beauty and sacredness.

With a portion of each sale going to carefully selected animal rescue organizations, Twisted Whimsy aims to adorn you and your journey with beauty and compassion.


Cruelty-Free Mission

I take great pride in the fact that all Twisted Whimsy items are now vegan friendly. No leather, skins, fur or bone are used in any of my products and all of the weaving materials are from plant based fibers and dyes. It is my commitment to provide bold, fun and beautifully crafted cruelty-free alternatives :: that wonderous place where compassion meets visionary fashion.

photo via Romance Riders

Twisted Whimsy's Goal = $4,000

Twisted Whimsy is adjusting her sails and growing in new and exciting ways. Currently I am working to expand my offerings and update my branding to more closely match my mission and the heart behind Twisted Whimsy.

Your support will help me buy new materials, launch the next jewelry collection at the Axis Show in New York City this fall and allow Twisted Whimsy to begin to bloom into a completely sustainable wholesale business.

{Axis Show :: Axis is a fashion lifestyle trade event created for a new generation of trend-focused young women. With an emphasis on cross-category merchandising, Axis is an inspiring platform that reflects the eclectic way its clientele shops.}

  • $3,000 will go toward the booth fee to exhibit at Axis
  • $700 will help purchase new materials and continue production of samples and expansion of offerings
  • $300 will go toward campaign fees


Perks for Donating

It truly takes a village and I can not thank you enough for your generosity. As a token of appreciation for supporting this dream, I have designed several new pieces of jewelry, fun accessories and the opportunity to collaborate on one-of-a-kind creations.

YOU ARE AWESOME printed recycled cotton canvas tote ($35)


ORION brass earrings ($40)

DACIANA hand-braided bracelet with brass accent ($45)

CALLISTO handcut brass earrings with indigo cotton tassels ($60)


ULA hand-braided organic cotton tassel necklace with brass accents ($70)



OTSANA hand-braided organic cotton necklace with brass pendant ($75)


FIND YOUR WILD brass pendant necklace ($80)



ALAMERE woven brass necklace ($100)

model photo: Danielle Cohen {Be Seen Photography}


NATASHA brass statement necklace - EARLY BIRD AW 2015 collection ($110)

model photo: Danielle Cohen {Be Seen Photography}


AKELA one-of-a-Kind Collaboration Necklace ($250)
Jewelry is about a connection to your soul, reminders of your strength, your beauty, your wisdom, your heritage, your guides. Let's put our heads and hearts together and create an amulet you can carry with you each day. I'll send you a short questionnaire, based on your thoughts I will sketch up some ideas and send you several ideas to choose from. Then we will create a one-of-a-kind necklace that speaks of your soul and reminds you of your sacred dreams.



Whimsy for a Year ($1100)
Give yourself the gift of whimsy for a year. With this donation, every month you will receive a special package filled with magical goodies from the store and my heart. Each month will be different and always a surprise but each will be valued at $100 or more. It might be filled with new prints, jewelry from a current collection or new pieces that aren't even for sale yet, a cute little bag, wall hanging or sacred found objects and earth medicine tools. You can keep them for yourself or gift them to a loved one. How fun to be surprised each month for a whole year!



Risks & Challenges

Twisted Whimsy is a budding business. Each design is started and finished in house. Most often I work many hours, 7 days a week to complete orders because I am committed to the vision of taking this project and dream to it's ultimate success. Over a decade in the design world has taught me that not every step of the production process is full proof. Designs often take dozens of tries before perfected for sale. I am not perfect. I make mistakes, yet there has been no hurdle too large or unmanageable to stop Twisted Whimsy from blooming. With your help I am prepared, nervous and exited to begin this endeavor with all of it's risks and challenges!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't worry, if you can't contribute money, you can always help spread the love by sharing this campaign with your friends and family through social media. I love you and am ever grateful for your helping in any way possible!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.
Joanna xxoo

Instagram

Facebook

story:
"Disguisery" The Collective noun for Tailors.

The story starts with making suits from my bedroom.  I love suiting.  The way a good suit can make you feel is amazing.  But I also have a passion of design and art.  Anything where you can turn nothing into something with your mind and your hands.

So I studied a degree in Bespoke Tailoring at London College of Fashion, where I exhibited work in London and New York.  I worked with many great tailors from Savile Row to America.

After which I set up my own Bespoke Tailoring label.  David Adams Quirkessential Tailoring, a luxury brand offering fully bespoke, traditionally crafted, hand made garments.

www.quirkessential.co.uk

I have a small but frequent client base that I maintained whilst working from home.  This may sound like a luxury, but believe me, spending all your life within the same four walls can drive you a little stir crazy.

So I looked at a number of opportunities to broaden my horizons.  

I applied to the infamous Central Saint Martins to study their MA in Menswear Design, and was accepted by the late great Louise Wilson.

A combination of weighing up what I thought I would get out of the course, the passing of Louise, and the cost lead me to withdraw early.

I thought long and hard about what it was that I loved about the course, and how I could better use that money I would have spent.

What appealed to me was getting up every morning and leaving the house to go this great space.  A space with access to all kinds of machines, equipment and resources.  Not only that but a space filled with a rich network of creative students and tutors all doing their own thing.

What I didn't like was the academic restrictions, like being told how to layout a sketchbook and how I shouldn't worry about the commerciality of my work.

So I began search for a place that has one without the other.  All the pros without any of the cons.  A space that has the creative vibe of a university but without any of the restrictions, a place where you can play, learn but most importantly, make, and make money from your work.

But I couldn't find one.

So I decided to create my own.

I invested all I had, borrowed from friends and family, took loans and called in as many favours as I could.

I found an amazing location right on the edge of Hackney Downs Park in East London. A real Fashionista's playground.  This 900 square foot hall is part of EatWorkArt creative studios and is surrounded by 100's of other studios including recording studios, graphic designers, artistes, architects and so on.  Exactly what you need to help inspire and motivate you through the day.  It also has a cafe, gallery, event space and holds creative weekly markets.  Amazing.

So I signed the lease and The Disguisery Collective was born.

The plan was to tailor this large empty room into a space for people very similar to me who are either recent fashion graduates, fashion students looking to work after hours, self-starters launching there own labels, freelance tailors or even just a hobbyists who don't have the space at home.  It doesn't matter if they make costumes or pants, they are a milliner or a cobbler.  This is going to be a creative space were we can all work together and help inspire and motivate one another, skill swap and learn new things.  But most importantly have access to space and machines to create, make, network, promote and sell our goods and make a living.

The other thing Im passionate about is using the space to teach others.  In my time telling people what I do I have met so many who tell me they would love to get into my line of work but lack the financial support to either quit their job to study or start a new profession.


So to start part of this space will be offering short courses.  An inexpensive weekend or couple of evenings just as an introduction to tailoring that covers the basics.  This lets people dip their toe in the water and see if it's for them.

Who knows, as we progress I would like to offer more in-depth courses, bring in other practitioners from other disciplines to teach a range of courses such as fashion design and pattern cutting. 

In the future hopefully I can use this as a way of giving back to the community and offer free courses to local youths who wouldn't necessarily get the opportunity to learn these skills otherwise.

But one thing at a time.


The good news is I have almost finished.  I have spent the past 3 months setting everything up.  I have single handedly built a second floor, I built all the work benches and cutting tables.  I bought in all the machines and specialist machines such as a blind Hem, overlockers, steam iron tables, cylinder arm machines.  The website is live but needs a little more work.


I also have people visiting and getting lots of interest.

Unfortunately due to lots of red tap surrounding the building of the mezzanine it incurred some serious delays.  In turn this has caused me to go over budget and I have now run out of money right at the last hurdle.


All that needs to happen now is the installation of a fire-rated suspended ceiling`and electrical work mainly power to the first floor and lighting to the ground floor.  This plus some extra funds to help tie up loose ends like promote the collective once that work is complete, finish the website and online booking system.  That's it.

The Downstairs as it Stands


Please help! Anything you can give would be great to help me finish this dream, and not have my and my family's life savings go to waste.  I am so close now I can feel the potential buzz about this place.


Plus you're not just helping me but all those people who need somewhere to work or want to learn new skills to make a living in this crazy world.

Please share this and follow me on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

You can also share and follow David Adams Quirkessential Tailoring on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

Kind regards,

David Adams

story:
A.CHRISTINE Design is all about empowering women. We support this cause in a variety of ways...

ONE, through realizing that too many women are TIRED of sacrificing comfort for high-end fashion. We fully believe that the most expertly made luxury women's shoes should be comfortable, supportive, sensual, a piece of visual art, well-made and should feature the highest quality materials. That is why we stand by our mission to create uber comfortable yet sensual shoes for women, allowing her to feel more confident with every step.

We use an extremely durable and flexible medical-grade memory foam cushioning inside every one of our shoes, allowing the cushion to mold to your specific arch and foot shape. Also, on all high heel models, we use a discreet EVA foam platform, which provides extra cushioning on the balls of your feet, allowing for longer wear without the pain. In addition, we use a thin textured rubber sole, which is much more durable and has better traction than the leather soles used in most designer shoes. As we found that many busy women will have thin rubber soles applied to the bottom of their designer shoes at a shoe repair shop, to protect them, before they even wear them once, we figured it was smart to make shoes that already have soles you can actually walk and live in. 

 

TWO, we support female empowerment through giving back to the cause, literally. Ten percent of our profits go directly towards a female-focused non-profit called Catalyst Ministries, which seeks to rescue, rehabilitate, and empower women and children who have been trafficked, enslaved or abused, internationally as well as in the US. Feel free to check out more at www.catalystministries.net 

The THIRD way that A.CHRISTINE Design supports the female empowerment cause is in how we are choosing to set the values of our brand. As this brand grows, our marketing campaigns will seek to show the value, dignity, innate beauty and strength of a woman, rather than objectifying her. We value health and self-care, so will select models of all nationalities who are natural-looking, yet also healthy and strong. We do not believe that choosing only size 0 and 2 models represents what a beautiful woman is. 

And FOURTH, we seek to create a brand inspired by the uniqueness of each woman's individual spirit and beauty. Our main source of design inspiration is the female body, with its sensual curves. Other inspirations include art, nature and architecture. We feel that the designer shoe market is saturated with styles that repeat themselves, so we take great joy in bringing something different to you. 

 

THE COLLECTION

 

Aqua Suede and Leather Flats

 

Black Suede and Snakeskin Flats

 

Black Snakeskin Crescent Heels

 

Plum Snakeskin Crescent Heels

 

ADDITIONAL ITEMS

 

Mini Wonder Woman Leather Tassel Key chain

 

Black Tailored V-Neck T-Shirt with White Logo and 'freedom and empowerment' quote

 

WHERE THE MONEY WILL GO

We are asking for $10,000. The funds will go towards...

  1.  Ordering all lasts (foot forms) we need to create the first collection, in sizes 5-11 and different heel heights.

  2. Supplying the beautiful leathers (calf, deer and lamb) and snake skins we use to create the shoes.
  3. Creating durable, high-quality curved heels with the latest 3D printing  and injection technology.
  4. Testing and product development of new designs.
  5. Streamlining and continually upgrading the quality of the shoes.
  6. Purchasing necessary shoe-making machines, such as an industrial sanding machine.
  7. Funding occasional supply trips within the US.
  8. Costs associated with launching our online store.
  9. 10% of our profits go towards Catalyst ministries, helping trafficked women and children to be rescued, rehabilitated and given a new life of freedom and hope. Currently, Catalyst has welcomed their first rescued woman into their new local US safe house, and is working with partners in high trafficking areas all over the world to rescue and rehabilitate at-risk women there as well. 

PERKS

When you pre-order, you will be spending a fraction of the cost of retail, for a brand new pair of made-to-order hand-crafted shoes, made in the USA. We stand behind our products so want you to be completely satisfied. Additionally, 10% of the profit will go towards supporting Catalyst ministries in its mission to bring freedom and restoration to trafficked women around the world. 

EXCHANGES

We do offer exchanges if the product is still in new condition. You have 30 days once receiving your order if you choose to exchange for another size. Please note that your new size exchange will be made-to-order, so please allow time for this. 

CONTACT

If you have any questions, comments or concerns and would like to speak directly with Amy, please feel free to email amy@achristinedesign.com and she will reply to you within 24 hours. 

INSTAGRAM: @achristinedesign

FACEBOOK: A.Christine Design

CONCLUSION

In conclusion, we want you to be involved. We see this new brand-to-be as a movement, not just a label. So join in however you can, whether through pre-ordering for yourself or as a gift for someone you love, or through a donation. Everything counts and is so very appreciated. Thank you for being a part of this exciting journey!

 

Amy Ryan

Shoe Maker, Designer, and Founder of A.CHRISTINE Design

story:
Our Story

Fun.  Something we don’t seem to have enough of these days.  Just plain old fun for fun’s sake.  You deserve to smile and so do the people around you.

That’s why we created the Schithead.  To bring a smile to your face, to your friends and family, and to the rest of the world when you're out in it.  When you wear a Schithead, you let the world know that you are confident, yet you don’t take yourself too seriously — you feel good and you're ready to go!  Schithead makes that fashion statement.  It's the ultimate head trip!

Not only are the Schitheads totally cool, they are made of the highest quality material, with 3-dimensional embroidery and fine detail stitching. There are currently two Schithead designs. The Classic comes in Khaki and has an adjustable Velcro strap, and the Extreme Flat Bill comes in Black and stretches to ensure a comfortable and secure fit. 

Schithead Is For Everyone

If you're wondering if the Schithead is for you, rest assured.  Everybody loves Schitheads!  Some people tell us they already have one at home!  There's no limit to who will smile at you when they see you coming wearing your Schithead.  That's why they're also great as gifts.

With Your Support

We are asking for your help to bring more joy to the planet by donating whatever you can to take Schithead to the next level of production in order to spread the word and make people smile, laugh, enjoy and share some fun.

We want to thank you in advance for anything you can contribute and welcome you to the Schithead world.  It’s the Schit!

Shipping

As of now we are anticipating shipping orders between April and May 2015 "first come, first served."

story:
Love for Pin Up

Calendar & Album Project

Rio Designs Collaboration Calendar Project is a high-end small business, with a strong Global recognition, showcasing breathtaking creative designed pin-up images that capture the beauty and an array of sexy photographs including classic era style of Professional Model Debbie Abazia.

Love for Pin Up is a Vintage Fashion, Photography and Creative Design Collaboration Project based in Rumson, New Jersey USA and is sponsored by Rio Designs. The goal is to create a full size, 12 month, perfect-bound full color calendar of the highest quality.  This Collaboration Calendar will feature the utmost ultra-luxe images of Italian beauty Debbie Abazia, captured by Rebecca D’Amato Professional Photographer - Viaggio Images, LLC and BTS Photographer / Videographer - Creative Graphic Designer Christine Feldmann, with the purpose of bringing back the sexy and classy style of the old vintage pin-up classics of yesteryear.  

The calendar will be available in both print and digital formats, but our main concentration will be on the print version, just like in the good ol' days.

If an overfunding is met at a $5,000 goal we will be able to complete this beautiful venture and share this project with you.

Additionally as a bonus and in honor of the calendar’s debut, we would like to show our gratitude to your contributions and create a Special Edition: VW Classic Beetle Creative Graphic Design Photograph Album, featuring different array of gorgeous pin-up images alongside a fun PR Article about personal Pin Up life experience!  This Special Edition is co - presented By: Keep Calm And Drive A Beetle.

This Indiegogo platform aims to fund the printing and publication of Love for Pin Up Calendar, to offer beautiful pin-ups of all kinds to our subscribers, and the Special Edition: VW Classic Beetle Creative Graphic Design Photograph Album co-release issue can't be published without your help! 

If we reach an overfunding of $10,000 we will be able to do another incredibly cool Special Edition - currently Top Secret!

Why Love for Pin Up?  

Well… Why not!

Pin Up era evoke a time in history that was sweet and sexy. Pin Up Girl is always in control, and she has the power over her femininity. We love all things Pin Up – it is a form of art that is part of our history, with cultural and iconic imagery that is sexy and socially conscious. So we want to bring this art form to you, with Rio Designs Love for Pin Up Collaboration Calendar. Our calendar is classic and nostalgic, with a nod of appreciation to the fashion, makeup, hair and cute design with sexy attitude that makes Pin Up Model Debbie Abazia so lovable.  We want to take that feeling and bring it into today’s woman, without losing that perfect aesthetic, and with your help and support, we can.

This is a special calendar as it depicts an array of styles featuring the one and only Debbie Abazia.

This calendar can be used any current or following year(s). Per month basis or yearly and you can choose what year!

With your help we hope to reach our goal of $5,000 and launching the calendar at the beginning of December 2015 with a private event all of which by donation and support you will be part of this venture with us.

Please support our Indiegogo, so that we can put out our Love for Pin Up Calendar and Special Edition -VW Classic Beetle Creative Graphic Design Photograph Albumand a variety of extras BTS videos and photographs with the passion for Pin Up Collaboration Projects to life!

The Team

Rio Designs collaboration project is a division of a Public Relations, Graphic Design, Fashion Production Development team that collaborates with Model Debbie Abazia (Left) and Rebecca D’Amato (Center) – Photographer to complete a venture and passion for art and fashion photography.  Whether we're building an amazing venture of BTS photography, BTS videography, creating graphics or photography for ads and products, or anything a company may need support for, Rio Designs including our collaboration partners Debbie Abazia and Viaggio Images LL complete our fun and creative team.

Christine Feldmann (Right), Founder of Rio Designs is the lead Project Director of this beautiful venture and with great passion has shared her love for VW Classic Beetle with all of her friends, family and business associates including all things vintage...and all things Pin Up.  We can't wait to bring you this incredible piece of art - and art it is...

We love to give back and help others as well on this platform. We are so pleased to be a sponsor for other amazing projects.

How You Can Help

The biggest thing you can do to help is back our project financially. We have set up many different types of rewards, starting at just $2. 

You can also help by spreading the word through facebook, twitter, tumblr, blogs, and other forms of social media. Spreading the word of our calendar is just as important as backing it. Not only do we want to raise the money to make this, but we also want to get as many people excited for it as we are!

Where the Money Goes

A large percent of the money is going towards printing costs. Printing a calendar costs a ton of money, even a small PR business like ours. The remainder of the money will go towards photography, graphic design (those are, of course, temporary teaser images - covers shown), and other costs associated with generating the awesome content we have in store for you! We would like to launch our calendar release with a party to celebrate this beautiful venture with you!

Sponsorship Opportunity

If you would like to be a Sponsor we have a few perks to choose from to support our small business and enjoy the lovely Pin Up photographs of Rio Designs Love for Pin Up Collaboration Project.

Please support our small business and enjoy the lovely Pin Up photographs of Rio Designs Love for Pin Up Collaboration Project.

Thank you,

Collaboration Team

Much blessings and love! xo

Love for Pin Up
Rio Designs
Keep Calm And Drive A Beetle
Debbie Abazia
Viaggio Images, LLC

featuring different array of gorgeous pin-up images alongside a fun PR Article
about personal Pin Up life experience!  This Special Edition is co -
presented By: Keep Calm And Drive A Beetle.
This Indiegogo platform aims to fund the printing and
publication of Love for Pin Up Calendar, to offer beautiful pin-ups of all
kinds to our subscribers, and the Special Edition: VW Classic Beetle Creative
Graphic Design Photograph Album co-release issue can't be published without
your help! 
If we reach an overfunding of $10,000 we will be able to do
another incredibly cool Special Edition - currently Top Secret!
Why Love for Pin Up?  
Well… Why not! 
Pin Up era evoke a time in history that was sweet and sexy.
Pin Up Girl is always in control, and she has the power over her femininity. We
love all things Pin Up – it is a form of art that is part of our history, with
cultural and iconic imagery that is sexy and socially conscious. So we want to
bring this art form to you, with Rio Designs Love for Pin Up Collaboration
Calendar. Our calendar is classic and nostalgic, with a nod of appreciation to
the fashion, makeup, hair and cute design with sexy attitude that makes Pin Up
Model Debbie Abazia so lovable.  We want to take that feeling and bring it
into today’s woman, without losing that perfect aesthetic, and with your help
and support, we can.
This is a special calendar as it depicts an array of styles
featuring the one and only Debbie Abazia. 
This calendar can be used any current or following year(s).
Per month basis or yearly and you can choose what year! 
With your help we hope to reach our goal of $5,000 and
launching the calendar at the beginning of December 2015 with a private event
all of which by donation and support you will be part of this venture with us. 
Please support our Indiegogo, so that we can put out our
Love for Pin Up Calendar and Special Edition -VW Classic Beetle Creative
Graphic Design Photograph Albumand a variety of extras BTS videos and
photographs with the passion for Pin Up Collaboration Projects to life! 
The Team 
Rio Designs collaboration project is a division of a Public
Relations, Graphic Design, Fashion Production Development team that
collaborates with Model Debbie Abazia (Left) and Rebecca D’Amato (Center) –
Photographer to complete a venture and passion for art and fashion photography.
 Whether we're building an amazing venture of BTS photography, BTS
videography, creating graphics or photography for ads and products, or anything
a company may need support for, Rio Designs including our collaboration
partners Debbie Abazia and Viaggio Images LL complete our fun and creative
team.
Christine Feldmann (Right), Founder of Rio Designs is the
lead Project Director of this beautiful venture and with great passion has
shared her love for VW Classic Beetle with all of her friends, family and
business associates including all things vintage...and all things Pin Up.
 We can't wait to bring you this incredible piece of art - and art it
is... 
We love to give back and help others as well on
this platform. We are so pleased to be a sponsor for other amazing
projects.How You Can Help
The biggest thing you can do to help is back our project
financially. We have set up many different types of rewards, starting at just
$2. 
You can also help by spreading the word through facebook,
twitter, tumblr, blogs, and other forms of social media. Spreading the word of
our calendar is just as important as backing it. Not only do we want to raise
the money to make this, but we also want to get as many people excited for it
as we are!


Where the Money Goes
A large percent of the money is going towards printing
costs. Printing a calendar costs a ton of money, even a small PR business like
ours. The remainder of the money will go towards photography, graphic design
(those are, of course, temporary teaser images - covers shown), and other costs
associated with generating the awesome content we have in store for
you! We would like to launch our calendar release with a party to
celebrate this beautiful venture with you! 
Sponsorship
Opportunity 
If you would like to be a Sponsor we have 
a few perks to choose from to support our
small business and enjoy the lovely Pin Up photographs of Rio Designs Love for
Pin Up Collaboration Project. 

Please support our small business and enjoy the lovely
Pin Up photographs of Rio Designs Love for Pin Up Collaboration Project. 
Thank you, 
Collaboration Team
Much blessings and love! xo
 Love for Pin Up 
Rio Designs Keep Calm And Drive A Beetle Debbie Abazia 
Viaggio Images, LLC

story:
About this project: 

In designing his Flip Flops, the Artist wanted to set you apart from the crowd by printing his personal paintings on your Flip Flops. They are made of quality material and their design will remain intact and won’t be altered day by day. Summer is coming, we all love wearing flips flops. They are associated with the sun, the good times ... but they are much more than you think... fell the summer enjoys wearing them.

Through this project, our company is launching the DM brand name. Indeed, this is the way to share creative art work through accessories which have been designed and fashioned by the Artist himself.

The Flip Flops are offered in a limited edition, including two flanges of Fabric/Nylon, more resistant and very pleasant for the summer season. The sole has been manufactured to be lighter and more comfortable. All these elements have been established to achieve an unique product that meets high standards while being very fashionable. 


Each painting shows us a universe and a different ambience full of vitality and spontaneity. In this collection, you will find 3 different models of Flip Flops and a specially designed handbag, all inspired and created by the Artist.

The painting "La Joie" was given to the Montreal Children Hospital to bring a sense of joy and hope to sick children. The special designed handbag was inspired by the same artwork.

His inspirations come from the present moment, which allows him to give life to colorful creations, bright, original and charismatic. This painter has over 49 works to his credit.

We hope through this project disseminate his positive and unique influences.
You will find below the titles of the current collections: "In the time", "Dynamic", "Exploration" and "Ying & Yang". 

Dominique’s artwork were exhibited at various venues but most notably at the Michel-Angelo Art Gallery, one of the most prominent in Montreal.

He is a member of the International Academy of Fine Arts of Quebec province in Canada.

First we want to create the brand Dominique Marcotte and disseminate to a wide audience, works that come from passion and some emotions of a talented artist designer. We want through this first Flip flops project expand the range to other products to create unique clothing and accessories, such as handbags, swimsuits etc... If, like us, you believe in our idea, please support us. Every little gesture is a huge boost.

Captivated to support a great idea? We are delighted to see you interested in our project. Any help is greatly appreciated. Therefore, we are pleased to offer the following choice of rewards.

Great thanks to all our backers. We appreciate your help and support. We are sure you will love our new products. If you have any questions, ideas or suggestions we would like to hear from you. Contact us by sending an e-mail to: doumm@msn.com

story:
Quality You’d Expect to Cost Thousands.

Our mechanical watches are built to outlive you but don’t have life without you. 

With all the features, precision and design you’d expect from a luxury watch but without the bullshit price tag:

  • Automatic movement
  • Sapphire crystal
  • Anti-Glare Coating
  • Leather straps
  • Luminous
  • Water resistant up to 100 meters
  • Four styles to choose from
  • Month and day of the week dials
  • Quick release clasp
  • 1-year warranty
  • 42 hours of power reserve
  • Stainless steel case
  • All watches come with a winder

10% of proceeds from our IndieGoGo Campaign will be donated, in equal quantities, to the awesome charity Chefs Cycle for No Kid Hungry, as well as to the Central Texas Food Bank.

Four Styles to Choose From

Ships in February! Need it as a gift? Request a PDF Gift Voucher.

  • Four styles to choose from
  • All watches come in designer packaging
  • All orders include a free winder

 

 

 

Made Like a Watch that Costs Twice as Much

Our mechanical watches are built to outlive you but don’t have life without you. With all the features, precision and design you’d expect from a luxury watch that is more realistically priced.

Functional and Durable So You Can Live Your Life
Interchangeable Strap, Water Resistant, Deployment Buckle, Stainless Steel Case, Sapphire Glass

Simple Mechanical Design Made with Precision
Anti-Glare Sapphire Crystal, Luminescent Hands, Date and Day of the Month Indicators,

Get These Extras When We Meet Our Goal

Helps us reach $60,000, and we'll send all backers an interchangeable nato strap with your watch. Help us reach $75,000, and we'll send all backers an interchangeable nato strap and a metal strap.

 

About Outcast

 “The watches I wanted were $3,000-$10,000, I couldn’t bring myself to spend that much on a fucking watch. So, I made my own.”

Outcast Watches was founded by a watch connoisseur who was sick of the market’s lack of affordable automatic movement timepieces. Looking for a watch that reflected the authentic lifestyle Kevin lives became a mission to build a brand. Every watch has been thoughtfully crafted to compliment an existence that doesn’t conform to the ordinary or mundane. Outcast and its founder encourage you to escape the grid and go live your life.

Outcast Watches is a Veteran-Owned Business.

Outcast’s headquarters located in Austin, TX.

Outcast is More About Heart than Smart(watches)

10% of proceeds from our IndieGoGo Campaign will be donated, in equal quantities, to the awesome charity Chef Cycle and their mission of No Kid Hungry, as well as to the Central Texas Food Bank.

story:
If you believe in this brand and you really like it name, logo and designs!, please come along and support us on this long journey., Your improvement advices are welcome.

Our Story

Hello, I am Olivier , CEO-founder and Creative Director of the eponymous Olivier Ruca® brand. After 7 years as a Product Designer and Quality Controller at a woodstove manufacturer in Belgium, I moved to London in the summer of 2013 to seek new opportunities. I had my Eureka moment between November 2012 and June 2013, while trekking the Sierra Nevada in California and later on when at the Grand Canyon, Los Angeles, Chicago, Wisconsin, New York. While this was a fertile moment for creativity, seeing the dynamism of American entrepreneurism prompted the launch of the label. My affinity for all things leather and desire to work with flexible yet luxurious material is what prompted me to start designing ladies handbags made with genuine leather.

I have spent the 18 months in the studio designing the bags, and many different types of garment as well as making samples by hand. With Safari, the other co-founder and childhood friend, we prepared for this campaign by establishing key contacts with suppliers, sourced materials and assembled a team to build the brand and prepare our first official collection. My dream is to see my products on femous fashion show stages such as London, New York, Milan and Paris. 

Our Design  

We find inspiration from the colours of spring flowers, patterns observed in nature and sounds of chirping birds. Not withstand that I was a DJ for 12 years, my recreation time consists of playing different genres of music: be the latest hip hop track or a classic piece of jazz or the electrifying guitars of Jimmy Hendrix.

To gratify our eternal quest for beauty and elegance, at  Olivier Ruca®  we make bags that not only embellish the modern woman but also bring her closer to the beauty of nature.

#Selfina High quality leather bag

#Angelica cute small leather Bag

#Angelica cute small leather Bag/Black version


#Black leather Belt with a luxury gold Buckle. Available in different colours

#Our wonderful men boxers, in four different colours

Our Quality

At  Olivier Ruca® , we deliberately use full-grain vegetable tanned leather due to its quality, durability and ecological sustainability. We are confident our products will not only match your fashion sense but also offer the pleasure of having a high quality leather bagand Belts obtained at a fraction of what it would costs with exclusive brands.

Campaign Fulfilment

Our Indiegogo campaign will run until 01th July 2016, production will start on 16th August 2016 and we expect to complete shipment by 30th October 2016.

100% of the donations will be used solely for bulk production.

Project Timeline



FAQ

1. Shipping: we provide UK, EU & International Shipping for perks above £100, otherwise add the £10 International Shipping Perk.

2. Duty/VAT: if you live outside the UK and EU, you will be responsible any applicable Duty/VAT.

3. Customs: please note that unexpected delays may occur due to country specific customs policies.

The Perks

We are offering our Indiegogo donors discounts of up to 50% and bundles have extra savings.



Our Company Organization

The Team

Our team is as international as our inspirations and our vision

Olivier:  from Belgium: Creative Director  and communication

Angelo: from Greece: Spec Technician

Jo: from Spain : 3D Designer

Qadeer: from Pakistan: Production Controller

Tanbir: from Bangladesh: IT

Estelle:  from Belgium: Graphic Designer

Alicia: from USA: Fashion Designer

Félicien: from Belgium: Accountant

Rebecca: from UK : Sales manager

story:
Like most entrepreneurial endeavors, our journey began after we identified a problem...

Yes, that's me, suffering through 40 degree weather in Corral E prior to running the BoA Chicago Marathon back in 2013. On the day prior to the race, I visited the runners Expo in search of a shirt to wear the following morning, knowing that freezing temps beckoned at the race's start, and mid 70's towards its end. It was suggested by staff at the Expo that I either wear a sweatshirt (and discard of it a few miles in) or tough it out by wearing a tank top/tee shirt. I figured that the former option would result in me casting off a perfectly good sweatshirt, and the latter would result in my expending vital energy prior to the run due to my body shivering. "That's it?" I thought. "Those are my only two options?" (Another slightly better option, the arm compression sleeve, would come later). It was at that moment I determined there had to be a better way..

But, what could be done to solve this problem? Following an intensive search process, I was fortunate to have discovered the Apparel Agency in Chicago which specialize in bringing conceptual athletic apparel to life. After several months of collaboration, we were able to develop the Tearadactyl 1.0 prototype (seen below)

The goal of this first iteration of the Tearadactyl shirt was to prove that we could successfully develop a performance shirt which had arm sleeves the athlete could remove on the fly (concerns about the shirt's aesthetic value would come later). Mission accomplished, thanks to the lovely ladies who helped test the shirt's efficacy on the famous North Avenue Beach running path in Chicago! This was a good start, but we needed to go back to the lab and work on further enhancing the efficacy and aesthetics of our new creation.

About six months later, the Tearadactyl 2.0 prototype was born (see above). There were several changes made with this new adaptation including (1) changing the shirt material to a signature grey color composed of a polyamide/elastane fabric, (2) converted the side mesh sleeve pockets to two "self material" compartments located at the rear of the shirt, (3) added a heat pressed logo with the name "Tearadactyl" located on the upper back of the shirt and a heat pressed company logo on the front left chest area (4) added contrast stitching throughout the shirt for effect (5) maintained a front flap zipper pocket for an MP3 player along with a grommet hole to accomodate a headphone cord and (6) maintained thumb holes on each sleeve.

In our ongoing quest to create the premier and original convertible athletic shirt, we will be making a few additional modifications to our debut Tearadactyl model prior to its release to the public. These adjustments will include (1) adding angled mesh panels to each rear sleeve pocket to facilitate passage of precipitation/moisture (2) changing the contrast stitching throughout the shirt to an amethyst color for the women's model and a light orange color for the men's and (3) introducing a softer, thinner material underneath each armhole to cover the exposed zippers in order to eliminate chaffing.

We will also be kicking off our sales and marketing campaign with our Tearadactyl Athlete of the Month (see above photo for our January edition). The theme of our campaign will be athletes on location throughout the city of Chicago performing their fitness regimens while wearing a Tearadactyl Athletic shirt. We will also be presenting an original monthly music mix entitled "Tearing up the Trail with Tearadactyl" featuring Chicago's own DJ Anton!

https://www.mixcloud.com/tearadactylrunning/tea...


FAQ's

  • Where can I get more information about Tearadactyl Athletic? The best place to stay up to date on all things Tearadactyl would be either our company website (www.tearadactylathletic.com) or following us on our Facebook business page (facebook/tearadactylathletic) or our Twitter business page (twitter/tearadactylathletic)
  • How does a Tearadactyl Athletic shirt stack up against all of its competition in the performance apparel market? Firstly, we have a patent pending on the actual shirt design itself, so our product is in a unique and exclusive class of its own. If you consider the alternatives out there to help, for example a runner, self-regulate their upper body temperature, they would consist of utliitizing an old sweatshirt (and casting it off mid-run), the arm compression sleeve (which has storage issues while running as well as can be easily lost, and further only covers a part of the runners arm), or simply exposing your upper body to the elements in a tee shirt or tank top and dealing with all of the extremes the environmental conditions might present. There will no doubt be more high tech products in the future capable of regulating one's upper body temperature during a run, but the fabrics they will utilize in production will most likely be largely untested when they are introduced (carcinogenic?), expensive, and may not hold up well to frequent trips through the washing machine.
  • Is the Tearadactyl shirt designed only for runners, or might there be other athletic applications for this shirt? The shirt was originally designed with the runner in mind, however there are several other practical applications for our product including (1) hiking (2) biking (3) yoga (4) working out, (5) competing in triathlons,and an unlimited number of other athletic endeavors. Further, the Tearadactyl is, for all intents and purposes, an all season shirt as it can be used as a layering piece during the winter months, as a stand alone piece during spring and fall months, and in its sleeveless incarnation during the summer months (this shirt provides you with a range of options!). It is also comfortable enough to be used for everyday purposes such as going for walks or lounging around the house.
  • Will the Tearadactyl shirt be available in any other colors besides grey? The shirt will only be available in the signature grey color during our first year of production. Depending on the demand, we plan on introducing the shirt in a variety of other colors in future production years.
  • In what temperature range will the Tearadactyl shirt be most effective? Our product is designed to work in what we would call "moderately cold to warm conditions" (40-75 degrees F). If you find it to be a particularly cold day, the "closed containment" nature of the shirt can be enhanced by simply adding 1-2 air activated hand/body warmers to each of the sleeve pouches in the rear. The best part about this idea is these heat packs are both relatively inexpensive and biodegradable.
  • How big of a concern will chaffing underneath the arms be for long distance runners/hikers in relation to each respective zipper that encircles the shoulder region? There are underarm flaps composed of a polyester/spandex material located along the zipper line so that the runner/hiker's underarm will not come into direct contact with the zipper. Like any material that comes into contact with body surfaces while running or hiking long distances, chaffing can obviously occur. However, it will not produce any more chaffing than one might expect while utilizing any other shirt while exhibiting a running/hiking motion over a prolonged period of time.
  • What is the primary reason behind starting your business? I believe that athletes, in particular long distance runners and hikers, should maintain their body temperature within a narrow and safe range while engaging in physical activity. I further believe that the Tearadactyl Athletic shirt will provide athletes with both the most efficacious and aesthetically appealing manner by which to achieve this goal.

Risks and challenges

At this point, funding for capital expenditures constitutes our only challenge to successfully launching Tearadactyl Athletic.

After fully self-funding the design and legal aspects, including patent and trademark, sufficient capital is needed in order to fulfilll our orders. Likewise, sufficient capital is required to ensure the successful launch of our marketing campaign and to secure the future growth of Tearadactyl Running as a brand.

This was a good start, but we needed to go back to the lab and work on further enhancing the efficacy and aesthetics of our new creation.


About six months later, the Tearadactyl 2.0 prototype was born (see above). There were several changes made with this new adaptation including (1) changing the shirt material to a signature grey color composed of a polyamide/elastane fabric, (2) converted the side mesh sleeve pockets to two "self material" compartments located at the rear of the shirt, (3) added a heat pressed logo with the name "Tearadactyl" located on the upper back of the shirt and a heat pressed company logo on the front left chest area (4) added contrast stitching throughout the shirt for effect (5) maintained a front flap zipper pocket for an MP3 player along with a grommet hole to accomodate a headphone cord and (6) maintained thumb holes on each sleeve.


In our ongoing quest to create the premier and original convertible athletic shirt, we will be making a few additional modifications to our debut Tearadactyl model prior to its release to the public. These adjustments will include (1) adding angled mesh panels to each rear sleeve pocket to facilitate passage of precipitation/moisture (2) changing the contrast stitching throughout the shirt to an amethyst color for the women's model and a light orange color for the men's and (3) introducing a softer, thinner material underneath each armhole to cover the exposed zippers in order to eliminate chaffing.


We will also be kicking off our sales and marketing campaign with our Tearadactyl Athlete of the Month (see above photo for our January edition). The theme of our campaign will be athletes on location throughout the city of Chicago performing their fitness regimens while wearing a Tearadactyl Athletic shirt. We will also be presenting an original monthly music mix entitled "Tearing up the Trail with Tearadactyl" featuring Chicago's own DJ Anton!
https://www.mixcloud.com/tearadactylrunning/tea...


FAQ's


Where can I get more information about Tearadactyl Athletic? The best place to stay up to date on all things Tearadactyl would be either our company website (www.tearadactylathletic.com) or following us on our Facebook business page (facebook/tearadactylathletic) or our Twitter business page (twitter/tearadactylathletic)

How does a Tearadactyl Athletic shirt stack up against all of its competition in the performance apparel market? Firstly, we have a patent pending on the actual shirt design itself, so our product is in a unique and exclusive class of its own. If you consider the alternatives out there to help, for example a runner, self-regulate their upper body temperature, they would consist of utliitizing an old sweatshirt (and casting it off mid-run), the arm compression sleeve (which has storage issues while running as well as can be easily lost, and further only covers a part of the runners arm), or simply exposing your upper body to the elements in a tee shirt or tank top and dealing with all of the extremes the environmental conditions might present. There will no doubt be more high tech products in the future capable of regulating one's upper body temperature during a run, but the fabrics they will utilize in production will most likely be largely untested when they are introduced (carcinogenic?), expensive, and may not hold up well to frequent trips through the washing machine.

Is the Tearadactyl shirt designed only for runners, or might there be other athletic applications for this shirt? The shirt was originally designed with the runner in mind, however there are several other practical applications for our product including (1) hiking (2) biking (3) yoga (4) working out, (5) competing in triathlons,and an unlimited number of other athletic endeavors. Further, the Tearadactyl is, for all intents and purposes, an all season shirt as it can be used as a layering piece during the winter months, as a stand alone piece during spring and fall months, and in its sleeveless incarnation during the summer months (this shirt provides you with a range of options!). It is also comfortable enough to be used for everyday purposes such as going for walks or lounging around the house.

Will the Tearadactyl shirt be available in any other colors besides grey? The shirt will only be available in the signature grey color during our first year of production. Depending on the demand, we plan on introducing the shirt in a variety of other colors in future production years.

In what temperature range will the Tearadactyl shirt be most effective? Our product is designed to work in what we would call "moderately cold to warm conditions" (40-75 degrees F). If you find it to be a particularly cold day, the "closed containment" nature of the shirt can be enhanced by simply adding 1-2 air activated hand/body warmers to each of the sleeve pouches in the rear. The best part about this idea is these heat packs are both relatively inexpensive and biodegradable.

How big of a concern will chaffing underneath the arms be for long distance runners/hikers in relation to each respective zipper that encircles the shoulder region? There are underarm flaps composed of a polyester/spandex material located along the zipper line so that the runner/hiker's underarm will not come into direct contact with the zipper. Like any material that comes into contact with body surfaces while running or hiking long distances, chaffing can obviously occur. However, it will not produce any more chaffing than one might expect while utilizing any other shirt while exhibiting a running/hiking motion over a prolonged period of time.

What is the primary reason behind starting your business? I believe that athletes, in particular long distance runners and hikers, should maintain their body temperature within a narrow and safe range while engaging in physical activity. I further believe that the Tearadactyl Athletic shirt will provide athletes with both the most efficacious and aesthetically appealing manner by which to achieve this goal.



Risks and challenges
At this point, funding for capital expenditures constitutes our only challenge to successfully launching Tearadactyl Athletic.
After fully self-funding the design and legal aspects, including patent and trademark, sufficient capital is needed in order to fulfilll our orders. Likewise, sufficient capital is required to ensure the successful launch of our marketing campaign and to secure the future growth of Tearadactyl Running as a brand.

story:
Short Summary

Well, I have been very busy and neglected this campaign. This doesn't mean I don't need your help. I have a couple weeks left.  Pictures, perks and other things to grab your attention and say thank you. 
I admit, computers make my head explode. Or at least I fear it will.  

Pamela Palmer of La Paloma Hats has been making elegant and whimsical hats now for over 20 years. Her passion for designing and creating headwear is where her focus is and should be, but to keep that focus, she needs to raise money to upgrade her workrooms for safety and patron comfort.  She also needs help with bookkeeping, marketing, management, website and production.  HA! And computers!

I would like to thank you for the support shown through the years and hopefully, years to come. Please accept the varies thank you gifts offered.  Please consider donating today and please pass this along. 

Horrible picture, I hear its all in the pixels (or not).

story:
At Project Blue Bear, we integrate the most virtuous aspects of commercial and charitable practices into one business model. We pledge to donate 10% of our net profits to the World Wildlife Fund (WWF) to support conservation efforts. Our mission is to create a brand that inspires and facilitates environmental conservation globally.

                

Blue Bear is part of a growing community of social enterprises led by committed and energetic business leaders, dedicated to joining the effort to combat climate change and its global consequences. We need your help to get our first line of apparel designed and into production. The sooner we are up and running, the sooner we can begin actively supporting the work of our partnership organizations and make a difference!


Our goal is to raise $6,000 to fund our initial startup costs, marketing strategy, partnership development, and design our spring and summer lines of apparel.

               


                    

o $1: THE TIP JAR: Stay up to date on our progress, new products, and website launch next month! Help us make a difference! #SaveTheBears


o $10: THE LITTLE BEAR: Contribute to the project and receive an official Blue Bear sticker. Looks great on a water bottle! Help us make a difference! #SaveTheBears


o $25: THE BASIC BEAR: CLASSIC TEE: Men's or Women’s Classic Tee: Choose between 4 unique colors. Super soft with a comfortable fit made with 100% cotton. Also receive an awesome Blue Bear sticker!


o $25: WOMEN'S TANK: Receive the Classic Womens Tank with our one of a kind Tribal Bear back print . Choose between 4 unique colors. Super soft with a comfortable fit made with 100% cotton. Also receive an awesome Blue Bear sticker!


o $35: MEN'S LONG SLEEVE TEE: Receive our unique Men’s Long Sleeve Tee. Choose between 4 variations! Super soft with a comfortable fit made with 100% cotton. Also receive an awesome Blue Bear sticker!


o $50: MENS POLO: Stay fresh in our Blue Bear design embroidered Men’s Polo! Choose between 4 unique colors. The product is super soft and made with 100% cotton. Also receive an awesome Blue Bear sticker!


o $70: BUNDLE 1: POLO & SHIRT: THE BEAR PAIR: Receive a Men’s Polo and any classic item (Men’s Tee/Long Sleeve Tee or Women’s Tee/Tank). Choose between 4 unique colors. All products are super soft with a comfortable fit and made with 100% cotton. Also receive an awesome Blue Bear sticker! Great for water bottles!


o $100: 2 POLO'S & CLASSIC TEE OR TANK: THE BIG BEAR: Receive 2 Men’s Polo's and any classic item of your choice (Men’s: Short Sleeve Pocketed Tee/Long Sleeve Tee or Women’s: Short Sleeve Tee/Tank) Choose between 4 unique colors. All products are super soft with a comfortable fit made with 100% cotton. Also receive an awesome Blue Bear sticker!


o $200: All Classic Items + Men's Polo: ADIRONDACK FAMILY PACK: Receive any combination of 5 classic items (Men’s Tee/Long Sleeve Tee or Women’s Tee/Tank) along with one Men’s Polo, all in the color of your choice  Super soft with a comfortable fit made with 100% cotton. Also receive an awesome Blue Bear sticker!


o $1000: THE VISIONARY: Receive one of each Blue Bear apparel item in the color of your choice! In addition, your name will be listed as a key supporter on our website.

               

The Tibetan Blue Bear is an ancient subspecies of the brown bear found in the eastern Tibetan plateau and is one of the most recent species of bear to become extinct in the wild. Project Blue Bear is focused on off-setting the impacts of human activity, and aims to promote environmental sustainability and combat climate change. The reality is that if there are 100,000,000 different species on Earth, and if the extinction rate is just 0.01% per year, then 10,000 species go extinct every year. 

Project Blue Bear’s approach has two main objectives:

1) Provide financial backing to organizations and projects with existing habitat conservation and restoration initiatives throughout the world. 
2) Provide information and foster awareness with regard to threats facing the global bear population.


                                 

The Blue Bear Project is a social enterprise, a for profit entity with an environmental mission. Profits from the Blue Bear Project will go towards organizations and initiatives focused on protecting the eight species of bear remaining today. By providing streams of capital from a scalable entity, operating within a well-established industry, it is our goal to provide quality apparel, and enable partnership organizations to bolster their impact protecting endangered species of bear.


   


When you receive your package from Blue Bear, take a picture in your new apparel and tag us on Twitter! We’ll post it to the page and if your photo gets enough retweets or likes, you’ll get free shipping off your next order. 


If you can't contribute to our campaign, you can still help by sharing our campaign with your friends and family. You can also find us on Twitter and Instagram – follow us and help spread the word! 

Thank you! We appreciate your support.

                                     

                                              

                                           

Jesse is an economist, entrepreneur, and trekker. Just last year, he trekked the oldest route in the Himalayas towards Everest Base Camp. Currently, an associate at The Wharton School of The University of Pennsylvania. His research focuses on urbanization and economic development in cities worldwide. He graduated from Oberlin College in 2015 with a BA in Economics focusing on International Development and Environmental Sustainability.

                                            

                                                

                                         


Stuart drinks Kombucha, eats granola and owns a WildLife Fact File. He currently works in the nonprofit sector, and is interested in building businesses that use capital to advance social and environmental justice. He graduated from Haverford College in 2014 with a BS in Psychology, and a minor in Environmental Studies.

                                                       

1)  What is a social enterprise?

A social enterprise is an organization that applies commercial strategies to generate improvements in human and environmental well-being— which may include (and does in our case!) using a percentage of profits to address social and environmental problems.

2)  How will Blue Bear make an impact?

Conserving habitats = conserving wildlife. Bears are roaming creatures and need plenty of space to survive. Climate change and expansion of industry, agriculture and urban sprawl have been cutting in to bear habitat, placing humans and bears in conflict for more than 100 years. A portion of every dollar spent with Project Blue Bear will go towards organizations that are actively working to promote the conservation and restoration of natural bear habitat in regions throughout the world. 

3)  How does Blue Bear source its apparel?

Our current apparel is hand printed in America, and is 100% cotton. We pledge to source our products with local suppliers that utilize sustainable business practices.

4) Will you have more styles and items in the future?

Yes! We are constantly working to come up with new designs and release new items! As we grow, we will have the capacity to branch out and offer a wide range of apparel to our customers.

5) How can I contact you? 

Just email us - founders@projectbluebear.com

6) Do we ship internationally?

Yes we do! However, there will be an additional charge depending on your whereabouts. 

7) What sizes do we offer?

We offer a variety of sizes! We currently offer small, medium, large, and extra-large. Please email us if you need any additional information.

story:
NEW!!! NOW AVAILABLE FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY S7/S7 EDGE

Who are we?

We are fans of smartphones, loving the luxury and quality. Our mission is to convert your phone into a real little luxury. We provide the best look to your phone, but also the best quality of care.

  • Curved edges 2.5D
  • Ultra Thin 0.3mm design
  • Oleophobic Coating
  • 9H Hardness Leve
We use the latest materials and technology in making luxury cases.
Our quality is recognized worldwide. We offer a wide range of our customers.

LUXURY MIRROR CASE FOR IPHONE 6/6S & IPHONE 6/6S PLUS





Kit includes: 1 x Tempered Glass, 1 x Wet Wipe, 1 x Dry Wipe, 1x Dust Absorber 

This three pieced case for the iPhone 6/6s & iPhone 6/6s Plus is lightweight, ultra slim, and offers a minimalist design. The electroplated acrylic back creates a luxurious mirror finish, while the aluminum frame protects against impacts and falls. The Luxury Mirror Case is the perfect choice with the perfect design.

Features

  • Lightweight, ultra slim, minimalist design
  • Electroplated acrylic back can be used as a mirror
  • Aluminum frame protection, also has foam protective layer to prevent scratches on your device
  • The 3 piece design includes: 1 electroplated acrylic back, 2 pieces of the aluminum frame to hold your device firmly

Colors

  • Black, Silver, Gold, Rose Gold

This three pieced case for the Samsung Galaxy S6 is lightweight, ultra slim, and offers a minimalist design. The electroplated acrylic back creates a luxurious mirror finish, while the aluminum frame protects against impacts and falls. The Luxury Mirror Case is the perfect choice with the perfect design.

  • Lightweight, ultra slim, minimalist design
  • Electroplated acrylic back can be used as a mirror
  • Aluminum frame protection, also has foam protective layer to prevent scratches on your device
  • The 3 piece design includes: 1 electroplated acrylic back, 2 pieces of the aluminum frame to hold your device firmly

Colors

  • Black, Silver, Gold


LUXURY MIRROR CASE FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY S6 EDGE & GALAXY S6 EDGE PLUS

This three pieced case for the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge & Galaxy S6 Edge is lightweight, ultra slim, and offers a minimalist design. The electroplated acrylic back creates a luxurious mirror finish, while the aluminum frame protects against impacts and falls. The Luxury Mirror Case is the perfect choice with the perfect design.

Features

  • Lightweight, ultra slim, minimalist design

  • Aluminum frame protection, also has foam protective layer to prevent scratches on your device
  • The 3 piece design includes: 1 electroplated acrylic back, 2 pieces of the aluminum frame to hold your device firmly
