story:
Currently the most affordable on the track

We've found that there's a niche between cheap watches and highest possible quality. So we decide to build an affordable that lasts for long. Made with the finest, 1500°C - 2732°F, superheated ceramic bezel, the top ring which encompasses and fastens the sapphire crystal of our WATKINS to ensure the 10 bar waterproofness of your watch and a surgial standard steel case.



This watch is an homage to the glorious race curcuit 'TheGlen', NY, USA. Charismatic F1 champions like Jim Clark, Emerson Fittipaldi,Niki Lauda, James Hunt or Gilles Villeneuve won races at Watkins Glen. Nowadays,the NASCAR and Indycars series battle it out on this celebrated track.


Do you remember the last America's Cup or last racing season? It was blue and red. These inspired us to create a dial with the two-toned big date.

The fuel to our engine and to our success is that we love what we’re doing, we love to create watches. Functional, and modern,manufactured to the highest standards of horological engineering.

Pole position for the WATKINS collection

We’ve repaired thousands of watches over the years. Highprecisely and with a hefty price tag. Last years we've got the idea designing a watch that is affordable, contemporary, stylish and that is equally at home in the great outdoors as well as at work.

The chronographs of WATKINS are a little different

Our customers may drive a Jaguar f type, a Hunter Marine Yacht, or you might find them racing on a track, in the water or in the air. Our new WATKINS “Curriculum No8” pledge collection combines all those attributes at a price far lower than other watches of this high standard of craftsmanship. We deliver direct to the consumer, without any retail markups.

Closing the gap to the leaders

By marketing directly to our customers and through Kickstarter, we eliminate the high cost of regular advertising while cutting out the proverbial middleman. The result: While other watches in the top quality category sell for 1000€ and up, we are able to offer the WATKINS “Curriculum No8” Collection on Kickstarter starting from only 149€ (~$165)!

We have created the "Curriculum No8" series, which combines ruggedness, flexibility and functionality for all kinds of environments. 

The core part of this watch is the bezel. This top-ring has to endure more abrasion than any other part of the watch.

1500°C - 2732°F, superheated ceramic bezel


Ceramic powders are superheated to 1500C to harden and solidify them into the bezel shape. Once shaped, it’s highly polished to provide it with a beautiful luster. Impervious to scratches. It takes more than 48h to create each of these bezels and is much sought after by collectors.

Are You ready to win? With a WATKINS you will be

Your chronograph will come with a sapphire crystal and is available with a choice of bands: stainless steel, premium vegetable-tanned leather, suede leather and several color selections of NATO nylon straps.

The watch is water resistant to 100m/10atm and comes in its own protective leatherette travelling pouch. 

Race days have always been a memorable experience full of nonstop activities. Now is your turn to add to the excitement with your support. We will add a serial number on each watch according to the order of your pledge.

Good stint, The watch is excellent with good fashion balance

Grid is pretty busy...

Fasten your seat belt




Great line-up for the big moment

30 days to go! Tune in now as we close in on the chequered flag

The development of a wristwatch takes several months. Many changes are needed to get the perfect design.

Our WATKINS "Curriculum No8" took about 16 months to meet all our high requirements for form, function and durability.

Today we reveal the secret. A ceramic bezel, the chronograph function and a 316L stainless steel case with GMT layout on the back case and 43mm diameter are the highlights of this series.

What strap fits to your monocoque?

All metal is brushed in a district maintenance free satin finish with matching satin glare free dials. All the metal parts materials are CE tested, this means nickel free case back, case, buckle and screw down crowns.

All watch hands have green lume applied to them which improves legibility in dark lighting conditions.

Different kind of sports needs different straps. Are you a Polo Player? Maybe the fine stitched glove Leather is your best choice. The dirty track is your home? As a Motor Racer you'll prefer the high end stainless steel watchband. Water Enthusiasts may select the waterproof Nylon Nato strap with the 316l button logo.

The first line of WATKINS authentic watches consists of 3 different dials in various matching watchbands:  
  • Black: a cool black satin dial and ceramic rotary bezel
  • White: the perfect everyday style
  • Silver: a subtle, classic watch suitable for all occasions.

You can choose your materials and colors plus optional additional watch straps for every kind of environment and occasion. How it works? Please see here.

Water/Dust resistance

Inside of the WATKINS watch is a finely-tuned Miyota 6S50 Chronograph movement, the same movement that’s used in Citizen branded watches. They’re very accurate and built to last for many years.

What's the time in Le Mans?

GMT Time Zone:  

GMT or Greenwich Mean Time is also known as UTC (Universal Time Coordinated) or Zulu Time. It is the international standard that all world time is set to as originally governed at the International Meredian Conference in 1884. Every time zone in the world is referenced against GMT and is unaffected by daylight savings time.

black&panda, black & color, or .... as you like

Bring on the night racing

 Gear up! Track action begins today!

Our new baby for the big race, and it's a honour to share the duties with you.

Alright ladies and gentleman! I figured it's time to start the official season. Let's buy the tickets and watch the race.

 We will never overcharge and dump absurd retail markups onto our supporters. Faultless taste doesn’t allow for compromises on quality, but it doesn’t have to break the bank. We’ve managed to keep the price under €200/$200 and while maintaining the impeccable top quality of materials used in the manufacturing of the WATKINS “Curriculum No8” Series.

Productive Test Day completed

Successful pre-test

Our manufacturing partners and part suppliers are well established they are known for rigorous quality control and we have a great relationship with them. In addition we are submitting every watch to an individual performance and quality check to insure every single timepiece meets the high benchmark we require.

The different components of the watch are produced through a variety of processes such as molding, polishing, machining and are then carefully assembled. The main quality check process includes water pressure tests and every watch runs through a in-house 48-hour time-keeping accuracy test.

Testing going well

Stop completed for WATKINS #8

Finely-tuned CITIZEN MIYOTA (Japan) 6S50 Quartz

Accurate details

Which car are you driving?

We will offer the WATKINS "Curriculum No8" watch series at wholesale pricing. By backing our project, you will help us pay for the first production run and in exchange you will receive a beautiful watch with an impressive spec sheet at a highly discounted price!

All our watches and espacially the Watkins come with an extended 5 years guarantee against manufacturing faults and you can send it back to us for repair replacement.

Watkins parts are known for uncompromising quality. All our materials and parts are well sourced and are carefully handcrafted by our skilled artisan watchmakers.

Band Version 1: Nylon strap Nato style 

  • Band width: 20mm width
  • Band max/min length: 20.5cm/15.5cm
  • Color: different colors available 
  • Logo: Stainless steel

Band Version 2: Leather strap 

  • Length: 20mm 
  • Width: 1.5mm 
  • Material: leather with ivory white contrast stitching 
  • Band Max/Min Length: 20.5cm/15.5cm 
  • Clasp: Massive steel buckle with logo 

Band Version 3: Steel bracelet 

  • Clasp: Fold over clasp 

Case 

  • Case Diameter: 43 mm 
  • Case Thickness: 13mm 
  • Face Diameter: 32.5 mm 
  • Case Material: Surgical grade 316L stainless steel 
  • Total Weight: 93g 

Case Back 

  • GMT Time zone engraving: Yes 
  • Back Plating: Stainless steel 

Bezel 

  • Material: Superheated scratch-resistant high-tech ceramic mix 
  • Rotating: unidirectional - counterwise 60 clicks 

Display 

  • Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal 
  • Display: Analog Movement 

Caliber

  • finely-tuned CITIZEN MIYOTA (Japan) 6S50 Quartz 
  • Date Function: Yes- Big Date 
  • Chronograph Function: Yes 

Water Resistant 

  • Testet: 10bar / 10atm / 100m 
  • Crowns: Screwable

Over the next few weeks, the whole team here will be putting production plans together. Meanwhile we will rigorously source, test, and research the materials and production of the watches, and most importantly, working hard to get your watch to you as soon as possible. While the watches are being manufactured and packaged, we will be preparing for large scale shipment to our backers.

We need you, the drivers, the engineers and the mechanics and last but not least the crowd who breathe life into these watches. Piece by piece, to complete this project in time before the fuel is empty.

We spend a lot of money and time in upfront work and pre-process. Now it's sunday morning and we're in the grid. The engines are roaring, we are ready to go. And we all want to bring some silverware home. Isn't it?

Based in Vienna, AUSTRIA, P.Beer GmbH is a family-run business operational. We're a solid team of european master watchmakers in third generation with well-developed and tested skills. This means we're able to hand assemble all our watches in our workshop, using materials sourced.

Thank you so much for checking out our project!!! Please help us to share with your friends and family!

Take advantage of a limited-time pre-order offer exclusively on Indiegogo and save $€$€ by purchasing before we launch.


Risks and opportunities

If this project gets funded, we will have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadlines. Projects often have trouble when facing the production process and deadlines for shipment. The project could face possible challenges if the quality of the product or packaging does not meet our requirements after production. However, we have extensive experience and close relations in manufacturing and production. In addition, we will not be outsourcing the post-production work to another company. Our team in Vienna and NYC is prepared to ensure that post-funding will run like clockwork when the time comes. (pun-intended) Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of production. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and ahead of schedule.

Currently the most affordable on the trackWe've found that there's a niche between cheap watches and highest 
possible quality. So we decide to build an affordable that lasts for 
long. 
Made with the finest, 1500°C - 2732°F, superheated ceramic bezel,
 the top ring which encompasses and fastens the sapphire crystal of our 
WATKINS to ensure the 10 bar waterproofness of your watch and a surgial 
standard steel case.This watch is an homage to the glorious race curcuit 'TheGlen', NY, USA.
 Charismatic F1 champions like Jim Clark, Emerson Fittipaldi,Niki Lauda,
 James Hunt or Gilles Villeneuve won races at Watkins Glen. Nowadays,the
 NASCAR and Indycars series battle it out on this celebrated track. Do you remember the last America's Cup or last racing season? It was blue and red. These inspired us to create a dial with the two-toned big date.The fuel to our engine and to our success is that we love what we’re 
doing, we love to create watches. Functional, and modern,manufactured to
 the highest standards of horological engineering.Pole position for the WATKINS collectionWe’ve repaired thousands of watches over the years. Highprecisely and 
with a hefty price tag. Last years we've got the idea designing a watch 
that is affordable, contemporary, stylish and that is equally at home in
 the great outdoors as well as at work. The chronographs of WATKINS are a little differentOur customers may drive a Jaguar f type, a Hunter Marine Yacht, or you 
might find them racing on a track, in the water or in the air. Our new 
WATKINS “Curriculum No8” pledge collection combines all those attributes
 at a price far lower than other watches of this high standard of 
craftsmanship. We deliver direct to the consumer, without any retail markups.Closing the gap to the leadersBy marketing directly to our customers and through Kickstarter, we 
eliminate the high cost of regular advertising while cutting out the 
proverbial middleman.

The result: While other watches in the top quality category sell for 
1000€ and up, we are able to offer the WATKINS “Curriculum No8” 
Collection on Kickstarter starting from only 149€ (~$165)!We have created the "Curriculum No8" series, which combines 
ruggedness, flexibility and functionality for all kinds of 
environments.

story:
Sometimes unfortunate situations happen to good people. 

Introducing LifeWatch and the LifeWatch monitoring service. Protecting the most precious assets in your life. Below is a headline from the Dallas Morning News two days after we launched this campaign.

http://www.cbsnews.com/news/antonio-lamar-cochran-arrested-murder-dallas-teen-zoe-hastings/

I-Global Business together with Maestro Personal Assistants is pleased to announce the launch of LifeWatch in the first quarter of 2016 in the United States. Started over a decade ago, Maestro provides unique personal assistance service. The executives at I-Global Business have been instrumental in bringing several first-of-a-kind products and services to market over the last twenty-five years. Together, the companies joined forces to form the next level in personal security. This combined vision of the executives is the driving force behind LifeWatch.

LifeWatch is the first to incorporate the new smart watch technology to the "HELP I'VE FALLEN" marketplace. Because we understand 99.99% of the time, our customers will not need the SOS capabilities of LifeWatch in an emergency situation, our  LifeWatch customers will receive an additional benefit, the LifeWatch personal concierge service. Click on the link below to see the benefits of this amazing personal concierge service.

http://www.personalassistants.com/the-service

http://www.i-globalbusiness.com

Each LifeWatch includes SOS capabilities to alert our emergency certified operators of any type of emergency situation our customers may have, including a fall, stroke, heart attack, sexual assault, home invasion, abduction and/or any other emergency that might take place.

To protect your loved ones against the ugliness that sometimes strikes in this world, a $1 a day peace of mind is minimal. As with any type insurance or service, THE COST OF HAVING IT IS MINIMAL COMPARED TO THE COST OF NOT HAVING IT AND NEEDING IT.


By participating in our campaign, you provide yourself and your loved ones with the security that is LifeWatch. A one-touch emergency SOS feature that provides emergency certified operators the ability to pinpoint your location globally by the utilizing the GPS capabilities of the watch and notify 911 even if you or your loved ones are unable to respond. 



In an abduction law enforcement statistics back up how important the first 48 hours are, with LifeWatch our goal is to notify emergency responders within the first 48 seconds. What if the girls below had been able to activate an SOS button on their watch and even without talking, authorities would have been alerted and dispatched. What if?


For elderly and young children, our service can establish a "Geo Fence" alert. This alert will notify you if your elderly family member or child travels outside the preset geographic area. We have all seen the "silver and amber alerts" on highway signs when a child or elderly goes missing. Peace of mind is priceless. 


The statistics below are the catalyst behind introducing LifeWatch, to not only the senior market, but to other markets as well. 

Let the statistics on falls help you understand why LifeWatch should be an easy choice for the elderly. Let the statistics on college campus sexual assault help you understand why LifeWatch should be an easy choice for parents of college age students. For the most vulnerable, our children, should you need to even need to wonder whether LifeWatch is easy choice?
  • When an elderly person falls, their hospital stays are almost twice longer than those of elderly patients who are admitted for any other reason.
  • Annually, falls are reported by one-third of all people over the age of 65.
  • Two-thirds of those who fall will do so again within six months.
  • Falls are the leading cause of death from injury among people 65 and older.
  • The most profound effect of falling is the loss of functioning associated with independent living. Elderly parents hate to give up their independence
  •  1 in 4 college women will be the victim of sexual assault during her academic career. (One in Four USA. Sexual Assault Statistics. http://www.oneinfourusa.org/statistics.php)
  • Survivors of rape or sexual assault are 4 times more likely to be victimized by someone they know than by a stranger? (National Center for Victims of Crime , U.S. Department of Justice, Office for Victims of Crime (OVC). National Crime Victims' Rights Week Resource Guide. 2009.)
  • Every 21 hours there is a rape on an American college campus. (U.S. Department of Justice. Center for Problem-Oriented Policing. Acquaintance Rape of College Students. http://www.cops.usdoj.gov/pdf/e03021472.pdf)
  • College women are most vulnerable to rape during the first few weeks of their freshman and sophomore years.(U.S. Department of Justice.2005 National Crime Victimization Study. 2005.)
  • College rape victims receive external physical injuries in over 47% of all rapes. ( Crisis Connection. National College Health Risk Behavior Survey. Fisher, Cullen & Turner, 2000. Warshaw, 1998. http://www.crisisconnectioninc.org/sexualassault/college_campuses_and_rape.htm)

Here are a few more quick facts:

  • Approximately 5 million Americans have Alzheimer’s disease
  • Alzheimer’s disease is the most common form of dementia among older people
  • 6 out of 10 with Alzheimer’s will wander from their homes or care-giving facilities at some point as the disease progresses
  • If not found within a 24-hour period, up to half will suffer serious injury or death
Initially, as we were preparing this campaign, a decision was made to bring the child model to market in 2Q of 2016, However, after our trip to our factory earlier this month, a decision was made to move up our production schedule on the child model.  Now parents can now bring the same safety and security to their children. 
Imagine always having the ability to check your app and know exactly where your children are. Provide your children with the ability to push the SOS button anytime there is stranger danger situation. Your child is worth having this type of piece of mind.

What we seek and what you receive:

Our goal is to identify the demand of the marketplace in order to set 2016 production numbers. The infrastructure is built to support this new platform and the ability to add on as-needed basis is in place.

By being one of the first to join LifeWatch, you will receive FREE monthly monitoring for the amount of time based on your membership level. In addition, by joining the social media and word of mouth campaign, you are able to earn additional FREE months of service outlined in the PERKS section. Refer several new customers, earn additional LifeWatch products. 

What makes LifeWatch unique is the personal concierge service you receive in addition to the security that is LifeWatch. The service that made Maestro such a hit in the business community is provided to every LifeWatch customer. You can call your personal concierge for anything, anytime, anywhere. Discover what every new Infiniti customer in North America has experienced for the last five (5) years.  Check out the Infiniti promotional video.


 

Get the level of service many Fortune 500 companies have provided their clients for the last decade. Tired of SIRI not understanding what you were asking? Worried about your kids typing and texting google while their driving? Sync your personal assistant to the bluetooth in your car and enjoy the hands free calling to your live personal assistant for whatever you need. This makes choosing LifeWatch over a pendent service (that can only be used in an emergency) a simple choice.

LifeWatch is not only the next level in personal security but it is also a state-of-the-art smart watch phone with its own SIM card. It can be used just like any mobile phone and includes all functions of a smart phone including SMS and social media applications such as Facebook, Twitter and Instagram allowing users the ability to carry their mobile device on their wrist. Welcome to the new age of communications.



What will our impact be?

Can you imagine how many more seniors who never wanted to wear a pendent around their neck will be willing to wear a smart watch which provides a higher level of security without feeling old? Or, can you imagine how many fall, stroke, and heart attack victims can receive treatment much quicker?

How many sexual assaults, rapes, and abductions maybe prevented in the future as people learn wearing a simple watch can alert 911 immediately? Will this act be a deterrent to potential predators? 

Help make an Impact! Spread the word about this incredible product and service. And, start protecting your loved ones TODAY.

Current status:

Presently, three (3) smart watches models have been selected. Each of these models perform the basic functions. One additional model is being evaluated.

We are in the initial stages of hiring specialized operators for the emergency SOS calls, as a higher level of training is mandated than current operators possess. 

We recently made the trip to China to meet with the factories and verified production capacity to ensure a smooth roll-out in 1Q 2016. 

We are finalizing our wireless carrier and fulfillment house contracts within the next 30 days.

Unable to contribute at this time, no worries.

By helping our campaign, you can earn a free LifeWatch but also earn free monitoring. Just spread the word either by word-of-mouth to your family or friends or promote our campaign on Social Media and you two can receive the same products and service as anyone that contributes to our campaign. Simply share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter or use any of the share tools provided by Indiegogo and you are on your way to earning free products and services.

College women are most vulnerable to rape during the first few weeks of their freshman and sophomore years.(U.S. Department of Justice.2005 National Crime Victimization Study. 2005.)

College rape victims receive external physical injuries in over 47% of all rapes. ( Crisis Connection. National College Health Risk Behavior Survey. Fisher, Cullen & Turner, 2000. Warshaw, 1998. http://www.crisisconnectioninc.org/sexualassault/college_campuses_and_rape.htm)




Here are a few more quick facts:

Approximately 5 million Americans have Alzheimer’s disease
Alzheimer’s disease is the most common form of dementia among older people
6 out of 10 with Alzheimer’s will wander from their homes or care-giving facilities at some point as the disease progresses
If not found within a 24-hour period, up to half will suffer serious injury or death

    Initially, as we were preparing this campaign, a decision was made to bring the child model to market in 2Q of 2016, However, after our trip to our factory earlier this month, a decision was made to move up our production schedule on the child model.  Now parents can now bring the same safety and security to their children. Imagine always having the ability to check your app and know exactly where your children are. Provide your children with the ability to push the SOS button anytime there is stranger danger situation. Your child is worth having this type of piece of mind.
What we seek and what you receive:

Our goal is to identify the demand of the marketplace in order to set 2016 production numbers. The infrastructure is built to support this new platform and the ability to add on as-needed basis is in place.

By being one of the first to join LifeWatch, you will receive FREE monthly monitoring for the amount of time based on your membership level. In addition, by joining the social media and word of mouth campaign, you are able to earn additional FREE months of service outlined in the PERKS section. Refer several new customers, earn additional LifeWatch products. 
What makes LifeWatch unique is the personal concierge service you receive in addition to the security that is LifeWatch. The service that made Maestro such a hit in the business community is provided to every LifeWatch customer. You can call your personal concierge for anything, anytime, anywhere. Discover what every new Infiniti customer in North America has experienced for the last five (5) years.  Check out the Infiniti promotional video.




         
Get the level of service many Fortune 500 companies have provided their clients for the last decade. Tired of SIRI not understanding what you were asking? Worried about your kids typing and texting google while their driving? Sync your personal assistant to the bluetooth in your car and enjoy the hands free calling to your live personal assistant for whatever you need. This makes choosing LifeWatch over a pendent service (that can only be used in an emergency) a simple choice.
LifeWatch is not only the next level in personal security but it is also a state-of-the-art smart watch phone with its own SIM card. It can be used just like any mobile phone and includes all functions of a smart phone including SMS and social media applications such as Facebook, Twitter and Instagram allowing users the ability to carry their mobile device on their wrist. Welcome to the new age of communications.


  






What will our impact be?
Can you imagine how many more seniors who never wanted to wear a pendent around their neck will be willing to wear a smart watch which provides a higher level of security without feeling old? Or, can you imagine how many fall, stroke, and heart attack victims can receive treatment much quicker?
How many sexual assaults, rapes, and abductions maybe prevented in the future as people learn wearing a simple watch can alert 911 immediately? Will this act be a deterrent to potential predators? 
Help make an Impact! Spread the word about this incredible product and service. And, start protecting your loved ones TODAY.


Current status:
Presently, three (3) smart watches models have been selected. Each of these models perform the basic functions. One additional model is being evaluated.
We are in the initial stages of hiring specialized operators for the emergency SOS calls, as a higher level of training is mandated than current operators possess. 
We recently made the trip to China to meet with the factories and verified production capacity to ensure a smooth roll-out in 1Q 2016. 
We are finalizing our wireless carrier and fulfillment house contracts within the next 30 days.


Unable to contribute at this time, no worries.
By helping our campaign, you can earn a free LifeWatch but also earn free monitoring. Just spread the word either by word-of-mouth to your family or friends or promote our campaign on Social Media and you two can receive the same products and service as anyone that contributes to our campaign. Simply share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter or use any of the share tools provided by Indiegogo and you are on your way to earning free products and services.

story:
The Classic Sports Bag...Reimagined

                    

The Zypr is the ultimate sports bag for active families and coaches: Flexible storage  + durable portability in one smart bag

Developed by parent coaches for active families, the Zypr is more than a sports bag.  It is a flexible storage system and durable ball bag in one, making it a breakthrough organization solution for those that don't just love sports, they live sports.

Storage at Home

Nearly 12 million US households have school-aged kids active in sports.  If these families are anything like ours, that translates into a lot of households trying to control the day-to-day clutter and chaos that comes with being an active family.

Most sports storage products on the market today can be limiting because of their cost, lack of quality, limited holding capacity, limited functionality, or installation requirements. 

                        

While these options promise organization, in reality, most garages look like this:

                                   

Durability on the Go

And options for taking your gear on the road aren't much better.  Coaches told us they were lucky if their gear bags lasted more than a season.  Parents told us that they threw out more bags than they cared to admit because wet items were left and forgotten inside.

"Make it last" was the #1 request from parents and coaches, so it became our motto for the Zypr.

In the design process, we talked with high school, college, and club coaches from most every sport, as well as sports parents and even a professional soccer players to better understand the gaps in the market.

After a series of design prototypes and fabrication reviews, we finally had the right mix of features to meet the standards of our "power" users.

                       

The Zypr's 2 in 1 Design 

1) Accessible ball storage solution for your garage, closet or mudroom

  • Two way zipper down the front of the bag for easy access to the desired item (without having to dump all the rest of the stuff out to get it)
  • Mega storage capacity to hold even the biggest collection of sports gear; the large Zypr can hold up to 20 regulation soccer or basketballs
  • Sturdy hanging loops let you securely hang items up and off of the floor
  • Industrial-strength mesh fabric to see your gear and allow for air flow to wet items inside
  • Mold and mildew resistant materials keeps your gear from getting smelly and the bag from splitting/rotting
  • Available in 3 sizes to meet your storage needs
2) Rugged bag for taking the gear to the field, gym, or yard
  • Quality materials and craftsmanship with a 3 year guarantee means this could be the last ball bag you need to buy
  • Adjustable carrying strap keeps your hands free to carry other items
  • Easy access to items inside via the two way zipper or the cinch top closure
  • Interchangeable accessories for added functionality:  waterproof pouch, padded shoulder strap sleeve, and pinny strap for practice gear

                       


Closing the Gaps in the Market | Solutions to Everyday Challenges

Zypr's Interchangeable Accessories

 

                                         

The Zypr is perfect for beach items, toys and stuffed animals and even laundry! 

Power User Testimonials


Product Specifications


 

             



The generosity of our supporters will help the Zypr move forward quickly.  Funds raised in this campaign will go toward an upcoming business trip to review the design and prototype progress on our next three products.  These products will require some additional capital for patent discovery and patent application if deemed worthy.

We will also be using capital to build out our eCommerce storefront and platform.  This will assist us with growing our Fundraising business unit to aid schools, clubs and organizations with turn-key programs leveraging social media.

We also will be pushing forward with our packaging initiative for our products as we work to create strong relationships with retailers.

If you would like more information on where the money is going, please do not hesitate to visit our current site www.TheZypr.com, or contact us through the campaign.

Thanks again for your support!




“You can't steal second and keep one foot on first base.”  My kids are probably sick of me saying that famous quote.  But it is one is my favorites as it summarizes what I truly believe to be important in life – progress always involves risk; sometimes you need to take chances to live life to the fullest.

Launching Zypr is my personal case of putting my money where my mouth is. I had an "a ha" moment while cleaning out our garage.  I was sorting through a mess of soccer balls we had piled in an old storage bin when it hit me.  Why hadn't someone made a more effective storage option for sports balls by now?  I commented to my wife about how sad it was that most of these kinds of sports products were made so cheaply that they clearly were intended to be disposable.

So I did a little research to see if I could find a quality, cost effective option that could handle all of the stuff in our garage.  You guessed it, I couldn't find one, we we decided to make one.  And from that, the Zypr was born.

With a prototype in hand, my wife, a marketing research junkie, couldn't wait to get feedback from friends and colleagues we though might need a Zypr in their life.  In the process, we learned that this snappy ball bag could also moonlight as a pretty amazing coach's bag, but i needed some additional bells and whistles - hence the interchangeable accessories.  Overall, the response was pretty great; so much so that we decided we had to take it to the next level.

With a focus on high-quality products for active families, we found our niche that we are very passionate about.  We are also excited about our partnerships wth non-profits and schools who desperately need high quality equipment and storage options.  We are grateful that we can help make a difference where it is needed most.

Although my wife and I have over 40 years of business experience between us, we knew this launch would provide challenges we had not previously experienced. 

To mitigate risks, we gathered a team of respected and experienced professionals to help.  Through collaboration we feel we have been able to identify and manage many of the issues that can be detrimental to a successful product launch. 

We secured relationships with a number of respected fabricators. We did market research, developed product prototypes, and performed a great deal of product testing by putting this bag in the hands of people that will use and abuse our products beyond what most of our users could imagine.

To further mitigate risk for our supporters and ensure prompt reward for their support, we ordered 1000 units of our product and have them ready for shipment (see picture). We will send these products out as quickly as allowed by Indiegogo after the campaign is over. 

We want our supporters to integrate their Zypr bag and accessories into their active lives and provide us feedback on the product. We want to hear what they like, but also what we can do to make the products better. We want to know how they use the product and what we can do to reach more active families. We want to see the before and after pictures of their garage, or the locations they take their Zypr bag. 

Having already gone through the entire process from design to prototype to production run, including shipping and logistics to receive a sizeable order at our location, we are confident in our “team” and the process we collaborated upon to move forward and grow.

                                     


Why are the discounts relatively small compared to other campaigns?

The Zypr Sports bags use the best materials and construction methods. Putting a lot into those two aspects of the bags increases the cost more so than inexpensively made products.  Instead of raising the price, we kept the price low so more families could afford a high-quality storage product for their gear. As we bring more quality products to market, we hope our satisfied Zypr users will be there to support us again.  In short, we cannot discount too much and still sustain our objective of bringing more quality products to active families.

When will I receive my reward?

We already have close to 1000 units on hand, and the accessories (water proof pouch, nylon cargo straps, shoulder pad) have just been ordered. We expect to ship those units to complete orders by late June/early July.

Additionally, more bags will be ordered as we monitor campaign efforts and continue growth efforts.

Are these the only colors for Zypr?

Yes, for now.  Currently, the small bag has green trim, medium bag has blue trim and the large bag has red trim.  Eventually, we hope to be in the position to do custom colors and personalization on larger orders.

Why are you not offering the Zypr to international supporters?

Our objective was to bring to market the highest quality, most durable sports bag using the best materials and construction methods available.  To make such a quality item, the cost is significant. We also wanted to price the bag extremely competitively so our supporters could see and feel the value of our product the first time they handled them.  Our desire to get our quality bag to the masses at a value limits our ability to offset shipping costs by minimizing margins any further.

What if I am international and I really want the Zypr products?

We would love to work with international supporters to try and find a mutually beneficially way to bring the Zypr products to you.  Please feel free to email us at Contact@TheZypr.com.  Hopefully, we can find an efficient and cost-effective way to navigate the logistics.

I understand the waterproof pouch in the images/video is a prototype.  What does the actual waterproof pouch look like?

Please check back here later during the campaign.  Because they had to dye the material and waterproof it, they could not provide us a prototype that is the right PMS (colors).

Thanks again for your support!

story:
First Ever High-Quality Gold Playing Cards

We make it possible! We worked and researched for more than two years, for best solutions, tehnics, materials to produce a playing cards that everyone wants to have, to be good looking, long lasting, also entertaining so you can use it like table top decoration like a thing of prestige and luxury, or play with friends and family. 

  • We are a dedicated team of young designers, innovators, that was done design and solutions for others for many years, and now decided to make our own product and start a business. 
  • We work hard to make this came true and to guarantee for product and quality
  • We need You very much NOW because our team is ready to get all things together immediately when champagne is over, Product cost are very high, also to be know we already invested our own 20000$, so you don't risk with us You just push us to start  right away, and make us focus on new products only. 
  • We also have many new products that are our designs, innovative, but it wait for us, to stand on our feet so we can bring them to life and focus only on it. 

Our agenda is to make things that don't exist, make existing things better, to improve life itself of Today. 

Made for Generations 

  • This product is made from Real 24K Gold foil
  • It will last for Generations to come.
  • it is waterproof, bending proof, crack resistant!
  • We are thinking of all, box, cards, quality.
  • Custom design is welcome, make your own cards with Family name or Logo
  • Gold-stamped logo

Every impact matters! 

You are most important to us, we make everything because we care for every one of you. 

  • You will make possible to build a most quality product it can be!
  • Perks are very worth and it is below prices for this kind of product (when it comes in stores) 
  • Our box is handmade with quality leather
  • Deck is done with layers of gold foil and put in special cover so it can bend and last for many years.
  • We are not like others, some large companies trying to sell a product because here is easier without big marketing plans, we are few individuals really trying our best to do what we like. 

Risks & Challenges

You don't lose anything with us, processes already pass our testing, we only need time to make it true and complete all parts together, so product can be produced.

  • Please don't have any doubt, we have a lot of problems in past with this project, materials, and how to overcome them, but we solve all problems and then come here. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please if you like our project, Please share it, We appreciate your help in any way

Thank You, 
Alen Ljubisic

story:
"The Tumble Bag" concept start from a rectangular box bag with a chain on the top. At the prototype stage, questions were asked such as...

  • Why does it have to looks the traditional way?

  • Why do the strap have to be only on the upper part of the bag?

In the final stage, the strap was moved to the side and the corner of the bag, so that it can be carried in different ways, hence attractive style change, while maintaining the overall geometric shape - therefore 3-in-1 extra.ordinary design.

Available in two Style :

  • The Tumble on chain
  • The Tumble (Leather Strap)

    Match your style

     

    The Tumble Bag on Chain

    The perfect purse . Small and structured with a touch of elegant.

    Size: Approx. 20 length x 12.5 height x 9 width (cm)

    Color:

    • "Smoke" Grey - Gold tone hardware
    • "Blush" Pink - Silver tone hardware
    • "Black" - Silver tone hardware

     

    The Tumble Bag

    A fresh, modern take on a classic bag. The Tumble Bag is the perfect, versatile everyday bag with room enough to fit your daily necessities.

    Size: Approx. 28.5 length x 21.5 height x 8 width (cm)

    Color:

    • "Smoke"Grey - Gold tone hardware
    • "Black" - Silver tone hardware

     

    The Design Process:

    We started each collection from researching current market trend, identification of the desired elements which would stand the test of time. The original concept was shaped into an experimenting form, then a prototype. The structure and proportion are key to the aesthetic of the product. Then well-chosen material and addition detail been add to enhance the structure. After finalize the collection, we work closely with the experience bag makers.

     

    From Designer:

    I was attached to innovative design in my childhood. I modified stuff which was left unused to become attractive and usable again. I chose industrial design department during my bachelor degree at Chulalongkorn University. During that time, I found passion for leather handbags, from experimenting and stitching leather into different articles because I was not attracted to the ones available in the market. I also found that it took much more to master specific skills required for the design and production of my ideal handbags.Therefore, I decided to further my study in accessories design at Domus Academy, Milan, where I earned a master degree. Upon my return to Thailand, I started my first commercial collection in 2017.

    My design inspiration is based on minimal and geometric form, aimed at achieving a new definition of minimal design. I use clean line and simplicity to create the handbags which are both beautiful and classic. The output is a clean appearance with style change, which can be done quickly and easily adjust as the way you want to carry. My objective is to deliver authentic handbags that offer luxurious touch and appeal to our customers.

The Tumble on chain
The Tumble (Leather Strap)
Match your style The Tumble Bag on ChainThe perfect purse . Small and structured with a touch of elegant.Size: Approx. 20 length x 12.5 height x 9 width (cm)Color:
"Smoke" Grey - Gold tone hardware
"Blush" Pink - Silver tone hardware
"Black" - Silver tone hardware
 The Tumble BagA fresh, modern take on a classic bag. The Tumble Bag is the perfect, versatile everyday bag with room enough to fit your daily necessities.Size: Approx. 28.5 length x 21.5 height x 8 width (cm)Color:
"Smoke"Grey - Gold tone hardware
"Black" - Silver tone hardware
 The Design Process:We started each collection from researching current market trend, identification of the desired elements which would stand the test of time. The original concept was shaped into an experimenting form, then a prototype. The structure and proportion are key to the aesthetic of the product. Then well-chosen material and addition detail been add to enhance the structure. After finalize the collection, we work closely with the experience bag makers. From Designer:I was attached to innovative design in my childhood. I modified stuff which was left unused to become attractive and usable again. I chose industrial design department during my bachelor degree at Chulalongkorn University. During that time, I found passion for leather handbags, from experimenting and stitching leather into different articles because I was not attracted to the ones available in the market. I also found that it took much more to master specific skills required for the design and production of my ideal handbags.Therefore, I decided to further my study in accessories design at Domus Academy, Milan, where I earned a master degree. Upon my return to Thailand, I started my first commercial collection in 2017.My design inspiration is based on minimal and geometric form, aimed at achieving a new definition of minimal design. I use clean line and simplicity to create the handbags which are both beautiful and classic. The output is a clean appearance with style change, which can be done quickly and easily adjust as the way you want to carry. My objective is to deliver authentic handbags that offer luxurious touch and appeal to our customers.

story:
Angie Finn and Meli Axford are sisters who started Systerly to change how fashion is produced. We're blue collar (our dad was a boiler-maker), good at what we do, hard-working and authentic.  Angie is a fashion designer with a PhD in Fashion and the commercial experience to back it up. Meli is a tech all-rounder who's spent 15 years making startups/building web applications.

 

We're design thinkers with a combined 50 years experience in fashion and tech.
We're innovating every aspect of the current outdated, fast fashion
production processes and we're driving change!

 

Systerly is a platform, not a dress. Our objective is to change the way we make designer fashion that surpasses fast fashion. We connect women who want to buy equitable and sustainable fashion with a network of local makers who work in their own studios, produce quality clothes and are well paid. We're pretty sure we're unique!  

 

To fix Australia (and world) fashion consumers need to
vote with their dollars
for more equitably produced products.  

 

We're innovating and re-engineering every aspect of the design and production process that's currently "broken" by leveraging available tech and sustainable fashion practices.  Not only have we completely re-engineered the production process but we're also innovating new sizing techniques, sewing techniques, design techniques - innovation is part of our culture.

For us, fashion sustainability is about job satisfaction and work-life balance for the makers, as much as it is about efficiently using sustainable fabrics. Equity is about getting fairly remunerated for your effort. We've designed this dress to:

  • suit you;
  • be made by a qualified maker in their own studio;
  • from Australian grown and made Merino wool;
  • for good pay. 

We're doing all of it! ​You can't top that.

 

Our business is designed to equitably enable makers.  We consider ourselves to be makers and have not factored profit into our model because we're happy to just be paid fairly for the work we do and don't want to profiteer.

The more people like you, who care and step up to fix fast fashion, the more local makers we can support.  Once you support the campaign, your contribution will bootstrap a maker onto the platform so they'll be able to earn $70 for each dress they make.  

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let's break it down for you:

  • We need to sell 1000 dresses in order to get 20 makers on the platform with a queue of orders rolling in so we can give the makers a steady stream of work. 
  • You get an awesome little black dress to wear that you are going to love and that's going to make you feel great every time you wear it because it will remind you that you're doing your bit!
  • The makers earn a living working at home with their families.
  • Less fast fashion is produced because ours is slow fashion, that is, we only make a dress once someone buys it.

 

The Impact

This is the difference your contribution will make:

  • By selling these dresses we'll be able to provide a "line of credit" to our qualified makers so they can free up their working capital and order the dress packs on account.  For a maker who is making 10 dresses a week, that's $700 that they would normally need to fund themselves. (You can learn more about how our model works below).
  • You will be increasing #whatshemakes by 400 times!  Makers in factories in Bangladesh earn as little as 17c for a garment that takes under 30 minutes to sew. This is the most substantial behaviour change women can make - stop buying fast fashion, which doesn't provide equitable employment for makers, and be the change you want to see.
  • You will be reducing the amount of fashion that goes to landfill. We've re-engineered the design & production process so that our clothes won't end up in landfill. Unlike fast fashion, where large proportions of every range go straight to landfill when they don't sell.   Our "just-in-time" production model means we don't make dresses that aren't sold because all of our customers buy on-order, rather than on-the-spot.  Almost every other brand uses the "hit & miss" model - where the clothes are designed and made before any input is garnered from the customers!!! Think about that.  With our brand, only the design work is done before the garment is sold to the actual customers (not buyers or other proxies). If no one likes a design it is NEVER made and can NEVER end up in landfill.  
  • You will also be supporting Australian made wool producers, as these dresses are made from environmentally-friendly 100% Australian made merino wool - a natural, biodegradable fibre - and reducing demand for polyester - which is what 60% of the world's clothes are made from and it uses harmful chemicals, including carcinogens, to produce it.

 

How Systerly Works

  • Our makers bootstrap their own production by purchasing a pack that contains everything they need ready for them to simply sew up the dress and send it back for QA.  The pack for this dress costs A$70.
  • As soon as they return a finished dress (which passes QA) they receive payment of A$140. Most makers will rollover A$70 to purchase another pack - so they need this "working capital" to fund their making.
  • Then we deliver the dress to you, which retails for $210 ($231 with GST). So we make the same amount on the dress as the maker - this covers our overheads - mostly our wages but also the postage for delivery and our small marketing costs. We've worked it out to be as equitable as possible for the makers.
  • So that is where the money is going - 1/3 for the materials, 1/3 for the maker and 1/3 for the platform running costs.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • We don't reach 1000 dresses: If we don't reach our goal it doesn't matter - the funds are basically funding the dresses - if we only reach 100 dresses we'll make 100 and bootstrap one maker with the funds! 
  • We don't get enough makers onboard: we need to connect with the right types of makers. Our makers don't need a lot of money to get on the platform - they need a domestic machine, a clean place to make and $70 to buy their first pack. What they do need is competence and the guts to back themselves.  We can't fund their mistakes so they have to do that themselves. 
  • Makers can't make the dress to our required standard: We mitigate this risk by:
  1. We qualify our makers through our onboarding process. Each maker has to make an initial pack as a test of their ability to satisfactorily make the dress.
  2. Makers have constant access to us through our Systerly Makers' facebook group where we answer questions, resolve issues and share video tips about how to make the dress. 
  3. Iterative design. We've design, made and reworked the design for this dress many times and then tested it with a novice sewer (Meli) and a maker to iron out any problems.
  • Makers can't make the dress quick enough to earn good pay / won't want to make the dresses as they don't get paid enough: We've mitigated this risk by paying the makers enough to adequately cover making the dress as well as the added cost of handling (ie collect the pack, re-pack and post the completed dress back.  We've made the dress ourselves many times -  Angie can make it in 16 minutes (you can see the timelapse video of this below) and Meli can make it in 25 minutes. Once proficient, every maker will be able to do it in under 20 minutes. We're confident it's attractive to our makers.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't want to buy a dress for yourself?  Here's how you can help:

  • Buy a dress for a woman in your life!  What better gift than one that helps empower other women and save the world at the same time?
  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by sharing our campaign, and what you think about it, with your networks.  We have minimal budget for marketing and need all the help we can get.  You can share this directly from this site using the share tools.

story:
Hi, I'm Liz!

Locks of Liz was created after the realization that my true passion was haircare. After working many years in the medical field, and a degree in Biology, it took me time to find my passion which I had been doing on the side all along! I'd like to thank the cancer patients I care for for making me realize not to wait, and that it's never too late.

Launching these Satin Hooded sweaters is the first step in kickstarting my brand which caters to the health and manageability of natural hair via hair care products and accessories. As a woman of color, it is important to me for women to embrace their natural attributes and learn that all hair is "good hair" and all hair is manageable. And working with cancer patients has also made me realize, "it's not JUST hair".

By contributing to this campaign not only will you help a single mother realize a dream for her and her daughter, but you will be contributing to the greater cause that is self care and self love. I have products in the works for natural hair products in testing phases which are showing amazing results in growth, moisturization, and managebility. I am also working on blueprints for novel curl friendly styling tools.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We'd like to start with 4 style options of our cropped hoodies:

  • Black/Gold with phrase "These Curls Ain't loyal"
  • Gray/Black With phrase "My Curls ARE My Pearls"
  • Dark Yellow (R251, G204, B52 - Brand color)/Black plain with white logo (left breast)
  • White/Gold plain with yellow logo (left breast)

My goal for this campaign is $15,000. About $10,000 will go towards the manufacturing of 100 of each of these sweaters. The remaining $5,000 will go towards my collaboration with a chemist so that I can further improve my home-made products and begin to move them into manufacturing. Shall I exceed my goal, more money will go into creating more sweaters; I have gotten request for full length sweaters and would love to full-fill that for this Fall season.

The perks will range from getting shout outs on my social media for joining me on this journey, to receiving up to TWO sweaters upon production (Est. delivery October 2019). 

...And if I don't reach my goal, it will just take longer for me to get these sweaters into the hands of those excited for them, and the selection will be limited. But, I will continue to pursue the purpose of my brand. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and I totally get it! But I would love it if you could share this campaign either on your social media, via email/text, or even by word of mouth to those you believe may be interested. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign!

In addition, you may also follow me or share my social media pages:

  • IG @Locks_of_Liz 
  • FB @LocksofLiz.Haircare
  • Youtube: Kurly Gurl Liz

I thank you in advance for your time and joining me as I kickstart my brand!

story:
At age 17 I became a teenage mom, unable to complete High School I decided to obtain a G.E.D. I attended a vocational school which allowed me to obtain my G.E.D while training for an office job. At 22 while working for a mental health clinic in queens, I decided to go back to school to pursue a career in fashion.

Because I had no background in fashion, I was unable to attend my dream school - The Fashion Institute of technology. I then decided to move to PA and attend a fashion design Program at Lehigh Community College, which taught me the basics of sewing and drawing which would then allow me to apply to the Fashion Institute of technology. Fast-forward 8 years later, I have completed two associates in Fashion design and a BFA at the fashion Institute of technology. I have interned for major brands like Calvin Klein and Tory Burch, I am currently Freelancing for Champion active wear and Kirkland.

While I was growing up I would purposely decide to go outside with pajamas, it was difficult to find clothing that allowed me to feel comfortable and relaxed. Now 15 years later I am still dealing with the same issues, while I won’t go outside wearing my little mermaid pajamas  anymore, I’ve decided to create pieces that offer the PJ's comfort but in a elegant, and functional way. YNA can achieve this by using luxurious fabrics like silks and wools which provide the same comfort pajamas offer. Our inventory will consist of items like - Robes, Kimonos, Jackets, Corsets, Joggers, Hoodies, Skirts, Swimwear, and Bustiers.   

Many other establishments are producing overseas due to high cost. Your contributions will help establish this made in American label, and provide people with casual elegant loungewear.

The cost of developing a brand is certainly steep, we aim to raise about $50,000, which will help cover expenses like luxury fabrics, trims, samples, production, showroom, fitting models, and pop up shop. 

The way YNANEWYORK will be thanking Contributors is by offering discounts, post features on our website and VIP guest to pop up shops launch parties. 

We hope to reach the goal but in the circumstance that we don’t, we will use the contributions to continue to successfully develop the brand.

The pieces we create or timeless, these are not items that are trend based. These pieces can be worn without a time constraint. Allowing for less disposal and less items in your closet. 

New adventures bring hurdles, my life has not been easy and I don’t expect it to be, there’s a lesson in every outcome, the key is to have a positive outlook and learn from your mistakes. My plan is to continue to push forward regardless of the setbacks.

There are plenty of ways to contribute without money, by sharing and spreading the word you can help our brand reach different audiences. Please share using Indiegogo’s sharing tools!

story:
Dear Potential Contributers and Customers,
We would like to introduce ourselves. Our names are Stephanos (Kale) Jett and Ryan Castello. Together we are LYE 'N' Heart. LYE 'N' Heart is online-based clothing store featuring all new and original designs drawn by Kale. We came up this idea because we envision a quality, high-end, and fresh new look for the fashion industry, for both men and women. Our hope is to deliver high-fashion items at affordable prices. 

What We Need & What You Get
We hope to raise $2000 over the course of the next 30 days. The $2000 we are hoping to raise is going to be used in the following ways:

  • Complete our website and publish it on the Web
  • Pay for materials, editing software, office supplies, and any other office equipment that may be needed
  • Create designs and products
  • Manufacturer's labor and shipping costs. 
  • Advertisement
  • Novelty items
  • Getting all brand names and graphic art copyrighted and registered
  • Any other expenses that may come up

* All money contributed will 100% be used for the expenses of running the company.
Perks
If the following amounts are donated, you will receive the following perks:

The Starter Pack

  • If you choose to contribute $10 to our campaign, you will receive the following:
  • 1. Signed thank you letter from Ryan and Kale
  • 2. A free LYE 'N' Heart concept art refrigerator magnet 

The Middle Pack

  • If you choose to contribute $50 to our campaign, you will receive the following:
  • 1. Signed thank you letter from Ryan and Kale
  • 2. A free LYE 'N' HEART concept art refrigerator magnet
  • 3. A special edition t-shirt created only for those who contribute $50 or more

The Grand Package

  • If you choose to contribute $115 to our campaign, you will receive the following:
  •  1. Signed thank you letter from Ryan and Kale
  • 2. A free LYE 'N' HEART concept art refrigerator magnet
  • 3. A special edition t-shirt created only for those who contribute $115 or more  
  • 3. Your name featured on a special page dedicated to you on our website  
  • 4. A free Lye 'N' Heart concept art magnet 

We are using flexible funding which means we will be keeping all funds for the company even if the total goal is not met.

The Impact
If we are able to raise the amount of money we need to start this company, this would mean achieving our life's goals and making a lasting imprint, not only as a brand, but as successful entrepreneurs. As we grow, we will be able to produce more products for you, our customers. However, we will always keep true to what we believe in - offering our first-rate products and all original designs, while still providing exceptional customer service to our online shoppers.
Risks & Challenges
Nothing in life is without it's own challenges, and we're sure that we will not be immune to challenges either. Some of these challenges may include:
Not making enough in sales

  • If this occurs, we will spend more time and money on advertising and making sure word gets out about LYE 'N' Heart. We will also rework and re-invent our business model and design.

We will also be improving our skills in business and money management. We will also be taking business courses at the local college and online.
If you Cannot Contribute
If you have read thus far, we would like to thank you for allowing us to take you along on a tour of why we are doing this and what we are about.
Before you go, we would like to ask you to spread the word about our company to your friends, family, neighbors, and anyone you meet . Go out there and make some noise! Also, be sure to use the many sharing tools Indiegogo has available.
We would like to thank you for taking the time to read our campaign plan, and hope you will consider making a contribution to our campaign.

Sincerely,
Stephanos (Kale) Jett and Ryan Castello
Founders
story_txt:
Dear Potential Contributers and Customers,We would like to introduce ourselves. Our names are Stephanos (Kale) Jett and Ryan Castello. Together we are LYE 'N' Heart. LYE 'N' Heart is online-based clothing store featuring all new and original designs drawn by Kale. We came up this idea because we envision a quality, high-end, and fresh new look for the fashion industry, for both men and women. Our hope is to deliver high-fashion items at affordable prices. What We Need & What You GetWe hope to raise $2000 over the course of the next 30 days. The $2000 we are hoping to raise is going to be used in the following ways:
Complete our website and publish it on the Web
Pay for materials, editing software, office supplies, and any other office equipment that may be needed
Create designs and products
Manufacturer's labor and shipping costs. 
Advertisement
Novelty items
Getting all brand names and graphic art copyrighted and registered
Any other expenses that may come up
* All money contributed will 100% be used for the expenses of running the company.PerksIf the following amounts are donated, you will receive the following perks:The Starter Pack
If you choose to contribute $10 to our campaign, you will receive the following:
1. Signed thank you letter from Ryan and Kale
2. A free LYE 'N' Heart concept art refrigerator magnet 
The Middle Pack
If you choose to contribute $50 to our campaign, you will receive the following:
1. Signed thank you letter from Ryan and Kale
2. A free LYE 'N' HEART concept art refrigerator magnet
3. A special edition t-shirt created only for those who contribute $50 or more
The Grand Package
If you choose to contribute $115 to our campaign, you will receive the following:
 1. Signed thank you letter from Ryan and Kale
2. A free LYE 'N' HEART concept art refrigerator magnet
3. A special edition t-shirt created only for those who contribute $115 or more  
3. Your name featured on a special page dedicated to you on our website  
4. A free Lye 'N' Heart concept art magnet 
We are using flexible funding which means we will be keeping all funds for the company even if the total goal is not met.The ImpactIf we are able to raise the amount of money we need to start this company, this would mean achieving our life's goals and making a lasting imprint, not only as a brand, but as successful entrepreneurs. As we grow, we will be able to produce more products for you, our customers. However, we will always keep true to what we believe in - offering our first-rate products and all original designs, while still providing exceptional customer service to our online shoppers.Risks & ChallengesNothing in life is without it's own challenges, and we're sure that we will not be immune to challenges either. Some of these challenges may include:Not making enough in salesIf this occurs, we will spend more time and money on advertising and making sure word gets out about LYE 'N' Heart. We will also rework and re-invent our business model and design.We will also be improving our skills in business and money management. We will also be taking business courses at the local college and online.If you Cannot ContributeIf you have read thus far, we would like to thank you for allowing us to take you along on a tour of why we are doing this and what we are about.Before you go, we would like to ask you to spread the word about our company to your friends, family, neighbors, and anyone you meet . Go out there and make some noise! Also, be sure to use the many sharing tools Indiegogo has available.We would like to thank you for taking the time to read our campaign plan, and hope you will consider making a contribution to our campaign.Sincerely,Stephanos (Kale) Jett and Ryan CastelloFounders

story:
About This Project

We are a group of furniture designers and makers in Costa Mesa, California. We started an online business to sell custom made, made to measure, made to order modern furniture at www.1x1modern.com. We developed a set of coat racks that have been inspired by some of the most famous landmark towers in the world, which we hope will be appealing to anybody interested in architecture and design -- hopefully, that's you! We could custom make these coat racks one by one, but we thought that we could make these coat racks available to a much broader audience at a much lower cost by contracting with a larger furniture factory (at 30% less than custom made price, if we can make the volume commitment).

Willingly Coat Rack

  • Inspired by the Willis Tower inside the Chicago Loop
  • Finished in Black Ash wood veneer that gives it a nice tactile grain
  • 40 cm (15.8 inches) by 40 cm at the base, 196 cm (77.2 inches) high
  • More information at our website: Willingly coat rack

Freely Coat Rack

  • Inspired by the One Freedom Tower in New York City
  • Finished in lustrous Light Gray color lacquer
  • 40 cm (15.8 inches) by 40 cm at the base, 206 cm (81.1 inches) high
  • More information at our website: Freely coat rack

Triangularly Coat Rack

  • Inspired by the Bank of China Tower in Hong Kong
  • Finished in Blue Ash wood veneer that gives it a nice tactile grain
  • 40 cm (15.8 inches) by 40 cm at the base, 188 cm (74.0 inches) high
  • More information at our website: Triangularly coat rack

Sharply Coat Rack

  • Inspired by The Shard Tower in the City of London
  • Finished in Blue color lacquer that gives it a nice smooth gleam
  • 40 cm (15.8 inches) by 40 cm at the base, 199 cm (78.3 inches) high
  • More information at our website: Sharply coat rack

Handily Coat Rack

  • Inspired by the John Hancock Tower along the Magnificent Mile of Chicago
  • Finished in Red Oak wood veneer that gives it a nice tactile grain
  • 40 cm (15.8 inches) by 40 cm at the base, 206 cm (81.1 inches) high
  • More information at our website: Handily coat rack

These are not copies or replicas of the buildings. Their shapes have been inspired by each respective building and respectfully rendered as an abstraction, an homage to their timeless design, but we were surprised by how well they work as coat racks, with hooks at different heights for long coats, petite coats and backpacks.

What We Need & What You Get

We need a total combined order of 30 coat racks, enough to fill up a 40-foot container, in order to get the volume pricing from the furniture factory. In return for you, from this campaign...

  • You get to choose any of the coat rack designs as a perk at more than 30% discount from our regular custom-made price of $1,290.
  • You get your perks delivered in early December 2016, just in time for the Holidays for that special architecture buff in your life (maybe that's you!).
  • If we can't reach our campaign goal of $25,000, then we will return your money, unless we can come to a new deal with the furniture factory. If you want, you can still order the coat racks from our website at their regular price.

The Impact

As designers and architecture buffs ourselves, we are really excited to be able to bring this small light of architectural and design inspiration to you, and at the same time, a practical addition for your home or office.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot commit to one of our perks, please help us in other ways:

  • Please let your friends and family know about this campaign, especially if they are interested in design, architecture or modern home decor and furniture.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools and come and visit us at our website www.1x1modern.com and our social media sites at Facebook, Twitter and Instagram!
  • From there, we would appreciate any comments you have about these coat racks, as well as any suggestion for what building or landmark we should be inspired by next.

Thank you!

story:
I have had a deep love of design and fashion since I was a very young girl.

Being a kid that grew up in the Midwest in the 70’s, I could not escape the allure of Halston, Studio 54 or the futuristic influence of TV shows such as Wonder Woman, The Bionic Woman or Buck Rogers in the 21st century.

Starting my retail career after college, I jumped into various corporate retail roles from Sales to Merchandising to Sourcing and Production. I was fortunate enough to have had some wonderful opportunities working at Fortune 500 companies such as The Gap and Williams-Sonoma as well as gaining my first foray into world of design with a stint at IDEO.

Overall, it was a dynamic and exciting 22-year career journey full of successes, a few failures and many friendships along the way! With the valuable, industry knowledge I gained over the course of 2 decades, I knew that the current retail model needed to be vastly improved quickly- culturally, ethically and technologically.

Partnering with my global manufacturers over the years, most often directly on the factory floor, I was able to groom my understanding of design, strengthen my strategic skillset and broaden my understanding on the true cost of what it takes to bring a product to market.

The irony is that we all pay a very high price for offshoring the production of mass amounts of goods each year- socially, economically and environmentally. Seeing firsthand both overseas and at home, the corresponding pollution and excessive packaging that hit our waste streams each year, continues to seriously impact me.

I have vowed, if given the chance, to do it differently, to create a better, more socially, environmentally and sustainable business model that puts people and planet ahead of pure profit.

After just completing my first year in my MBA program with an emphasis in Design Strategy, I am that much more well equipped to build a business that has tenets rooted in transparency, sustainable product innovation and customer co-creation.

With the launch of my brand, Nanedi Valles, I want to build a company, a culture and a brand that sets out to do things differently, to do what is right.

Today’s consumer wants well-crafted, unique designs and buy-it-once quality products that last. With the aid of technology and social media, consumers can now be quickly heard when it comes to their immediate wants, needs and opinions.

Additive manufacturing, or better known as 3D printing, is now allowing custom products to penetrate the American market at a much larger scale and faster pace. This technology has afforded me the opportunity to make Nanedi Valles strictly Made in the Americas (North/South/Central America and Mexico).

I have partnered with 10, highly respected U.S. makers, for my initial Summer 2017 collection launch. In some cases, it has taken 4-5 different makers to bring one of my designs to market. I am confident you will see all of the care, quality and love put into every piece of my collection.

Nanedi Valles is guaranteed to deliver a unique, sophisticated, sustainable, one-of-a-kind product and online shopping experience supported with a customer concierge service that embraces and celebrates you every day!

Thank you for your help in making this mighty dream become a reality!

 

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

Through your help and contributions, I will be able to take my first step in making Nanedi Valles a reality.

I am seeking an initial round of funding of $25,000, over the next 45 days, in order to continue to build the retail brand of the future!

This specific dollar threshold will also qualify me to apply to the Tory Burch Foundation Fellows Program in September 2017:

http://www.toryburchfoundation.org/fellows/

I have pulled together a special series of exclusive product offerings across my Summer 2017 jewelry and handbag collection, curated exclusively for you to help raise these important funds.

If I am not able to achieve my goal of $25,000, whatever funds I do receive will go back to paying for the tooling and development fees that I incurred to date in developing this special collection.

THE IMPACT

I want to build a company that fully engages and integrates the customer, real-time. I want to build a company with a strong, positive and proactive, social conscience and places people and planet at the top of the list. I want to provide the highest quality, unique products that provide an incredible customer experience.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

With any new venture there are many unknowns politically, environmentally and financially that can impact any business model at a moment’s notice. However, the constraints I have encountered in building my business over the last year have actually pushed me to be more resourceful, flexible and innovative. I am confident I can build an exciting new business with your help!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If a monetary contribution is not possible, I would love to enlist your help in simply spreading the word on my company’s exciting mission and vision! I want to reach as many people as I can in order to get my business off the ground in the next 45 days.

story:
CONCEPT & PHILOSOPHY

From our home here in Helsinki, we set out to discover the other side of the Moomins.

To go deeper into the World Tove Jansson created and the characters that she first brought to life. 

Known across the World as playful, adventurous, loveable characters. They are also curious, unusual, mischievous, mysterious and sometimes misunderstood creatures – from an even more mysterious World. 

We were inspired by the original stories and characters - which capture the imagination of adults as well as children – because they are much deeper and more thought provoking than most. They are based on real places, events and people. Characters who are brave enough and bold enough to explore unknown places – with a child like sense of adventure and temptation. 

From the beginning we wanted to capture the true heart and soul of the Moomins in our products. Deep, meaningful, relatable but very unique. Tove Janssons graphic illustrations use black and white contrast to show mood.  The darkness and the light, the joy and the fear, the comfort and the unknown - bringing the stories and the characters to life. 

These elements are present in the products we have created. Strong but stylish. Playful but not childish. Bold, graphic and timeless. Street style with a sense of freedom and adventure.

Just like the Moomins on an adventure in Moominvalley – we wanted to capture the feeling of exploring something or somewhere new. The idea that the Moomins are timeless and their stories transcend generations.

Be the first to discover the other side of the Moomins.

 

Our accessories are not only stylish, but also functional. For example, Moomin by Mozo backpack has a separate pocket for your laptop:

 

CAMPAIGN

All the products presented in this campaign are in the production stage. The estimated shipment time, depending the product, is April/May 2017. Our backers get their products first and with discounted prices.

We would love for you to join us on this journey . With your support  we are able to produce an even wider selection of stylish exclusive products. Hopefully, you share our enthusiasm about the concept and philosophy of the designs, and help us to go further on this adventure.

We love to hear from our customers and fans, so please don't hesitate to share your feedback.

TEAM

Mozo is a design house, based in Helsinki, Finland. We've created mobile accessories for brands like Microsoft, Nokia, Fujitsu, Eve-tech and others. We are known for innovative design and premium quality.

Our team is a blend of youth & experience. Being inspired, motivated and driven, we're passionate about exploring new worlds and creating new designs. Just like this new collection, with which we've expanded our product range further into the world of fashion.

It's a powerful creative synergy for doing the things we love.

 

 

Join us on this journey and help us to spread the Moomin philosophy around the world!

Thank you for your support.

Mozoans
