story:
Perfect Performance Under The Sun

Interviewing an elderly person during testing the iShade sunglasses. And thanks for a warm letter from Chicago

 (Don't miss the most important short video here)

 

Dear Tony,

I Loved the sunglasses that you gave me. The 26hr drive back to Chicago was made so much easier because of those glasses. For example, I would start my drive before dawn and drove straight into the sunrise. The sunglasses made driving in the sun easy to do because they were dark enough to keep my eyes focused on the road. They were also comfortable, I know because I had them on for Hours. But they were not too dark because when I went into truck stops I did not need to remove the glasses as things were real clear.

Thanks 

Clayton

4th April 2017

 
 

A boy wearing iShade sunglasses 

(Don't miss the 15 seconds short video here)

Here’s a boy at a game wearing iShade sunglasses on a sunny day. Watch as he turns towards the sun, the lenses transition to its darkest shade, as he turns towards the shadows, the lenses appear more and more transparent.

A golfer wearing iShade sunglasses

 

While wearing iShade outdoor, the sun may appear like the moon, as all the glare disappears no matter how strong the sunlight is.

The player gets ready to swing his golf club to hit the golf ball. As he bows down to see the ball, the lenses become clear to allow for better visibility. When the golfer hits the ball and looks up, the iShade darken instantly to protect his vision against the bright sunlight. No more glare of the sun at all.

Here is Torrey Pines Golf Course in La Jolla, California of USA,  interviewing is currently taking place... 

(Don't miss the 30 seconds short video here)

 

A girl wearing iShade sunglasses  

(Don't miss the 10 seconds short video here)

The girl is moving her head up and down. The light intensity is weak when she bows her head, and so the lenses turn transparent in half a second. When she turns her head up to strong sunlight, the lenses darken via linear stepless technology. The entire process not only super fast but smooth and gentle.

 

iShade discoloration process

(Don't miss the 20 seconds short video here)

 

What'll happen when face to or away from the sun while wearing iShade?

When directly facing the sun, the lenses reach the maximum shade in response to the most intense sunlight. But as you turn away from the sun, the shade also becomes lighter, in response to the decreasing light intensity, until it reaches its minimum. But as you are returning to face toward the sun again, the lens shade will automatically get darker until it reaches the darkest level. So the iShade lens changes its shade in direct proportion to the intensity of the exposed sunlight instantly.All the change within half a second.
 

A driver wearing iShade sunglasses

 (Don't miss the important short video here)

Basically, iShade has an extremely clear visibility when you are driving, because it's basic color is very light with very high transmittance. This makes it clearer than traditional sunglasses. But as long as the sun appears in front of your vehicles, iShade works to block out the harsh glares and have a clear visibility for your driving. Due to the dynamic progressive coloring feature, which makes it more clear than any traditional sunglasses. iShade actually help seeing at a distance and everything will look much clearer even in dim lighting. You can wear them inside a room or a tunnel and still see just fine.  iShade greatly improves your vision. Clearer vision means safer when you drive. Diamond is valuable, but safety is life.

iShades perfectly synchronizes with the subtle and immediate changes in the lighting environment and many users even don't feel the transition at all. But users can attest to the smart shading technology when they block the chip using their hands and see the discoloration process taking place.

The action above is just for demo and is not recommended for actual use.  

 

Driving through the tunnel

iShade sunglasses become clear and light with visual clarity once the car enters the tunnel. Once the car gets out of the tunnel, the lenses immediately darken according to the light changes in the environment. There's no need to manually take off the glasses or to put them back on. Less distraction means more safety. Nothing is more important than safety when you drive.

 

Driving into an indoor parking lot.

You may also experience dimming issues when you're wearing traditional sunglasses and you head into an indoor parking lot. The transition from the road and open sunlight into a dark parking area will cause you to see nothing. It will be so dark that you'll have to take off your traditional sunglasses! But this won't be an issue if you're wearing iShade. Diamond is valuable, but safety is priceless.

 

Daily Color Change

The light intensity of the iShade sunglasses depends on the brightness of the surrounding environment. The lenses automatically adjust to the relative brightness on a number of light illumination modes. This is somewhat similar to a parabola.

 

Powerful Polarized Lens

Is iShade Polarized?

The answer is yes, definitely. But how do we prove it?

Here's a simple experiment to convince you.

(Don't miss the 15 seconds short video here)

Here are two pairs iShade sunglasses. When you put the lens on top of each other, it darkens.

Here is a polarizing test card. Put iShade in front of the test card, the hidden fish pattern will be displayed. 

 

iShade, also for myopic group

 

Hold on for a minute. I have a myopic condition, but can I still wear the iShade? The answer is yes. Though myopic prescription lens is currently limited due to technology, there's still a way to make it work. A prescription adapter is the best solution for wearing your glasses along with iShade.

iShade with Prescription Adapter

Behold, the add-on prescription adapter for those who have myopic conditions. The operation and installation are super easy! 

(Don't miss the 10 seconds short video here)

 

(The gentleman is wearing iShade with a prescription adapter)

As you can see the superior performance of iShade is unmatched by traditional sunglasses in the marketplace. But what is the key difference between iShade and traditional sunglasses?
We can say, whenever you need a clear vision, iShade is more clear and whenever you need a shade, iShade provide better shading. It's not only high-tech but fashion, practical and high-end which to lead your future eyewear.

 

The Sunglasses Revolution 

Sunglasses were invented about a hundred years ago using fixed tints applied to the lenses. Though providing protecting from the glaring sun, sometimes it became too dark to see when the sunlight is weak, and sometimes the strong sunlight causes excessive glare like you're never wearing the sunglasses in the first place. The fact is that the fixed lens dye could not cope with the changing light conditions and the ambient environment. But all of that is about to change.

Enter the iShade smart tinting sunglasses. It is a subversive product in the field of eyeglasses. iShade adapt to the amount of sunlight you're seeing and automatically changes the lens' dye. The result is a revolutionary feature that allows the wearer the best visibility under the sun at all times. 

 

The Working Principle of iShade Sunglasses.

(Look! The basic color of the lenses are very light with extremely high transmittance, which are clear indoors and darken outdoors.)

Combining smart chip technology with self-tinting lenses. Powering each iShade sunglasses is a specially-made, energy saving smart chip made by the company. The solar chips are environmentally friendly, uses solar energy and more importantly, allows for the changing of the lens tint in as little as half a second. The driving principle behind it is a light theory based on electric tensions which adjust the lens via responsive transmittance. The stronger the sun, the darker the lens and vice versa. You need only one pair of sunglasses for all seasons and all weather conditions. You won't have to manually switch your sunglasses from on to off, or vice versa- the adjusting is done for you. All you need to do is to relax!

 

WHY iShade?

Your Other Premium Sunglasses Can't Compare

List of Features:

Completely Intelligent

It looks no different from traditional sunglasses. Replace battery with solar energy and automatic transition without a switch, completely intelligent.

0.5-Second Reaction Tinting Speed

Photochromic lens darkens when it detects UV rays in about 10 to 20 seconds while changing from dark to light in a few minutes. But the reaction rate of iShade for changing the tint is half a second. The lenses change by themselves during the synchronization process. 

Dynamic Progressive Coloring

When there is no sunlight, the basic color of lens is very light.When there is sunlight, the change of tint starts at the top and transition to the bottom. The lenses always appear darker at the top than at the bottom. Due to the sun always above the eyes, this makes visibility much better and the shading effect to work more excellently than any traditional sunglasses.

Linear Stepless Coloring

The most amazing innovation is the tinting linear stepless discoloration feature, which added an unprecedented level of comfortability to the sunglasses wearer. The discoloration process and the transition is so smooth that your eyes won't feel the transition at all.

Car-Sensitive Coloring

iShade works best when you're driving during the day. With it, you can block out the bright sunlight and have a much more clear visibility even when the sun is in front of the car. Glare problems disappear and you can concentrate on driving safely on the road.

Ultra Light Weight
Traditional sunglasses usually weighs 25-45 grams,but iShade smart tinting sunglasses weights only 23 grams. Despite all these features, Ishade is even lighter than traditional sunglasses.

 

Chip Tech.+Solar Tech.+ Flexible LCD Tech.

A chip as a iShade's CPU(enlarge)            A chip compared to US coins(enlarge)

iShade’s computer chip is the result of long years of research and development by the company. At the heart of the chip is a smart CPU like that of a powerful computer.

     A control module（enlarge）                          Control module for batch production

 

Flexible LCD Lens

 

          Fexible LCD lenses                                   Flexible LCD lenses and chip combination

A set of chip and lenses combination is a key component，although high-tech but looks very simple.We made high-tech to be simple.

 

 All parts breakdown before assembly                                 After assembly

Final Products 

 

Structure of iShade

 

Technical Specs

 

 

Team Story

Ever wonder how iShade smart tinting sunglasses came to be? Let us tell you the whole story.

Michael Xiao used to be a salesman selling sunglasses in Southern California for many years. It was his job to drive around every day to meet his customers. One major problem he had was actually facing the strong glare of the Southern Californian sun as he drove from one city to another. It reached a tipping point when Michael almost had an accident because he couldn't see where he was going!

Sure, he was wearing sunglasses. But that sometimes had no effect, especially in the face of the blinding sun. The lenses were simply not capable of diffusing the strong sunlight. When the sun is weak, the shades were simply too dark. Michael began thinking how much his life as a driver and as a salesman would improve if there was a way to make an "intelligent" sunglasses...

So in 2006, Michael entered a venture with his younger brother Tony about developing iShade. After 2 years of hard work and research, the first prototypes were produced. It made use of LCD senses and batteries to change the color of the lenses. Then, the team encountered their first problem- the lens was flat, it was heavy and a button had to be pressed for the lens to change color.

Both inventors thought about making things simpler. The ideal smart sunglasses of the future will have to be flexible and have curved LCD lenses. Instead of batteries, kinetic and solar energy were to be used to achieve maximum innovation. But alas, the technology and the materials to make this possible were simply not available during the time. 

It wasn’t until curved lenses were mass-produced for e-book readers and high-end smartphones that the iShade finally took shape. 2010, Darren and Ben, two young and promising chip experts joined our team.  

We gave up the original design and everything back to the drawing board. We contacted the best lens manufacturers and worked closely with them. After numerous of failures, and the future looked good. The iShade underwent major technological and design changes. The switch that operated the dimming was replaced by a smarter solar-powered chip. The flat lens was discarded in favor of the curved variety, which is an amazing story in itself. Overall, a new solar chip module controls the whole process. The chip set a default intensity of 3000 Lux, which changes colors appropriately in 0.5 seconds. 

Fast forward to 2017 and we have the new iShade to thank for. It is the newest technology in the field of eyeglasses. We'd love to take this opportunity to give thanks to all of our friends and our avid supporters, and to our future supporters in this innovative endeavor. We hope that with added backing we can push this product to the market so that sunglasses users and drivers will enjoy the benefits it can bring. Our mission is to produce top-notch sunglasses that are made with the highest standards. This is our gift to our beloved investors.

 

Our Team 

 

Risks and Challenges

At first glance, iShade smart sunglasses look very much like the future of tinted shades, but the technology powering it is relatively straightforward and simple. The parts that make up the whole is the control module, the flexible LCD lens, and the plastic frame. All of these can be produced under a controlled environment.

One of the most notable challenges encountered was the production of satisfactory flexible LCD lenses. Flexible liquid crystal displays that go in e-book readers, high-end smartphone screens and other electronics are so in demand that if we were to order now, it would take approximately five months to be delivered. This is a double-edged sword that can go both ways. If the supply is short, then some of the product deliveries will have to be postponed.

The good news is that all the lens factory we visited know the selling potential of our products. There should be a strict time frame to ensure successful deliveries. If all goes as planned, the order of iShade will be shipped and arrive well before Christmas time. 

You'll be sure to appreciate the product when the next hot summer months come. There's a use for it even in the colder months- use it as you ski down slopes for unparalleled visibility!

We'd love to take this opportunity to thank all of our current backers. We'd love to have this groundbreaking product be available as soon as possible to help all sunglasses users and drivers on the road. Your support means the world to us. Without it, such an innovative product would never have existed. Our goal is to perfect the iShade with great improvements and invaluable advice.

Again, thank you for your incredible support!

 

Options

 

Classic Black                                                    Modern Coral

 

iShade A for normal vision people. Available in two colors of your choice. Items included: 1 iShade glasses, 1 glasses case, 1 cleaning cloth and a bottle of lens cleaning solution.

iShade B for myopia people. Available in two colors of your choice. Items included: 1 iShade glasses, 1 prescription adapter, 1 glasses case, 1 cleaning cloth and a bottle of lens cleaning solution.

Global free shipping

If all goes as planned, the order of iShade will be shipped and arrive well before Christmas time. It makes for an excellent Christmas gift for others or for your own personal use!

The benefits of being one of a iShade backers,

1, you’ll get a big discount off the retail price.

2, you’ll be the first to use this innovative product.

3, you’ll enjoy the best price when you buy the product again after the campaign is over.

For Partnerships, Business, Distributions, and Sales

Do you see the market potential iShade has? If you would like to work with us, distribute iShade around the world, please contact at: 

info@ishadeusa.com/ming@jacksonoptical.com.cn

 

FQAs

Q: Who can use iShade?

A: Drivers can use iShade to improve their safety on the road. The sun glare is disappeared and you can concentrate on driving. People can use iShade as they undertake their favorite outdoor activity. The benefits of smart sunglasses far outweigh that of traditional sunglasses. All in all, whenever you need a clear view, iShade is more clear and whenever you need a shade, iShade provides better shading. 

 

Q: How does iShade change colors and under what conditions?

A: There are two essential factors that make it happen- start light and saturation illumination. Start luminance creates the minimum lens discoloration. When light is measured at 3,000 Lux, the lens will start to change. Saturation illumination will try to achieve the darkest lens illumination. If the light is measured at 50,000 Lux, then the lens will achieve the darkest saturation.

 

Q: Why do you use the slower 0.5-second discoloration time frame when there's, say 0.1 discoloration speed?

A: It's all about not triggering the lens flicker phenomenon. Setting the discoloration speed to 0.1 seconds will cause the smart lens to flicker and cause a distraction. Setting it at a slower 0.5 seconds will not trigger the flicker effect.

 

Q: How long can iShade last?

A: It's roughly the same as the lifespan of smart watches, smartphones and any product that has electronic components installed within.

 

Q: How do I clean the iShade?

A: It's best not to touch the smart lens directly in order for it to be as clear as possible. You can use appropriate cleaning methods much like you would traditional sunglasses.
story_txt:
Perfect Performance Under The SunInterviewing an elderly person during testing the iShade sunglasses. And thanks for a warm letter from Chicago (Don't miss the most important short video here) Dear Tony,I Loved the sunglasses that you gave me. The 26hr drive back to Chicago was made so much easier because of those glasses. For example, I would start my drive before dawn and drove straight into the sunrise. The sunglasses made driving in the sun easy to do because they were dark enough to keep my eyes focused on the road. They were also comfortable, I know because I had them on for Hours. But they were not too dark because when I went into truck stops I did not need to remove the glasses as things were real clear.Thanks Clayton4th April 2017  
A boy wearing iShade sunglasses (Don't miss the 15 seconds short video here)

Here’s a boy at a game wearing iShade sunglasses on a sunny day. Watch as he turns towards the sun, the lenses transition to its darkest shade, as he turns towards the shadows, the lenses appear more and more transparent.

A golfer wearing iShade sunglasses
 
While wearing iShade outdoor, the sun may appear like the moon, as all the glare disappears no matter how strong the sunlight is.
The player gets ready to swing his golf club to hit the golf ball. As he bows down to see the ball, the lenses become clear to allow for better visibility. When the golfer hits the ball and looks up, the iShade darken instantly to protect his vision against the bright sunlight. No more glare of the sun at all.
Here is Torrey Pines Golf Course in La Jolla, California of USA,  interviewing is currently taking place... 
(Don't miss the 30 seconds short video here)




 

A girl wearing iShade sunglasses  
(Don't miss the 10 seconds short video here)


The girl is moving her head up and down. The light intensity is weak when she bows her head, and so the lenses turn transparent in half a second. When she turns her head up to strong sunlight, the lenses darken via linear stepless technology. The entire process not only super fast but smooth and gentle.


 
iShade discoloration process

(Don't miss the 20 seconds short video here)


 


What'll happen when face to or away from the sun while wearing iShade?
When directly facing the sun, the lenses reach the maximum shade in response to the most intense sunlight. But as you turn away from the sun, the shade also becomes lighter, in response to the decreasing light intensity, until it reaches its minimum. But as you are returning to face toward the sun again, the lens shade will automatically get darker until it reaches the darkest level. So the iShade lens changes its shade in direct proportion to the intensity of the exposed sunlight instantly.All the change within half a second.
 
A driver wearing iShade sunglasses
 (Don't miss the important short video here)

Basically, iShade has an extremely clear visibility when you are driving, because it's basic color is very light with very high transmittance. This makes it clearer than traditional sunglasses. But as long as the sun appears in front of your vehicles, iShade works to block out the harsh glares and have a clear visibility for your driving. Due to the dynamic progressive coloring feature, which makes it more clear than any traditional sunglasses. iShade actually help seeing at a distance and everything will look much clearer even in dim lighting. You can wear them inside a room or a tunnel and still see just fine.  iShade greatly improves your vision. Clearer vision means safer when you drive. Diamond is valuable, but safety is life.
iShades perfectly synchronizes with the subtle and immediate changes in the lighting environment and many users even don't feel the transition at all. But users can attest to the smart shading technology when they block the chip using their hands and see the discoloration process taking place.
The action above is just for demo and is not recommended for actual use.  
 
Driving through the tunnel
iShade sunglasses become clear and light with visual clarity once the car enters the tunnel. Once the car gets out of the tunnel, the lenses immediately darken according to the light changes in the environment. There's no need to manually take off the glasses or to put them back on. Less distraction means more safety. Nothing is more important than safety when you drive.

 
Driving into an indoor parking lot.
You may also experience dimming issues when you're wearing traditional sunglasses and you head into an indoor parking lot. The transition from the road and open sunlight into a dark parking area will cause you to see nothing. It will be so dark that you'll have to take off your traditional sunglasses! But this won't be an issue if you're wearing iShade. Diamond is valuable, but safety is priceless.

 
Daily Color Change
The light intensity of the iShade sunglasses depends on the brightness of the surrounding environment. The lenses automatically adjust to the relative brightness on a number of light illumination modes. This is somewhat similar to a parabola.

 
Powerful Polarized Lens
Is iShade Polarized?
The answer is yes, definitely. But how do we prove it?

Here's a simple experiment to convince you.
(Don't miss the 15 seconds short video here)



Here are two pairs iShade sunglasses. When you put the lens on top of each other, it darkens.
Here is a polarizing test card. Put iShade in front of the test card, the hidden fish pattern will be displayed. 


 
iShade, also for myopic group
 

Hold on for a minute. I have a myopic condition, but can I still wear the iShade? The answer is yes. Though myopic prescription lens is currently limited due to technology, there's still a way to make it work. A prescription adapter is the best solution for wearing your glasses along with iShade.
iShade with Prescription Adapter
Behold, the add-on prescription adapter for those who have myopic conditions. The operation and installation are super easy! 
(Don't miss the 10 seconds short video here)

 


(The gentleman is wearing iShade with a prescription adapter)
As you can see the superior performance of iShade is unmatched by traditional sunglasses in the marketplace. But what is the key difference between iShade and traditional sunglasses?We can say, whenever you need a clear vision, iShade is more clear and whenever you need a shade, iShade provide better shading. It's not only high-tech but fashion, practical and high-end which to lead your future eyewear.

story:
Short Summary

The team consists of three business entrepreneurs. Mr Yeung is the founder with 25 years plus in the Telecom R&D industry. Mr Yeung was the General Manager and VP of Engineering at Airspan UK before starting Power Way Hong Kong in Science Park.

The campaign is to fund the R&D activity to take the project from early prototype to pilot trial with supporting organisations/ parties. The product is designed to address need to take care of our  elderly who is in the high risk of falling category or have a minor fallen before.

The target fund is to employ two software engineers to work on the AI predictive algorithm optimisation and product cost reduction (from prototype to production ready). Our target is to have a batch of 100 samples ready for pilot trials in 12 months. Contributors can nominate their friends or family member to participate in our first pilot trial that we can manage and monitor over the Internet using a cloud based platform.

    For US$150 , you will get the early bird device after our pilot trial with 1 year free subscription to our support platform.

    For US$250, you will get the family early bird 2 devices after our pilot trial with 1 year free subscription to our support platform. 

    For US$50, you get 1 year support service platform license for a single user.

    For US$500, you get a group user license for upto 15 users

    For US$1500, you can participate or nominate a friend or family to join our pilot trial and keep the device and life time support service license.

Our prototype service platform uses IBM Cloud service and below is a snapshot of the process flow of some of the nodes.

    If we are not able to complete the project within the time frame, you have the options to get 30% funding back or agreed to wait for the final product.

The Impact

After research with healthcare workers in UK and healthcare team in HK, a fall preventive alert system is much needed for the elderly. A preventive measure rather than an alert system that will report a fall incident that has happened is what we are offering. The device and supporting service platform will use AI predictive algorithm to raise advance warning to helper(s)/ organization of a potential life changing event of the user. The AI system will self learn each users movement characteristic to fine tune the output of the forecast improvement the accuracy and reduce false trigger situation.

Risks & Challenges

Differentiators

1.Self learning algorithm to improve prediction accuracy over time. Without the user even noted this is being done.
2.IOT and Cloud based technology: Centralize control console to oversee a number of users
3.Small device that is water and washing machine proofed 
4.Battery has fire and impact proofed enclosure for maximum safety.
 
The challenge is to characterize the users movement types and use the self learning predictive algorithm to reliably trigger the alert to the helper with just in time notice.

Contributors can nominate their friends or family member to participate in our first pilot trial that we can manage and monitor over the Internet using a cloud based platform.
    For US$150 , you will get the early bird device after our pilot trial with 1 year free subscription to our support platform.
    For US$250, you will get the family early bird 2 devices after our pilot trial with 1 year free subscription to our support platform. 
    For US$50, you get 1 year support service platform license for a single user.
    For US$500, you get a group user license for upto 15 users
    For US$1500, you can participate or nominate a friend or family to join our pilot trial and keep the device and life time support service license.
Our prototype service platform uses IBM Cloud service and below is a snapshot of the process flow of some of the nodes.

    If we are not able to complete the project within the time frame, you have the options to get 30% funding back or agreed to wait for the final product.

The Impact
After research with healthcare workers in UK and healthcare team in HK, a fall preventive alert system is much needed for the elderly. A preventive measure rather than an alert system that will report a fall incident that has happened is what we are offering. The device and supporting service platform will use AI predictive algorithm to raise advance warning to helper(s)/ organization of a potential life changing event of the user. The AI system will self learn each users movement characteristic to fine tune the output of the forecast improvement the accuracy and reduce false trigger situation.

Risks & Challenges
Differentiators
1.Self learning algorithm to improve prediction accuracy over time. Without the user even noted this is being done.
2.IOT and Cloud based technology: Centralize control console to oversee a number of users
3.Small device that is water and washing machine proofed 
4.Battery has fire and impact proofed enclosure for maximum safety.
 
The challenge is to characterize the users movement types and use the self learning predictive algorithm to reliably trigger the alert to the helper with just in time notice.

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

  1. Decide how many Sleek Supply watches & straps you would like, then click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK."
  2. Choose your favorite watch style & band color.
  3. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  4. You receive your order & enjoy your new watch when production is finished.

What is Sleek Supply Co all about?

We're not excited about fashion. We're excited about the idea of versatility. All of our founders grew up in a place where timeless fashion is a staple. Where cool & casual outlives loud & trendy. We stick to the ideology that trends fade, but authenticity is timeless. We hope you're with us on that.

What specifications are we looking at?

Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 38 mm
Dial Window Material: Hardened Mineral Glass
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Water Resistant: 3ATM/30 Meters
Watch Band Width: 18 mm
Bezel Width: 2 mm
Crown Size: 5 mm

The Two Year Warranty

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us.  

If the mechanics or watch parts malfunction, and it’s our fault, we will repair or replace your product for free. This does not cover any abuse you might put your watch through on your own. The warranty does not cover water damage, normal wear and tear, batteries, accidental glass damage, scratches, strap discoloration, or theft. 

Meet The Team

Press / Customer Relations Contact: tate [at] sleeksupply.com

Team Mascot

We Need Your Support!

This is a great opportunity to benefit mutually. By pledging for one of our watches on Indiegogo, you'll not only help a small business grow, but you'll also receive an awesome watch at a fraction of its normal price! 

If you are unable to pre-order a watch, we would still love some extra support. You don't have to share this on your Facebook or tweet it to the world, but if you know someone that this would be perfect for, send them a message to check our campaign out. It goes a long way and follows our philosophy of building personal connections instead of marketing to the masses.

Instagram: @Sleek_Supply
Facebook: Sleek Supply Co.
Twitter: @SleekSupply

story:
Apparel & Art

  • My name is Chai, the creative director of CHAI LONDON. Originally from the UK, where I graduated from Fashion Design school. I moved to NYC five years ago to commence an opportunity with the largest fashion house in the states, Ralph Lauren. I later launched the menswear line, CHAI LONDON when I noticed a gap in the market and a demand for fashion forward menswear. Men were becoming fashion conscious and wanted to express themselves through sense of style. 
  • Being able to travel to Wynwood in Miami, the largest art platform in the states made me very intrigued to learn more about the muralists and artists... I wanted to collaborate with them.     I wanted to utilise my clothing platform to showcase their work. 
  • With your donation we will be able to create a canvas for local artists as well as garments for fashion conscious individuals to express themselves in. 

We aim to move forwards into small scale proudction with our fashion forward mens tops and jackets. This will allow us to have sufficient inventory to collaborate with local artists throughout the community to express their identity through artwork onto this apparel.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are aiming to raise $20k which will allow us to purchase materials for our styles and to go into production with our prototypes. 
  • As an expression of our gratitude for your donation we will provide you with various perks for believing in our mission and supporting out brand.
  • If we do not reach our goal we will put funds towards creating a pop-up event to showcase both our apparel and local artists. The event will have an artist doing a live drawing session onto our apparel. We will continue to have events to raise the funds to move forwards with our goal.

The Impact

This will be an opportunity to create a platform for local artists and an emerging menswear brand. We will unite British fashion with American artists. 

The proceeds from the sales of these items will go towards the artists and to local charities who use art as a form of healing, such as 'Healing and Education Through Art foundation'.

http://www.savethechildren.org/site/c.8rKLIXMGI...

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Anything you can donate is all in contribution to our goal and we are extremely grateful for you!

  • Please share our story and our goal and pass this campaign on to other people who care about creativity in our community, platforms for local artists and healing through art.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank You From The Bottom Of Our HeART!

story:
What is Pouch Puppies?

Pouch Puppies is the sports tank top with a front pouch that comfortably hugs your puppy with your warmth everywhere you go, while allowing you to go about your day as usual.

You can take your pups shopping, rock climbing, bike riding and so many other recreational activities. Just don't go doing cartwheels or handstands because we didn't fit them with seatbelts!

 

 

 

What makes it awesome?

The specialty fur repellant fabric has a perfect amount of strength and stretch in it, which allows you to place your puppy in the front pouch without damaging the top. It can hold up to 10kg in weight. The materials used are a premium polyester/spandex mix with a breathable weave keeping the wearer and the puppy cool. 

The fashionable razor-back style shape of the top distributes the weight of your puppy evenly throughout your back, allowing you to wear this for hours on end with complete comfort.

It even reduces anxiety in dogs as it hugs them with perfect compression as if they're being held in your arms. 

This top changes the way we interact with our puppies by keeping them closer to us for longer with little to no change in whatever daily task we are completing.

 

 

Where it started

We started pouch puppies accidentally when one day Mel was doing some house work and decided to wear another tshirt on top of the one she was already wearing and place her puppy in between to carry it around. Before we knew it, sketches were being drawn and and idea was born!

When we originally pieced this together it looked like a sack on the front of the singlet and we knew no one in their right mind would wear it. After speaking with some fashion stylists we were able to come up with a sports tank top that not only looked amazing but was extremely comfortable to wear.

 

 

This isn't our first rodeo

Mel contacted Blake who is a digital marketing guru to take this product and make it great.

Blake and his agency Happy Hippo Media control the sales and marketing for highly successful companies with some making as much as $500k/month from their marketing capabilities.

Happy Hippo Media have had experience with startups before and know how to build beautiful brands at scale. They only takes on projects they really love and this is something they describe as "exciting as Ben & Jerry's ice cream".

Our manufacturing contact produces pet products for around the world at scale in quantities of the tens of thousands each week and has the capacity to manufacture our product with precision and efficiency.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to be able to collect enough funds through you and other generous backers or through pre-orders to pay for the manufacturing cost of our first batch of Pouch Puppies and also a marketing campaign.

Once we manufacture the first batch and have enough funds to kickstart the calculated campaign with our agency partner, our dream will come true and puppy parents around the world can rejoice!

Perks: 
Pre-orders will receive a 31% discount on the official launch price once these are manufactured or a 36% discount if two are purchased.

The RRP is $87. Discounted pre-orders will only be $60.

If the fund goal isn't reached we will still continue according to plan however we wont be able to launch at the scale required to take it globally and will only have enough funds to market to one country at a time.

If the goal is reached we are happy to continue receiving funding and further pre-orders to scale the business even further than anticipated.

 

 

 

The Impact

This campaign is important to us as we haven't been able to find another dog carrier that fits this comfortably and is as durable from wear and tear. 

Anxiety in dogs is a common condition nowadays and can be resolved with love and time spent with their owners. Puppies absolutely love it and we want puppy parents around the world to share the same experience.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We have had multiple hurdles to overcome through the prototyping process and have been able to find solutions to these with our accomodating manufacturing contact who believes in our product. 

We we experiencing tearing in the side seams where the puppy weight was pulling on, but after working with the manufacturer to fix this we were able to create reinforced seams that allowed for maximum strength and to carry dogs up to 10kg in weight.

A challenge ahead will be to see just how many people will appreciate this product as much as we do and want to purchase it. Testing this through our social pages will be key here.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help us with the above, you can still help us by spreading the word :)

There are sharing options available that you can use to share with your friends and family.

 

Thank you so much for your help! We're looking forward to bringing Puppies and their parents closer ❤

story:
Hi friends, supporters, crowd-funders!

For the ones who don’t know me, let me quickly introduce myself.

I am... Julie Jumper. In 2011, I move to Goa, India and started my own clothing label « Jungle Gypsy »

Creating my own factory in 2012, I have been designing clothes with all my love and passion, and hopefully adding a little love for all of you beautiful souls and our family here in Goa.

Jungle Gypsy has gone through a great deal of challenges since it's start, but this year has clearly been the most difficult one. Normally, once the season is at its end, I would fly back to Europe where I feel blessed to run fashion pop-ups, festivals boutiques and seasonal markets. And as many of you know I established a small boutique here in Goa over the last 3 years (which, after a lot of soul-searching, I've decided to permanently close, as the pandemic was devastating for many small businesses).

With the current lockdown, I am stuck in India where it's just not possible to raise my annual funds. From the beginning of March onwards, the Post in India has been an ordeal, and the only options for small packages are extremely expensive, which as you could imagine is a big turn off for all customers. So, I’ve decided the best option for this current rough patch, is to send all my clothes back to Europe & Canada and get them distributed from there. However, before I do, I thought it would be a great idea to make a fundraising with the many friends of Jungle Gypsy. As I have no idea how long I will be stuck here, and considering, while I currently have very little money (and maybe struggling.. just a bit) - I also have so many beautiful clothes, all just waiting for a new home.

So now, I hope I have an idea how together, friends & community might support one another, and here's a great opportunity to get yourself or your loved ones, something special from our Goa lifestyle!! Likewise, this comes as a big support for me in a complicated economic hardship. And so, for all those interested, now is a great opportunity to get my clothes at a HUGE discount while at the same time, supporting me and my brand in this difficult moment.

Thank you all for your love and support over the years, and taking the time to read this. I hope you might find something special, at a super price, which might brighten your lockdown season run or make a great gift for someone special far away, when we can all get back to our travels once more!

Brother... Sisters... Family... Tribe One love!!

 

www.junglegypsyfashion.com

 

*Price on my website are in USD however the perks are in canadian dollars since my bank account is canadian. 

*once you purchase i perk i will personally get in touch with you to send your coupon and assist you with choosing your new outfit.

story:
Welcome to Oracle Jayne Station 

Oracle Jayne Station is named after the street in Tucson, Arizona where my father grew up, where I got to spend part of my summer vacations. On the ranch at the edge of the Sonora Desert, my family taught me to appreciate the plants and animals we'd interact with. To this day, I still remember the smells of my grandmother's mud room, the scents from my grandfather's medicine cabinet, and the aromas of the desert after it rained. 

After working as a makeup artist for 17 years, I know that fragrances have long been marketed based on emotions and experiences. Rarely do they actually have anything to do with either. What’s inside the bottle usually has very little from the natural world or any authentic heritage. Oracle Jayne Station challenges all that.

 

What does the signature scent smell like?

My signature scent, El Arroyo, is inspired by the smell of the desert after it rains, and the sight of the creek running behind my grandparents ranch. This is the first luxury fragrance to containing a spectrum of the chaparral plant aromas. Also known as greasewood or creosote, this hearty Sonoran Desert shrub was previously thought to be an impossible to distill plant. Two different innovative and entirely natural processes collect the extract and distill the essential oil, resulting in a "multifaceted" fragrance that changes with each breath. On its own, the greasewood shifts between subtly sweet, gently floral, woodsy like cedar, cooling like eucalyptus, and spicy green like wasabi. El Arroyo combines greasewood with snakeweed, myrrh, and several other botanicals to create a unique and welcoming fragrance that changes from moment to moment.

El Arroyo is suitable for all genders. 

 

Why ask for crowdfunding from IndieGogo?

The perfumes, soaps, and body products I make are inspired by genuine moments in my life. The ingredients need to match up.

I'm sourcing organic, fair trade, and wildcrafted ingredients. These are significantly more expensive that the ingredients you get from most department stores, indie beauty brands, and "natural" beauty products. Most large companies use artificial scents, private label formulas, and an array of toxic synthetic chemicals hidden behind the word "fragrance". Sometimes better brands will tell you the country where their essential oil came from. With some of my ingredients, I can tell you the name of the woman who picked them, when she distilled them, and when was the last time it rained. The better quality and unique ingredients set the brand apart.

I'm paying more to offer you safer, artisanal, and more ethically produced products. Even my alcohol is organic! They smell better, care for your skin better, and in times like these, hopefully just make us feel better. I need your help to make them the best they can be. 

 

Lots of products are almost ready to head your way, and to finally make this dream a reality your advance purchases and funding will help me pay for:

-credit card expenses for bulk orders of packaging, but especially the premium ingredients from other small businesses, Fair-Trade women's cooperatives in Ghana, organic alcohol supplier in Oregon, and organic and wildcrafted essential oil crafters in the United States and internationally. 

-trademarks already in progress and other required legal fees

-partnerships with visual artists, illustrators, and sculptors

-a custom and interactive website

-getting the word out!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still me on my mission.

  • Link, share, comment, on Instagram @OracleJayneStation. Ask friends to get the word out and let them know where to look.
  • Post the IndieGoGo link to Facebook or post to my personal page.
  • Visit OracleJayneStation.com to sign up for my mailing list

 

-------------------------------

More about Oracle Jayne Station:

Many of the ultra premium ingredients cost more for me to obtain. I encourage you to review the labels on all the products. It’s my belief that luxury brands have a responsibility to deliver the best ingredients possible...and for much of recent history, they haven’t. Most of us have only had the chance to smell artificial or poor quality versions of fragrances that big companies usually sell. This bothers me immensely because then we don’t know what we’re missing. It’s like spending a lifetime thinking I didn’t like coffee...until I finally had a good cup of coffee. 

 

Every Oracle Jayne product is made from scratch with superior essential oils and tinctures from organic or wild sourced plants, extracted using CO2, cold process, steam distillation, and organic cane alcohol. No synthetic chemicals, no excessively processed, expeller pressed, harsh solvent extracted ingredients. No imitation scents or pre-made formulas. No “private label” products.  No “melt-and-pour” soaps. Whenever they can be found, Fair-Trade certified ingredients are used. No animal ingredients are used and no products are tested on animals. Packaging is simple and  recyclable or biodegradable. 

 

The quality of an essential oil depends on where the plant is from, what chemicals it was grown with, when it’s picked, and how it’s extracted. Some are amazing. Some are disturbing. Hundreds of versions of an ingredient will exist, sometimes expensive, sometimes costing ten times less...but for good reason. 

 

Oracle Jayne is pushing the limits of what a perfume brand is able, and willing, to offer its customers. Fragrance is an art. Oracle Jayne Station is authentic luxury and an experience worth sharing.

El Arroyo is suitable for all genders. 
 
Why ask for crowdfunding from IndieGogo?
The perfumes, soaps, and body products I make are inspired by genuine moments in my life. The ingredients need to match up.
I'm sourcing organic, fair trade, and wildcrafted ingredients. These are significantly more expensive that the ingredients you get from most department stores, indie beauty brands, and "natural" beauty products. Most large companies use artificial scents, private label formulas, and an array of toxic synthetic chemicals hidden behind the word "fragrance". Sometimes better brands will tell you the country where their essential oil came from. With some of my ingredients, I can tell you the name of the woman who picked them, when she distilled them, and when was the last time it rained. The better quality and unique ingredients set the brand apart.
I'm paying more to offer you safer, artisanal, and more ethically produced products. Even my alcohol is organic! They smell better, care for your skin better, and in times like these, hopefully just make us feel better. I need your help to make them the best they can be. 
 
Lots of products are almost ready to head your way, and to finally make this dream a reality your advance purchases and funding will help me pay for:
-credit card expenses for bulk orders of packaging, but especially the premium ingredients from other small businesses, Fair-Trade women's cooperatives in Ghana, organic alcohol supplier in Oregon, and organic and wildcrafted essential oil crafters in the United States and internationally. 
-trademarks already in progress and other required legal fees
-partnerships with visual artists, illustrators, and sculptors
-a custom and interactive website
-getting the word out!
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute financially, you can still me on my mission.

Link, share, comment, on Instagram @OracleJayneStation. Ask friends to get the word out and let them know where to look.
Post the IndieGoGo link to Facebook or post to my personal page.
Visit OracleJayneStation.com to sign up for my mailing list

 
-------------------------------More about Oracle Jayne Station:
Many of the ultra premium ingredients cost more for me to obtain. I encourage you to review the labels on all the products. It’s my belief that luxury brands have a responsibility to deliver the best ingredients possible...and for much of recent history, they haven’t. Most of us have only had the chance to smell artificial or poor quality versions of fragrances that big companies usually sell. This bothers me immensely because then we don’t know what we’re missing. It’s like spending a lifetime thinking I didn’t like coffee...until I finally had a good cup of coffee.  Every Oracle Jayne product is made from scratch with superior essential oils and tinctures from organic or wild sourced plants, extracted using CO2, cold process, steam distillation, and organic cane alcohol. No synthetic chemicals, no excessively processed, expeller pressed, harsh solvent extracted ingredients. No imitation scents or pre-made formulas. No “private label” products.  No “melt-and-pour” soaps. Whenever they can be found, Fair-Trade certified ingredients are used. No animal ingredients are used and no products are tested on animals. Packaging is simple and  recyclable or biodegradable.  The quality of an essential oil depends on where the plant is from, what chemicals it was grown with, when it’s picked, and how it’s extracted. Some are amazing. Some are disturbing. Hundreds of versions of an ingredient will exist, sometimes expensive, sometimes costing ten times less...but for good reason.  Oracle Jayne is pushing the limits of what a perfume brand is able, and willing, to offer its customers. Fragrance is an art. Oracle Jayne Station is authentic luxury and an experience worth sharing.

story:
Bluetooth headsets have used the same uncomfortable designs since the first prototypes emerged in the late 1990s.

But stuffing an earphone deep into your ear canal isn’t just uncomfortable. It closes you off from the world around you, creates a breeding ground for bacteria, and usually falls out, right when you need it.

 

 

 

NEOPON clips to the outside of your ear and doesn’t come in direct contact with your ear canal. It is comfortable, hygienic, and doesn’t block outside conversation. You can wear it throughout the day and get far more out of your smartphone.

Listening to music, receiving and making calls, listening to news and social media updates, remote controlling your smart home appliances: All are easier when you have immediate voice and audio access to your phone.

 

 

 

 

Our patented, ergonomic design securely wraps NEOPON around your ear, even without having to bury it deep in your ear canal like other headsets. It stays firmly in place, even when you run or jump.

 

 

The flexible wire allows the speaker to wrap comfortably around your ear, and makes it fully adjustable.

Apart from being hygienic, this also prevents intense sound waves from hitting your eardrum directly and potentially causing hearing impairment.

 

 

Other Headsets:

 

Sound isolating earphones close off your ears, raising humidity and creating a perfect petri dish for bacteria. In this short term this leads to itching. In the long term it can cause serious health problems.

 

 

 

 

 

NEOPON is not only the most comfortable, but also the smartest hands-free headset ever.

We’ve developed a set of smart applications that turns NEOPON into your personal A.I Assistant. To ramp up the volume, simply add an extra ear tip and channel the sound.

 

 

 

NEOPON connects to your smartphone or computer using Bluetooth LE. It works perfectly with AI assistants like Siri, OK Google and Cortana.

We've also developed an Android app that truly takes advantage of the fact that you can wear NEOPON all day long. Our app uses text to speech to keep you updated on who's calling, your text messages, social media updates and your schedule.

 

 

 

The battery lasts all day long, and recharges in just one hour.

NEOPON comes with up to 130 hours standby life, 6 hours talking time, and 5 hours of wireless music streaming on a single charge.

 

 

 

 

Support us now and be the first to receive NEOPON for 40% off the retail price.

 

 

For all backers, we will provide four different types of eartips.

 

 

WE NEED NEOPON!

WE NEED NEOPON!

WE NEED NEOPON!

WE NEED NEOPON!

WE NEED NEOPON!

WE NEED NEOPON!

 

NEOPON is Best Hands-Free for Everybody!

 

 

As a lover of music and a lifelong learner, I’ve suffered through uncomfortable earphones to listen to my favorite bands, and to lectures and audio books, since I was in middle school.

Unfortunately these bad earphones damaged my ears and caused hearing loss. So I set out to create a safe, always comfortable headset that I could wear all day.

By training I’m a mechanical designer and technician. I’ve spent 10 years of my career focused on factory automation.

My co-founder spent years at Samsung’s smartphone division in the Middle East, and is focused full time on sales and establishing our channel partnerships.

We have received $200,000 in government funding to help us out through the initial R&D stage. In 2016, we were named one of the Most Promising Electronic Gadgets at the China Daily Innovation Awards.

 

 

Now, we’re ready to mass produce the product.

We already have an agreement in place with a manufacturer in Shenzhen, but a successful Indiegogo campaign will help us prove our market demand and thus secure more investments and mass pre-orders.

A highly successful indiegogo campaign will also help us secure the fundings and time we need to continue the development of our next lineup in the coming years.

 

 

 

We plan to complete the campaign by the end of February, and immediately begin the manufacturing process.

We aim to deliver the first batch of NEOPON to all our Indiegogo supporters by March.

 

NEOPON

Most Promising Electronics Gadget

< China Daily Innovation Awards >

Sophie YAN, CHINA DAILY Reporter

NEOPON products

 

MAKE YOUR ORDER NOW!

story:
As a designer dedicated to craftsmanship and the mastery of fine art techniques, I believe socially conscious design is the key to the future. 

In practice, my aim is to create aesthetically captivating objects that address growing concerns about the social and environmental costs of luxury goods and consumerist culture.

I have been working for the past 9 months to build a brand that reflects my mission to make quality goods that will last for generations.  The launching of this brand will coincide with a major show at the Smithsonian  - a curated exhibition showcasing the works of 55 American masters and 25 cutting-edge artists from America's top design schools.

Getting this off the ground means creating product that will be beautiful and high quality. Your help will cover things like purchasing leather, running a LASER-cutting machine, hand-staining, finishing and stitching. 

We are bringing a line of high quality leather goods and handbags to the market.  These will be available via our website online and through personal custom order appointments from our Brooklyn, NY studio.

  • We use only beautiful Vegetable-Tanned Leather from a reliable distributor right here in New York.
  • We source high quality, durable hardware like zippers, O-rings, collar pins and other findings. 
  • We also use beautiful Italian fabrics for linings and other accents.
  • Japanese trims for our really exciting monkey fists and some structural elements.

The Impact: 

The TJH line aims to set a standard within the American community of leather artisans by keeping production in-house and maintaining a meticulous eye on both the technical and conceptual elements of the brand. My background in luxury goods and custom work have shown me  the most viable path is uniting the production values of the high-end market with the sustainable design practices that will play an integral part of tomorrow's economy.

 In sponsoring us at launch level, you take a stand for a more mindful market, where luxury and accessibility are not mutually exclusive. In our increasingly disposable consumerist society, the importance of these values has never been more vital.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Feel free to get the word out and make some noise about the TJH Launch Campaign.
    • Please use the Indiegogo share tools, or contact me directly!

story:
NAZ&COURT LEGACY COLLECTION

We are offering our first collection - Legacy - to you at a discount in order to raise capitol for our first run of production. Legacy is our eco-ethical approach to modern classic wardrobe staples.  Imagine your favorite t-shirt, pair of jeans, jackets, suits and more. They fit you perfectly and are softer than anything you have felt. Our fabrics have the lowest carbon footprint possible, made in Los Angeles under fair wage, and fair trade. And we aim to replace all of your apparel needs with sustainable and ethical Naz&Court.

MEET NAZ&COURT

Naz Harounian and Courtney Barriger met on the set of a  fashion reality show in 2014. They quickly connected over  their mutual love for advocacy and the arts, which lead  them to team up and eventually win the show.

Naz  immigrated to the U.S. as child and quickly fell in love with American culture, before she knew it, she was a California girl.  She wanted to make a beneficial difference in society and spent the majority of her time pursuing education at UCLA and soul searching. She found film and fashion gave her the voice to make that difference.

Meanwhile Courtney grew up in Jacksonville FL, studying International Relations, discovering fashion design when illustrating her published novels.  She made her imagination three dimensional with apparel. She became familiar with fast-fashion ground-zero traveling South East Asia.  This changed her into an advocate for Fashion Revolution.

Rocky  in Naz&Court Veggie Tanned Rebel Leather Jacket

Saa in Naz&Court Eucalyptus Womens T-Shirt

Exclusive Leather Bracelet            Eucalyptus Embroidered Scarf 

Unisex Eucalyptus Chambray Button-Up

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

HOW DOES YOUR ACTIVISM HELP

The world's leading experts on climate change fear that the current political state of America could derail plans aimed at ensuring the future safety of the global environment. We must unite in light of the serious issue of climate change being called a hoax. Moreover, one in six people work in the textile industry, many in unsafe conditions where they are underpaid and overworked. We need to unite to stop the unethical treatment of workers. Become a NAZ&COURT REBEL WITH A CAUSE. You will be an activist aimed at reversing climate change by reducing greenhouse gas emissions.  Your donation will contribute to education on the negative effects of fast-fashion, so we can change the future.

Naz&Court Custom Couture Garment or Outfit

BECOME A REBEL WITH A CAUSE

We've been diligently working on designing our first sustainable and ethical line so it can ready for production before the next United Nations Fashion Fights Poverty event in March 2017. We've also launched our grass roots educational program, but hope to expand it nationally. The more people join, the greater the impact.  Breaking into the market in order to revolutionize it comes at a high price, and that's why we need your help.

Naz&Court Sustainable Starter Kits

WHERE DOES YOUR CONTRIBUTION GO

• Sustainable Materials

• Ethical Manufacturing

• Expansion of the educational program, "What's on Your Back"

• Perks Fulfillment

• Indie gogo fees

Gifting your perk for the Holidays is easy, every Perk comes with a Holiday card that shows your order which will be shipped at a later date due to production schedule. It's like a second Christmas!

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We are two individuals that have built our company form the ground up. The garment industry is highly competitive and starting a company of this magnitude is no easy task. We face the hurdles of having to solve unique and new challenges on a daily bases. Many of  these  are  challenges that other, more established, non sustainable,  and likely unethical companies do not face. Fast fashion is a real threat, to the environment  and garment workers, but it is also a threat to our company , We hope that people realize the value of purchasing  sustainable and ethical and the value of innovative, curated design. We also face the challenge of  sourcing sustainable materials, which limits our design scope, nevertheless we aim to create garments that compete with  luxury brands.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We do not see Naz&Court just as a brand, but mainly as a project of awareness towards sustainability in which we warmly welcome each customer to be part of!

There are many ways you can participate:

PRE-ORDER our garments through this Indiegogo campaign (bracelet, scarf, button-up)

INVEST in our campaign even if these first products are not your style but you share the same vision about sustainable fashion – you can order an illustrated novel and enjoy a read, or as a gift for your friends.

SHARE this campaign with your family and friends on Facebook or Instagram

SIGN UP for our e-mail list at Naz&Court.com

FOLLOW us on Facebook or Instagram

By spreading the word about sustainable fashion, we’ll send a strong message together to the fashion world: we’ll be able to show how many people demands new standards of fashion, and to know where and how the clothes are made.

Signed copy of NightBook by Courtney Barriger

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

OUR QUALIFIERS

• Named the future of fashion by the United Nations Fashion Fights Poverty

• Passionate and educated about sustainable & ethical apparel

• Endorsed by L.A. City Hall Officials

• Fashion Design Show winners

OUR TIMELINE

We aim to go into production as soon as the campaign ends in December, to have our samples prepared in time for our next runway show with United Nations Fashion Fights Poverty in Los Angeles in March 2017.

FINAL NOTE

We want to make sure you’ll enjoy our products. One of the most important things is that you’ll get your correct size. That is why we kindly ask you to take your own measurements and compare them carefully to our size picture.

We love being punctual and the production schedule estimate is based on the discussions with our suppliers. If we do highly exceed our goal, there might be some short delay on shipping - but in that case we will inform you immediately about timing. In that case, we will ship your items based on the order we have received your purchase.

SIGN UP for our e-mail list at Naz&Court.com

story:
Short Summary

  • Hi guys! My name is Coy Stites, I am a full time hair stylist, with 3 years behind the chair. Recently switching over to booth renting and being my own boss really unleashed my boss attitude and the light bulb went off and i knew what i needed to do. Starting a company has always been my dream, especially if its gonna help so many in the industry i owe my life to.
  • This campaign is helping to fund my dream to help my fellow stylists in saving money by not ruining everything we own in bleach.
  • This campaign goal is to makeup the difference in creating this line. I saved up for years and can fund most of it myself, however this last chunk will jumpstart and speed up the process in getting these clothes ready to buy for you guys.

What We Need & What You Get

  • This money will go directly into the business, funding fabric sourcing, the design process, the prototype stages, and if i can raise enough, even more stock so its available to more people who want them.
  • Now the perks are for you guys as a thank you and my appreciation of any dollar i get. I want to get very personal with the people supporting me and my brand, which is why instead of physical items that will be thrown away or kept in a drawer to be forgotten, i chose to make the perks personal with me, including you guys in the process and what goes on behind the scenes. if you have any ideas for future perks please let me know!
  • Whether i don't reach the goal or surpass it, every dime will go into making sure this is the highest quality i can possibly make it while keeping it reasonable priced. Even if we sell out of the first launch, i plan on putting that into more designs, more stock, more sizes, more color choices, just growing every aspect of this brand.

The Impact

  • I noticed a gap in the market that wasn't being tapped into, at least in the USA, of cute bleach proof clothing. I have only seen anything bleach proof once and it was a plain black t-shirt. So i decided to change that myself and offer varieties of clothing, for men and women eventually, so we can look cute for our clients as well as protect where our money is going and not throwing it away when we get a stain or looking less professional because our clients see a giant orange stain.

Risks & Challenges

  • I have never done anything like this so we will all be learning together. I have already learned so much in these last few months researching that i never knew. I know this is gonna be a challenge, but if you know me, I do what i have my mind set on, one way or another. I wont back down from a challenge.
  • Fortunately, i am working with a wonderful company who sees my vision and has been helping to guide me and let me have executive control. They have decades experience in the clothing industry, hundreds of fabric connections, and a manufacturing plant in the U.S.A. I speak with the president themselves and i trust she sees what i see for my company and has been very receptive to anything i had to say. I truly am blessed to have been connected with them.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you cant donate, please just share this everywhere! A share to me is worth just as much, get the word out there. Thank you so much already!

What We Need & What You Get

This money will go directly into the business, funding fabric sourcing, the design process, the prototype stages, and if i can raise enough, even more stock so its available to more people who want them.
Now the perks are for you guys as a thank you and my appreciation of any dollar i get. I want to get very personal with the people supporting me and my brand, which is why instead of physical items that will be thrown away or kept in a drawer to be forgotten, i chose to make the perks personal with me, including you guys in the process and what goes on behind the scenes. if you have any ideas for future perks please let me know!
Whether i don't reach the goal or surpass it, every dime will go into making sure this is the highest quality i can possibly make it while keeping it reasonable priced. Even if we sell out of the first launch, i plan on putting that into more designs, more stock, more sizes, more color choices, just growing every aspect of this brand.


The Impact
I noticed a gap in the market that wasn't being tapped into, at least in the USA, of cute bleach proof clothing. I have only seen anything bleach proof once and it was a plain black t-shirt. So i decided to change that myself and offer varieties of clothing, for men and women eventually, so we can look cute for our clients as well as protect where our money is going and not throwing it away when we get a stain or looking less professional because our clients see a giant orange stain.

Risks & Challenges

I have never done anything like this so we will all be learning together. I have already learned so much in these last few months researching that i never knew. I know this is gonna be a challenge, but if you know me, I do what i have my mind set on, one way or another. I wont back down from a challenge.
Fortunately, i am working with a wonderful company who sees my vision and has been helping to guide me and let me have executive control. They have decades experience in the clothing industry, hundreds of fabric connections, and a manufacturing plant in the U.S.A. I speak with the president themselves and i trust she sees what i see for my company and has been very receptive to anything i had to say. I truly am blessed to have been connected with them.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, please just share this everywhere! A share to me is worth just as much, get the word out there. Thank you so much already!

story:
*2019-07-23 UPDATE: NEW COLOURS OUT available for pre-order now here or on our website!

*If you have made a contribution, please fill in this order form for us to prepare the correct item for you

 

ABOUT NIGHTHAWK

Each sleeve features a purpose-built pocket to fit any contactless card. Use one for effortless tapping in and out of transport; the other for smooth contactless payments, all without ever having to reach into your jacket.  

 

Our performance-centered Spacewalk fabric is waterproof and windproof, without compromising breathability and comfort.  

 

 

Tangled earphone clumps are a thing of the past, with built-in earphone cable hangers and access points for seamless connection to your phone, stored in a custom-designed pocket allowing easy access for taking calls and switching between songs.    

 

Zippered pockets both on the outside and the inner lining provide added security for your passport, wallet and phone. The outer zippers are reinforced with water-repellent coating to keep your items safe no matter the weather.  

 

 

 

We’ve also included two dedicated pockets for storing your Bluetooth earphone case, keys or coins,  thoughtfully placed for secured storage and easy access.

 

 

For jotting down your thoughts or designing on the go, we’ve included a custom-fitted pocket for storing your Apple pencil, or simply your favourite pen.  

 

 

Nighthawk: the urban bomber jacket created for the modern man.  

 

Size Chart & How to Measure 

Measurement Method 1: measure your own body

Sleeve: Measure from the shoulder line to the bottom of the sleeve 

Chest: Measure under the arms at the fullest part around the chest/bust horizontally.

Waist: Measure around your waist at the narrowest part

Hips (Sweep): With the feet together measure around fullest part.

Measurement Method 2:

1. Find a jacket you have that you feel fits you the best

2. Measure the below 4 places:

Sleeves

Length

Chest 

Waist

Hip (Sweep) - this is the elastic band at the bottom of the jacket

3. Find the closest matching size from the sizing chart 

 

Measurement Method 3: 

1. Send us an email to hello@zeluslondon.com, and tell us your:

Height (cm)

Weight (kg)

Usual T-shirt size and jacket/blazer size

What best to describe your build: skinny, slim, average, atheletic, muscly, larger sized

Your general preferred fit: tight fit, slim-fit, regular fit, lose fit

2. We will then recommend the best fit for you

 

PLEASE NOTE:

1. The above measurements represent the actual measurements of the jacket in each location

2. Jackets are meant to be worn over other layers, so don’t size exactly. You'll need to leave space for wearing additional layers under the jacket, such as a t-shirt and sweater.

3. We will provide further sizing guidelines and examples of different sized people wearing Nighthawk jackets later on which will be sent out towards the end of the campaign.

4. Please don't hesitate to ask if you have a question, we are here to help!

Our Customers Wearing Nighthawk

 

 

LATEST BACKERS REVIEWS

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

SHIPPING - As soon as the campaign is over, you’ll be mailed a link for a survey. The Survey will ask for size choice. Please ensure this is filled out promptly once camping ends to avoid delays with your order.

RETURNS - Most crowdfunding campaigns do not have return policies. We do. If you find a manufacturer’s defect, or have received the wrong size, you have 30 days to exchange. 

To follow our return procedure, please post the item to the address included in our Customer Return Form (comes with the parcel), and email us:

Your postal receipt to hello@zeluslondon.com 

Your name/address and order number (which was given when the purchase was made).

Once we have received the returned item and verified its condition, we will refund the initial purchase amount and the postal cost paid by the customer.

 

 

ABOUT ZELUS LONDON

ZELUS LONDON™ is an apparel designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in London, United Kingdom. Taking inspiration from artists and thought leaders like Jiri Thyn, Ido Portal and Alan Watts, the brand stands for simplicity. All our garments are designed to create the perfect balance between function and form. Our popular t-shirts are created with Nanoflex, a bespoke performance fabric made to fit like your own skin, while being soft, stretchy and breathable. 

Now, we are proud to present our latest brainchild, the Nighthawk jacket. We have teamed up with expert suppliers from around the world to craft a new, functional bomber jacket for urban living. The features of this jacket have been carefully curated to streamline your everyday city experience without adding bulk. 

We believe that simplicity has the power to enhance your performance: there’s a reason that Einstein rotated five identical suits and Steve Jobs never deviated from his iconic black turtleneck and jeans. It has been proven again and again that the burden of decision-making wears you down. By minimising lower-order decision-making, energy is conserved for the things that really matter. 

The Nighthawk jacket was created to streamline your focus by lifting the burden of tiny everyday stressors: deciding what to wear, the feeling of dread when you can’t find your credit card, tangled earphone clumps. At ZELUS LONDON, we believe that simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication. That’s why we think that Apple’s chief designer, Jonathan Ives, had it right when he said that ‘design is at its best and its most empowering when it simply disappears.’

We hope that Nighthawk appeals to you, the city dwellers that it was created for. Your support will allow us to continue to create streamlined, innovative and beautiful clothing, including a women’s line and winter jacket. 

 

OUR TEAM

 

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA
