story:
The world’s most comfortable, stylish, and technologically advanced pair of motorcycle shoes. ROAME Zeros' have seamlessly integrated turn signal and brake light technology which wirelessly connect to your motorcycle. 

Motorcycle shoes should be safe, but they shouldn’t have to be uncomfortable, bulky, inconvenient, and unfashionable.

We’ve spent the last three years designing the ultimate motorcycle shoe, so you can ride safely without giving up comfort and style. The ROAME Zeros are designed to be a motorcycle shoe that fits into your everyday life.

By using the newest technology for impact protection, integrating electronics for enhanced rider visibility, and re-thinking the way shoes are made, the ROAME Zeros are everything a motorcycle shoe should be. 

  

The ROAME Zeros are a fusion of safety and fashion. An emphasis on a casual look, increased comfort, and hidden technology set the Zeros apart from all motorcycle shoes that have come before it.

The fact that most of the safety features are hidden was one of the reasons why we called this shoe the “Zeros”. When it comes to developing our product, we made Zero compromises. Finally, total freedom! You don’t have to choose between safety and comfort anymore.

We feel you should be able to be free of constraints when it comes to motorcycle footwear. The Zeros are a high top shoe that blurs the lines between performance and casual wear. These lightweight shoes are designed for all-day riding, comfort, and performance without cutting corners. 

The longer you ride, the more you realize the importance of motorcycle gear. Certainly our helmets, jackets, boots and gloves have become far more than just safety gear, but a part of our motorcycle lifestyle. Where does it say that motorcycle gear has to be inconvenient and unstylish? The ROAME Zeros are here to redefine what motorcycle safety should look like.

With the ROAME Zeros we wanted to create a shoe that would offer motorcycle safety while complementing your lifestyle. Remember, it’s not if you’ll crash but when. If you ride long enough, you will go down. You need make sure you’re wearing the right gear to protect yourself when this happens.

First, add our small transmitter box to your motorcycle's existing turn signal/brake light system, then pair the shoes with this box. Once the shoes have been paired with this transmitter box, all you have to do is get on your bike and start riding. ROAME takes care of the rest.

It’s hard hard to see motorcycles because they have less mass than 4 wheel vehicles and therefore have a smaller road presence. Drivers notice an absence of cars, not the presence of a motorcycle. Motorcycles are roughly 1/6th the size of a 4-door sedan. That translates to a significant reduction in visibility.

Whether you are riding to work, school, bike night, or just a casual ride to meet friends for lunch, the ROAME Zeros will be there to help you stay safe, looking good, and keeping you comfortable.

Have you ever a stored a pair of comfortable shoes to change into at school or work? ROAME Zeros is your solution.

We are almost lined up for first-run production, but we need help to get this off the ground. With the money we raise on Indiegogo, we will finalize the electronics, get FCC approval, and place our first order.

From there, the sky’s the limit. If this campaign is a success, we hope to quickly expand our product offering and add more new designs to our collection, as we continue to make motorcycle safety comfortable and stylish. 

Growing up with motorcycles, Adam spent every possible moment on 2 wheels. When he started riding on the street in 2007, he quickly noticed a big problem. Motorcycle shoes were bulky, uncomfortable, and there was a great need on the road to be seen by other vehicles. This was the motivation over the last three years to bring the ROAME Zeros from concept to reality.

story:
It’s time to shake things up! Open your eyes. The future of sunglasses is at your fingertips with WOLT. Welcome to our wavelength - we don’t throw shade - only good vibes here.  We welcome you to a more flexible world… A decade of experience and  knowledge has led us to perfect the sunglasses of the now - the future -  out with the old, in with the new. 

We’re here to guarantee that you keep up in this world that is forever  changing, shifting and expanding; quality, convenience, flexibility and  versatility - here’s to a new age of eyewear. I wear WOLT. 

 

 

 

With 10 years experience in the glasses industry we have developed the experience and knowledge to create the glasses we have always wanted, that matches today's high expectations for a product that lasts.  Unlike  every other glasses companies out there, we offer a pair of versatile glasses that help make your every day life effortless.
 

Our ultra modern, trendsetting sunglasses fold down to only 2 cm. And with our breakthrough lens-changing mechanism you'll be able to change lenses effortlessly on the go. 

 

 

We give you our take on three of most popular and classic styles of sunglasses, the wayfarers, the aviators and the circular lens designs. 

 

 

 

Looper is our round model in the Eclipse series. We took the classic round design and reshaped it to fit the Wolt family.  We wanted the design to be minimalistic, elegant but still fun and have  the characteristics of the classic models.  We are very happy about the  outcome and hope you appreciate it as much as we do. 

 

 

 

The wayfarer model has been around since the early 50's and is a must in any sunglasses collection. We give you Rover, Wolt's take on the classic.  

 

 

 

The aviators. Another must have in a sunglasses collection. The model has been around since the 30's and Scout is our take on the undying classic. 

 

 

Our glasses are in perfect balance with fashion trends and progressive technology. We are on the forefront of whats possible in the glasses industry. Working, playing and socialising are all elements we have brought together into what we believe is the perfect pair of glasses. 

You’d upgrade your phone when technology develops, so why wouldn’t you upgrade your eyewear? 

We have made our product foldable two ways to fit any size pockets.  Shirt pocket, trouser, purse or wallet… With our collapsable design, our glasses fold to only 5cm x 2cm.     

Extensive research and development has aided us to have the only sunglasses in the world available today which fold like this. 

 

The future is OURS. As we propel faster and deeper into a tech-driven age, we’re passionate about bringing sunglasses with us on this journey. The lens that makes sense… Our slick and tool-less design gives you the freedom to change lens’ on the go - getting more bang for your buck. 

Interchangeable lenses have always been an issue with notoriously weak screws or awkward lens mechanisms. So we created a whole new lens-click system that erase these problems. Simply click on lenses of choice and keep on enjoying your day! 

 

With our 4-in-1 pair: polarised, UV blocking, ad-blocking and anti-blue light  for all gamers, web developers, bloggers and Instagrammers out there…  Works for day-to-day and for blue-light play - socialising from sunset  to sunrise, protecting your eyes from all the light. The future is WOLT. 

 

 

 

1.65 million glasses are lost a year around the world and are in the top   5 items lost every year. Which brings us to our last but not least   feature. With our in-case built in bluetooth (GPS) tracker you’ll never loose your glasses/case again. With the downloadable app, your glasses  will always be within reach.  

 

All of our Eclipse series sunglasses come with an elegant GPS bluetooth  tracker. It fits safely inside a pocket of the sunglasses case and runs  off a battery that lasts an incredible 2 years before it needs changing.  

 

Every pair of Eclipse sunglasses comes with a leather case with room for 1 pair of sunglasses, one pair of extra lenses and our bluetooth tracker.

 

Our travel case have room for 3 pairs of sunglasses, 2 pairs of extra lenses and our bluetooth tracker.

 

Furthermore to our Eclipse Series, we have made a line of sunglasses at a  more affordable price with the same quality control at the forefront  manufacturing process. Our Division Series is based on  the classic wayfarer style with a splash of colour. With a face made of  high quality plastic and temples of aluminium they make a great  alternative to the Eclipse series if you wanted to represent Wolt at a lower price.  

 

 

Having a clear mind and space allows you to think and act with purpose. For a clear frame and lens think Soho.

 

When crystal oceans and blue skies aren’t just a dream away. But a goal, a drive, a way of life.

 

The pink lenses that you cannot help but smile at. Worn to stand out and spread happiness.

 

When privacy is key. For the motivators and shape shifters.

 

 

The warm sunset tones of the mediterranean inspired our frame and lens tones, for the all day and all nighters.

 

Clean and slick architecture of Oslo inspired this pair of sunglasses, a place where design and fashion meets in perfect harmony.

 

Where the outdoor, on the go, lifestyle meets wooden rustic tones. Sunglasses which fit into the life way live.

 

The Festival season inspired sunglasses. A pair which gets passed around the friendship group for those stand out IG photos.

 

Back to black, the classic blackout frame and lens for the inner ‘rockstar or baller’. Trialed and tested to turn heads wherever you go.

story:
We'd like to introduce VanJohan!

VanJohan is the only underwear brand with a unique support system that gives you a bolder look while preventing sticking, itching, and odor. VanJohan outperforms in situations where you are sitting all day long, working out at the gym, or just standing in your underwear. 

The luxury underwear brand is designed to be extremely comfortable and fit ALL body types. VanJohan stays classy and uncomplicated without compromising on quality, to bring you the comfort and confidence you deserve.  

 

Feel confident walking around in just your underwear.

  

 

 

 

 

Your comfort and confidence is important to us. At VanJohan, we are committed to delivering a fit for regular men. Our design is made with the understanding that regular men come in all different shapes and sizes, and their comfort and fit shouldn’t be compromised.

  

Women are no strangers to the power of imagination when it comes to underwear. Let us help you feel Bold and Sexy when strutting around in just your briefs.

We can’t guarantee overall package performance, but we can guarantee overall package appearance and comfort!

  

You’re on a date, she picks a long walk on the beach of course. It’s hot out, and you know at some point your male parts are going to shift and get stuck to your leg, or even worse get shifted up and squashed by your waistband. You’re now left worrying about how you’re going to “wiggle” out of this situation without her noticing. 

This is anything but comfortable and is exactly what VanJohan is designed to prevent. We created a comfortable ‘hammock-area’ for your crown jewels to rest without worry. We call this the Package booster™, which enhances lift on your overall package appearance.

One size fits none. Offering a wide range of sizes from Small to Extra Large. VanJohan is crafted to fit your body the way underwear is supposed to. The package booster also allows showers, growers and modest men alike, to enjoy a snug and secure fit. 

  

Much like relationships, trust is important. Same goes with underwear! It is the most intimate piece of clothing you wear. VanJohan is a brand you can trust to keep your valuables safe, secure, and fresh all day long. 

We’ve all had those days that have lasted longer than we’re comfortable with. The anti-bacterial qualities in our fabrics prevent bad odors and allow you to relax knowing your package is taken care of.

   

Talking about getting things wet. There’s nothing sexy about sweat stains. With the use of our moisture-wicking material, you can stay fresh, dry and clean all day long.

   

  

Designed to be comfortable, aesthetically pleasing, and innovative in every little detail. We are proud to move the standards in men’s underwear forward, and increase the level of comfort and functional design. These boxer briefs go down the leg to mid-thigh and are designed to stay in place with a bind. Smart materials and luxury design = VanJohan. 

  

When we say we don’t complicate things, we truly mean it. We noticed that underwear tags cause chaffing, so we decided to remove the tag from our underwear and haven’t looked back since. By doing this, we reduce chaffing, material, and manufacturing steps all at once. 

  

Without a tag, you might assume it will be difficult to identify our brand. Fear not, we’ve thought this out. Our soft feel waistband comfortably hugs your body while proudly displaying the VanJohan Logo. Display your confidence and our brand with honor.

 

There used to be a time that clothing lasted a good amount of years. Nowadays most gear is of low quality and made by cheap labor under bad conditions. Put your mind at ease as we guarantee a fair product in all aspects.

Our goal at VanJohan is to create a sustainable product line. Creating a high quality garment that is guaranteed to last longer than your average pair. In our manufacturing process, we’ve adopted Flatlock Stitching, a technique used to enhance comfort by eliminating chaffing caused by traditional solutions. 

    

When it came to designing our underwear, we discovered the smartest way of improving the quality, comfort and durability would be to choose the right materials. Our underwear is made up of highly beneficial and sustainable products, and by doing this we not only create the underwear you’ve been waiting for, but the environmental impact is far lower compared to conventional underwear production.

     

 

    

 * All undies are premium  

** We’ll send a survey  so that you can choose size, color and fill in your address at the time

story:
I've created this fundraiser to help launch a new lifestyle brand of clothing and gear just for the female player.  Let's create a cool brand, designed, produced, and purchased by women for women. Help me create high quality, fair trade, earth-friendly wear that gives back to the sport we love. Each product will be made by a women's artisan co-op, paying them Fair-Trade wages, in countries where their women's national team needs support. 

I'd love it if you would partner with me on this adventure.

First product - a beanie made in Haiti. More photos to come. 


  • We like to play hard and we're tough; we like to look good in clothes made for our bodies. With your support, you'll be helping empower females around the world, of all ages, as we all see and recognize a brand that represents us. 30 million females play soccer - help me create quality gear, clothing, and accessories for all of us.  Keep reading and I'll tell you why it's not going to be simply stylish but also do a lot of good for females and for the women's game. 
  • This Soccer Girl campaign is to help get the brand started - to give it a good kick off! We're starting slowly, one product at a time, wanting to do things well and do good along the way. We're having our products made in countries where their national team needs our support. I remember hearing about the Haiti Women's team trying to qualify for World Cup only to not have enough money for the taxi. Then, when they got some funds they gave them to Trinidad/Tobago who needed money for food. There are a lot of these stories for women's soccer. These stories clicked inside my brain, and I thought I'd come up with a way to give back - so a percentage of profits will be donated to the Women's Soccer Program in the country where our product is being made. First up is Haiti (yes, they're still struggling after that horrible earthquake five years ago), sadly so many women's soccer programs struggle. I want to do this right by lifting up women all along the way, from sourcing material, to producing it, to purchase.


What We Need & What You Get

We're asking for $15,000 to get this first product launched and set us up to build the business and get started on future products. 

Stretch Goals

TRAVEL TO HAITI! We've been invited to travel to Fond des Blancs and visit the Artisans' Cooperative, meet the women creating the beanies, and watch their soccer girls play. We'd love to visit and take them supplies for the soccer girls (their field is surrounding by prickly plants which pop their balls!) and capture some media content to share this project with the world, show the beauty that is Haiti, and support Haiti Projects' work by sharing it on our multiple media platforms. 

CONTINUE CREATING PRODUCTS. Next up will be Gear Bags designed with the female player in mind. 


Perks (with longer descriptions)

If you prefer to give but don't want a perk in return, just scroll to the bottom and click 'SELECT A PERK'. It will take you to a screen 'NO PERK I JUST WANT TO CONTRIBUTE'. Thanks for helping to make it happen!

2 Soccer Girl Stickers $5

Every bit helps when you're building your dream. This is an easy affordable way to support the project and be part of our team. Where will you show off your Soccer Girl stickers? 


International Shipping $10

Choose this perk to help cover the cost of International shipping outside the United States. Just click your regular perk AND this perk. It helps; it really helps. Only click it once no matter how many hats you're buying.

20 Soccer Girl Stickers for your whole team $40

We know that's a lot of money for stickers, and we know you're really just supporting us and the stickers are one of the ways we can thank you. We hope you'll give them to your players, your teammates, your co-workers, your kids...

1 Soccer Girl brand beanie. $40 

(please choose international shipping also if you're outside of the US)

Our model is Haiti Projects' employee Sophonie; knitting by Sonia.
We chose Haiti Projects in Fond Des Blancs, Haiti to make our first ever product. 
(From their website) "Haiti Projects is a 501(C)(3) corporation with focused initiatives to empower women of rural Haiti toward self-sufficiency. We provide access to jobs at fair trade wages, education, health care, and avenues for building sustainable community. Haiti Projects is located in the town of Fond des Blancs. We are currently the second largest employer in a region of Haiti where over 35,000 people live with no electricity or public services."
Their Artisan Cooperative will be making our beanies with yarn they had donated from Calvin Klein - definitely re-use sourcing. Based on a design chosen by YOU through social media, the women came up with a knit pattern to match. We have photos of the first prototype and are awaiting samples to sew on our woven label to brand it as a Soccer Girl product. We've worked into our costs the shipping from Haiti and paying Fair Trade wages 

3 Soccer Girl beanies & 20 Stickers $100

Here's an option to receive three of the lovely artisan crafted beanies, made in Haiti and support their National Team in reaching their goal of qualifying for the 2019 Women's World Cup in France. We'll send 20 stickers as well, so this will have you really showing your Soccer Girl spirit and heart. Once a soccer girl; always a soccer girl.

Houston Dash Autographed ball $100

Coach Randy Waldrum responded with a quick yes when I asked if he could send a signed ball. Here it is for you to have with several autographs from the Dash players. Consider purchasing it as a gift for the Houston fan in your life. 

5 Soccer Girl beanies & 20 Stickers $175

You know everyone is going to want one of these beanies when you receive it in the mail, so why not get this perk of five beanies? 

Haiti Women's Nat'l Team Autographed jersey $200

Coach Shek Borkowski has been so kind as to send us a team jersey autographed by the Haiti Women's National Team. Please consider donating and we'll send you this unique special gift from the ladies in blue. 


3 tickets to the Women's World Cup in Winnipeg, Canada! USA's First match! You actually get two games! AND, deluxe corner room accomodations in the sold out Fairmont Winnipeg Hotel for two nights. $1000




USA v. AUSTRALIA  and  SWEDEN v. NIGERIA Winnipeg Stadium / Stade de Winnipeg, Winnipeg, MB

Mon, Jun. 8, 2015 03:00 PM. Section 225, Row 2, Seat 3. 

Section 225, Row 2, Seat 2.Section 225, Row 2, Seat 1

*ALSO: Two nights deluxe accommodations at The Fairmont Winnipeg June 6th and June 7th, in a deluxe corner room. 

http://www.fairmont.com/winnipeg/

The Impact
Here's our mission you'll be supporting: Our mission is to promote women’s soccer around the world and empower ladies of all ages to play and enjoy the game for a healthy and positive path in life.  We strive to empower females by making products that have the most impact possible for women in soccer countries where we can make a difference to the women’s game and the women who live there. We choose to use our bottom line for good and believe in creating value for society by merging buying power and financial success with standards of Fair Trade and environmental responsibility. 

Risks & Challenges

The challenges to this project come with my chosen slow method of doing business and working with sometimes rural and remote communities. This could mean we're slower to offer new products or there could be delays in shipping. 

  • I'm a great troubleshooter and will work at making the logistics work for everyone, and I'm all about communication, so just email if you have questions or concerns. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you can't contribute financially, but please contribute to the dream of Soccer Girl by helping us spread the word:

  • Please make some noise about the campaign! Get loud like you're watching your fave team play. Let everyone know you're cheering for us.
  • Please share with your social friends on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

More about the team!

Check out the awesome teammates helping me with this project! They are ready to help spread the word about this campaign through social media. I can't wait to send them the first beanie samples, thanks Lauren and Helenna!

Lauren Barnes - Seattle Reign FC - NWSL National Women's Soccer League. Defender. Lauren (born May 31, 1989) is an American professional soccer defender. She currently plays forNWSL club Seattle Reign FC and is a former member of the United States U-23 women's national soccer team. In 2013 she was voted Defender of the Year for the Reign, and in 2014 helped the team make it to the NWSL Championship. You can follow Lauren on Twitter @laurenkb31


Helenna Hercigonja-Moulton -  Defender. Helenna (born April 28, 1993) is a Croatian/Jamaican American playing professional soccer in Croatia. She is a member of both the Croatia National Team and Club team ŽNK Pomurje in Slovenia. She runs a terrific and informative video blog about her experience as an American making it as a female professional soccer player in Europe. 
Hella Offsides - Click this to view Helenna's videos. Subscribe while you're at it.  And here's her Facebook page Hella Offsides Facebook.

My son, Dawson. He plays for his high school team in Alaska. We have a lot of fun playing, watching, and talking soccer. He's going to help with marketing for this campaign. #ProudMom
Aren't they great. You can be on the team too by liking, commenting, and sharing posts about this campaign, and I'll be forever grateful if you support the dream of Soccer Girl.


Thanks to all of you! Much love. Smooch.

story:
At GadgetBox, we discovered that the number of entrepreneurs who launch their products is increasing at a very rapid pace. As a result of this, consumers are not able to fully experience and engage in new products and technology that is swarming the globe. In order to resolve this, we created GadgetBox. GadgetBox is a tech-based subscription box service that helps both sides of the equation (consumers and entrepreneurs) close the gap and be connected more directly.

We aim to bridge the gap between household consumers and entrepreneurs using our unique subscription box service. We allow entrepreneurs to gain maximum exposure for their product(s) through our service that sends subscription boxes to our subscribers on either a monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis. These subscription boxes will contain a certain amount of tech & design gadgets that will be received by the subscriber via postal mail. They will not be randomized entrepreneurial based products. These products will be hand picked by the GadgetBox team in order to match the preferences of the subscriber as closely as possible. We have a technique made specifically to allow us to garner greater insight regarding the preferences of the subscriber. 





The products in the boxes will be provided by entrepreneurs that we partner with, therefore allowing household consumers to be aware of the new and unique innovations that are swarming the globe. This subscription box service vastly mitigates the dilemma that entrepreneurs face when they want to properly expose their products to household consumers.

 Furthermore, household consumers like me and you will be able to discover new gadgets and tech products that are making life easier all over the globe!




  • Through our website, household consumers and entrepreneurs will be able to create a free account and consumers will be able to subscribe to our subscription box service. Just look for the Sign Up button located on the top right corner

GadgetBox Website

Our Regular Subscription Box:


Our Premium Subscription Box:



  • As a household consumer/subscriber, you will also be able to subscribe by clicking the subscribe button on the top bar, or any other subscribe button that you will see scattered around our site




  • Entrepreneurs will be able to create their own account and easily register their product(s) with us.

  • Be up to date with our latest updates and newest products by visiting our weekly blog


  • We will also have an online store that you will be able to shop from if you would like to. (You don't have to be subscribed in order to shop from our store)


  • You will be able to send our subscription boxes as a gift to your friends or family too. It is the same procedure as subscribing for yourself, except your gift will be given to the person of your choice as a surprise at their doorstep!



  • Through your profile you will be able to keep track of the products your receive and also be able to edit any of your information or subscription plan if necessary



  • Finally, you will receive points. Each month, as a subscriber,  when you receive your box, you will accumulate a specific amount of points. If you purchase from our online store then even more points will be accumulated. You will be able to redeem these points when shopping on our online store and getting up to 30% discounts!

  • Once you sign up on our website (https://gadgetbox.us) (refer to website section above) you will receive an email from the GadgetBox team confirming your subscription and/or online order. We will then contact you via email to fill out a quick questionnaire in order for us to get to know you better. This way we will be able to handpick some of the gadgets to match your preferences as closely as possible. Here is a sample of what the questionnaire may look like:


  • Depending on the subscription plan you choose (monthly--box every month) (quarterly--box every 3 months) (yearly--box every 12 months) you will receive the GadgetBox subscription box on your doorstep. We will pack the boxes with your tech and design gadgets and ship them to you accordingly. 
  • If you would like to change/upgrade your subscription plan you can do so through your account by clicking the "Edit" button. 
  • You can also purchase products/gadgets from our online store without being a subscriber--Simply add the products you like to your cart and check out. If you don't have an account you can make a free account and proceed to checkout. The history of products your ordered can be kept track of through your account/profile page.
  • All payments are accepted online and are highly secure through an SSL encryption code, through our secure payment gateway, and we also are PCI Compliance tested.
  • Each time your order from our store and/or receive a subscription box, you will have points added to your account. These points can later be redeemed for discounts when your purchase from our online store.

                                       


                                                               


The subscription box that is received on a monthly, quarterly or yearly basis (Depending on the subscription plan you choose) will include unique and innovative tech & design gadgets. It can be anything from newly designed & sound efficient wireless headphones to a 3D printing pen to a Smart Lightbulb and so on. The box full of gadgets that will arrive at your home will contain anywhere between 3-6+ gadgets/products (Once again, the amount of products received will depend on the subscription plan that you choose)


Here are some of the Tech & Design Gadgets that have been or will be featured in our Subscription Boxes:











                                                 

We have received many positive response and feedback from prospective clients and from a survey that we launched a few months back. Here are just a few of the responses:

1) "I think that it is an amazing service that really helps you put into perspective the true benefits of electronics and technology. Truly amazing."--Paula B, Subscriber


2) "It's a great opportunity for entrepreneurs and small business owners to really take their product to the next level in terms of exposure. Really something out of the ordinary."--Kevin P, Entrepreneur &  Business Owner


3) "If you like technology then this is definitely for you."--Kurt B, Subscriber 


4) "As an entrepreneur who's just getting started, I thought that it really helped me acquire a closer connection with my audience since they were able to experience my product on a first-hand basis"--Neil C, Serial Entrepreneur 


5) "This was the first time I was signing up for a subscription box in my life, and to be honest, I wasn't a hundred percent sure what I was getting myself into. But after the first box came all my doubts were erased. I mean I got a 3D printing pen in the first box--that's amazing!" --Noah A, Subscriber



We are Rishi Patel and Kirtan Barot. We are two everyday university students who are ambitious and passionate about the rapidly developing tech world. We met at university and discovered that we both had a passion for technology and business, and we wanted to share that passion with the world. After speaking with many new and experienced entrepreneurs and after attending many technology exhibitions, we found that the connection between consumers and entrepreneurs was not fully efficient. We went on to distribute a survey regarding this issue  and the results of the survey were the same---consumers were not fully exposed to new and innovative entrepreneurial products and entrepreneurs were not efficiently  engaging with consumers. We took a stance to mitigate and resolve this issue and thus a tech-based subscription box service, GadgetBox, was born. 


                                                 


                                               


*You can sign-up on our email list to receive the latest news & updates 

*Click the link to join our email list: http://gadgetbox.launchrock.com/



Go Team GADGETBOX!
story_txt:
At GadgetBox, we discovered that the number of entrepreneurs who launch their products is increasing at a very rapid pace. As a result of this, consumers are not able to fully experience and engage in new products and technology that is swarming the globe. In order to resolve this, we created GadgetBox. GadgetBox is a tech-based subscription box service that helps both sides of the equation (consumers and entrepreneurs) close the gap and be connected more directly.


We aim to bridge the gap between household consumers and entrepreneurs using our unique subscription box service. We allow entrepreneurs to gain maximum exposure for their product(s) through our service that sends subscription boxes to our subscribers on either a monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis. These subscription boxes will contain a certain amount of tech & design gadgets that will be received by the subscriber via postal mail. They will not be randomized entrepreneurial based products. These products will be hand picked by the GadgetBox team in order to match the preferences of the subscriber as closely as possible. We have a technique made specifically to allow us to garner greater insight regarding the preferences of the subscriber. 












The products in the boxes will be provided by entrepreneurs that we partner with, therefore allowing household consumers to be aware of the new and unique innovations that are swarming the globe. This subscription box service vastly mitigates the dilemma that entrepreneurs face when they want to properly expose their products to household consumers.

 Furthermore, household consumers like me and you will be able to discover new gadgets and tech products that are making life easier all over the globe!











Through our website, household consumers and entrepreneurs will be able to create a free account and consumers will be able to subscribe to our subscription box service. Just look for the Sign Up button located on the top right corner



GadgetBox Website




Our Regular Subscription Box:


Our Premium Subscription Box:





As a household consumer/subscriber, you will also be able to subscribe by clicking the subscribe button on the top bar, or any other subscribe button that you will see scattered around our site













Entrepreneurs will be able to create their own account and easily register their product(s) with us.





Be up to date with our latest updates and newest products by visiting our weekly blog









We will also have an online store that you will be able to shop from if you would like to. (You don't have to be subscribed in order to shop from our store)







You will be able to send our subscription boxes as a gift to your friends or family too. It is the same procedure as subscribing for yourself, except your gift will be given to the person of your choice as a surprise at their doorstep!







Through your profile you will be able to keep track of the products your receive and also be able to edit any of your information or subscription plan if necessary






Finally, you will receive points. Each month, as a subscriber,  when you receive your box, you will accumulate a specific amount of points. If you purchase from our online store then even more points will be accumulated. You will be able to redeem these points when shopping on our online store and getting up to 30% discounts!




Once you sign up on our website (https://gadgetbox.us) (refer to website section above) you will receive an email from the GadgetBox team confirming your subscription and/or online order. We will then contact you via email to fill out a quick questionnaire in order for us to get to know you better. This way we will be able to handpick some of the gadgets to match your preferences as closely as possible. Here is a sample of what the questionnaire may look like:




Depending on the subscription plan you choose (monthly--box every month) (quarterly--box every 3 months) (yearly--box every 12 months) you will receive the GadgetBox subscription box on your doorstep. We will pack the boxes with your tech and design gadgets and ship them to you accordingly. 
If you would like to change/upgrade your subscription plan you can do so through your account by clicking the "Edit" button. 
You can also purchase products/gadgets from our online store without being a subscriber--Simply add the products you like to your cart and check out. If you don't have an account you can make a free account and proceed to checkout. The history of products your ordered can be kept track of through your account/profile page.
All payments are accepted online and are highly secure through an SSL encryption code, through our secure payment gateway, and we also are PCI Compliance tested.
Each time your order from our store and/or receive a subscription box, you will have points added to your account. These points can later be redeemed for discounts when your purchase from our online store.



                                       


                                                               




The subscription box that is received on a monthly, quarterly or yearly basis (Depending on the subscription plan you choose) will include unique and innovative tech & design gadgets. It can be anything from newly designed & sound efficient wireless headphones to a 3D printing pen to a Smart Lightbulb and so on. The box full of gadgets that will arrive at your home will contain anywhere between 3-6+ gadgets/products (Once again, the amount of products received will depend on the subscription plan that you choose)



Here are some of the Tech & Design Gadgets that have been or will be featured in our Subscription Boxes:

























                                                 



We have received many positive response and feedback from prospective clients and from a survey that we launched a few months back. Here are just a few of the responses:

3) "If you like technology then this is definitely for you."--Kurt B, Subscriber 

4) "As an entrepreneur who's just getting started, I thought that it really helped me acquire a closer connection with my audience since they were able to experience my product on a first-hand basis"--Neil C, Serial Entrepreneur 

5) "This was the first time I was signing up for a subscription box in my life, and to be honest, I wasn't a hundred percent sure what I was getting myself into. But after the first box came all my doubts were erased. I mean I got a 3D printing pen in the first box--that's amazing!" --Noah A, Subscriber








We are Rishi Patel and Kirtan Barot. We are two everyday university students who are ambitious and passionate about the rapidly developing tech world. We went on to distribute a survey regarding this issue  and the results of the survey were the same---consumers were not fully exposed to new and innovative entrepreneurial products and entrepreneurs were not efficiently  engaging with consumers. We took a stance to mitigate and resolve this issue and thus a tech-based subscription box service, GadgetBox, was born.

story:
Short Summary

Help put the CA Smart Highway initiative on the 2016 ballot. The initiative would:

    I) Immediately halt spending on “highspeed” rail and preserve funds for innovative transportation projects.

    II) Move the majority of state highway funding to usage based fees for convenience and compatibility with new technologies.

    III) Ensure that CA will implement viable, cutting edge, transportation technology on public right of ways.

The deadline to submit legal language for a 2016 ballot initiative is August 25th, 2015. Your contributions will help us develop the marketing materials (ads, concept art, etc) to help win over the public, assemble a campaign staff, collect signatures, and pay legal fees.

About Me: I'm a California native, Stanford grad ('07) and entrepreneur (Civinomics.com, DigitalNEST.org) who is passionate about improving government in our generation. I've organized large scale, iPad based, public outreach campaigns for government agencies like the San Francisco Public Utilities Commission. I've seen firsthand how slowly the wheels of government turn and therefore how necessary it is that they are pointed in the right direction. 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/manukoenig

twitter: @manukoenig


What We Need & What You Get

In the short term, we need to create more concept art so people understand what a smart highway is and how it will impact their everyday lives. 

We need to do outreach to potential voters to understand what their misconceptions and hold-ups will be.

We need to organize industry roundtables to determine what elements of the policy can best facilitate new technology implementation.

You get OG campaign swag including stickers, t-shirts and posters as well as VIP tickets to any and all public events. 

Any level of funding will help make this possible. The $100,000 goal will give us a solid start. 


The Impact

This initiative will define public policy for the implementation of sustainable automotive technology the world over.


Risks & Challenges

Prop 1A: The Highspeed Rail Act, identified the need for sustainable transportation solutions and created a funding source, however it chose the wrong technology. 

The goal of the CA Smart Highway initiative is to provide incentives for new technology with enough flexibility to tackle future uncertainties. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Volunteer: casmarthighway@gmail.com

Follow our Tumblr: http://casmarthighway.tumblr.com

Like the Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/casmarthighway

story:
ENGLISH & FRANÇAIS


Description / Définition :

          DOORAK is a high-end clothing brand that draws its roots from an ideology combining both: potentialities, fairness, prospecting, self-overcoming and beyond all the quest for innovation. It is thus a concept that associate the "who can to whom wants" thereby combining the action to thought. When we say DOORAK, we imply: "Have the attitude ... keep the altitude"

          DOORAK est une marque de vêtements haut de gamme qui tire sa source d'une idéologie combinant à la fois : potentialités, équité, prospection, surpassement de soi et au-delà de tout, la quête de l’innovation. Il s’agit ainsi d’un concept qui associe” le qui peut au qui veut” mariant de ce fait l’action à la pensée. Qui dit DOORAK dit : "Ayez l’attitude... gardez l’altitude)..

  • The story of the project / L'histoire du projet :

          My name is Serbelloni LOYEM, promoter of the DOORAK brand. Born into a modest family, I quickly aspired after my Marketing studies, to be an actor in the economy. I hoped not only to support myself, but also to work my way up to Fair Trade and job creation in the fashion world. Originally, I wanted to create a large garment clothing workshop; The majority of young specialized in fashion in Africa in general and in Cameroon in particular (my home country), fail to blend in professionally by lack or insufficiency of the fashion business.

          Je suis Serbelloni LOYEM, promoteur de la marque DOORAK. Issue d'une famille modeste, j'ai très vite ambitionné après mes études de Marketing, d'être un acteur de la vie économique. L'espoir, non seulement de subvenir au mieux à mes besoins, mais aussi d'œuvrer à ma façon pour un commerce Équitable dans la mode et pour la création d'emploi. A l'origine, je souhaite créer un grand atelier de confection vestimentaire; La majeure partie de jeunes spécialisés dans la mode en Afrique en général et au Cameroun en particulier (mon pays d'origine), ne parviennent pas à s’insérer professionnellement par manque ou insuffisance d'entreprises de mode. 

          In the same track, Cameroon is a producer country of cotton, silk, leather, wool and other materials needed for the manufacture of clothing. More than one craftsmen encounter difficulties in the sale or export of their finished products (silk fabrics, leather ...).So, I had to find a way, not only to create jobs, but also to promote Fair Trade.

          Dans le même sillage, le Cameroun, est un Pays producteur de coton, de soie, de cuir, de laine et bien d'autres matières nécessaires à la fabrication des vêtements. Plus d’un  des artisans rencontrent énormément de difficultés pour la vente ou l’exportation de leurs produits finis (toiles de soie, le cuir…). Il me fallait absolument trouver un moyen, non seulement de créer de l'emploi, mais aussi de favoriser un Commerce Équitable.

         The project was ambitious, but most of all required substantial financial resources. From 2003, I have started the quest of personal financings by taking many small jobs that I associated as best I could to my evening studies.. A year later, the result was not conclusive. Despite the difficulties encountered, I believed and I remained unshaken because I felt and I knew that this project was viable. Having scrutinized several additional tracks, I realized that it was necessary to go through a side project that will serve me as a springboard for the implementation of my clothing workshop. Hence the idea of a clothing brand that adheres better with a clothing workshop, furthermore, it was a perfect fit with my educational background.

          Le projet ambitieux, mais surtout nécessite des moyens financiers conséquents. Dès 2003 je me lance dans la quête des financements personnels à travers de nombreux petits emplois que j’associe tant bien que mal à mes études en cours du soir. Un an plus tard, le résultat n'est pas probant. Malgré les difficultés rencontrés, j’y ai cru et je suis resté inébranlable   car je sentais et je savais que ce projet était viable. Après avoir scruté plusieurs pistes supplémentaires, je réalise qu'il est nécessaire de passer par un projet secondaire qui me servira de tremplin pour  l'implantation de mon atelier de confection. D’où l’idée d'une marque de vêtements en ce sens qu’elle adhérait mieux avec un atelier de confection, de plus, elle était en parfaite adéquation avec ma formation scolaire.

          So I decided to create the DOORAK brand as my own image; that is to say a brand that marries perseverance, faith in its potentialities and goals. In the same logic, I decided to immigrate in France in 2004 in the hope of finding a more favorable framework for the project. The brand formalizes in 2006. A new challenge begins, because it is not just about creating clothing workshops in Africa, but it is also about succeeding in developing a clothing line in France facing tough competition. The beginnings were extremely difficult; I had to find various partners that had to be compensated, and I did not have the means. I was therefore compelled to follow a self-taught training in different areas. I managed thereby to launch in 2007 a collection of T-shirts. The product was appreciated but sales did not take off. After study, I came to the conclusion that it would be an advantage to stand out to distinguish myself. So, I took a break in 2008 to prepare for my next move.

          Je décide alors de créer la marque DOORAK à mon image; c’est-à-dire qui marine  persévérance, foi en ses potentialités et ses objectifs. Dans la même logique, je décide d'immigrer en France en 2004 dans l'espoir de trouver un cadre plus favorable à ce projet. La marque s'officialise en 2006. C'est un nouveau défi qui commence, car il n'est plus seulement question de créer des ateliers de couture en Afrique, mais il faut aussi réussir à le développer une ligne de vêtement en France face à une rude concurrence. Les débuts sont extrêmement difficiles; il fallait trouver des partenaires divers qu’il fallait rémunérer, et je n’avais pas les moyens pour. Je me trouve donc contraint de suivre une formation en autodidacte dans différents domaines. Je parviens de ce fait à lancer en 2007 une collection de tee-shirts. Le produit est apprécié mais les ventes ne décollent pas. Après étude, j’en arrive à la conclusion selon laquelle il faudrait se d'avantage se démarquer pour se distinguer. Je marque alors une pause en 2008 pour me préparer. 

          The brand returns to the front of the scene in March 2015 with luxury caps that meet a very favorable response from the fanatics of this accessory. These are the users who prefer a soaked product with an unusual touch. The growing success leads to new demands such as T-shirts, Jackets, Trousers, Dresses, Handbags, Shoes ...

This demand forces us to expand our range to satisfy all parties. However, it faces financial barriers that prevent us from continuing in our tracks. Hence our presence on this website to share with you the experience by seeking financial support.

          La marque revient sur le devant de la scène en Mars 2015 avec des casquettes de luxe qui rencontrent un écho très favorable auprès des fanatiques de cet accessoire. Il s'agit des utilisateurs préférant un produit imbibé d’une touche hors du commun. Le succès grandissant entraine des nouvelles demandes telles que : Tee-shirts, Vestes, Pantalons, Robes, Sacs à main, Chaussures … 

Ce besoin nous oblige à étendre notre gamme afin de satisfaire toutes les parties. Cependant, on se heurte à la barrière financière qui nous empêche de continuer dans notre élan. D’où notre présence sur ce site pour partager avec vous cette expérience qui se veut la nôtre et par là solliciter un soutien financier de votre part.


THE NUMBERS :

Our total requirement =  19 252$
Available = 3 962$
Your help = 15 290$

LES CHIFFRES :

Notre besoin total = 17 000 €

Disponible : 3500€

Votre aide : 13 500€

  • IF THE OBJECTIVE IS EXCEEDED :

With the surplus amount, we are going to begin the setting-up of the workshop in Africa near craftsmen and to create the first jobs.

  • SI L'OBJECTIF EST DÉPASSÉ :

Avec le montant excédant, nous allons commencer l’implantation de l'atelier de fabrication en Afrique près des artisans et créer les premiers emplois


RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

As any activity, we cannot ignore the possible risks.

The competition :

The fashion is a highly competitive market, it would be of which very difficult to forge a place and to maintain it.  However we made a deep analysis on this matter and the best way of resisting in the face of the competition is to be always faithful to our strategic line;  Our purpose is not the quantity, but the quality and especially in the respect for the fair trade.  For DOORAK, It is the ethical, then the Earnings. it would be of what very difficult for the other brands to respect this strategy.

The supply and demand:

Thesuccessgrowingofthebrandthroughouttheworldcaninvolveveryastrong demandofourproducts. Thiswill puttousthenintheincapacityto answertherequestimmediatelyfrom whereapossiblelossofmarket share. Forstagewiththissituation,weconsiderhaseachtimeto presentfirstourmodelsaheadofpre-orderin order tohavetimeto produceaccording tothepassioncarriedtoamodeloranother…


RISQUES ET CHALLENGES:

Comme toute activité, nous ne saurions ignorer les éventuels risques.

La concurrence:

La mode est un marché hautement concurrentiel, il serait dont difficile de se forger une place et la maintenir. Toutefois nous avons effectué une analyse profonde à ce sujet et la meilleure façon de résister face à la concurrence est d'être toujours fidèle à notre ligne stratégique ; Notre but n'est pas la quantité, mais la qualité et surtout dans le respect du commerce équitable. Pour DOORAK, C'est l'étique, ensuite le Gain. Il serait dont très difficile pour les autres marques de respecter cette stratégie.

L'offre et la demande :

Le succès croissant de la marque à travers le monde peux entraîner une très forte demande de nos produits. Ceci nous mettra alors dans l'incapacité de répondre immédiatement à la demande d'où une possible perte de part de marché.
Pour palier à cette situation, nous envisageons a chaque fois présenter en avant premier nos modèles en pré commande afin d'avoir le temps de produire en fonction de l'engouement porté à un modèle ou un autre...


WHY THIS PROJECT IS IMPORTANT ?

- The target market is European in general and French in particular. Rising unemployment is

undeniable; Many stylists, model makers, graphic designers, models  from major French or European schools do not  have the chance to work in major fashion companies. Furthermore, any consumer would wand a high-end clothing, with quality and reasonable price.

- Cameroon (example of an African Country) is a producer country of cotton, silk, leather, wool and other materials for making clothes ... Moreover, about 95% of qualified young people in this field have no uncorked for lack or insufficiency of garment enterprises. The minimum wage is 25,000 CFA francs; the equivalent of about 42$ per month. The RSA or equivalent does not exist. Therefore the majority of young graduates are left on their own. More than one craftsmen encounter difficulties for fair marketing products related to fashion.

DOORAK presents itself as a new chance, a new career opportunity, a new breath to the economic weapon, a powerful vector of purchasing power through products designed, developed by French youth, made by French and African young people, presented by French and Africans models and sold around the world; all in a logic of fair trade.

  • POURQUOI CE PROJET EST IMPORTANT ?

- Le marché visé est Européen en général, et Français en particulier. La montée du chômage y est indéniable; bon nombre de dessinateurs, de stylistes, modélistes, infographistes,  mannequins tous issus des grandes écoles Françaises ou Européennes n’ont pas toujours la même chance de vivre de leur savoir-faire dans les grandes sociétés de mode. Par ailleurs, tout consommateur souhaiterait avoir un vêtement haut de gamme, de qualité et ce à prix raisonnable.

- Le Cameroun (exemple de Pays Africain) est un Pays producteur de coton, de soie, de cuir, de laine et bien d'autres matières nécessaires à la fabrication des vêtements... Par ailleurs, environ 95% des jeunes qualifiés du domaine n'ont aucun débouché par manque ou insuffisance d'entreprises de confection. Le Smic est de 25 000 FCFA; l’équivalent d'environ 38 € par mois. Le RSA, ou l’équivalent n’existe pas. Par conséquent la majeure partie des jeunes diplômés sont livrés à eux-mêmes. Plus d’un  des artisans y rencontrent des difficultés pour une commercialisation équitable des produits lié à la mode.

          DOORAK se présente donc comme une nouvelle chance, une nouvelle opportunité de carrière, un nouveau souffle à l’ arme économique, un vecteur puissant du pouvoir d'achat à travers des produits conçus, élaborés et dessinés par des jeunes Français, confectionnés par des jeunes Africains et Français, présentés par des mannequins Français et Africains et vendus dans le monde entier; le tout dans une logique du commerce équitable.

  • WHY MUST WE HELP ?

- With your support it will be possible to provide more fair trade

- With your support we could create thousands of jobs.

- Thanks to you, this project will come to life

- With you, we will be stronger for stronger action.

  • POURQUOI VOUS DEVEZ NOUS AIDEZ ?

- Avec votre soutiens il sera possible d'apporter un plus au commerce équitable.

- Avec votre soutiens nous pourrions créer des milliers d'emploi.

- Grace à vous ce projet prendra vie.

- Avec vous nous seront plus fort pour des actions plus forte.


HOW CAN YOU SUPPORT US ?

- BY MAKING A FINANCIAL DONATION

- BY FOLLOWING OUR PROJECT IN YOUR NETWORKS.

TWEET IT.

FACEBOOK IT.

INSTAGRAM IT.

EMAIL IT.

SEND IT VIA MAIL ...

  Thank you for your support that will leave your name forever engraved in the history of DOORAK brand.

  • COMMENT POUVEZ-VOUS NOUS SOUTENIR ?

- EN EFFECTUANT UNE DONATION FINANCIÈRE

- EN FAISANT SUIVRE NOTRE PROJET DANS VOS RÉSEAUX.

PARTAGE TWEETER.

PARTAGE FACEBOOK.

PARTEGE INSTAGRAM .

PARTAGE  EMAIL.

ENVOIS PAR MAIL ...

  Merci de votre soutien qui laissera votre nom à jamais gravé dans l'histoire de la marque DOORAK.


  • PRODUCTS AVAILABLE ON DOORAK.COM

  • PRODUITS DISPONIBLE SUR DOORAK.COM

Caps 100 % leather, logo embroidered in the back, gold-plated plaque DOORAK in facad

Casquettes 100% cuir, logo brodé à l'arrière, plaquette DOORAK plaqué Or en façade

story_txt:
ENGLISH & FRANÇAIS


Description / Définition :

          DOORAK
is a high-end clothing brand that draws its roots from an ideology combining
both: potentialities, fairness, prospecting, self-overcoming and beyond all the
quest for innovation. It is thus a concept that associate the "who can to
whom wants" thereby combining the action to thought. When we say DOORAK,
we imply: "Have the attitude ... keep the altitude"
          DOORAK
est une marque de vêtements haut de gamme qui tire sa source d'une idéologie
combinant à la fois : potentialités, équité, prospection, surpassement de soi
et au-delà de tout, la quête de l’innovation. Il s’agit ainsi d’un
concept qui associe” le qui peut au qui veut” mariant de ce fait l’action à la
pensée. Qui dit DOORAK dit : "Ayez l’attitude... gardez l’altitude)..
The story of the project / L'histoire du projet :
          My
name is Serbelloni LOYEM, promoter of the DOORAK brand. Born into a modest
family, I quickly aspired after my Marketing studies, to be an actor in the
economy. I hoped not only to support myself, but also to work my way up to Fair
Trade and job creation in the fashion world. Originally, I wanted to create a
large garment clothing workshop; The majority of young specialized in fashion
in Africa in general and in Cameroon in particular (my home country), fail to
blend in professionally by lack or insufficiency of the fashion business.

          Je
suis Serbelloni LOYEM, promoteur de la marque DOORAK. Issue
d'une famille modeste, j'ai très vite ambitionné après mes études de Marketing,
d'être un acteur de la vie économique. L'espoir, non seulement de subvenir au
mieux à mes besoins, mais aussi d'œuvrer à ma façon pour un commerce Équitable
dans la mode et pour la création d'emploi. A l'origine, je souhaite créer
un grand atelier de confection vestimentaire; La majeure partie de
jeunes spécialisés dans la mode en Afrique en général et au Cameroun en
particulier (mon pays d'origine), ne parviennent pas à s’insérer
professionnellement par manque ou insuffisance d'entreprises de
mode. 

          In the same track,
Cameroon is a producer country of cotton, silk, leather, wool and other
materials needed for the manufacture of clothing. More than one craftsmen
encounter difficulties in the sale or export of their finished products (silk
fabrics, leather ...).So, I had to find a way, not only to create jobs, but
also to promote Fair Trade.

          Dans
le même sillage, le Cameroun, est un Pays producteur de coton, de
soie, de cuir, de laine et bien d'autres matières nécessaires à la
fabrication des vêtements. Plus d’un  des artisans rencontrent énormément
de difficultés pour la vente ou l’exportation de leurs produits finis
(toiles de soie, le cuir…). Il me fallait absolument trouver un moyen, non
seulement de créer de l'emploi, mais aussi de favoriser un Commerce Équitable.








         The
project was ambitious, but most of all required substantial financial
resources. From 2003, I have started the quest of personal financings by taking
many small jobs that I associated as best I could to my evening studies.. A
year later, the result was not conclusive. Despite the difficulties
encountered, I believed and I remained unshaken because I felt and I knew that
this project was viable. Having scrutinized several additional tracks, I
realized that it was necessary to go through a side project that will serve me
as a springboard for the implementation of my clothing workshop. Hence the idea
of a clothing brand that adheres better with a clothing workshop, furthermore,
it was a perfect fit with my educational background.
          Le
projet ambitieux, mais surtout nécessite des moyens financiers
conséquents. Dès 2003 je me lance dans la quête des
financements personnels à travers de nombreux petits emplois que
j’associe tant bien que mal à mes études en cours du soir. Un an plus
tard, le résultat n'est pas probant. Malgré les difficultés rencontrés,
j’y ai cru et je suis resté inébranlable   car je sentais et je
savais que ce projet était viable. Après avoir scruté plusieurs pistes
supplémentaires, je réalise qu'il est nécessaire de passer par un projet
secondaire qui me servira de tremplin pour  l'implantation de mon atelier de
confection. D’où l’idée d'une marque de vêtements en ce sens qu’elle
adhérait mieux avec un atelier de confection, de plus, elle était en
parfaite adéquation avec ma formation scolaire. 

          So I decided to create the DOORAK brand as my
own image; that is to say a brand that marries perseverance, faith in its
potentialities and goals. In the same logic, I decided to immigrate in France
in 2004 in the hope of finding a more favorable framework for the project. The
brand formalizes in 2006. A new challenge begins, because it is not just about
creating clothing workshops in Africa, but it is also about succeeding in
developing a clothing line in France facing tough competition. The beginnings
were extremely difficult; I had to find various partners that had to be
compensated, and I did not have the means. I was therefore compelled to follow
a self-taught training in different areas. I managed thereby to launch in 2007
a collection of T-shirts. The product was appreciated but sales did not take
off. After study, I came to the conclusion that it would be an advantage to
stand out to distinguish myself. So, I took a break in 2008 to prepare for my
next move.
          Je
décide alors de créer la marque DOORAK à mon
image; c’est-à-dire qui marine  persévérance, foi en ses
potentialités et ses objectifs. Dans la même logique, je décide d'immigrer en
France en 2004 dans l'espoir de trouver un cadre plus favorable à ce
projet. La marque s'officialise en 2006. C'est un nouveau défi qui
commence, car il n'est plus seulement question de créer des ateliers de
couture en Afrique, mais il faut aussi réussir à le développer une
ligne de vêtement en France face à une rude concurrence. Les
débuts sont extrêmement difficiles; il fallait trouver des
partenaires divers qu’il fallait rémunérer, et je n’avais pas
les moyens pour. Je me trouve donc contraint de suivre une formation
en autodidacte dans différents domaines. Je parviens de ce
fait à lancer en 2007 une collection de
tee-shirts. Le produit est apprécié mais les ventes ne décollent pas.
Après étude, j’en arrive à la conclusion selon laquelle il
faudrait se d'avantage se démarquer pour se distinguer. Je marque alors
une pause en 2008 pour me préparer.  

          The
brand returns to the front of the scene in March 2015 with luxury caps that
meet a very favorable response from the fanatics of this accessory. These are
the users who prefer a soaked product with an unusual touch. The growing
success leads to new demands such as T-shirts, Jackets, Trousers, Dresses,
Handbags, Shoes ...
This
demand forces us to expand our range to satisfy all parties. However, it faces
financial barriers that prevent us from continuing in our tracks. Hence our
presence on this website to share with you the experience by seeking financial
support.

          La
marque revient sur le devant de la scène en Mars 2015 avec des
casquettes de luxe qui rencontrent un écho très favorable auprès des
fanatiques de cet accessoire. Il s'agit des utilisateurs préférant un
produit imbibé d’une touche hors du commun. Le succès grandissant entraine
des nouvelles demandes telles que : Tee-shirts, Vestes, Pantalons, Robes, Sacs
à main, Chaussures … 
Ce besoin
nous oblige à étendre notre gamme afin de satisfaire toutes les parties.
Cependant, on se heurte à la barrière financière qui nous empêche de continuer
dans notre élan. D’où notre présence sur ce site pour partager avec vous
cette expérience qui se veut la nôtre et par là solliciter un soutien
financier de votre part.






THE NUMBERS :Our total requirement =  19 252$ Available = 3 962$Your help = 15 290$

LES CHIFFRES :

Notre besoin total = 17 000 €
Disponible : 3500€
Votre aide : 13 500€


IF THE OBJECTIVE IS EXCEEDED :
With the surplus amount, we are going to begin the setting-up of the 
workshop in Africa near craftsmen and to create the first jobs.
SI L'OBJECTIF EST DÉPASSÉ :
Avec le montant excédant, nous allons commencer 
l’implantation de l'atelier de fabrication en Afrique près des artisans 
et créer les premiers emplois


RISKS AND CHALLENGES:


As any activity, we cannot ignore the possible risks.


The competition :


The fashion is a highly competitive market, it would be of
which very difficult to forge a place and to maintain it.  However we made a deep analysis on this
matter and the best way of resisting in the face of the competition is to be
always faithful to our strategic line;  Our
purpose is not the quantity, but the quality and especially in the respect for
the fair trade.  For DOORAK, It is the
ethical, then the Earnings. it would be of what very difficult for the other
brands to respect this strategy.


The supply and demand:


Thesuccessgrowingofthebrandthroughouttheworldcaninvolveveryastrong demandofourproducts. Thiswill puttousthenintheincapacityto answertherequestimmediatelyfrom whereapossiblelossofmarket share. Forstagewiththissituation,weconsiderhaseachtimeto presentfirstourmodelsaheadofpre-orderin order tohavetimeto produceaccording tothepassioncarriedtoamodeloranother…



RISQUES ET CHALLENGES:


Comme toute activité, nous ne saurions ignorer les éventuels risques.


La concurrence:

La mode est un marché hautement concurrentiel, il serait dont difficile de se
forger une place et la maintenir. Toutefois nous avons effectué une analyse
profonde à ce sujet et la meilleure façon de résister face à la concurrence est
d'être toujours fidèle à notre ligne stratégique ; Notre but n'est pas la
quantité, mais la qualité et surtout dans le respect du commerce équitable.
Pour DOORAK, C'est l'étique, ensuite le Gain. Il serait dont très difficile
pour les autres marques de respecter cette stratégie.

L'offre et la demande :

Le succès croissant de la marque à travers le monde peux entraîner une très
forte demande de nos produits. Ceci nous mettra alors dans l'incapacité de
répondre immédiatement à la demande d'où une possible perte de part de marché. 
Pour palier à cette situation, nous envisageons a chaque fois présenter en
avant premier nos modèles en pré commande afin d'avoir le temps de produire en
fonction de l'engouement porté à un modèle ou un autre...

WHY
THIS PROJECT IS IMPORTANT ?
- The
target market is European in general and French in particular. Rising
unemployment is 
undeniable;
Many stylists, model makers, graphic designers, models  from major French or European schools do
not  have the chance to work in major
fashion companies. Furthermore, any consumer would wand a high-end clothing,
with quality and reasonable price.
-
Cameroon (example of an African Country) is a producer country of cotton, silk,
leather, wool and other materials for making clothes ... Moreover, about 95% of
qualified young people in this field have no uncorked for lack or insufficiency
of garment enterprises. The minimum wage is 25,000 CFA francs; the equivalent
of about 42$ per month. The RSA or equivalent does not exist. Therefore the
majority of young graduates are left on their own. More than one craftsmen
encounter difficulties for fair marketing products related to fashion.
DOORAK
presents itself as a new chance, a new career opportunity, a new breath to the
economic weapon, a powerful vector of purchasing power through products
designed, developed by French youth, made by French and African young people,
presented by French and Africans models and sold around the world; all in a
logic of fair trade.

POURQUOI CE
PROJET EST IMPORTANT ?
- Le marché
visé est Européen en général, et Français en particulier. La montée du chômage
y est indéniable; bon nombre de dessinateurs, de stylistes, modélistes,
infographistes,  mannequins tous issus des grandes écoles
Françaises ou Européennes n’ont pas toujours la même chance de vivre de
leur savoir-faire dans les grandes sociétés de mode. Par ailleurs,
tout consommateur souhaiterait avoir un vêtement haut de gamme, de qualité et
ce à prix raisonnable.
- Le Cameroun
(exemple de Pays Africain) est un Pays producteur de coton, de soie, de cuir,
de laine et bien d'autres matières nécessaires à la fabrication des
vêtements... Par ailleurs, environ 95% des jeunes qualifiés du domaine n'ont
aucun débouché par manque ou insuffisance d'entreprises de confection. Le
Smic est de 25 000 FCFA; l’équivalent d'environ 38 € par mois. Le RSA, ou
l’équivalent n’existe pas. Par conséquent la majeure partie des
jeunes diplômés sont livrés à eux-mêmes. Plus d’un  des artisans y
rencontrent des difficultés pour une commercialisation équitable des produits
lié à la mode.
          DOORAK
se présente donc comme une nouvelle chance, une nouvelle opportunité de
carrière, un nouveau souffle à l’ arme économique, un vecteur puissant du
pouvoir d'achat à travers des produits conçus, élaborés et dessinés par des
jeunes Français, confectionnés par des jeunes Africains et Français, présentés
par des mannequins Français et Africains et vendus dans le monde entier;
le tout dans une logique du commerce équitable.




WHY
MUST WE HELP ?
- With
your support it will be possible to provide more fair trade
- With
your support we could create thousands of jobs.
- Thanks
to you, this project will come to life
- With
you, we will be stronger for stronger action.

POURQUOI VOUS
DEVEZ NOUS AIDEZ ?
- Avec votre soutiens il sera
possible d'apporter un plus au commerce équitable.
- Avec votre soutiens nous pourrions
créer des milliers d'emploi.
- Grace à vous ce projet prendra vie.
- Avec vous nous seront plus fort
pour des actions plus forte.


HOW
CAN YOU SUPPORT US ?
- BY
MAKING A FINANCIAL DONATION
- BY
FOLLOWING OUR PROJECT IN YOUR NETWORKS. 

TWEET IT.
FACEBOOK IT.
INSTAGRAM IT.
EMAIL IT.
SEND IT VIA MAIL ...
 
Thank you for your support that will leave your name forever engraved in the
history of DOORAK brand.



COMMENT POUVEZ-VOUS NOUS SOUTENIR ?

- EN EFFECTUANT UNE DONATION FINANCIÈRE 
- EN FAISANT SUIVRE NOTRE PROJET DANS VOS RÉSEAUX.
PARTAGE TWEETER.
PARTAGE FACEBOOK.
PARTEGE INSTAGRAM .
PARTAGE  EMAIL.
ENVOIS PAR MAIL ...
  Merci de
votre soutien qui laissera votre nom à jamais gravé dans l'histoire de la
marque DOORAK.

story:
Rice Love - Buy a bag. Feed a Family

In 2014, Coney, Nate and I started Rice Love with an idea from my mom to recycle jute rice bags by sewing them into bags. We tested some designs and people loved them. We also wanted to give away the rice that was once inside to families in need.

In February 2015, we traveled to Coney's home country of India to give away rice. It was amazing to see what a little extra rice could do for a family in India. With 20 kilos of extra rice, families had extra money to accomplish some of the things they needed.

Giving away rice was exciting and rewarding! We made sure to buy the high quality rice at retail rather than finding the cheapest rice we could and buying in bulk. This way, we supported the local economy from farmer all the way down to the smallest local retailer. The little extra money that a family has was spent in their community, stimulating the local economy.

We are on Indiegogo to raise money to launch a new line of recycled bags, build an ecommerce site, and to begin exhibiting at trade shows.

We want Rice Love to grow so that we can do more good! We need your support. Please buy a bag and spread the word.

What We Need & What You Get

Rice Love makes stylish products that have the look and feel of authentic burlap rice bags. In the future, these bags will retail for more than they are listed for during this campaign. Be part of the Rice Love history and pledge today! 

Recycled Pencil Case $10

Recycled Hip Pack $15

Recycled Re-usable Shopping Bag $25

Recycled Messenger Bag $25


Recycled Back Pack $35


The Impact

Your contribution makes a huge impact! Not only do you get a unique bag, but it represents love:

  • For each bag bought, a kilo of rice will be donated to a family in need in Nepal (except for the pencil case).
  • We are a successful team.
  • We aren't like others supposed "do-gooders". We love doing good. We are happy to get out there and do it. We don't have layers of bureaucracy that waste precious dollars. You're money will get to the people.

Risks & Challenges

Naturally, production can be full of challenges. Does Rice Love have what it takes to overcome them? These materials will be manufactured in the neighboring state of Nepal. We know the import process and cost. We have a proven track record of success. You can rest assured that if the project goal is met, you will receive your reward! We thank you for placing your confidence in us!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you don't buy a bag, please spread the word!

story:
HELP US HELP YOU

We know what you’re thinking.
We know what you want.
We know what you need.

How do we know? Because this is what you’ve been telling us:

We’re tired of the hype in golf.
We‘ve had it with buying a new club only to see it discounted shortly after.
We want unbiased club reviews.
We deserve the truth.

MyGolfSpy was founded for these reasons, sparked to life by golfers just like you.

You asked for change and we answered the call. The industry needs accountability and the players need a voice. Together, let’s ignite the revolution.


OUR MISSION

To equip you with reviews you can trust and the info you need to get the most out of your performance, budget and time.

To add your voice to the thousands of other golfers who have something to say about the future of our game.


YOU ARE THE KEY TO THIS REVOLUTION

You are the reason we go to the office everyday. We work for you. By supporting MyGolfSpy today, we can continue to provide the truth golfers deserve.

We want to build a state of the art testing facility that rivals any in golf. We’ll put the claims to the test made by all the golf companies so you can see for yourself how they measure up. We’ll recruit specialists to cover a wider range of products and issues. Altogether, we want to provide you access to the most comprehensive database of reviews and information available today.

By doing so, we also want to grow our ranks to over a million strong. Imagine, over a million golfers united, forcing the golf companies to take notice and find better ways to serve you. Because we the players are the ones that ultimately support the game.



OUR DATACRATIC MOVEMENT
IS BASED ON TRUTH NOT HYPE

The same way that players need to visualize and understand the golf shots they face, you the consumer need the facts about the products you’re buying.

Unfortunately, marketing has become more important than performance and profits more important than your satisfaction. Knowing the truth about your choices has a huge impact on the actual value you get from any and every purchase you make.

For us, it’s not about getting you to buy more products, it’s about helping you buy the products best suited for your game.

In fact, we don’t want you to spend one dollar on a club unless it improves on what you already own.

That’s why we want to provide you with the data and the details you need to cut through the hype so you can see for yourself whether a club really is longer and straighter or whether it’s just newer and shinier.




WHY SHOULD YOU TRUST MYGOLFSPY?

That is a very important question to ask. Our response is simple:

Our testing criteria, performance data and conclusions are not influenced by advertising revenue. Unlike other golf media outlets, we’re free to report only the truth. We pay no attention to logos. We simply focus on what the numbers reveal in our testing.

Is this years driver better than last years? Is it worth the money? Is it a technological breakthrough or simply a new paint job?

Come on, let’s get it in the lab see what the data says.


BEYOND MONEY —
WE NEED YOUR HELP SPREADING THE WORD

MyGolfSpy exists to serve and be an advocate for golfers at every level, age and gender. At its heart though is a growing community of golfers looking for truth and who want to be heard. Whether you’re able to donate to our campaign or not, you can still help send a message to the industry that golfers want change.


Simple yet powerful ways you can help:

•  Share this video Facebook or Twitter

•  Choose a banner to post on Facebook or Twitter

•  Click here to email other media outlets asking them to cover our story

  and help spread the word.

•  Click here to email the golf companies directly, urging them to support

  unbiased product testing.

•  Stay connected. Follow us on Facebook and on Twitter to stay up-to-date

  with our campaign. #powertotheplayer


MORE FROM THE OWNER (Adam Beach):

My name is Adam Beach and all I know is golf.

This place, this site, it's more than just a business to me, it truly is an expression of who I am and what I believe in, down to my core.  I feel the work I do is a reflection of who I am and the idea behind the work I do is more important than the work itself.

You see, I don't actually see myself in the golf business at all, I am in the business of caring.  You, the reader/golf consumer challenge me everyday to get it right.  I take pride in being morally sound and looking out for you, in fact I lose sleep over it.  It drives me nuts to think a golfer somewhere is being taken advantage of by marketing or big business. The last thing golf companies should be doing is treating golfers like they are less important than money, because you're not.  I don't think you or any other golfer should spend a dollar unless it improves on what's already in your bag.

I am also an obsessive data cruncher, over analyzer, and insanely honest.   You see my words and question my motives, so I wanted to give you a chance to see who I am on a personal level.  I designed a putter that was used in the Ryder Cup, I competed in a world long drive competition, I have fit thousands of golfers, I designed some technology I feel changed the game, but like most people that love golf, I worked at a golf shop for my first job. Mostly, I am just a guy who wakes up with one goal: do the right thing.

Watch the video and maybe that will help you understand, you are my motive.




REFERRAL PROGRAM

We’re doubling down on our efforts to spread #PowerToThePlayer to every golfer and offering you an incentive to keep the momentum rolling.

We're now offering a 10% commission on every pledge you bring in. The baseline for this program starts at $250. Once you've referred $250 worth of pledges via your MyGolfSpy unique URL, you'll automatically be eligible for participation and set to receive your payout at the end of our campaign.

For example: Say you bring in $10,000 in referrals that's $1000 in your pocket and all you had to do was get people to click your link and contribute to MyGolfSpy in support of unbiased product testing and reviews.

How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page).
