not about getting you to buy more products, it’s about helping you buy the
products best suited for your game.
In fact, we
don’t want you to spend one dollar on a club unless it improves on what you
already own.
That’s why
we want to provide you with the data and the details you need to cut through
the hype so you can see for yourself whether a club really is longer and
straighter or whether it’s just newer and shinier.WHY SHOULD YOU TRUST MYGOLFSPY?That is a
very important question to ask. Our response is simple:
Our testing
criteria, performance data and conclusions are not influenced by advertising
revenue. Unlike other golf media outlets, we’re free to report only the truth.
We pay no attention to logos. We simply focus on what the numbers reveal in our
testing.
Is this
years driver better than last years? Is it worth the money? Is it a
technological breakthrough or simply a new paint job? 
Come on,
let’s get it in the lab see what the data says.

BEYOND MONEY —WE NEED YOUR HELP SPREADING THE WORDMyGolfSpy
exists to serve and be an advocate for golfers at every level, age and gender.
At its heart though is a growing community of golfers looking for truth and who
want to be heard. Whether you’re able to donate to our campaign or not, you can
still help send a message to the industry that golfers want change.
Simple yet
powerful ways you can help:
•  Share this video Facebook or
Twitter
•  Choose a banner to post on
Facebook or Twitter
•  Click here to email other media
outlets asking them to cover our story 
  and help spread the word.
•  Click here to email the golf
companies directly, urging them to support 
  unbiased product testing.
•  Stay connected. Follow us on
Facebook and on Twitter to stay up-to-date 
  with our campaign.
#powertotheplayerMORE FROM THE OWNER (Adam Beach):

My name is Adam Beach and all I know is golf.
This place, this site, it's more than just a business to me, it truly is an expression of who I am and what I believe in, down to my core.  I feel the work I do is a reflection of who I am and the idea behind the work I do is more important than the work itself.
You see, I don't actually see myself in the golf business at all, I am in the business of caring.  You, the reader/golf consumer challenge me everyday to get it right.  I take pride in being morally sound and looking out for you, in fact I lose sleep over it.  It drives me nuts to think a golfer somewhere is being taken advantage of by marketing or big business. The last thing golf companies should be doing is treating golfers like they are less important than money, because you're not.  I don't think you or any other golfer should spend a dollar unless it improves on what's already in your bag.
I am also an obsessive data cruncher, over analyzer, and insanely honest.   You see my words and question my motives, so I wanted to give you a chance to see who I am on a personal level.  I designed a putter that was used in the Ryder Cup, I competed in a world long drive competition, I have fit thousands of golfers, I designed some technology I feel changed the game, but like most people that love golf, I worked at a golf shop for my first job. Mostly, I am just a guy who wakes up with one goal: do the right thing.
Watch the video and maybe that will help you understand, you are my motive.


REFERRAL PROGRAMWe’re doubling down on our efforts to spread #PowerToThePlayer to every golfer and offering you an incentive to keep the momentum rolling.We're now offering a 10% commission on every pledge you bring in. The baseline for this program starts at $250. Once you've referred $250 worth of pledges via your MyGolfSpy unique URL, you'll automatically be eligible for participation and set to receive your payout at the end of our campaign.For example: Say you bring in $10,000 in referrals that's $1000 in your pocket and all you had to do was get people to click your link and contribute to MyGolfSpy in support of unbiased product testing and reviews.How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page).

story:
At Garibaldi Watches we strive to be the bridge between high-luxury and streetwear.

We are a brand for creatives embracing a lifestyle where you pursue your true goals. We’re designers, photographers, chefs, street artists, athletes, musicians, DJ's, fixie enthusiasts, surfers, entrepreneurs, skaters and more.

Our watches are the first ever to have premium Japanese selvedge denim on the dial.


Why Selvedge Denim?

These days, selvedge denim has become more desirable than non-selvedge for two reasons: 

1) The nuance of the denim weaving technique itself  

2) The commitment to quality from the mills producing selvedge denim. 

Japanese selvedge denim has a reputation among denim enthusiasts as being the best in the world and for good reason. Japanese denim is known for its premium construction and the skilled, artisanal craft required to make it, which is why we have chosen it for our watches.


We are initially offering two watch lines:


42mm Men's Watch (6 Styles)


38mm Unisex Minimalist Watch (4 Styles)


All materials are handpicked and each and every strap handmade to make sure every detail is according to our demands. 


Our Clasp

Our double-locking deployment clasp allows you to easily fit the watch to your wrist. Whether you like to wear it tight or to wear it slightly loose, this clasp lets you do it all. Once it's fitted you will never need to adjust it again. 

This type of deployment clasp is typically found on watches in the luxury segment, which is why we are particularly proud of being able to equip each of our watches with one minus the exorbitant price tag.


Our Selvedge Denim

What do Evisu, Samurai, Momotaro Jeans, Japan Blue and Garibladi Watches have in common? Quality.

We source our denim from the same town where these denim powerhouses are based, Kojima.


When selecting the denim, 2 things were important:
1) Color
2) Weight. 

Color and texture are what make our watches truly unique. We needed a denim that was light enough to be embossed on a strap while also being able to fit through our deployment clasp. This was not an easy task but we are very happy with the outcome and we know you will be too!

Our Strap

Our straps are made with a combination of genuine leather and Japanese selvedge denim. The leather underside gives extreme comfort while each of our shorter straps has the iconic red-and-white selvedge stitching on one edge for a subtle but head-turning look.


Our philosophy is simple - style and quality doesn't have to cost a fortune. 

We look to give the following:
  • AFFORDABILITY: Starting at just $89 on Indiegogo. We work direct to consumer, passing the savings to you with radical transparency.
  • PRACTICALITY: We wanted a quality handmade watch useful enough for everyday wear. Simply, a no frills watch that just makes sense.
  • DESIGN: So many watches these days look the same. Seriously where has the creativity gone? Our hope is that you will appreciate just how much time we spend on the design of the watches to make them instantly recognizable and evocative.

In order for the Garibaldi Watch project to reach fruition, we need to raise $10,000 to fund initial manufacturing costs with the ability to scale through more orders. 

Our minimum order quantity for our selvedge denim is HIGH and considering we have 4 colours of denim it means we need to sell a large number of units to cover this. This is where you come in!

Through Indiegogo, backers will receive wholesale pricing (up to 53% discount), be the first to wear the new watch collection, and become ambassadors of the brand.


From now until the end of our campaign (September 22), you can refer your friends to receive additional Garibaldi watches in your choice of style or color for FREE!

*Contest is only open to funders who have pre-ordered at least one Garibaldi Watch. Rewards are not stackable—only one will apply at a time.

Referring your friends is simple. All you have to do is:

1. Log into your account on Indiegogo and 

2. Click on the sharing buttons near the top of our campaign page, which automatically shares your unique link via email or social media. 

You can also copy your unique link by clicking on the link button and paste that into your social media updates or emails.

When your friends click through your unique link and contribute to our project, their contributions will be registered under your name. 

You can track your referrals by clicking on your user name on the top right of the page, then going to "My Contributions" and clicking on the "Referrals" tab.

At the end of the campaign, we will tally how many referrals you have and deliver your reward to you!


Our Development Process

We designed every single part of the watch (except the internal movement) ourselves. The attached photos show the different stages of development in the overall process before we were 100% happy with the design.

When conceptualising our product we used our two 3D printers to print the different cases we were considering. 

This is where our 3D printing our prototypes proved invaluable:

  1. We were able to minimise costs by 3D printing all our favourite designs before deciding on the winner.
  2. We did extensive development in the ergonomics of the casing to ensure it would be comfortable for both mens and women's wrist sizes. This meant optimizing the weight distribution and wall thickness.

Our 3D printed strap even shows the denim and stitching detailing.


Our Name

When deciding on a name for our brand, one of the areas of our research was the history of denim and how it has become to be a staple of people’s wardrobes. There are various stories as to how and from where denim originated and subsequently rose to prominence but one such tale caught our eye. 

We drew inspiration from an Italian general from the 1800s, Giuseppe Garibaldi. One day Garibaldi faced an uphill battle where the odds were completely stacked against him. Seeing that this could have been his last battle he decided to throw tradition out the window and wear whatever he wanted, which turned out to be a pair of blue pants. 

He won this battle and became a cult hero around the world, and so began the trend of wearing blue pants, which would later evolve into lighter versions of denim. We believe the name Garibaldi fits our brand perfectly as it promotes doing your own thing, starting something new, and fearless approach to life.


Our Team

Watch collecting has been a lifelong passion 


Being part of the Garibaldi team is like being part of a little family. Our team consists of designers who have grown up or are now living in two of the world’s largest fashion hubs, NYC and Shanghai. Fashion has played a massive part of our individuality and personal development and we feel that this is reflected in our timepieces - we’ve got the elegant and modern casing inspired by the modern Shanghai skyline complemented by some New York swag baby!

But it’s not just about the watch - it’s about the lifestyle, it’s about art, it’s about love. We possess all of these things within this company that a lot of companies just don’t have.

So this is a shout out to your #APC #Samurai #Evisu1991 #JeanMichelBasquiat - you have inspired us to start our own journey and we’re so excited to share it with you!


Where We Are

We have partnered with a leading manufacturer and for the last 16 months have actively worked with our watchmakers to assure that our watches are built to look exactly like the design we have created. We have given specific requests to our fabricators so that the watches may also function to our own high standards. 

Our manufacturers have over 20 years of experience producing handmade, luxury watches ranging in the hundreds to thousands of dollars in retail value. They hold a great reputation for delivering high-grade watches as well as respecting customer deadlines.

The idea of craftsmanship and uniqueness doesn’t end at the product itself. We carried it throughout the product packaging, the marketing and the customer experience.




Going forward, we plan to work with independent designers as well as household names in the selvedge denim scene to create more unique and off-the-wall timepieces. 

And YOUR SUPPORT will help us achieve this dream.

Don’t settle for ordinary – let your watch tell a story. 


Supporting Partners

                                                           

We are proud to have our fulfillment plan certified by Floship, a leading crowdfunding fulfillment provider. We have calculated the optimal means of shipping our watches to all markets in a fast and cost effective manner.

For proof of certification into the fulfillment plan please click here.


Risks and Challenges

With any project comes risks and challenges. These issues can occur during the development, production, and/or logistical aspects of the project. When making products molds can break, materials can be swapped, and imperfections can be missed during quality control. When shipping goods packages get damaged, packages can be lost, and certain countries will levy large duties even for a small order.

Basically, things can happen that are out of our control but we are confident we have the skills and existing industry knowledge to mitigate any potential risks. We enjoy excellent and longstanding relationships with our suppliers and one of the original founders of Garibaldi Watches will be onsite at the manufacturing centres throughout the campaign and production cycle to ensure the highest quality and standards are met. 

We have everything in place to launch our product line and the means to correct anything that might go wrong . Most important, we will continue to be transparent throughout the campaign, and also into production and beyond if Garibaldi Watches is funded. If you have any specific questions about our campaign, our products, or our brand please ask us directly and we will continue to update the answers to the FAQ. Alternatively, shoot us an email via: info@garibaldiwatches.com


Other Ways You Can Help


                              

   Instagram           Facebook            Twitter             


We want to say a BIG THANK YOU for checking out our project, and your help in making it a reality.

We realise that not everyone might be in a position to pledge but you can also help us spread the word by checking out and sharing our campaign on social media. Every little helps!


FAQ

Q: Can I pledge to get more than one watch at a certain level?
A: Of course you can! For each additional watch you want, simply add on another pledge amount to your current pledge. For example, if you're in at the $125 level, add an extra $125 for each additional watch. If you want two watches at that pledge amount, you'd pledge $250.
Q: When can I select my watch of choice?
A: We will be sending out our official survey once our project ends. You will then be able to select your watch and give us your correct shipping instructions.
Q: What type of stainless steel do you use for the watches?
A: Garibaldi Watches use a high quality 316 Low Carbon Grade stainless steel that looks and feels great.
Q: What type of movement is used?
A: Both our 42mm and 38mm watches use Japanese Miyota Precision Quartz movements, which are world renowned for being accurate and reliable. Our 42mm watch includes the date function while our minimalist 38mm watch does not.
Q: Is the watch waterproof?
A: It's water resistant meaning it's fine to wear when in the rain or washing the dishes. On the other hand if you're off scuba diving leave it at home.
Q: What is the warranty on the watch?
A: One Year Manufacturers Guarantee on the movement of our watches. Unfortunately, the warranty does not cover damages that may occur from everyday wear and tear.
Q: When will my card be charged?
A: All cards will be charged after time has ran out on the campaign. You should see a charge on your account 3-5 days after the campaign ends.
Q: When will my watch be shipped?
A: Manufacturing is standing by! If and when we’re successfully funded and our campaign ends we will put the order in. We expect to have all watches shipped out by December 2015 - just in time for Christmas!!
Got any more questions we haven't covered? Ask us in the comments section or email us at info@garibaldiwatches.com

story:
Hello, we are Karina, Marcis, Liga and we are BETOLLI team.


BETOLLI offer anyone in any place of the world to create a specially designed shirt with the help of the shirt constructor available at the «Betolli» homepage, modifying countless details and nuances, and more importantly to acquire a unique self-created shirt according to individual sizes.


I am addressing you, as we would like to implement the idea of the pocket handkerchief constructor.


With this small constructor, the same as with the shirt constructor, it will be possible to choose the most preferable fabric and the embroidery colour. And to make it special, we will offer the possibility to interweave emotions in it. We know there are words which can inspire, therefore it is worth writing them down and holding them right next to the heart. This handkerchief will be not only a bright accessory, but also a reminder of what is important to you.

story:
Our passion at Bikini Thief, women. We want to be a positive influence on women, helping to empower anyway we can. Our new swimwear includes the "Love Yourself Liner" words of inspiration that are the last thing you see before you throw on your swimsuit and head out on an adventure. You are unique. You are Beautiful. You are one of a kind. In addition, we do and will continue to partner and support organizations in local and far reaching communities that provide support and give back to girls and women in a variety of ways. 

 Bikini Thief is also proud to be 100% made in Pasadena, California. The swimwear made in the USA is the best quality possible, and therefore slightly more expensive to make. We want every woman to be able to afford a Bikini Thief swimsuit which is why we keep the cost of our suits as low as possible while delivering made in the USA quality.

 We feel that our message and our quality products go hand in hand in how we define ourselves. By expanding our product line BEYOND! swimwear, we can reach more people and help empower more women. 

   With the additional funds we can sample a variety of new products, new materials, and new designs. From there, we can see how the world "likes" our cover-ups, accessories, and more.  Marketing efforts will include our brand and what we stand for, new products, and current products, 

 Sampling, fine tune fitting, and marketing. That's the hard part. Once we get things going, economies of scale allow us to negotiate better prices for materials and deliver a high quality product at the best price possible. The more we raise, the more we can develop. We have lofty ambitions that are well rooted in the economics of sound business development.

 From our start, Bikini Thief is proud to donate time and products to a variety of charitable causes. Empowering women is our focus but we have and will continue to donate to schools, support groups, and community events. Our success with celebrities wearing Bikini Thief and appearances in high profile media events like Sports Illustrated Swim allows us to leverage brand recognition to help events raise funds and attention to their cause.

 As you know, with almost everything today, things change fast. We take a risk when designing new suits and new patterns. What the world loves today, may just be for today. We have a track record though, five years in business and aspiring for more with every new line we develop. We feel that we can do more, a lot more, and with our track record, we feel it is the right time.

  We also strongly believe this is sooo much more than about capital. Empowering women, just thinking about, talking about it, can lead to doing it. Anybody that even reads this is taking a step in that direction. And what a good direction to go. We hope you will be a part of it anyway you can.

Our passion at Bikini Thief, women. We want to be a positive influence on women, helping to empower anyway we can. Our new swimwear includes the "Love Yourself Liner" words of inspiration that are the last thing you see before you throw on your swimsuit and head out on an adventure. You are unique. You are Beautiful. You are one of a kind. In addition, we do and will continue to partner and support organizations in local and far reaching communities that provide support and give back to girls and women in a variety of ways. 
 Bikini Thief is also proud to be 100% made in Pasadena, California. The swimwear made in the USA is the best quality possible, and therefore slightly more expensive to make. We want every woman to be able to afford a Bikini Thief swimsuit which is why we keep the cost of our suits as low as possible while delivering made in the USA quality.
 We feel that our message and our quality products go hand in hand in how we define ourselves. By expanding our product line BEYOND! swimwear, we can reach more people and help empower more women. 
   With the additional funds we can sample a variety of new products, new materials, and new designs. From there, we can see how the world "likes" our cover-ups, accessories, and more.  Marketing efforts will include our brand and what we stand for, new products, and current products, 
 Sampling, fine tune fitting, and marketing. That's the hard part. Once we get things going, economies of scale allow us to negotiate better prices for materials and deliver a high quality product at the best price possible. The more we raise, the more we can develop. We have lofty ambitions that are well rooted in the economics of sound business development.
 From our start, Bikini Thief is proud to donate time and products to a variety of charitable causes. Empowering women is our focus but we have and will continue to donate to schools, support groups, and community events. Our success with celebrities wearing Bikini Thief and appearances in high profile media events like Sports Illustrated Swim allows us to leverage brand recognition to help events raise funds and attention to their cause.
 As you know, with almost everything today, things change fast. We take a risk when designing new suits and new patterns. What the world loves today, may just be for today. We have a track record though, five years in business and aspiring for more with every new line we develop. We feel that we can do more, a lot more, and with our track record, we feel it is the right time.
  We also strongly believe this is sooo much more than about capital. Empowering women, just thinking about, talking about it, can lead to doing it. Anybody that even reads this is taking a step in that direction. And what a good direction to go. We hope you will be a part of it anyway you can.

story:
Short Summary

I want to put Apple Watch Edition in a toilet, make a video that glorious event and post it on youtube/whatever. That's it. Perhaps give it a good stir and throw it a couple of times. Because it makes much sense. 

What We Need 

We need the following:

  • Apple Watch Edition (choose the exact model and strap - I think rose gold makes most sense)
  • an iPhone - because Apple Watch requires an iPhone to work (I'll provide one)
  • compatible toilet (I'll run compatibility tests and contact Genius Bar to double- verify compatibility on a pre-owned toilet)
  • skills to execute the experiment (we combine the latest technology with expertise to ensure proper insertion)

Risks & Challenges

Apart from the whole undertaking being considerably challenging, the risk includes drowning of the Apple Watch edition, which would prevent it from being used in consecutive drops and other experiments (like making a slingshot out of it).

The mitigation plan is to use some string or something. This should work.

story:
ILATRO is the realization of a dream: to imagine and create new CARBON FIBER PRODUCTS that improve the lives of all, designed and handmade in ITALY.

Do you remember when suitcases were without wheels? Probably not. That was the first great revolution. Ilatro’s carry-on bag is the second.



We are a team of young Italians who love to travel and explore the World. We are also designers, lawyers and have loads of experience in mechanical engineering.

We believe that time is precious and that even moments of anticipation, if well spent, will improve our lives.

So we wondered: how can we reduce the stress of travel to improve our lives and those of others? How can we take pleasure during times of waiting?

Ilatro suitcases are the first carry-on bags that allow you to have a seat when no other seat is available. And, if necessary, they transform into a backpack.

WWW.ILATRO.COM


HOW DOES IT WORK


IT'S BASED ON A PATENTED DESIGN

Ilatro carry-on bags are the perfect combination of passion, professionalism and Italian design.



LEAVE YOUR CARBON FIBER CASE AT THE HOTEL, AND EXPLORE THE WORLD WITH JUST A BACKPACK ON YOUR SHOULDERS!

By means of simple screw hooks the fabric part can be detached from the carbon fiber to become a backpack.

The backpacks are interchangeable. You can choose among three different colors.

You can change color as you like and customize your everyday look.



The backpacks are made of high-strength polyester for a durable, soft shape.


CUSTOMIZATION: YOUR BACKPACK WILL BE FOREVER YOURS.

In addition to the choice of color we give you the possibility to customize your backpack and make it uniquely yours: we can embroider your name or email on your backpack!

If it gets lost someone might find it and take the effort to get it back to you. 


WASHABLE AND WATERPROOF

Sometimes things do not go as planned... Like when a pack breaks: chocolate, cosmetics or simply time can dirty your carry-on luggage.


How did you solve the problem in the past? Our backpacks you can simple throw into the laundry ... as many times as you want.


A REAL OBJECT OF DESIGN



Traditional suitcases, when they are not used, are hidden in cupboards or closets. 


 

An Ilatro suitcase, on the other hands, is a design object, to expose and use not only during a travel but every day to lend your home a unique style and an elegant decor.

TAKE CARE OF PEOPLE YOU LOVE!



Children, the elderly or adults with mobility impairments often need to rest: sometimes it is enough a gesture as simple as sitting down to regain serenity.


TECHNICAL DATA SHEET


AIRLINES RESTRICTIONS: ILATRO SUITCASES MEET THE SIZE REQUIREMENTS OF MOST OF THEM.

Many airlines have restrictions regarding the size and weight of the luggage: Ilatro suitcases fits both these requirements.



Leveraging the lightness of carbon fiber we minimizes the weight of the carry-on bag. And that leaves more space available for the things that really matter to you... without paying for extra weight.


WHERE WE ARE

Our company is located in the south of Italy, in Apulia, the "land of the trulli", ancient stone houses that have been declared UNESCO world heritage.

 ( ALBEROBELLO -  Itria Valley - Italian region of APULIA)

Here, among a Mediterranean setting, the production of aircraft components began in the 1930s.

ILATRO or Phillyrea latifolia is a species typical of the Mediterranean.
The fruits are ripe blacks, similar to olives, but smaller and rounder.
The wood Ilatro is hard and compact, durable as carbon fiber.



The know-how evolved over time in our region now includes the processing of new composite materials, including carbon fiber.
HOW WE PRODUCE IT:
An high-tech process for a new generation of materials 

Composite materials have become a precious resource in the creation of numerous products, since they combine lightness, mechanical resistance and fine aesthetics.

Carbon fiber is the material with which the airplanes of the future are made.

To make our carbon fiber suitcases we use a production process that involves autoclaves: the very same technology used by the aerospace industry for making satellites, space rockets and airplanes. This approach is more expensive than other manufacturing  processes, but it is the only one that guarantees high performance in terms of mechanical strength, lightness and flexibility.

POSSIBLE  RISKS & CHALLENGES

One of the biggest risks when you contribute to a crowd-founding campaign are delays due to production troubles. This happens because few start-up companies run their own production plants and must thus out-source manufacturing to other companies, often found on the other side of the planet.

WE BUILD OUR OWN PRODUCTS

WE TAKE MANUFACTURING SERIOUSLY: WE HAVE ALREADY SET UP A PRODUCTION PLANT IN ITALY, THE MOLDS ARE DONE- WE HAVE EVEN BUILT OUR OWN AUTOCLAVE MACHINE.

WE DIRECTLY TAKE CARE OF THE REALIZATION OF OUR PRODUCTS.


WE ARE READY TO MAKE BEAUTIFUL PRODUCTS!!!

So what we need now is you!!!

Your contribution is important because it allows us to hire people who will work in this new company and start the production.

RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT

Our aim is to mix, the Italian heritage, unique in the world, in fashion design and handicraft, with state of the art aerospace technology, bringing for the first time the use of these new high-tech materials, and their exceptional performance, into the daily life of all of us. And this is really a big challenge.


We believe that scientific research and technological innovation are the heart of any company, but we know we are still too small to address these challenges alone.

For this purpose we have formed a strong partnership with CETMA, a research center, where young and talented researchers, specialized in materials engineering and industrial design, work with us to find new and more efficient production models to be used directly in our facilities.

(CETMA, Engineering, Design & Materials Technologies Center)


BY SUPPORTING THIS CAMPAIGN, YOU WILL MAKE THIS POSSIBLE: YOU WILL TRANSFORM A GREAT IDEA INTO A CONCRETE REALITY.


We are very excited about the start of this campaign and your opinion it is very important to us, so it would be really a great help for us to receive your feedback.



Let us know any idea, advice or even a simple encouragement just to let us understand that we are on the right track and to help us to improve.

PERKS

When contributing to the Ilatro Indiegogo campaign, you'll have the option to choose from:



HERE'S WHEN THINGS WILL HAPPEN 

Please Note:

· Use always the same email for all the pledge you make.

· Remember to add the shipping cost.

· Orders will be processed in order of arrival.

· our shipping rates do not include any taxes or charges you may incur on arrival in your country. Please check dutycalculator for your country.


ABOUT US

Our team is made of creatives, designers, lawyers, mechanical engineers and people with a strong background in composite material manufacturing. 

We have different skills and we share the passion for our work. 

Our team has big brains and big hearts.


We work every day just like a team of athletes working together in different roles to win the game.

We believe that good teamworking is the secret of every successfull enterprice.

We love spend time together, brainstorming ideas, some of which we then hope to transform into reality, to re-imagine our world.

What we need now is your help to make it possible.

All of us says thank you for your help.

 

WWW.ILATRO.COM


FIND THIS CAMPAIGN ON:

FACEBOOK

TWITTER

http://trendinc.today/new-this-week/#/ilatro/

story:
HEY FRIENDS,WE LAUNCHED A NEW CAMPAIGN WITH CHANGES PLEASE VISIT THIS LINK. WE ARE EXCITED WITH THE NEW CHANGES. 

ALL BACKER FROM THIS CAMPAIGN WILL BE GIVING THERE WATCHES AS PLANNED.THANK YOU

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/bojuria-by-c...


                              OUR STORY

A watch is not only a piece to tell the time,it is a symbol of self love,awareness of changing times and the very epitome of style. Its not only enticing to the eyes,it serves as a valuable entity of keeping us in line with all we have to achieve in a timeline of 24 hours  at the same time connecting the past,present and the future in a single piece.


At Charles Jaja watches,we not only blend our unique style with modern changes,but we offer a sense of pride to whoever wears them. And all these at the most affordable price surprisingly.






Our first collection BOJURIA,was born due to the rising need to offer luxury to those who find exquisite pieces overpriced. Many watch lovers would like to own a watch with all the elements of quality,durability and overall aesthetic value but at a reasonable price. The sole aim of BOJURIA is to provide reachable luxury to everyone.

WHO ARE WE?

Thanks for asking. Charles Jaja consists of a diverse team of creative product designers with skills within thefield of design and manufacturing. Our team encompasses over 7 years of combined experience in bringing innovative products to life. We have worked tirelessly in perfecting BOJURIA and you are the final piece to our dream puzzle.

CHARLES JAJA TIMEPIECES COME WITH A WARRANTY

We believe in our watches and you should too. If anything were to happen to your watch within the first 2 years, send it back to us for repair or replacement. 


SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Material: 316L stainless steel
  • Diameter: 44mm
  • Bezel: 2mm
  • Strap: Crocodile skin leather
  • Clasp: Butterfly buckle
  • Feature: Day/date feature
  • Movement: Japanese VJ55 Quartz movement
  • Water resistance: 5ATM

                                             

AFTER OUR CAMPAIGN 

After the Indiegogo campaign concludes, we will carefully source, test, and research the materials and production of the watch. While the watches are being manufactured and packaged, we will be preparing for large scale shipment to our backers. We are confident in bringing the best to play and providing quality.


TIME LINE

  • INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN: 18 MAY - 28 JUNE 2015
  • SURVEY & FINALIZE: 29 JUNE - 15 JULY 2015
  • PRODUCTION: 16 JULY - 16 SEPTEMBER  2015
  • PACKAGING & QUALITY CONTROL:  17 SEPTEMBER - 24 SEPTEMBER 2015
  • SHIPMENTS: 25 SEPTEMBER - 30 SEPTEMBER 2015 

 YOUR SUPPORT

Designing a product is one thing but bringing it to life is a different ball game. That being said we need your help,not only pledging for our unique watches but sharing it with your friends and family. A tweet or a Facebook share will go along way in helping us to reach our goal. We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page and anything you can do to add is well appreciated.

RISK AND CHALLENGES

If our project gets funded,we have a lot of previous experience with product production and a great relationship with our manufacturer. Also we have taken steps to reduce potential problems.We have booked our production dates, and we have a local partner who is on the ground and in daily contact with our manufacturer in our absence. We can stay ahead of any problems that may arise and make adjustments as needed.Transparency is a key factor we take seriously and that is what we will give to you and we will maintain open communication with all our backers.

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS:

International Shipping is $15 to $30 depending on how many watches backed. 

Please note: backers will be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and/or local taxes you may incur in your country of residence. Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties,we cannot misrepresent the customs information.  We appreciate your understanding.

FINALLY

We want to use this opportunity to thank Indiegogo for accepting us and also to everyone for your trust in us and our brand,we will not let you down. THANK YOU.

We can stay ahead of any problems that may arise and make adjustments as needed.Transparency is a key factor we take seriously and that is what we will give to you and we will maintain open communication with all our backers.

Please note: backers will be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and/or local taxes you may incur in your country of residence. Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties,we cannot misrepresent the customs information.  We appreciate your understanding.
FINALLY
We want to use this opportunity to thank Indiegogo for accepting us and also to everyone for your trust in us and our brand,we will not let you down. THANK YOU.

story:
Short Story

Hello, my name is Graal, owner and developer of Buddy Caddy; the first functional animal shaped golf bag.  My inspiration came from my love of animals and the idea came to me when I was introduced to golf two years ago.  I love my new hobby; however, I could not find any golf bags that would capture my heart.  I then realized there is a need for something unique and fun in the golf industry.  Riggs, our family dog was my model while I was drawing my idea of Buddy Caddy on my sketch book.   Currently, the prototype is 98% complete and our goal is to perfect it 100%.  My team and I  were able to attend the Inventor's Spotlight at the PGA Show this year in Orlando, Florida.  The feed back was positive; therefore, I am driven to move forward with Buddy Caddy.   I am here at IndieGoGo to capture an audience to contribute towards this new, fun and creative golf bag that will guarantee to make you and other people smile!

What We Need & What You Get

Passion is the vehicle to complete Buddy Caddy's  final working prototype, but without your support, it will be slow to accomplish.  To continue this project, we will need a minimum of $24,000.00.  This unique golf bag requires two molds that is part of the design: the golf club organizer with a paw design and the bottom base with paw shoes.  Our aim for this  second goal is to make three working prototypes for men, women and  children.  With your contribution, depending on the perks you choose, you will receive our Buddy Caddy golf bag or accessory offers.

Please make sure to click the PERKS for more details on how to receive the first online Buddy Caddy products.

1.)  Made in USA!  Be the first 300 people to receive our first limited edition black T-Shirt  by American Apparel.  Please note that if you are the first person, yours will be "LIMITED EDITION #001 OF #300 and the second person will have "LIMITED EDITION #002 OF #300 printed on the shirt,  and etc...


2.) Made in USA,  Be the first 300 people to receive our first limited edition black sweatshirt  by American Apparel with embroidered logo design.

3.)  Limited Edition, Hand painted and signed Buddy Caddy hat by Graal Gaerlan. Please note that this is based on a first come first serve only, so be the first 300 people to order!!!

Risks & Challenges 

 New, fun and  innovative product designs in the golf industry is much needed.  Hence,  I truly believe Buddy Caddy products will motivate golfers,  especially animal lovers, women, children and others to own these unique golf bags. Surpassing the the first goal of Buddy Caddy from  a concept idea to an actual sample prototype was my own risk by self funding it to fruition.  The challenges of completing the final working prototype is why I am here at IndieGoGo to achieve my second goal. This goal is to make three unique molds: the club organizer and the base of the golf bag. The club organizer is designed to compliment the shape of a paw.  The base of the golf bag is designed to mimic two pair of pet shoes.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to donate funds, we will accept your word of mouth to your friends and family.  Please share www.indiegogo.com/buddycaddy or www.buddycaddy.com to them.  We want to thank you in advance for your help.

The Impact

We believe Buddy Caddy golf bags will bring a new sense of humor to your favorite sport.  With your help, we  appreciate  your assistance with this fun and amazing project.  Furthermore, we strongly support www.gabrielsangels.org, a non-profit organization that assist with children that were physically, mentally and emotionally abused.  A portion of your donation will help heal one child at a time.  Thank you in advance for your support.
story_txt:
Short Story


Hello, my name is Graal, owner and developer of Buddy Caddy; the first functional animal shaped golf bag.
 My inspiration came from my love of animals and the idea came to me when I was introduced to golf two years ago.  I love my new hobby; however, I could not find any golf bags that would capture my heart.  I then realized there is a need for something unique and fun in the golf industry.  Riggs,
our family dog was my model while I was drawing my idea of Buddy Caddy on my sketch book.   Currently, the prototype is 98% complete and our goal is to perfect it 100%.  My team and I  were able to attend the Inventor's Spotlight at the PGA Show this year in Orlando, Florida.  The feed back was positive; therefore, I am driven to move forward with Buddy Caddy.   I am here at IndieGoGo to capture an audience to contribute towards this new, fun and creative golf bag that will guarantee to make you and other people smile!
What We Need & What You Get

Passion is the vehicle to complete Buddy Caddy's  final working prototype, but without your support, it will be slow to accomplish.  To continue this project, we will need a minimum of $24,000.00.  This unique
golf bag requires two molds that is part of
the design: the golf club organizer with a paw design and the bottom base with paw shoes.  Our aim for this  second goal is to make three working prototypes for men, women and  children.  With your contribution, depending on the perks you choose, you will receive our Buddy Caddy golf bag or accessory offers.Please make sure to click the PERKS for more details on how to receive the first online Buddy Caddy products.1.)  Made in USA!  Be the first 300 people to receive our first limited edition black T-Shirt  by American Apparel.  Please note that if you are the first person, yours will be "LIMITED EDITION #001 OF #300 and the second person will have "LIMITED EDITION #002 OF #300 printed on the shirt,  and etc...2.) Made in USA,  Be the first 300 people to receive our first limited edition black sweatshirt  by American Apparel with embroidered logo design.



3.)  Limited Edition, Hand painted and signed Buddy Caddy hat by Graal Gaerlan. Please note that this is based on a first come first serve only, so be the first 300 people to order!!!


Risks & Challenges 
 New, fun and  innovative product designs in the golf industry is much needed.  Hence,  I truly believe Buddy Caddy products will motivate golfers,  especially animal lovers, women, children and others to own these unique golf bags. Surpassing the the first goal of Buddy Caddy from  a concept idea to an actual sample prototype was my own risk by self funding it to fruition.  The challenges of completing the final working prototype is why I am here at IndieGoGo to achieve my second goal. This goal is to make three unique molds: the club organizer and the base of the golf bag. The club organizer is designed to compliment the shape of a paw.  The base of the golf bag is designed to mimic two pair of pet shoes. 
Other Ways You Can Help

 
If you are not able to donate funds, we will accept your word of mouth to your friends and family.  Please share www.indiegogo.com/buddycaddy or www.buddycaddy.com to them.  We want to thank you in advance for your help.

The Impact 

We believe Buddy Caddy golf bags will bring a new sense of humor to your favorite sport.  With your help, we  appreciate  your assistance with this fun and amazing project.  Furthermore, we strongly support www.gabrielsangels.org, a non-profit organization that assist with children that were physically, mentally and emotionally abused.  A portion of your donation will help heal one child at a time.  Thank you in advance for your support.

story:
Nail Capsule.

Funding for nail capsule will allow me purchase the basic material to manufacture and put Nail Capsule into production. With the funding of € 1500. this means I can buy the material in certain quantities to keep the manufacturing cost down.

While € 1500 is my goal a  lesser amount will still allow me to get Nail Capsule up and running, so each and every backer means a step closer to my goal.

The Nail Capsule is a simple but effective tool so that is why I am trying to launch it through Indiegogo and really appreciate your help as backers to help me.

Each backer will receive the perks stated in the time stated so by backing this project and helping me meet my goal you receive this unique product.

story:
Today, prams have seen few transformations.

WockyWolf was created to be the next step of experience evolution to make walks with the pram more comfortable.

We have created an innovative pram to attain this goal.

Through a combination of modern technology you can never have problems with rocking your baby to sleep; your hands will always be warm and your gadgets will always be charged. Walk will always be comfortable and safe.

We spent over two years studying mother’s needs and carefully made our first pram equipping it with revolutionary facilities.

 Every seam, wire, pockets for folding things and devices have been thoroughly tested.

 The result is the best thing for modern mums.

The whole our team shares our happiness and believe that the walk with our pram will be joyful and comfortable for each parent around the world.

 

Our pram’s patented heated handle will protect your skin from the effects of adverse weather conditions.

Your baby’s sleep will no longer be disturbed by sudden incoming phone calls, because we have equipped our pram with an alerting system synchronized to your cell phone via Bluetooth.

When you have an incoming call or text message the handle will vibrate gently to let you know, and the display will show the details.

Go about your day or talk with friends while your baby is lulled gently to sleep, hands-free!

You can also recharge the battery at home.

When walking your baby after dark, these decorative features will also draw the attention of drivers and pedestrians and help prevent collisions.

Under the pram’s handle there is a special recess with two easy-to-reach compartments to keep your baby’s drink warm.

Here we’ve also installed two handy USB slots. 

This small recess can hold anything you might need: nappies, towels, toys and so on.

 

 

XXI century is called the century of the modern IT-industry. Today’s children do not know what a Rubik’s cube is, but they know very well, where you can buy a powerball. We cannot imagine our morning without a hot cup of instant coffee and hot water. It is difficult to make us get to work without transport, and we will never give up our cell phones. That’s not surprising; we are living in the age of information and technology. Every year the hundreds of new high-tech devices invent all over the world and they simplify our lives. Our company also wants to contribute.

How it began:

History WockyWolf company began two years ago, when two friends Oleg Andronov and Alexei Burdonov decided to create their own company for the production and release of prams, with the introduction of innovative technologies. The idea came to us, paying attention to walking moms with strollers for newborns, when we realized what is missing in the pram and why modern people feel uncomfortable. After studying the global market of well-known brands of baby carriages and taking polls of more than 1,500 thousands of mothers, we realized what to change.

And from the moment on, we seriously approached to the decision of tasks aiming to start the pram’s production. We wished to care for parent’s convenience and child’s safety.

2014 - 2015 years were the most difficult for us. We have worked on ShakeSystem technology for a long time. It easily shakes pram without the mother’s hands while standing on the ground. That is very smooth and soothing movements for the child. Newborns love to wiggle; it reminds them the time when they were in mother’s tummy.

Another difficulty was in decreasing weight of our pram due to the use of lightweight materials, but without losing sight of safety, reliability, ease and stability. At the junction of these qualities, we have received weight of 17.8 kilograms.

At the second stage, we developed a special niche extending the housing cradle, and removing all the usual hanging bag is fixed on the handle. Mom can put there all the necessary things for the baby (bottle food, napkins, diapers etc.). We have made two departments in the niche, which can heat the bottle for the baby, and one more important thing in the modern age: USB connector for charging devices. The niche is located under the handle and easily accessible.

We have implemented a heating regulated handle with many different positions for bad weather conditions. It will be very convenient to everyone who carries pram (mom, dad, grandma or grandpa) can adjust it by height and overhang.

Since the beginning of March 2015 and by the end of 2015 we were responsible for the development of the display and the power supply of all electrical components.

We created warning system and to save the baby’s sleep and not wake him up randomly-up appeared warning system and its synchronization with cell phone via Bluetooth. Pram’s handle pleasantly vibrating when you will receive incoming call or SMS and the built-in display shows its details. To ensure the operation of all electrical items of the pram, we have equipped it with a built-in battery self-charged function due to integrated in wheels electric generator. The battery can be also recharged at home via the micro-USB.

At the beginning of 2016 we paid our attention to the child’s safety, design and materials.

There is harness in all types of strollers for elder children, but in prams for infants they are not available for some models. While the baby carriage going down the stairs, the child can slither down and stroller roll over, so we have to provide security in advance.

An important feature of the pram is passabitily. Large rubber wheels provide maximum passability in all conditions. A soft swing-out mechanism gives greater maneuverability of the pram.

WockyWolf is equipped with a reliable braking system on the two rear wheels.

Our pram has reflective strips gleaming in the dark. The extra light will draw the driver’s attention that there is someone on the road or near it;

Unusual design of «Watermelon» style can attract many people. It is perfectly suits to the company name. After all, it's not a secret that the favorite food for the wolf-cubs is a watermelon berry. We are also working on other designs, and we would not stay put with earlier attainments.

Let's approach the material:

In WockyWolf were used only natural materials to the child could easily breathe and not to create the greenhouse effect. On the surface of the cradle trimmed with windproof and waterproof firm fabric. The bottom of the pram trimmed with natural leather, inside our product was used thermo fabric that may be unfasten for washing.

We have ideas for the prams of the second generation, and believe me, we will not stop there and every year we will surprise and make you happy...

Oleg Andronov about our pram WockyWolf

Evgenii Fedorov about our pram WockyWolf

Valeriy Korenev about our pram WockyWolf

1. Where will you have headquarters?

Nevada, USA.

2. Are you shipping worldwide?

Yes.

3. What are shipping costs?

Transportation costs vary depending on the selected pram and your location. Select your country in the finishing process and shipping cost will be instantly displayed. Let us know if the price is not displayed correctly.

 

Follow us to be the first to know of new open positions:

story:
With simple and user-friendly in mind, Sheer Tech has created ShakeShake Umbrella the world's best nonwetting umbrella that has a UPF50+ protection rating. 


Anti-Dripping – There will be no water dripping after use in the rain. This is because we use a highly water resistant canopy and therefore water won’t stick to the surface. 
Fast Drying – Dries 3 times faster than regular umbrella due to the special characteristic of the surface.
UV Protection – the umbrella comes with industry highest standard UPF≥50+ UV Protection.
Light Weight – Our foldable umbrella is only half the weight of regular umbrella.

With our superhydrophobic treatment, the surface chemistry of the canopy won't allow rain (which contain bacterias)  stick to the canopy . Therefore, without harmful bacterias growing on the canopy or surroundings like inside the vehicle or carpet, there won't be any awful odors.



Extra fine silk like fabric weave together with multi-layers of protection for rain and sun ray.

Ever seen someone brought in a soaking wet umbrella? With our Drip stop technology, nothing will ever drip after a good shake.

With the typical umbrella, water drips everywhere and it makes a mess! With our Shakeshake umbrella, there won’t be water dripping.
 

With to our special formulate treatment, the superhydrophobic effect can last up to 30mins without any wetting. 
 

Superhydrophobic testing for wettability
 

Even when the weather is really bad or you were outdoor for an extensive period of time and you notice a little wetting on your Shakeshake umbrella, with our weaving pattern, it will dry in no time! Here,  a 20 minutes drying test to show how effective Shakeshake Umbrella dries compare to other umbrellas that claim to have fast drying.

Dry 3 times faster than regular umbrella
Drying Shakeshake umbrella in closed position makes easy anywhere
 
Many of you would know that people who get great amount of exposure to ultraviolet ray（mainly UVA & UVB）are at greater risk for skin cancer. And most people think about sun protection only when they spend a day doing outdoor activities. But something many would not notice is that sun exposure adds up day by day, and it happens every time you are exposed to the sun. With our ShakeShake Umbrella, it offers UPF 50+ protection. There is no need to spend time and put on sunscreen when you are just walking from your office to lunch or just need to be outside for a short walk, just simply pop open  and it is ready to go. It is time to take care of our skin.
 
With ShakeShake Umbrella offers UPF 50+ protection which is the highest industry standard.
There is no need to spend time and put on sunscreen and reapply after a few hours, just simply pop it open and it is ready to go.
 
Frame is made from aluminum and reinforced fiberglass.
 

Aluminum handle with a non-slip grip for the Long umbrella and lightweight non-slip grip for the foldable umbrella
Groceries bags are often used to carry wet umbrellas. In some countries, shopping centres, restaurants and hotels even offer their customers a special made plastic bags for umbrellas to ensure it won’t drip. As most of you would know, plastic bags are made of non-renewable resource and they destroy the environment. You can use now save the environment by usingShakeshake Umbrella, an umbrella that doesn’t drip.
 
 



Steel Grey & Deep Cobalt

 
Long Version Umbrella
 
Foldable Version Umbrella
 

Sheer Tech was founded by Anxon, Kyle, and Tiffany, it began with a simple idea. We got tired of wet umbrella dripping and always making everything around us soaking wet. We wanted something much more versatile, convenient, and environment-friendly, so we develop an umbrella that can solve all that!


 

 
Updates:
Foldable Ver Umbrella Cover 
 

Our team worked very hard to bring Shakeshake Umbrella to a point where they are ready to be mass produced.  We are finish with prototyping and have finalized on the working models.  We have sourced all of our components, finalized our designs and gone through 13 different iterations of the umbrellas to get to where we are right now. All that remains is to place a production order based on  you guys and our distributor needs. The fabrication and framework are underway and we have a reliable manufacturer source that can produce quality products at a large scale.

We will keep you up to date and will do all in our power to minimize impact on delivery.

story:
Swain. One simple design.



For her and for him.  

As it happens in life, the most beautiful things are the simple ones. Developing something to wear, is about designing less and let yourself express your own individuality. Why? Because you were born original.


Designed for comfort. All year round.  

Materials were chosen for the best comfort. The interior is a fine layer of leather. An anatomical footbed and a strong rubber sole will give you an easy walk. The final touch comes from the outer: a smooth skin of suede leather. And because the rubber sole is just 7 mm thin, they are perfect to wear all year round.


The difference is in the details.

Creating something so meaningful, drove us to go even further. One box. The world’s most advanced material…wood. Simple. The perfect package for Swain.


Be the change you want to see in the world.

We give you the opportunity to make a difference. Our planet is the greatest recycling machine and you can be part of it. A box is perfect for plant strawberries or to keep your books and CDs on your desk. There are so many ways you can reuse it. Find yours and share it with us.


But there is one more thing.

Swain carries a story. And like all stories it starts with….

Once upon a time, on a small village, there lived a young man, like many others. Starvation was knocking on everyone's door, but he decided to challenge adversity. Alone, with his hands working together, no machinery. He went to the local Craftsman and showed him is work: beautiful handcrafted boots. "Keep doing your work young man. The boots are perfectly made.", said the Craftsman, asserting the excellence of the product. In the following week the young Mendes went to the local market and sold all the boots made. That day would become the beginning of a legacy. On the following years the business started to grow, and more than 20 men were now working on his workshop, including his son Joseph who left school with just twelve years old. Knowledge and passion being passed from father to son. But after some time, the handmade shoes of this family were now competing with industrial made shoes. The decision of closing the workshop was taken, yet keeping the selling business on local markets.


The last days of Mr. Mendes were spent with his two young grandsons before passing away. An extraordinary journey of work, dedication and integrity that changed the lives of many others. The grandsons of Mr. Mendes followed different paths: the older remained in the selling business with two shoe stores and the younger started working in telecommunications. “But sometimes a person meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it. “ After reading an article about the story of Red Bull, a new world began to emerge. The words “it’s not a drink, it’s a way of life”, started to echo in the mind of the youngest. Despite having a strong background in a completely different field (maths, physics, electronics) and with a decade of experience, he decided to take a shot. A Post- Graduation in Branding and Brand Management opened a total new range of possibilities. However, one thing was missing: an idea to implement, a product to sell.



He always thought that his grandfather’s old workshop would be the perfect place for a small restaurant. A place where you could go back in time. So, he went there with his father to take some photos. It had been over a decade since the last time he entered there. The sewing machines, the old wooden shoe forms and even Mr. Mendes old hand tools. All intact. And when they were about to leave, he noticed on a particular wicker basket. After pulling some old stuff he saw something different on the bottom: a very old leather boot. His father approached him, and said: “Son, it was made by your Grandfather 50 years ago”.

In that moment everything became clear. One hundred years later, the legacy was being handed over again. A lifetime journey hidden in time. And it was always there, waiting to be found.


Brand t-shirt.

You can back for a t-shirt. Sizes, color and gender will be gathered at the end of the campaign with a survey to all Swain backers.

Backers.  

Swain is manufactured in northern Portugal. Along with Italy, Portugal makes the best handmade quality shoes of the world. We are selling some samples and the feedback is great. With your help, we will be able to start a production line. Our first milestone will be 1000 SWAIN pairs, and we have a timeline of 10 weeks to deliver the last one. Thereby, the first backers will receive first. The next one thousand pairs will take 20 weeks and so on. Remember, Swain are perfect to wear all year round. We will produce from 36 to 46 (EUR). In the table below you can check the sizes comparison. Contact us for other sizes in the comments section. 

Share this project my dear backer friends, and follow us on

https://www.facebook.com/GravenCorp




Frequently asked questions

1. I back for a pair of Swain. What about my shoe size number? Sizes will be gathered at the end of the campaign with a survey to all Swain backers.

2. Are Swain really good to wear all year round? Yes. You can wear them in the summer too.

3. I ordered on the survey 41 (EUR) but it’s short on my feet. Can I get the 42 (EUR) ? Yes. Send us by mail your 41, but keep the wood box to lower the shipping costs.  We will send the 42 and refund you the shipping costs paid. Nevertheless, numbers are matching among our costumers and the feedback is great.
story_txt:
Swain. One simple design.



For her and for him.  
As it happens in life, the most beautiful things are the simple ones. Developing something to wear, is about designing less and let yourself express your own individuality. Why? Because you were born original.




Designed for comfort. All year round.  
Materials were chosen for the best comfort. The interior is a fine layer of leather. An anatomical footbed and a strong rubber sole will give you an easy walk. The final touch comes from the outer: a smooth skin of suede leather. And because the rubber sole is just 7 mm thin, they are perfect to wear all year round.



The difference is in the details.
Creating something so meaningful, drove us to go even further. One box. The world’s most advanced material…wood. Simple. The perfect package for Swain.


Be the change you want to see in the world.
We give you the opportunity to make a difference. Our planet is the greatest recycling machine and you can be part of it. A box is perfect for plant strawberries or to keep your books and CDs on your desk. There are so many ways you can reuse it. Find yours and share it with us.

But there is one more thing.
Swain carries a story. And like all stories it starts with….
Once upon a time, on a small village, there lived a young man, like many others. Starvation was knocking on everyone's door, but he decided to challenge adversity. Alone, with his hands working together, no machinery. He went to the local Craftsman and showed him is work: beautiful handcrafted boots. "Keep doing your work young man. The boots are perfectly made.", said the Craftsman, asserting the excellence of the product. In the following week the young Mendes went to the local market and sold all the boots made. That day would become the beginning of a legacy. On the following years the business started to grow, and more than 20 men were now working on his workshop, including his son Joseph who left school with just twelve years old. Knowledge and passion being passed from father to son. But after some time, the handmade shoes of this family were now competing with industrial made shoes. The decision of closing the workshop was taken, yet keeping the selling business on local markets.


The last days of Mr. Mendes were spent with his two young grandsons before passing away. An extraordinary journey of work, dedication and integrity that changed the lives of many others. The grandsons of Mr. Mendes followed different paths: the older remained in the selling business with two shoe stores and the younger started working in telecommunications. “But sometimes a person meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it. “ After reading an article about the story of Red Bull, a new world began to emerge. The words “it’s not a drink, it’s a way of life”, started to echo in the mind of the youngest. Despite having a strong background in a completely different field (maths, physics, electronics) and with a decade of experience, he decided to take a shot. A Post- Graduation in Branding and Brand Management opened a total new range of possibilities. However, one thing was missing: an idea to implement, a product to sell.


He always thought that his grandfather’s old workshop would be the perfect place for a small restaurant. A place where you could go back in time. So, he went there with his father to take some photos. It had been over a decade since the last time he entered there. The sewing machines, the old wooden shoe forms and even Mr. Mendes old hand tools. All intact. And when they were about to leave, he noticed on a particular wicker basket. After pulling some old stuff he saw something different on the bottom: a very old leather boot. His father approached him, and said: “Son, it was made by your Grandfather 50 years ago”.In that moment everything became clear. One hundred years later, the legacy was being handed over again. A lifetime journey hidden in time. And it was always there, waiting to be found.Brand t-shirt.You can back for a t-shirt. Sizes, color and gender will be gathered at the end of the campaign with a survey to all Swain backers.Backers.  
Swain is manufactured in northern Portugal. Along with Italy, Portugal makes the best handmade quality shoes of the world. We are selling some samples and the feedback is great. With your help, we will be able to start a production line. Our first milestone will be 1000 SWAIN pairs, and we have a timeline of 10 weeks to deliver the last one. Thereby, the first backers will receive first. The next one thousand pairs will take 20 weeks and so on. Remember, Swain are perfect to wear all year round. We will produce from 36 to 46 (EUR). In the table below you can check the sizes comparison. Contact us for other sizes in the comments section. 
Share this project my dear backer friends, and follow us on
https://www.facebook.com/GravenCorp





Frequently asked questions

1. I back for a pair of Swain. What about my shoe size number? Sizes will be gathered at the end of the campaign with a survey to all Swain backers.
2. Are Swain really good to wear all year round? Yes. You can wear them in the summer too.
3. I ordered on the survey 41 (EUR) but it’s short on my feet. Can I get the 42 (EUR) ? Yes. Send us by mail your 41, but keep the wood box to lower the shipping costs.  We will send the 42 and refund you the shipping costs paid. Nevertheless, numbers are matching among our costumers and the feedback is great.

story:
Short Summary

We at Pik Sha & Co are about providing not only Melbourne but national and international interests with highly sought-after apparel.
Pik Sha & Co was founded in Melbourne Australia, but inspired by one of the Co Founders up-brining in Hong Kong. The name "Pik Sha" is the street name on which one of the Co founders spent the majority of his childhood. Memories of the street "Pik Sha" will be reflected in some of the future designs for our brands. So our brand is based on old memories, but good, lifelong memories. Our aim at Pik Sha & Co is to become a well recognized local clothing brand which ultimately will be recognised on a larger scale, wether it is nationally or even globally.


What We Need & What You Get

Well, to be perfectly honest, we need money to actually get started. We have all our contacts set up with suppliers, but we need capital to get the process going.

We are aiming to reach $750 to help contribute to our dream of starting this brand.


Why should you support us?

Well, firstly all of our designs are made by us at Pik Sha & Co. All of our clothing is made from the highest quality cotton and our printing is all hand printed silk screen. By supporting us you will help make a fantastic idea into a even better reality so we can design even amore vibrant and diverse range of clothing to please all who choose to support and wear our brand.

Below we have some more designs by Pik Sha & Co, feel free to email us at pikshaco@gmail.com on your thoughts, all comments are welcome

story:
Why is the bag you set off with never big enough for what the day throws at you?

Why are you left fumbling for keys, muddling your laptop with your gym kit, then having to buy shopping bags?

Ohyo has teamed up with London designer Felix Conran to produce one multi-purpose bag that grows with your day, sorts out your stuff and reduces use of plastic bags. Now wouldn't that feel better?

Ohyo Bag Mark 1 was successfully funded on Kickstarter in 4 days, we need your orders to up-scale production and develop Mark 2.

The Ohyo bag is:

• a tablet bag that increases in size to hold your gym kit.

• a workbag that expands to hold your groceries.

• a backpack that unfolds for a weekend away.

• a travel bag that gets bigger to accommodate those last minute purchases.

It truly is a case (or bag) of one size fits all.

The first 500 Ohyo Bags are being made in London now. With your input we're tweaking the design and colours and preparing to upscale production. 

 About Ohyo

Ohyo was set up to produce products that make life a little more convenient. Our collapsible Ohyo water bottle extends to hold 500ml or 1000ml. And when empty it will squish down to fit in a pocket or bag. Using (and re-using) an Ohyo avoids the need to buy environmentally damaging bottled water. 

The Ohyo bag, like the bottle, is designed to make everyday life that bit easier. And if it means fewer plastic bags get used, that’s an added bonus.

With your support, The Ohyo Bag will be the first of many adaptable products by Felix Conran (Grandson of Sir Terence Conran) and Guy Jeremiah. You can watch Guy pitch the Ohyo Bag to investors and Jason Manford on Dave TV's Money Pit at 7:30pm on Thursday 12th November! 

See press coverage for Felix Conran's brand new Ohyo Bag in After Nyne and The London Evening Standard.

                                                            Tablet Bag Form

                                                                      Messenger Bag Form

                                                               Backpack Form

                                             Grocery Bag Form (above and below)

story:
THE CROWDFUNDING

¡Ánimo, valiente! needs your help to make a second photo session and its first fashion film.

You can see the first photo shoot from last summer here: http://www.animovaliente.com

We believe in working closely, so we'll do everything locally, as our clothes: the photographer, the models, the hair & make up stylists, the video maker, ...

In this way, we create a better environment and you help us to continue recycling and creating new clothes from already discarded denim gardments.

❤

LA FINANCIACIÓN

¡Ánimo, valiente! necesita tu ayuda para poder realizar una segunda sesión de fotos y su primera mini película de moda.

Puedes ver la primera sesión de fotos del verano pasado aquí: http://www.animovaliente.com

Creemos en el trabajo cercano, así que lo haremos todo de manera local, igual que nuestras prendas: el fotógrafo, las modelos, los estilistas de peluquería y maquillaje, el vídeo creador, ...

De esta manera, creamos un entorno mejor y nos ayudas a seguir reciclando y creando nuevas prendas a partir de las prendas vaqueras que ya fueron desechadas.

-------------

¡Ánimo, valiente! AT THE COP 21 OF PARIS: http://animovaliente.com/post/134862916457/cop21

¡Ánimo, valiente! has taken part in the catwalk “Changer la mode pour le climat” taken place at Hôtel de Noirmoutier, Paris, on December 8, 2015, at 7pm, organized by Universal Love, within the COP21.

❤

¡Ánimo, valiente! EN EL COP 21 DE PARÍS: http://animovaliente.com/post/134862916457/cop21

¡Ánimo, valiente! ha participado en el desfile “Changer la mode pour le climat” celebrado en el Hôtel de Noirmoutier, París, que ha tenido lugar el 8 de Diciembre de 2015, a las 19h., organizado por Universal Love, dentro del COP21.

-------------

THE MANIFESTO

¡Ánimo, valiente! is that denim garment forgotten in the back of a closet that exploded and redesigned defies the boundaries of time.

It’s that denim garment with its expressive capacity expanded through the art of sophisticated processing and recycling.

It’s that piece of denim you can’t bear to part with and we transform and renew.

It’s that denim garment that preserves the essence of fabric on a new design.

It’s the belief in the multiple lives of a denim which has not had enough with one.

It’s unique, original and personal.

It’s the union of between denim and design.

Old = Potentially transformable!

Have courage! - ¡Ánimo, valiente!

❤

EL MANIFIESTO

¡Ánimo, valiente! es esa prenda vaquera olvidada en el fondo de un armario que despiezada y rediseñada desafía los límites del tiempo.

Es esa prenda vaquera con su capacidad expresiva ampliada mediante el arte de la transformación y el reciclaje sofisticado.

Es esa prenda vaquera de la que odias despegarte y que nosotros transformamos y renovamos.

Es esa prenda vaquera que conserva la esencia del tejido sobre un diseño nuevo.

Es la creencia en las múltiples vidas de un vaquero que no ha tenido suficiente con una sola.

Es único, original y personal.

Es el feliz encuentro de lo vaquero con el diseño.

¿Viejo? ¡Potencialmente transformable!

¡Ánimo, valiente!

-------------

THE BRAND

Since the origins of civilisation, the role of clothing in defining individuals and their culture cannot be overstated. Through what we wear on our bodies, we show ourselves to be one of the group, but not without simultaneously displaying our individuality.

Everything is done by me, Succubus, one by one and handmade. This means that there cannot be production as such and the gardments cannot be sent to sewing factories/plants as usually is done. All the clothes are unique and exclusives and are made with love, so it takes so long to develop and finish them. (Have you ever tried to unstitch a hole jean? It is really a madness till you get to remove all the thread, try it.)

Because of the denim fabric and the way they are sewn, all ¡Ánimo, valiente! clothes are made to last.

❤

LA MARCA

No es posible exagerar el papel que ha tenido la vestimenta definiendo a los indiviuos y su cultura desde el origen de los tiempos. Con lo que llevamos puesto nos identificamos a nosotros mismos como parte del grupo, pero sin perder nuestra individualidad.

Todo está hecho por mí, Succubus, pieza a pieza y a mano. Esto quiere decir que no puede haber producción como tal y que las prendas no pueden ser enviadas a talleres de costura como suele hacerse habitualmente. Todas las prendas son únicas y exlusivas, y están hechas con mucho mimo, así que lleva mucho tiempo desarrollarlas y terminarlas. (¿Has tratado alguna vez de descoser un pantalón vaquero entero? Es realemte una locura hasta que consigues quitar todo el hilo, pruébalo.)

Por el tejido vaquero y la manera en la que están confeccionadas, todas las prendas de ¡Ánimo, valiente! están hechas para durar.

-------------
