story:
Our Mission

Drift Light is built on the belief that doing business and doing good are not mutually exclusive. We’ve found that we can solve complex problems by breaking them down. The issue that we’ve dedicated ourselves to is improving the lives of the nearly 600,000 men, women, and children currently homeless in the US (Source: 2015 Congressional Report on Homelessness). This number is staggering, and the problem is extraordinarily complex. So let’s start small.

We were surprised to find that socks and underwear are the most needed, yet least donated items at shelters across the US. It’s amazing that something as small as a fresh pair of underwear can have a large impact. So we set out to come up with a sustainable, scalable way to provide basic necessities to homeless shelters, and in the long-term, provide jobs to those transitioning out of homelessness. Enter Drift Light.

While in her last semester at Duke, our founder combined her experience in fashion and volunteering at homeless shelters to create a beautiful line of underwear that donates basic socks and underwear for every purchase made. In an effort to make this idea a reality, Willa entered the Duke Changeworks Startup Competition and ended up winning. The judges were excited about the concept and believed she could quickly take the concept from an idea to a reality. One year later, we’re ready to officially launch the company.


Our Game Plan

All contributions go toward two main things: fulfilling product orders and donations to shelters across the US. Our first donation events will be in Raleigh-Durham, NC, Minneapolis-St. Paul, MN, and Los Angeles, CA. We call our donation model One for Many, because we’re able to donate up to a week’s worth of basic socks and underwear for every purchase made. So when you buy one, you give many.

                     

The rest of the funds will go toward our first Drift Light purchase order. We have manufacturing lined up and are ready to start production so you can get your new favorite undies. All of our pieces are handmade in Los Angeles by family-owned shops. We are proud to use high-quality, eco-friendly materials. By using bamboo cotton, we’re able to create incredibly soft underwear from a renewable resource. Additionally, our shipping materials are selected by our Sustainability Consultant, Serena, to be both cost-effective and eco-friendly. We are committed to doing the most good.


How You Can Help

If you're ready to join us on this journey, there are many ways you can help! 

1. DONATE to our campaign by clicking "Contribute Now" on the top right of this page. 

2. PRE-ORDER pieces from our premiere collection by selecting a "Perk" from the bar on the right of this page. You can even snag a week's worth of undies at an exclusive discounted Indiegogo Perk price! Once we've hit our $20,000 goal, we'll reach out to you to confirm your size and color preference. 

3. SHARE this campaign with your friends, family, neighbors, and the cashier at the supermarket. When you're as excited as we are, you'll find it easy to tell the world!

4. FOLLOW us on Instagram @Drift_Light and LIKE us on Facebook.com/DriftLightIntimates


Drift Light Premiere Collection

When selecting your Perk, don't worry about picking a size/color/style. We'll reach out once we've reached our campaign goal to confirm your preferences. All products are available in Black or White and are made in Los Angeles with ultra-soft and eco-friendly bamboo cotton. The cotton has a generous stretch, so each style and size fits a variety of bodies.

                            


WILLA BRALETTE

Our favorite bralette is made with soft lace and adjustable straps, making it comfortable enough for everyday wear yet elegant enough to bring out your inner goddess. Available in Black and White.

     

     


WILLA UNDIE

We like to think of the Willa undie as an everyday bikini cut with a twist. With the comfort of  bamboo cotton and elegance of floral lace, these medium-coverage bikini bottoms are comfy enough to wear every day yet cool enough to Instagram. Available in Black and White.

      

     


TRUE NORTH BRALETTE

Calling all wanderers - no matter where you roam, the True North Bralette will be there to support you. Made from eco-friendly and ultra-soft bamboo cotton, this style will keep you comfy and stylish all around the world. Available in Black and White.

     

   


TRUE NORTH UNDIE

This full-coverage pair of underwear combines ultra-soft bamboo cotton with a little bit of stretch for our most comfortable bottoms yet. The criss-cross detailing on the sides keep this style modern and big-booty friendly. Available in Black and White.

   

   


 MAVEN BRALETTE

At Drift Light, we believe you can have it all. So we designed the Maven bralette to bridge the gap between our two favorite things: ultra-soft bamboo cotton and luxurious scalloped lace. Available in Black and White.

     

      


MAVEN THONG

Our Maven Thong combines the beauty of delicate lace with the practicality of a seamless bamboo cotton thong. We love this thong for its comfort, style, and ability to mix/match with any of our bralettes. Available in Black and White.

     


Maven Thong in Black not pictured but available!

FRIDAY BOXER BRIEF

Don't worry guys, we didn't forget about you! Our Friday Boxer Brief uses ultra-soft, eco-friendly bamboo cotton in a modern, boxer brief fit. We both know you need clean underwear, so skip the laundromat and order a pair (or 7...) so you can feel like it's Friday every day. Available in Black and White.

     

     


SUNDAY BOXER

Don't worry guys, we didn't forget about you! We used super-soft, eco-friendly bamboo cotton to make the most comfortable and classy boxers you've ever seen. Our boxers have a modern, relaxed style that feel like Sunday afternoons. Available in Black and White.

     

     


SIZING

All of our pieces are made with materials that stretch, so each size and style fits a variety of body shapes. Once you place your order, we’ll reach out to confirm your size and color preference.


BRALETTES - All bralettes include adjustable straps for maximum comfort. Our current bralettes are ideal for women with cup sizes between A-C, but we’re excited to start designing bralettes that are comfortable and supportive for larger cup sizes.

                           XS                 S                  M                 L                 XL

Bust Size        32 - 34          34 - 36         36 - 38          38 - 40          42 - 44


WOMEN’S UNDIES - All of our undies are made of super soft cotton that stretches, so each size and style fits a variety of body shapes. The Willa undie is a bikini cut, the True North undie is a bikini cut with a little more coverage, and the Maven Thong is a classic thong made with soft bamboo cotton that disappears under clothes.

                           XS                 S                  M                 L                 XL

Hip Size          34 - 36          36 - 38         38 - 40          40 - 42         42 - 44


MEN’S BOXERS AND BOXER BRIEFS - All of our undies are made of super soft cotton that stretches, so each size and style fits a variety of body shapes.

                                    XS                 S                  M                 L                 XL

Waist Size           26 - 28          28 - 30         32 - 34          36 - 38         40 - 42


RETURNS/EXCHANGES

We want you to love your Drift Light undies, so we’ll happily exchange any unworn bralettes. Unfortunately, due to sanitary guidelines, we cannot accept returns on underwear bottoms, so make sure to check the sizing charts above!
story_txt:
Our MissionDrift Light is built on the belief that doing business and doing good are not mutually exclusive. We’ve found that we can solve complex problems by breaking them down. The issue that we’ve dedicated ourselves to is improving the lives of the nearly 600,000 men, women, and children currently homeless in the US (Source: 2015 Congressional Report on Homelessness). This number is staggering, and the problem is extraordinarily complex. So let’s start small.We were surprised to find that socks and underwear are the most needed, yet least donated items at shelters across the US. It’s amazing that something as small as a fresh pair of underwear can have a large impact. So we set out to come up with a sustainable, scalable way to provide basic necessities to homeless shelters, and in the long-term, provide jobs to those transitioning out of homelessness. Enter Drift Light.While in her last semester at Duke, our founder combined her experience in fashion and volunteering at homeless shelters to create a beautiful line of underwear that donates basic socks and underwear for every purchase made. In an effort to make this idea a reality, Willa entered the Duke Changeworks Startup Competition and ended up winning. The judges were excited about the concept and believed she could quickly take the concept from an idea to a reality. One year later, we’re ready to officially launch the company.Our Game PlanAll contributions go toward two main things: fulfilling product orders and donations to shelters across the US. Our first donation events will be in Raleigh-Durham, NC, Minneapolis-St. Paul, MN, and Los Angeles, CA. We call our donation model One for Many, because we’re able to donate up to a week’s worth of basic socks and underwear for every purchase made. So when you buy one, you give many.                      The rest of the funds will go toward our first Drift Light purchase order. We have manufacturing lined up and are ready to start production so you can get your new favorite undies. All of our pieces are handmade in Los Angeles by family-owned shops. We are proud to use high-quality, eco-friendly materials. By using bamboo cotton, we’re able to create incredibly soft underwear from a renewable resource. Additionally, our shipping materials are selected by our Sustainability Consultant, Serena, to be both cost-effective and eco-friendly. We are committed to doing the most good.How You Can HelpIf you're ready to join us on this journey, there are many ways you can help! 
1. DONATE to our campaign by clicking "Contribute Now" on the top right of this page. 
2. PRE-ORDER pieces from our premiere collection by selecting a "Perk" from the bar on the right of this page. You can even snag a week's worth of undies at an exclusive discounted Indiegogo Perk price! Once we've hit our $20,000 goal, we'll reach out to you to confirm your size and color preference. 
3. SHARE this campaign with your friends, family, neighbors, and the cashier at the supermarket. When you're as excited as we are, you'll find it easy to tell the world!
4. FOLLOW us on Instagram @Drift_Light and LIKE us on Facebook.com/DriftLightIntimates

 
Drift Light Premiere Collection
When selecting your Perk, don't worry about picking a size/color/style. We'll reach out once we've reached our campaign goal to confirm your preferences. All products are available in Black or White and are made in Los Angeles with ultra-soft and eco-friendly bamboo cotton. The cotton has a generous stretch, so each style and size fits a variety of bodies. 

                            

WILLA BRALETTE
Our favorite bralette is made with soft lace and adjustable straps, making it comfortable enough for everyday wear yet elegant enough to bring out your inner goddess. Available in Black and White.



     


      


WILLA UNDIE
We like to think of the Willa undie as an everyday bikini cut with a twist. With the comfort of  bamboo cotton and elegance of floral lace, these medium-coverage bikini bottoms are comfy enough to wear every day yet cool enough to Instagram. Available in Black and White.


      


     


TRUE NORTH BRALETTE
Calling all wanderers - no matter where you roam, the True North Bralette will be there to support you. Made from eco-friendly and ultra-soft bamboo cotton, this style will keep you comfy and stylish all around the world. Available in Black and White.



     

    



TRUE NORTH UNDIE


This full-coverage pair of underwear combines ultra-soft bamboo cotton with a little bit of stretch for our most comfortable bottoms yet. The criss-cross detailing on the sides keep this style modern and big-booty friendly. Available in Black and White.


    

    


 MAVEN BRALETTE
At Drift Light, we believe you can have it all. So we designed the Maven bralette to bridge the gap between our two favorite things: ultra-soft bamboo cotton and luxurious scalloped lace. Available in Black and White.



     


      



MAVEN THONG
Our Maven Thong combines the beauty of delicate lace with the practicality of a seamless bamboo cotton thong. We love this thong for its comfort, style, and ability to mix/match with any of our bralettes. Available in Black and White.


     


Maven Thong in Black not pictured but available!


FRIDAY BOXER BRIEF
Don't worry guys, we didn't forget about you! Our Friday Boxer Brief uses ultra-soft, eco-friendly bamboo cotton in a modern, boxer brief fit. We both know you need clean underwear, so skip the laundromat and order a pair (or 7...) so you can feel like it's Friday every day. Available in Black and White.





     


     


SUNDAY BOXER

Don't worry guys, we didn't forget about you! We used super-soft, eco-friendly bamboo cotton to make the most comfortable and classy boxers you've ever seen. Our boxers have a modern, relaxed style that feel like Sunday afternoons. Available in Black and White.




     


     


SIZING
All of our pieces are made with materials that stretch, so each size and style fits a variety of body shapes. Once you place your order, we’ll reach out to confirm your size and color preference. 
BRALETTES - All bralettes include adjustable straps for maximum comfort. Our current bralettes are ideal for women with cup sizes between A-C, but we’re excited to start designing bralettes that are comfortable and supportive for larger cup sizes.

                           XS                 S                  M                 L                 XL
Bust Size        32 - 34          34 - 36         36 - 38          38 - 40          42 - 44
WOMEN’S UNDIES - All of our undies are made of super soft cotton that stretches, so each size and style fits a variety of body shapes. The Willa undie is a bikini cut, the True North undie is a bikini cut with a little more coverage, and the Maven Thong is a classic thong made with soft bamboo cotton that disappears under clothes.

                           XS                 S                  M                 L                 XL
Hip Size          34 - 36          36 - 38         38 - 40          40 - 42         42 - 44

MEN’S BOXERS AND BOXER BRIEFS - All of our undies are made of super soft cotton that stretches, so each size and style fits a variety of body shapes.
                                    XS                 S                  M                 L                 XL
Waist Size           26 - 28          28 - 30         32 - 34          36 - 38         40 - 42

We want you to love your Drift Light undies, so we’ll happily exchange any unworn bralettes. Unfortunately, due to sanitary guidelines, we cannot accept returns on underwear bottoms, so make sure to check the sizing charts above!

story:
We would like to produce a collection of scarves, which features predators inspired by the wild. Each backer will receive a silk scarf of their design choice.

The designs, which include a raven, leopard, crocodile and an octopus, were created by the print designer Alina Zamanova, and have been created in line with the personalities of Harper and Blake.

Here’s a sample of one of the scarves with the raven print:

The material dimensions of the scarves are 140 x 140cm. This large flow of material gives an endless versatility of how the scarves can be worn, from wrapping elegantly around the neckline to tying around the waist as a skirt for a more designer appeal.

The sample you see above has been made from light crepe de chine silk, which is very light and delicate but we may use either wool/silk or modal/cashmere blend which are perfect for the winter months.

We have made 8 samples in total, one scarf of each design.

QUALITY

Quality is very important to us and for this reason we have carefully selected the manufacturer to produce the scarves. The factory we have chosen has a long heritage and expertise in producing luxury scarves at the highest standards and produce scarves for many of the high-end fashion brands in Europe. The scarves will be made with only the finest silk material, giving it a luxurious decadence and feather light feel.

WHY INDIEGOGO?

There are a few reasons why we're using Indiegogo for this project and one is that it's a great way to get feedback on the scarves, and see if people out there like them.

The second reason is to raise the funds needed to produce the scarves you see below and we're hoping that enough of you will like the scarves and pre-order yours.

THE DESIGNS AND REWARDS

You can choose any design for the scarves.

The rewards will cover the cost of the silk fabric, printing costs, hemming and shipping costs.

Here are the design options:

Harper's Raven


Harper's Leopard


Harper's Crocodile


Harper's Octopus


Blake's Raven


Blake's Leopard


Blake's Crocodile


Blake's Octopus


Thank you and consider sharing our campaign.

story:
Have you ever rushed into a retail store but found it hard to pick a suitable garment for yourself?

Believe it, ClothesMake is here to solve all the problems !

WEAR WHAT YOU DESIGNED

ClothesMake believes everyone has unique imagination and always seeks a way to present it. Therefore we provide an opportunity for you to be your own fashion designer.  

Engaging you in the entire designing process to make your design to reality and be one of a kind. You will find constant improvement and innovation on our multi-functional customization system.

 

First of all, what is ClothesMake?

Simply speaking, ClothesMake is a garment customization platform on which you get access to various fabrics and style selections, flexible personal customized options, more reasonable price, better handcraft assurance, efficient manufacture and expedite delivery.

You will be able to select the style, color, button, details fully following your personal taste. Our experienced tailors manufacture your item for you in accordance with your body measurement. 

​

  • ​Personalized dressing advice 

ClothesMake is committed to offering personalized dressing advice and customization service according to your unique needs. Our professional fashion coordinators who delve into Men's fashion field will deliver trendy style tips and render personalized dressing advice to you. We know that all you want is just a small fraction of suits that fit well in your professional role and some particular occasions. 

With us, you can get professional suggestions about how to select the appropriate outfit for any event.

  • Visualization design system

On our Website, you will be able to experience a smart design and visualization system. It will not only clearly list production descriptions but also visualize a display of the products for your ease to feel and understand your design.

 

 

 

 

 

Why Choose ClothesMake-Our Specialization

 

  • Experienced tailors with expert handcraft 

You are the designer of your own suits and shirts, in order to highlight your personality and elegance, we integrate your size, preference and creative design into manufacture. Connect your selection and tailor’s craftsmanship to make a unique masterpiece.

After we receiving your order, your selection of design, fabric, detail, will be evaluated and organized by our experienced tailors.

Fabric cutting is based on your requirements and the garment features. To avoid the error when cutting, our tailors will mark on the fabric and undergo hand-cutting.

We manufacture garment based on original Italian design with intelligent manufacturing technology. Eventually, it will be completed through sophisticated sewing process with superior handcraft of our skilled tailors who have more than 15 years tailoring experience in average.

 

  • Fabric quality

ClothesMake selects fine quality dense woven fabric. The fabric offers soft, tactile feel, and also gives the suits constructive shapes. With the saturated color as well as trendy texture, the garment guarantees an unparalleled chic look.

  • Perfect Fit Guarantee

We are fully aware of the importance of perfect fitting. All our suits and shirts are hand-made with highest standard. However if there is any problem with the items, we offer Perfect Fit Guarantee to compensate for.

  • Quality Inspection 

Every piece of clothing that customized on the ClothesMake platform will be processed under strict quality inspection procedures before delivery.

Components Examination. Tailors check all fabric, pockets, cuffs, vents, colors, buttons, lapels are corresponding with your requirements.

Structure Review. Tailors check the size matches your measurement profile, also confirm the outlines and sewing threads are flawless.

General Inspection. Our packing department reconfirm that every detail of the clothes is correct and pack products carefully.

Pre-shipping. After finishing up the final packaging, an overall quality inspection will be carried out for the purpose of 100% customer satisfaction.

  • Packing & Delivery

Our garment cover, which is waterproof and crease resistant, is exclusively designed and manufactured for you. Even if it may undergoes a long trip until it gets to you, we made sure it maintains the perfect shape when delivered.

Packing, as an well-designed process, is completed by a specialized team. Every garment from ClothesMake will be carefully folded, covered and packed ensuring that it is sending as an exquisite gift to please you when you open it.

The garment cover will then be packed into our exclusively designed delivery boxes to prevent it from humidity and damage during the long trip.

All orders are shipped via one of the fastest express companies: UPS Worldwide Express. Your made-to-order garment will be delivered right to your door within 15 business days from the date of payment.

RULE BREAKER OF FASHION INDUSTRY

Our price does not include any extravagance retail mark-up or store overhead. Therefore, we can distribute more earnings to tailors so as to motivate the 120% dedication making your garments.

As a result we offer more discount to you to maintain an affordable price as well as an incredibly excellent customization experience. 

                                        Our Policies

  • Return

Because each one of our garments is custom made specifically for you, we cannot offer full refunds. However, we are 100% committed to working with you until you are fully satisfied.

    • Alterations

    You may take the item to a local tailor if it only needs a minor adjustment. We will reimburse the expense up to $50. 

    • Compensation

    If against all odds, our product is not as perfect as what you expected but you still choose to keep it, you are illegible to apply for a discount which can be used for next order.

                             Frequent Asked Questions (FAQ)

     

    • How do I use this voucher(s) on your website?

    As soon as you get the perk(s), you will receive an email listing all the information you will need to know about how to use the voucher. Please notice that the voucher gives you the privilege to waive all the additional fees of the fabric substituition. The voucher is valid through Dec. 31, 2018. 

    • How soon will I receive my order?

    ClothesMake garment are made-to-order and will be delivered right to your door within 15 business days. However if we need to contact you regarding any measurement or query this will add to the delay.

    • Which countries does ClothesMake ship to?

    Currently we ship worldwide except countries in South America, Middle Eastern or Africa. But we would extend our service range to other countries soon.

    All orders are shipped via express air with UPS.

    • How do I submit my own measurement?

    Here at ClothesMake, our method of measuring is quite unique to our process, so please be sure to follow our Measurement Guide  as closely as possible. Our level of accuracy is directly related to the information you provide and the measurements you submit. Please understand that while we cannot be held liable for personal measurement errors, we remain committed to all of our customers and will always offer to share in the cost of a remake, if one is requested.

    • Do I need a Tailor to take my Measurements?

    We know that getting your own measurements taken may seem daunting, but with the help of a friend and our measurement guide videos, it’s actually quite easy and fun. So, there’s no need to get measured at a professional tailor. Furthermore, we review every customer’s measurements thoroughly to ensure that nothing seems off. If something does, we’ll reach out and ask you to re-measure particular areas. No matter what, we’ve got you covered.

    • How can I contact ClothesMake and what is your turn around time?

    You can use our online live chat system to contact us for urgent request. Or you can send email to service@clothesmake.com. ClothesMake customer service representatives are committed to respond via email within 24-48 hours on weekdays.

story:
URBNFEET are made using a Specially Treated Fabric

The whole idea behind URBNFEET is to provide a long lasting solution to a very common problem faced world wide alike. 

In our quest to solve this problem, after almost a year's hard work involving several hit & trails, we developed a fabric that could repel almost any liquid and still withstood the passage of time without any damage to it. 

 

URBNFEET have Shoes for All Occasions. Aptly the Go-To Shoes.

We then went onto carefully developing the categories and range that could make URBNFEET the go-to shoes for every occasion, for everyone. 

URBNFEET are the epitome of Craftsmanship as they bring together Science, Comfort and Style, making them the Most Desirable Shoes. 

 

Finally a Solution to the most common Problem : URBNFEET

Spilling a beverage while at college, Wine being spilled while at parties or just spilling Tea/Coffee while at work, 

All of this will never be a concern again with URBNFEET at Your FEET. 

 

PRODUCT CATALOGUE

 

Men's Slip-ons

 

Men's Sneakers

 

Men's Semi-formals

 

Women's Slip-ons

 

Women's Sneakers

 

Women's Semi-formals

 

 

 

SIZE GUIDE

Note: For Any Different Size , Kindly get in touch with us. Happy to Help!

 

To bring this all come to Life, we need Your Help. We need Your Love and Support. We urge you all to contribute and give us a chance to serve you. 

 

 

 
 

Spill-free. Dirt-free. Truly, Zero Maintenance!

 

Let it flow. Let it flow. Truly Dry.

 

CO-FOUNDERS

story:
We have developed a new and improved version of the TOM Backpack after successfully funding and delivering the original version via Kickstarter. 

This is the most versatile backpack every produced. 

 

When we came out with the TOM Backpack, we knew we had a winner on our hands. People took to this travel accessory immediately, recognizing it as a means to conveniently carry everything you could possibly need on all future journeys. After all, travel is most enjoyable when it is worry-free: with the TOM Backpack, you don’t need to leave behind anything, so you can finally relax and take in the world around you.

 

 

 

Total volume of the bag before expansion is 26 Liters.  When expanded the volume increase to 33 Liters.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Total Weight of the bag without accessory attachment is 3.6 Lbs.  With the shoe bag it is 4.2 lbs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Once again we are turning to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $5000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the TOM Backpack Version 2. As a thank-you, contributors will receive the backpack itself.

Risks & Challenges

We were confident the first time around, but having actually delivered the TOM Backpack successfully once already, we know that we can pull this off without a hitch. Our manufacturing and distribution partners are ready to move forward with our prototype as soon as we hit our funding goals, so we will have no problem hitting any of our deadlines and getting you the TOM Backpack Version 2 in time for your planned holiday. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing this campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and any other social media platforms you may use. The more people know about the TOM Backpack Version 2, the better. We want adventurous people in particular to be aware that this backpack is out there.

All contributions are greatly appreciated, and we thank you sincerely for your time and support.

People took to this travel accessory immediately, recognizing it as a means to conveniently carry everything you could possibly need on all future journeys. After all, travel is most enjoyable when it is worry-free: with the TOM Backpack, you don’t need to leave behind anything, so you can finally relax and take in the world around you.   Total volume of the bag before expansion is 26 Liters.  When expanded the volume increase to 33 Liters.         Total Weight of the bag without accessory attachment is 3.6 Lbs.  With the shoe bag it is 4.2 lbs.               What We Need & What You GetOnce again we are turning to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $5000. story:
Add more dimensions to your day and personality!

Multi Face Dress: it's a simple dress that you could wear in 4 different ways by adding and changing its fronts. You save time, space and money, having four different looks, and you could change them everywhere you want to. So just choose your favorite front, attach it on your dress in a few minutes and go!

Become a part of the projects and help us revolutionise women's everyday fashion lifestyle.

How does it work? Just see our Dressing guide video below.

 

Our Brand

D-SIGN Returnity - designed for the contemporary woman, always busy but attentive to her image, shrewd in choosing her wardrobe that believes in the quality of the garments, and appreciates the aesthetic refinement. Because fashion for us is in constant motion.

In any proposal the ‘casual’ look combine itself to the ‘chic’ one and the ‘easy’ coexists with ‘sophisticated’’, allowing the development of multiple solutions to wear even at different times of the same day. 

D-SIGN Returnity thus becomes the expression of a style revolution that doesn’t stay in only one dimension, but it is in constant change. 

Let's RE-TURN together!

Here's the D-Sign Collection's TEAM!

The designer: Diana Vassileva

After completing my studies at the European Institute of Design in Milan, I started working in the style office of a Bergamo manufacturer, where I had the opportunity to collaborate with several important brands, and I participated in the creation and affirmation of the corporate brand. 
As I was raising my technical and creative skills, I found out my growing need to experiment and to adapt the same garment to the many daily needs. I started building the whole idea, sketch by sketch. After making a few prototypes, I was surprised of how functional were they and how comfort and creativity were placed in the same piece of garment! Then I've patented this project and the journey began!

And here I am! This is one of my transformable styles, and it belongs to the latest Spring- Summer collection: it's a simple dress that you could wear in 4 different ways by adding and changing its fronts. You save time, space and money, having four different looks, and you could change them everywhere you want to. 

The dress has two hidden zips and a couple of press buttons, so you can choose your favorite front, attach it on your dress in a few minutes and go! The dress and the fronts are made of high quality, non-folding materials, produced in Europe, with a great attention for the detail. 

For us 'transformation' is freedom: being everywhere as you want, following your own comfort without sacrificing style: infact we have already developed the next spring/summer and fall/winter transformable collections, and they are just waiting to be produced and marketed... and that is where you can help. 

The funds raised in this campaign will be used for the production of the next collection and for its advertising. Become a part of the projects and help us revolutionise women's everyday fashion lifestyle!

 

Risks & Challenges

The Multi Face Dress is a part of the second spring/summer collection and for the first time we present this idea of transformable garments out of Italy. 
We've already tested the techniques, the fabrics and the comfort of this product and we work with a very professional team of seamstresses and pattern constructors, with our partners in the European Union, that has been operating for long years in the international market. 

Our challenge is to affirm the idea that every woman is special and free to choose and change. Bringing to life the entire transformable collection with different styles and accessories, we'll give our customers the 'instruments' to create their own look. 

Alter the Indiegogo's sales campaign, as every production, we'll order immediately the materials we need to produce the dresses. We will keep you informed about every step of the production: fabric arrivals, zips and buttons, cut and seam. You'll be able to see our work in progress by life photo and short videos, here on Indiegogo. In this way you'll be informed for any modifications regarding the product and the estimated delivery date. 
ORDERS: To do the order of the Multi Face Dress, you should choose the color of the basic dress, and the kind of front you most like. To do this, just check up our sizing chart and our color/front proposal above. After the campaign we'll contact you to establish the missing information regarding the front you've chosen. We'll send you by e-mail a summary sketch of the combination you've ordered. 
COLORS: As the project is in a digital support, there could be differences between the color in the photo and the real one. 
MATERIALS: the materials we use are very suitable for summer as do not sweat, they are high-quality, made of viscoses, mixed with silk and polyester. This mixture guarantees that the dress and the fronts will not be creased while worn or during the transportation. 
RETURNS: we will not be able to do returns, as most Indiegogo campaigns.

story:
Our Journey

May we start by saying thank you for your interest in URSA Timepieces. Even reading our Indiegogo campaign is the first step in supporting our journey and if it pushes you to spread the word about our timepieces, even better!

 

URSA Timepieces

Our sole purpose is to provide watch lovers with quality Swiss Made watches at an affordable price. We are based in the United States but our watches are Swiss-made and expertly crafted with a high quality finish. Our watch manufacturer has been in business since 1981 so rest assured you're getting quality made watches at an affordable price. 

 

Swiss Made vs. Swiss Movement

Don't be fooled by watches that say Swiss Movement on them as it's not the same as Swiss Made.

Throughout the world the reputation of Swiss made watches is unrivaled. Know-how, impeccable quality, aesthetic prowess, technical innovation: the indication Swiss made reflects all this, and much more. Two words which, combined with renowned brands, guarantee the best choice for the consumer in search of a high value timepiece.

A Swiss Made watch bears the mark "Swiss Made" that sets them aside from others. It is a symbol of the product’s authenticity. In order for a watch to bear the "Swiss Made" symbol, the manufacturer of watches has to make sure they follow the standards defined by the Swiss law. This means the movement is cased up in Switzerland, the movement is Swiss, the manufacturer carries out the final quality control inspection in Switzerland.

A Swiss Movement watch only has Swiss mechanism but the rest of the watch manufacturing and inspection is done in other countries like China. 

 

Production

From the first design of a watch to the finished product, all production steps are executed and monitored in the beautiful town of Solothurn. The manufacturing all of our watches is done according to the official Swiss Made regulations – a label which stands for high quality craftsmanship, technical know-how, innovation and competence, as well as aesthetic values.

 

Watch Lovers

We understand that Indiegogo is bombarded with revolutionary concepts, and ours isn’t anything like that, but by funding our campaign you are allowing watch lovers and collectors to own luxurious Swiss Made watches without the outrageous price tag.

When you take into consideration just how many of our competitors demand between $500 and $10,000 for a well-made Swiss watch, it’s only then you realize just how special this project could be. We hope you see that with this campaign and choose to support our journey.

With a successful campaign we will offer you with the first initial styles with more styles and colors coming in the future. The more the campaign raises the more styles we can produce. Sounds good, right?

 

The Collection

Three fantastic styles are included in our start up collection and can be found below. All of our watches come with a 2 year manufacturers warranty.

Style 1: The Racer's Chronograph Watch

Product Features:

________________________________________________________________________________________

DESIGN

Made from a 42.5mm stainless steel case, black dial and brown leather strap, this watch offers a stylish chronograph sure to be a conversation starter.  Its pro-level chronograph makes this piece much more than a pretty face. This watch offers an easy to read bezel. 

________________________________________________________________________________________

MOVEMENT

Swiss Made RONDA 5040.D Quartz 

________________________________________________________________________________________

DURABILITY 

Water-resistant up to 100 M. Glass made from K1 mineral with sapphire coating. 

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Style 2: The Aviator's Chronograph Watch

Product Features:

________________________________________________________________________________________

DESIGN

With a 48mm case the dial can be easily seen under the most demanding conditions.  Made from a stainless steel case, black dial and black leather strap with red stitching, this watch stands out no matter where you wear it.  Its pro-level chronograph makes this piece much more than a pretty face. This watch offers an easy to read date indication as well as retrograde day indication.

________________________________________________________________________________________

MOVEMENT

Swiss Made Ronda 8040.NQuartz 

________________________________________________________________________________________

DURABILITY 

Water-resistant up to 100 M. Glass made with a mineral crystal. 

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Style 3:  Gentleman's Classic Automatic Watch

Product Features:

________________________________________________________________________________________

DESIGN

Made from a 42mm Stainless Steel Black PVD plated case, dark green dial and dark brown leather strap, this watch offers a stylish classic look that will look great during any formal event or business meeting.  With a 25 jewel automatic self-winding design this piece offers battery-free use with a power reserve of up to 40 hours. 

________________________________________________________________________________________

MOVEMENT

Swiss Made RONDA R150 Automatic

________________________________________________________________________________________

DURABILITY 

Water-resistant up to 100 M with a scratch resistant Sapphire glass. 

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

    Risks & Challenges

    We value transparency and that’s the way we’ll always do business. So, with that said, it’s important to point out the biggest challenges we face as we proceed with this project. We understand bumps along the way are inevitable, but our first of those big bumps may just be that we don’t meet our initial funding goal, meaning we can’t provide all the timepieces you see in this campaign.

    If all else fails, we will still go ahead with the Gentleman’s Classic Automatic Watch and that will ship out to all those who choose that perk. That said, we hope this campaign proves to be a huge success and we can fulfill all pledges, no matter the timepiece chosen!

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand that sometimes you're not able to contribute financially but still want to help us out. Here are some ways you can help us by spreading the word.

    • Share on social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, etc.)
    • Share it through text or messenger to any watch lover you know

story:
I'm Allison Aniskina. I'm a 26 year old knitwear designer from New York, temporarily residing in Moscow. I am a creative by nature, and making a positive impact on the world is what drives me the most. Today, it’s up to creatives to think of ingenious ways to make the planet a better place.

Global fashion is in need of reform more than ever, for though it has a crippling impact on the environment, consumers - by default or circumstance - follow the pattern of buying endlessly. Our pace of life is getting faster. We are on call 24 hours a day, and as a result, some of us forget to focus on our mental health. The digital age is costing children important life skills. A big chunk of the first generation growing up in an “always on” world is suffering unforeseen consequences. 

I've been accepted onto an MA program in Fashion Entrepreneurship and Innovation. My mission at LCF would be to figure out a way to challenge these issues through one of the only ways we lift our heads to pay attention - fashion.

    My vision, with the help of this program, is to create a sustainable unisex brand that encourages people to assess their own behavior through interactive and positive messaging on sweaters and accessories.

Knitwear being the most sustainable form of fashion, People! would be the 'nudging knitwear brand' that inspires people to bring their own carrier bags to shops, helps someone in distress step back and take a minute to breathe, or perhaps provokes a busy parent to occupy their child with a wearable object that benefits their motor skills instead of handing them a magic screen. 

As you will be funding an idea, not just a postgraduate course, I'm offering never-before-seen garments and accessories to my backers. Many of them are displayed in digital form because I simply do not have time to wait for samples to arrive. I've represented them as realistically as possible, so don't worry about receiving an olive sweatshirt with a cucumber on it.

 

​     

  • Tote / Goodie 2 Many Tees: What better way to combat plastic pollution, than to save these jersey tees from hitting trash bins and landfills.

    • Made from upcycled t-shirts that are then naturally dyed with indigo.

 

  • Single Earring / G-Zen Master: Dump chaos and if you can't remember to take a minute to breathe, at the very least this earring will do you, your friends, or a random stranger a favor.

    • Made from silver, silver plated brass and silver posts.

 

 

​           

  • T-Shirt / Extra Extra Awareness: Remind yourself and others of the grim reality of plastic pollution. It remains to be one of the biggest problems facing the world’s seas, climate change, and human-made chemical pollution. Let's start changing our habits.

    • ​Made from 100% organic Indian cotton in manufacturing facilities powered by green renewable energy. Sizes will be collected at the end of the campaign.

    • Available in Ecru. Unisex fit. Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL

 

 

  • Sweatshirt / Plastic Repeller: You've made your rounds of cocktails with friends, when you reach your arm out to return the menus, look at the forearm of your sweatshirt and remember. "By the way, could you please exclude all straws from the drinks we've ordered."

    • Made from 100% organic Indian cotton in manufacturing facilities powered by green renewable energy.

    • Available in White. Unisex fit. Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL

 

​

  • Scarf / Single Usuffocated Future: In case somebody comes up to you and asks about what plastic is doing to the planet, you just unravel the scarf, then gently wrap it around your neck, and explain to them that is everyone's metaphorical future.

    • ​Made from 100% Baby Alpaca.

    • Available in Medium Gray & Dusty Blue.

    • Hand spun by a small group of artisan in the Marcapata region in the Andes mountains, Peru in a direct cooperation without middlemen. 

 

 

​

The total sum of the program is £19,930. UAL has amazingly offered a £5,000 tuition fee waiver, but that still leaves me with £14,930. The funds I raise are vital, furthermore, to proving to the UK Student Visa authorities that I have the financial support necessary to complete my degree. I'm hoping to raise the full amount, but if I raise less than 50%, I will refund the money. Whatever money I raise over 50% will go to the initial payment required at enrollment. 

 

  • DONATE: If you can, donate whatever you can. 
    • A dollar or coffee's worth will go a long way. If 1,000 people donate at least $5, the finish line won't be as scary.
    • To make things more exciting, I'm offering a raffle in the "Surprise Gift" reward! Those backers will have a chance to win the Plastic Repeller sweatshirt.  
  • SHARE, SHARE, SHARE: Your colleagues, your family your annoying neighbors, your lovers, your dusty Linkedin profile, through your pets' instagrams.
  • EMAIL: Slip into people's inboxes and create the gift that will continue giving: shares!

 

  • If you're unable to donate, you can still help just as much!

  

  • There should be no problems with my current manufacturers. They are on standby and ready to start producing as soon as the campaign ends in mid-August.
  • Come rain, -20 C weather, or alien abduction, I promise to get the rewards to your doorstep.

 

     

A big thank you to: Lazlo Barclay, Jacqueline O'Kane, Mila Yurist, and Oscar for making the campaign video possible. 

 

 

“The Paradoxical Commandments" 

People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered.
Love them anyway.

If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives.
Do good anyway.

If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies.
Succeed anyway.

The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow.
Do good anyway.

Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable.
Be honest and frank anyway.

The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds.
Think big anyway.

People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs.
Fight for a few underdogs anyway.

What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight.
Build anyway.

People really need help but may attack you if you do help them.
Help people anyway.

Give the world the best you have and you’ll get kicked in the teeth.
Give the world the best you have anyway.”

― Kent M. Keith

Made from silver, silver plated brass and silver posts.

 
 
​           

T-Shirt / Extra Extra Awareness: Remind yourself and others of the grim reality of plastic pollution. It remains to be one of the biggest problems facing the world’s seas, climate change, and human-made chemical pollution. Let's start changing our habits.

​Made from 100% organic Indian cotton in manufacturing facilities powered by green renewable energy. Sizes will be collected at the end of the campaign.
Available in Ecru. Unisex fit. Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL, 4XL


 
 



Sweatshirt / Plastic Repeller: You've made your rounds of cocktails with friends, when you reach your arm out to return the menus, look at the forearm of your sweatshirt and remember. "By the way, could you please exclude all straws from the drinks we've ordered."

Made from 100% organic Indian cotton in manufacturing facilities powered by green renewable energy.
Available in White. Unisex fit. Sizes: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL


 
​

Scarf / Single Usuffocated Future: In case somebody comes up to you and asks about what plastic is doing to the planet, you just unravel the scarf, then gently wrap it around your neck, and explain to them that is everyone's metaphorical future.

​Made from 100% Baby Alpaca.
Available in Medium Gray & Dusty Blue.
Hand spun by a small group of artisan in the Marcapata region in the Andes mountains, Peru in a direct cooperation without middlemen. 


 
 
​
The total sum of the program is £19,930. UAL has amazingly offered a £5,000 tuition fee waiver, but that still leaves me with £14,930. The funds I raise are vital, furthermore, to proving to the UK Student Visa authorities that I have the financial support necessary to complete my degree. I'm hoping to raise the full amount, but if I raise less than 50%, I will refund the money. Whatever money I raise over 50% will go to the initial payment required at enrollment. 
 



DONATE: If you can, donate whatever you can. 
A dollar or coffee's worth will go a long way. If 1,000 people donate at least $5, the finish line won't be as scary.
To make things more exciting, I'm offering a raffle in the "Surprise Gift" reward! Those backers will have a chance to win the Plastic Repeller sweatshirt.  



SHARE, SHARE, SHARE: Your colleagues, your family your annoying neighbors, your lovers, your dusty Linkedin profile, through your pets' instagrams.

EMAIL: Slip into people's inboxes and create the gift that will continue giving: shares!

 
If you're unable to donate, you can still help just as much!

  


There should be no problems with my current manufacturers. They are on standby and ready to start producing as soon as the campaign ends in mid-August.
Come rain, -20 C weather, or alien abduction, I promise to get the rewards to your doorstep.

 
     
A big thank you to: Lazlo Barclay, Jacqueline O'Kane, Mila Yurist, and Oscar for making the campaign video possible. 
 

 
“The Paradoxical Commandments" People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered.Love them anyway.If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives.Do good anyway.If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies.Succeed anyway.The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow.Do good anyway.Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable.Be honest and frank anyway.The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds.Think big anyway.People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs.Fight for a few underdogs anyway.What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight.Build anyway.People really need help but may attack you if you do help them.Help people anyway.Give the world the best you have and you’ll get kicked in the teeth.Give the world the best you have anyway.”
― Kent M. Keith

story:
Summary

Hi! My name is Deshanta. I've always been into creative, expressive stuff. It didn't matter what it was... movies, writing, music, dancing or singing, I was all about it.  I've worked in different aspects of the entertainment industry absorbing everything so that one day I could produce my own content. That time is now! Introducing "Sick Like Mines" Totem Series 1.

Nature is something else that fills so many with peace and happiness. At the same time I feel that aren't given the love and respect that they should. That's when I came up with the idea of creating tee shirts that represents the spirit of the many creatures that are a part of this world. Get on this ride of unity and self discovery through creation. Introducing "Sick Like Mines" Totem Series 1

It took some time but I found an artist who understood my vision. I love the interpretations of the photos I presented to Sydney Height. She is an amazing talent. For series 2, I wanna find another artist who will bring their version of "Sick" to the forefront. 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET
My Goal is $6000. After taking a Social Media training program, I realized how essential it is to have that type of presence for different reasons. 1. potential customers 2. networking 3. advertising and 4. staying relevant. With me juggling so many aspects of my business I acknowledge I need a social media manager. One who understands this vision. I still plan on  interacting with everyone though whenever I can. I wanna hear your stories about your favorite totems.
We got some really cool perks that we offer. There's Sick Like Mines logo tees, postcards, magnets, and buttons. The Totem Series 1 which include Wolf, Crow, Angler Fish, Snake, Dragonfly and Poison Dart Frog are so popular, I've decided to add them as postcards as well.
Whatever is earned will still be invested in Sick Like Mines. I also want to continue doing Comic Cons which are all over the country at different times of year, I need a new lap top, I could buy more inventory, etc. There are different business related things I could invest the funds in.

THE IMPACT
I am very proud of my project. It's my way of being the reflection that I want to see in the world while collaborating with like minded individuals. Sick Like Mines will give various creatives a platform to shine.  I wanna keep finding artists who will bring their version of "Sick" to the forefront and so on and so and so. This never has to end. We can keep healing while supporting one another. When I've earned enough, I'll start producing films and documentaries. I'll continue creating platforms so that messages are received for more people to relate to.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
I would LOVE, LOVE, LOVE and APPRECIATE if you would  contribute or share with friends. Spread the word however you can. You can also use Indiegogo's share tools!  I believe in my company. My heart, soul, sweat and tears has been invested since the inception of Sick Like Mines. Thanks for all the love and support.

story:
Short Summary

Hey there! We’re Alegra and Sabrina, your favorite animal-loving, queer couple, and we have a dream to make something that is 100% ours and 100% something we’re proud of!

In early 2019, we decided to create our own clothing line (crazy right?) that highlights our love of animals, puns, and being incredibly stylish. What’s our plan for the future? Good question! We don’t have it all quite figured out yet, but what we do know is that working on this has made us incredibly happy and we’re excited to continue moving forward!

Every design you’ll see us put out is drawn and designed by Alegra (she’s a really incredible artist isn’t she?) Alegra has been vegan for about two years now and has participated in a number of rallies, conventions, and even created her own documentary called "Animal Harm" that exposes the horrors of the animal industry.

Every design is printed on 100% pre-shrunken hard cotton T-shirts from Panther Printing in Patterson, NJ. We have shirt sizes ranging from unisex XS to XL and each tee has a pocket with the Cadaver Dog logo embroidered on the front.

5% of each sale WILL be donated to our favorite organization, Skylands Animal Sanctuary And Rescue. They do incredible work rescuing and caring for a variety of animals and allowing them to live their best, FULL lives on acres of beautiful farmland.

 

If you haven't stopped reading yet, THANK YOU for your time! Any support aside from our mothers will mean a heck of a lot.

And if you like what you see, don’t forget to visit our website, follow us on Instagram, Twitter, and like us on Facebook! 

The Impact

Alegra here! Starting a clothing line supporting an animal-welfare cause has been a dream of mine for years. I'm a proud vegan who believes one person can make a difference. With your help, you're making a difference in not only our lives, but in the lives of hundreds of animals. When you buy one of our shirts, you're sending the message that compassion and kindness matters.

  • 5% of each sale will be donated to Skylands Animal Sanctuary & Rescue. They are a wonderful sanctuary run by Mike Stura in Wantage, NJ. They often hold tours where you can visit the pigs, cows, chickens, turkeys, and goats that were rescued from slaughterhouses, religious ceremonies, live markets, abandonment, farms, neglect, and abuse.
    • Learn more by visiting their website: https://skylandssanctuary.org/
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this on Facebook, Twitter, word of mouth, and to anybody you think would be interested in our business. 

We appreciate all the support we can get!

story:
IMBA INC. presents IMBA Rockwatch!

IMBA ROCKWATCH is made of high-performance flour elastic material

BUT...

1000 first Indiegogo contributors get metal strap!

We can talk for a long time about the high-definition display that demonstrates amazing visual experience

 

Have you ever dreamed to became waterproof ?

IMBA did it.

Weather, altitude, air pressure, and ultraviolet light. The Environment reports on your hand.

IMBA INC. supports any kind of sport activity.

IMBA Rockwatch cares about your heart.

IMBA Rockwatch cares about you at all. It would be your personal assistant, sleep monitor, sedentary and drinking reminder. IMBA Rockwatch cares about life.

Let's see what's inside IMBA Rockwatch.

Display：1.22 inches 240*240 resolution          Main Chip：nordic nrf52832

Full Length of the Watch：24.5cm                       Bluetooth：4.2

Strap Material：Silicone, Metal*                          Waterproof Level：IP68

Battery Capacity：150 mAh                                  Life Time：7 days standby

* Metal strap at the momeny exclusively available for Indiegogo bakers.

And here how we do it...

And that's how we'll ship it to you

Now it's time for boring economics

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I'm Carly Becker. I'm a full-time consultant by day, and a makeup enthusiast and entrepreneur by night. I'm absolutely obsessed with makeup. I have more palettes than pairs of shoes! 

I'm starting this campaign because I have a vision. I want to allow the makeup obsessed to express who they are — or who they want to be — with makeup, even if only for a day. I have developed a cosmetics line that allows just that, matching personality traits with curated palettes and lipstick collections. 

But I can't do this alone. I need your help and support to reach my goal of starting this amazing company. With these contributions, I can fully launch the business in December 2017 with three flagship palettes and three lipstick collections in three different lipstick formulas. Once I'm funded, I can branch out and offer other makeup products, such as foundation, powders, and makeup brushes. I envision Blend It Like Becker offering a full line of personality-driven cosmetics. Will you be able to find your personality in the collection? 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need $7,999 to launch Blend It Like Becker. Here's a breakdown:
    • $3,500 will go towards perk fulfillment — that is, sending out the perks that people purchase on this Indiegogo campaign.
    • $3,500 will go towards inventory for the December 2017 launch. 
    • $999 will go towards the cut that Indiegogo takes and the credit card processing fees. 
  • There are a variety of perks you can get by contributing to the campaign.
    • Most importantly, the first two flagship palette, Attention to Detail, and Life of the Party. Attention to Detail is a versatile palette with neutrals and a hint of edge that will be perfect for anyone who works in a more straight-laced atmosphere, or is just generally more reserved, but still wants their palette to multitask for more dramatic looks.

  • Life of the Party is on the other end of the spectrum, with bold and dramatic dark shades and bright and vivid colors. 

  • Two lipstick collections, each of three shades, in three different formulas: Sweetheart, a velvet semi-matte cream; Dependable, a liquid long-lasting; and Brilliant, a high-shine duo-chrome gloss.
  • Attention to Detail lipstick collection contains light pinks and nudes.

  • Life of the Party touts bright magentas and hot reds. 

  • A third flagship palette and lipstick collection, which will be released during the Indiegogo campaign. 
  • One Limited Edition palette, which is only available through the Indiegogo campaign, and will be released around the halfway point. Only 25 are being produced, andn it will never be made again;  get it while you can!
  • Don't forget the swag items, such as accessory pouches, totes, and more! 

  • Finally, if you just want to donate a little, receive either a personalized Thank You email, or a shout out on Instagram. 
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, the funds will go towards perk fulfillment first and foremost, and the leftover funds may allow me to launch in December, just on a smaller scale. 

The Makeup

All of the makeup created by Blend It Like Becker abides by the following standards:

  • Cruelty-free
  • Gluten-free
  • Paraben-free
  • Vegan
  • Made in the US
  • Assembled and labeled by hand (by me!)

The Impact

  • Blend It Like Becker is an innovative company in the cosmetics industry for one main reason: personality. We all want to express ourselves through our makeup. Now you can find palettes and lipstick collections designed specifically with your personality traits in mind, be it personality traits you love about yourself, admire in others, or aspire to have. Even if you don't care about the personality, you'll love the beautiful, versatile, wearable color stories told through each palette, and the buttery soft, richly pigmented high-quality shadows and blushes. Not to mention the three unique lipstick formulas that are all amazing in their own ways. 
  • The announcement of the Blend It Like Becker cosmetics line garnered over 1,100 likes on Instagram! When Attention to Detail was announced, 40 people immediately signed up for the wait list. It's obvious that people want what Blend It Like Becker has, and now it's your opportunity to make this company a reality.
  • This company is my dream, my obsession, my life. I will do everything in my power to make sure it is a success. By purchasing my perks and contributing towards the Blend It Like Becker fund, you can rest assured that I will make this company come alive. I just need a little support, that's all!

Risks & Challenges

  • One of the biggest risks I face is not meeting my goal. If this happens, I will still be able to fulfill perks, and depending on how much is raised, I might still be able to launch in December, but it will be on a much smaller scale. 
  • Another risk, on the opposite end of the spectrum, is that I raise more than what I need. This would be amazing, but it would also cause a lot more work on me to fulfill perks. I am prepared to bring in a team if I'm overwhelmed by orders, so you can rest assured that you will receive your perks in a timely manner. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I get it if you aren't able to contribute. That's ok, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Share this Indiegogo campaign on all of your social networks, tagging @blenditlikebecker on IG or CarlyBecker710 on Twitter, and using the hashtag #madeupwithpersonality. Use the Indiegogo sharing tools provided on the website. You could even put a note about my Indiegogo in your email signature! Spreading the word helps me just as much as contributing does!

It's obvious that people want what Blend It Like Becker has, and now it's your opportunity to make this company a reality.
This company is my dream, my obsession, my life. I will do everything in my power to make sure it is a success. By purchasing my perks and contributing towards the Blend It Like Becker fund, you can rest assured that I will make this company come alive. I just need a little support, that's all!

I get it if you aren't able to contribute. That's ok, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Share this Indiegogo campaign on all of your social networks, tagging @blenditlikebecker on IG or CarlyBecker710 on Twitter, and using the hashtag #madeupwithpersonality. Use the Indiegogo sharing tools provided on the website. You could even put a note about my Indiegogo in your email signature! Spreading the word helps me just as much as contributing does!

story:
Pono Pareos Wearable Art Expressions:
Know thyself completely. Adorn yourself accordingly.

Vallaeia's personal story.

 

Aloha,

We are Vallaeia Springs, artist (right), and Sylvia (Maya) Dolena (left), business consultant. We are both very experienced in our own field and have partnered to birth Wearable Art Expressions for women!
Picture Madonna’s song, "Express Yourself" playing in the background.

We have been working on this project for a year, with art selection and sample production and market testing.  We are ready to express ourselves and launch!

To start, we want to offer Vallaeia’s art in the form of pareos, a unique, versatile wearable art piece that can be expressed in whatever style you want to wear.  No limits.  We will show you at least 20 ways.  We named this expression, Pono Pareos.  Pono in Hawaiian has a variety of subtle meanings and we use Pono as the way of perfection no matter how it shows up. Our Pono Pareos will show up in many ways for you, however you choose, and it will always be perfect.

Kumu Ehulani's Pono hula, just for you.

 

Main features:
Sizing for variety of styles and body types:
2.25 meters wide  or approximately 88 inches
110 cm length or approximately 43 inches

Original art is unique and colorful adding style and beauty for any occasion.
There are two color tones available for each original painting design.

Fabric is first quality rayon voile which is a light, flowy rayon similar to a very soft, refined cotton.  This fabric is light and airy for summer wear and also warm for winter neck scarves and shawls.  This fabric is virtually wrinkle free and can be ready to wear within minutes.

Casual to Elegant Wardrobe in one piece of wearable art.  Because of size and fabric, this pareo can be configured in a variety of styles to basically increase your wardrobe 20 fold with one piece of wearable art. Wardrobe pieces can be from evening dresses to shawls and neck scarves to beach cover-ups to wall hangings and bed covers.  The variety and uses are unlimited.

<insert video of 20 ways to style a pareo>

How we will use Your Contributions
Your contributions will fund our first production run of 4 art pieces in two color tones, light and dark. Any contributions over our goal will fund additional production runs and also will allow us to add art pieces to production.  Additionally, there is a game board and art game pieces under development. This will be another project unless we exceed funding.

Long-term Vision
Our long-term vision is to have our own production plant here in Hawaii, employ women and teach children the art of expression. Pahoa Town was severely damaged by hurricane Isselle in 2014 and the lava flow, the same year, came dangerously close, disrupting lives and livelihood of the residents. Many businesses left, never to return. 

What We Need (Goal: $8,000) & What You Get (Fabulous Perks)

We have contracted with an agent in Bali who evaluated and secured our production company for the sample production run.  Since the samples have been run, we are making some minor adjustments in the color tones and in the manufacturing quality of the pareo.  The funding goal, $8,000 will be completely invested in production and shipping to our Hawaii location.  Since these pareos are part of the perks, some of the funding will be used to ship the perks to you. For international shipments, we may need to charge for shipping.

Our perks include pareos and art prints signed by the artist and a unique selection of original art in the form of digital and printed posters, cards, and limited edition giclees.  

If we don’t reach our intended goal, we will limit the quantity of production to the amount needed to fulfill all of our perks.

The Impact

Making a difference on the island of Hawaii and for women:

It is not well known, but East Hawaii Island is one of the most economically depressed areas in the state of Hawaii.  More than 50% of the residents rely in food stamps to survive, mostly single mothers.  Our project will eventually employ women and will empower women to express their true selves. We also have another project called, Just One Generation Away to teach children life skills through art.

Sylvia (Maya) Dolena is a master Project Manager having worked at Hewlett Packard for over 25 years, managing multi-million dollar projects.  She is a women’s empowerment coach and workshop facilitator and brings her skills and passion to this project. Many of the workshops she offers are pro bono to the local residents.

Vallaeia Springs is a self-taught artist who uses her art to convey and express emotions in a powerful way.  She will teach women and children how to use art as a positive method of expression.

Risks & Challenges - Happiness is having a Plan B

At this point, the only two potential risks are

-- Consistent, quality production in Bali.
Maya Dolena has worked with the contracted agent in Bali before to produce her own pareos, called Affirmation Art Wear.  With our agent in place to monitor and oversee the production runs, we are confident about receiving top quality pareos and other products made from art as we expand.

--Keeping the cost consistent. 
With a fluctuating economy all over the world the exchange value of the dollar keeps changing.  We plan to have a funding buffer to accommodate this in the short-term.  In the long-term, we plan to have production here in Hawaii.

Contribute and/or help create a BUZZ

Please contribute! Whatever amount you give is most appreciated.  If you cannot contribute monetarily, spread the word to your family, friends, work associates, and anyone who wants to help women help themselves.  

You can use the Indiegogo share tools to share the campaign, our videos, the art, the story, or whatever else you think they would be interested in. Help us create a BUZZ that will go viral.  YEA! 

Join us in our journey of expression.  And if you are ever in Hawaii, we hope to have our production plant built and a tour available.    Mahalo nui, thank you very much.
story_txt:
Pono Pareos Wearable Art Expressions:Know thyself completely. Adorn yourself accordingly.
Vallaeia's personal story.

 
Aloha, 

We are Vallaeia Springs, artist (right), and Sylvia (Maya) Dolena (left), business consultant. We are both very experienced in our own field and have partnered to birth Wearable Art Expressions for women!Picture Madonna’s song, "Express Yourself" playing in the background.
We have been working on this project for a year, with art selection and sample production and market testing.  We are ready to express ourselves and launch!
To start, we want to offer Vallaeia’s art in the form of pareos, a unique, versatile wearable art piece that can be expressed in whatever style you want to wear.  No limits.  We will show you at least 20 ways.  We named this expression, Pono Pareos.  Pono in Hawaiian has a variety of subtle meanings and we use Pono as the way of perfection no matter how it shows up. Our Pono Pareos will show up in many ways for you, however you choose, and it will always be perfect.
Kumu Ehulani's Pono hula, just for you.

 
Main features:Sizing for variety of styles and body types:2.25 meters wide  or approximately 88 inches110 cm length or approximately 43 inches

Original art is unique and colorful adding style and beauty for any occasion.There are two color tones available for each original painting design.


Fabric is first quality rayon voile which is a light, flowy rayon similar to a very soft, refined cotton.  This fabric is light and airy for summer wear and also warm for winter neck scarves and shawls.  This fabric is virtually wrinkle free and can be ready to wear within minutes.

Casual to Elegant Wardrobe in one piece of wearable art.  Because of size and fabric, this pareo can be configured in a variety of styles to basically increase your wardrobe 20 fold with one piece of wearable art. Wardrobe pieces can be from evening dresses to shawls and neck scarves to beach cover-ups to wall hangings and bed covers.  The variety and uses are unlimited.


<insert video of 20 ways to style a pareo>
How we will use Your ContributionsYour contributions will fund our first production run of 4 art pieces in two color tones, light and dark. Any contributions over our goal will fund additional production runs and also will allow us to add art pieces to production.  Additionally, there is a game board and art game pieces under development. This will be another project unless we exceed funding.
Long-term VisionOur long-term vision is to have our own production plant here in Hawaii, employ women and teach children the art of expression. Pahoa Town was severely damaged by hurricane Isselle in 2014 and the lava flow, the same year, came dangerously close, disrupting lives and livelihood of the residents. Many businesses left, never to return. 

What We Need (Goal: $8,000) & What You Get (Fabulous Perks)
We have contracted with an agent in Bali who evaluated and secured our production company for the sample production run.  Since the samples have been run, we are making some minor adjustments in the color tones and in the manufacturing quality of the pareo.  The funding goal, $8,000 will be completely invested in production and shipping to our Hawaii location.  Since these pareos are part of the perks, some of the funding will be used to ship the perks to you. For international shipments, we may need to charge for shipping.
Our perks include pareos and art prints signed by the artist and a unique selection of original art in the form of digital and printed posters, cards, and limited edition giclees.  

If we don’t reach our intended goal, we will limit the quantity of production to the amount needed to fulfill all of our perks.
The Impact
Making a difference on the island of Hawaii and for women:
It is not well known, but East Hawaii Island is one of the most economically depressed areas in the state of Hawaii.  More than 50% of the residents rely in food stamps to survive, mostly single mothers.  Our project will eventually employ women and will empower women to express their true selves. We also have another project called, Just One Generation Away to teach children life skills through art.
Sylvia (Maya) Dolena is a master Project Manager having worked at Hewlett Packard for over 25 years, managing multi-million dollar projects.  She is a women’s empowerment coach and workshop facilitator and brings her skills and passion to this project. Many of the workshops she offers are pro bono to the local residents.
Vallaeia Springs is a self-taught artist who uses her art to convey and express emotions in a powerful way.  She will teach women and children how to use art as a positive method of expression.
