At this point, the only two potential risks are
-- Consistent, quality production in Bali.Maya Dolena has worked with the contracted agent in Bali before to produce her own pareos, called Affirmation Art Wear.  With our agent in place to monitor and oversee the production runs, we are confident about receiving top quality pareos and other products made from art as we expand.
--Keeping the cost consistent. With a fluctuating economy all over the world the exchange value of the dollar keeps changing.  We plan to have a funding buffer to accommodate this in the short-term.  In the long-term, we plan to have production here in Hawaii.
Contribute and/or help create a BUZZ
Please contribute! Whatever amount you give is most appreciated.  If you cannot contribute monetarily, spread the word to your family, friends, work associates, and anyone who wants to help women help themselves.  
You can use the Indiegogo share tools to share the campaign, our videos, the art, the story, or whatever else you think they would be interested in. Help us create a BUZZ that will go viral.  YEA! 
Join us in our journey of expression.  And if you are ever in Hawaii, we hope to have our production plant built and a tour available.    Mahalo nui, thank you very much.

story:
WHO WE ARE

 

DODÖ was founded by the designer Dominique Millan, a passionate illustrator and textile designer. DODÖ is an accessories design brand which proposed, design, variety and colour. In our experience, day by day, we always found the same characteristics in accessories, the same kind of colours or pattern, and no matter how much we inquired everything was the same.

So tired of this of this monotony, we decided to propose a new line based on the chromatic variety.

Our accessories are hand-painted on a canvas, once they are ready, then they are protected with PVC cover. We use the best AVIOS in the market, so we can made a quality product. In our day to day, we look new forms and themes, from which we are inspired and managed to abstract them and transform them into new pieces of design.

Created and inspired for you, DODÖ.

FEELING

Each purse is a piece of art, so you can forget about the regular colours or find someone with a similar purse, that will not happen again with our purses, each of them is one of a kind, because they are hand painted so is going to be impossible to find two equals.

 

1 MINUTE OF DETAILS

 

¿Do you want to know more about our collection and the details of our products?

Don’t miss our video.

 

 

 

FEATURES

 

 

 

- WRISTBAND -

To take into account:
You can carry the clutch or use the wristband and carry it in your wrist.

In the process, we have incorporated a new detail in the wristband.

- A NEW PULLER -

We made a new change in the puller for the zipper in the clutch. The classic puller has been changed to a tassel puller.

 

ONE OF A KIND

Every one of our bags is a unique piece of art.

Each one is hand-painted and hand-made.
HAND-PAINTED: the handbags start as a painting on canvas, like a piece of art.
HAND-MADE: We work with Peruvian artisans to achieve a unique and quality product.
 

We use each unique design in various combinations and shapes, show-casing the originality of the work of art.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

DESIGN, DETAILS AND QUALITY

We defined our primary materials after extensive testing and prototyping, choosing high quality over quantity. It took us over seven months of experimentation to decide what to use. We care about every detail in each product.

Our accessories are hand-painted on a canvas.  Once they are ready, they are then protected with PVC cover. We attach our logo on a piece of crystal clear acrylic, cut by laser, and we add gold colored metal accents.

Our scarfs are printed on gauze and hand-sewn. Each design is a hand drawing, created by the designers of DODÖ.

 

SAMPLES

 

ART AND CONCEPT, IN BAGS AND SCARVES

We based our designs initially in figure drawings, which are reflected in the scarves. We take the color scheme and abstract the figure drawings into a final design for the handbags.

WE ARE CURRENTLY WORKING ON THESE:

 

TIMELINE

 

OUR PHILOSOPHY

At DODÖ, we want every accessory to be unique. We have fun doing our work and we aim to reflect that joy in our line of accessories. We seek the best professionals in their respective areas, so we can bring about a product that reflects quality and design.

“I was looking to create a new line of accessories that had its own original and fun voice.”  Dominique Millan

 

 

THANK YOU

Thank YOU for your support on our journey. We want to celebrate life, and show that every person is unique, like our accessories.

Every startup takes an army to build, and we couldn’t have done it without help from so many people, who support us in this amazing dream:

  • Gerardo, our numbers man, who supported us from the beginning.
  • Andrea, for forcing us to get up when we got tired.
  • Shushu, our amazing model and friend.
  • Rulo, for the amazing video and editing.
  • Lizette, for her work behind the scenes.
  • Leycy, for her help in the stopmotion video.
  • Ronaldo, for your edits in the stop motion video.
  • Anita, to give love to each scarf.
  • Martín, for risking with us.
  • Federico, your service was amazing.
  • Hilda and Alejandra, for their amazing text edition.
  • Beatriz Casos, you are who inspired us to follow our dream.

 

REWARDS

Optional. If you want to personalize your purchase, you can have your initials painted on the handbags, or you can choose your favorite colors on the design. ($50 additional cost – only in handbags).

Note, each design is determined by product line.

FAQS

  • How did you get this idea?

We were looking a different approach for an accessories brand. We wanted something new, something different that moves away from monotony, also something hand made, because a in world like today that a lot of things are made in factories, we want something made by humans, an object that has history, that is done with love. We want to create something unique, colorful, amusing, each one different. So, after experimenting with materials and ideas, we came to the final product.

  • What does DODÖ mean?

DODÖ is how Dominique’s mother calls her. Her mother is one of the most important persons in her life, so she selected that nickname to head this accessories line in her mother’s honor, as a way to give her tribute for everything that she has made for Dominique and her sister.

  • I’m not ready to buy a bag/scarf, but I love your mission and would love to support!. How can I help?

Each contribution is important to us. If you are interested in making a small donation, you can buy a drawing, a key ring or a tassel.
You can also support us greatly by sharing our project with all your contacts.

  • I don`t use bags/scarf, but I love art. ¿How can I support?

You can support us with the purchase of a full canvas. We work in two measurements.
1 meter x 1 meter / 39 inch x 39 inch (square)
We will contact you to know if you have any preference in size.
The canvas is sent to you rolled up in a protective tube.

  • Where can I find information about the product?

We have an Instagram and a Facebook account! Very soon we will be launching our own website.

 

LOGISTICS

  • When will I receive my purchase?

In mid-May 2018.

  • What is your return policy?

We will only accept returns in case of manufacturing defects.

  • How do I know which design I am going to receive?

We contact each sponsor to select the print of his/her preference within the styles available by product. If you are interested in a more personalized design, there is an additional charge of $50.

  • What are accessories made of?

The bags are made of canvas, which is hand-painted; after that the canvas material is protected with a PVC coating. The scarfs are made of printed gauze, and they are hand-sewn.

  • Do DODÖ accessories come in other materials?

No, but in the future, we may be interested in working with other materials.

  • Do you ship worldwide?

We currently only ship to the US and Canada.

  • How much is shipping?

Shipping costs vary depending on the package you buy.

 

WHERE WE ARE?

We are finally launching a full line of accessories!

With the initial amount of $20,000 we will be able to move to a larger production phase where we can secure materials and supplies for our first collection. With your support of our products, we’ll be able to launch our brand, get feedback from our designs and you could be helping us develop new ideas for new products in our accessory lines or new design ideas!

 

If you have any questions, please get in touch !!

story:
We have been working in the shoe industry for more than 6 years but we couldn’t check if all the steps of the production were responsible and sustainable.

As a lot of people consider recycled material and eco-friendly fashion as not cool enough, or low quality products.

That's why we've decided to create THE STRING, to offer the #coolest eco-friendly shoes ever by paying attention as much to ecology and good working conditions as to design !

 

 

The materials that we use are recycled, sustainable, or both of them.

The DENIM is from authentic recycled American jeans. These come from unsold inventory or recycling industry.

 

 

Our leather is tanned without chromium. This chemical element is toxic for humans and the environment. So we use alternative tanning technologies which are non-toxic for workers and eco-friendly.

 

 

Our collections are directly inspired by the jeans. Tommy, the founder and designer, found a year ago an old used denim of a famous brand in the back of his wardrobe and had the inspiration to make a shoe with some parts of it. After several tests with the manufacturer we've made a very cool prototype with the entire jean. The Eco-friendly project was born !

So we reproduced the 5th pocket of a pair of jeans to our shoes which makes the collection feel just as cool : are you wearing a pair of jeans or a pair of shoes on your feet?

 

In those, there can be a slight difference of shade between the same 2 models which makes each pair unique and irreplaceable.

We launched 2 models: The espadrilles, Jeanne, are declined in two colors. Marius the sneakers, declined in 10 colors.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

THE STRING wants to involve people and make them aware of the consequences of deforestation and palm oil production for the Orangutan Habitat.

So for each pair of shoes pre-ordered, we make backers plant 10 trees* to reforest Orangutan habitat in Indonesia. We do it in partnership with BOS Foundation* (http://orangutan.or.id/) which rescues, rehabilitates and reintroduces orangutans

 

*Each backer will receive a certificate from Borneo Orangutan Survival.

 

Palm oil production is directly responsible for Orangutan extinction that’s why we want to involve people and make them aware of the consequences of deforestation.

WE WANT TO CONTRIBUTE TO THINGS CHANGE !

 

Materials that we use are recycled, sustainable, and responsible

For the denim collections we use authentic American pairs of jeans. Those come from unsold inventories or the recycling industry.

 

 

Most leather in the fashion and shoe industries is tanned using chromium (from 80 to 95% of all leather produced worldwide).  Chromium is a chemical element which is toxic for humans and the environment.

So our leather is tanned without chromium. We use alternative tanning technologies which are non-toxic for workers and eco-friendly. *

 

* That includes the use of oxazolidine in combination with other re-tanning agents of synthetic and vegetal origins

 

For the lining inside of the shoes, we use an antiperspirant and antibacterial “veggie” material in synthetic leather, 100% organic.

 

 

The sole that we use for the sneakers is made with rubber which is 35 to 50% recycled. The espadrille sole is made with jute rope that is 100% natural.

 

To ensure quality products and workers’ conditions, we chose to make our shoes in Spain and Portugal. Portugal is today one of the best shoe producer in the world and the Basque Country in Spain is the best producer of espadrilles. This choice allows us to visit our manufactories and checking at any time in few hours of driving.

 

Why The String ?

THE STRING is the link between people and environment. In our mind, it allows to keep connected  animals, nature, and people to each other.

It's also the strings of Guitar, Violin and Piano which inspire us in all the collections we design and the projects we launch. 

 

 

Why making an eco-friendly shoe brand?

We’ve been working in the shoe industry for more than 6 years but even if we’ve taken care about social responsibility and the environment, we haven’t been able to control all the steps of the production and check if the products were sustainable and responsible.

We noticed that a few shoe brands exist which care about the environment, but not enough to be concerned about the quality and design as well.

So we decided to create a brand new shoe, eco-friendly and sustainable to offer the coolest sustainable shoes ever!

 

 

Why Orangutans ?

 

 

It’s a topic that has been bothering us for several years. Palm oil production is directly responsible for Orangutan extinction.  That’s why we want to involve people and make them aware of the consequences of deforestation on the Orangutan Habitat.

One of the triggers for our action is a video which appeared on YouTube a few months ago and shows an Orangutan trying all by himself to stop a bulldozer which was destroying his home. video here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R4zzbwM07bw

We were really shocked by that and decided not to be spectators any longer, but to be players and contribute to things changing!

 

Established in 1991, the Borneo Orangutan Survival (BOS) Foundation is an Indonesian non-profit organization dedicated to the conservation of the Bornean Orangutan and its habitat, in co-operation with local communities, the Indonesian Ministry of Forestry and international partner organizations.

 

BOS MISSIONS

Reintroducing :   Accelerating the release of Bornean orangutans from ex-situ to in-situ locations

Protecting :   Encouraging the protection of Bornean orangutans and their habitat.  Increasing the empowerment of communities surrounding orangutan habitats

Capacity Building :   Strengthening institutional capacity

Researching :  Supporting research and education activities for the conservation of Bornean orangutans and their habitat

Partnerships : Promoting the participation of and partnership with all stakeholders

THANK YOU !!!

A huge thank to all the backers who support us with this project. Thanks to you, it will allow us to set up our Eco-friendly brand on the market and above all, rescue a lot of Orangutans !!! 

Thanks a lot and see you guys soon !!

Those come from unsold inventories or the recycling industry.  Most leather in the fashion and shoe industries is tanned using chromium (from 80 to 95% of all leather produced worldwide).  Chromium is a chemical element which is toxic for humans and the environment.So our leather is tanned without chromium. We use alternative tanning technologies which are non-toxic for workers and eco-friendly. * * That includes the use of oxazolidine in combination with other re-tanning agents of synthetic and vegetal origins For the lining inside of the shoes, we use an antiperspirant and antibacterial “veggie” material in synthetic leather, 100% organic.  The sole that we use for the sneakers is made with rubber which is 35 to 50% recycled. The espadrille sole is made with jute rope that is 100% natural. To ensure quality products and workers’ conditions, we chose to make our shoes in Spain and Portugal. Portugal is today one of the best shoe producer in the world and the Basque Country in Spain is the best producer of espadrilles. This choice allows us to visit our manufactories and checking at any time in few hours of driving. Why The String ?THE STRING is the link between people and environment. In our mind, it allows to keep connected  animals, nature, and people to each other.It's also the strings of Guitar, Violin and Piano which inspire us in all the collections we design and the projects we launch.   Why making an eco-friendly shoe brand?We’ve been working in the shoe industry for more than 6 years but even if we’ve taken care about social responsibility and the environment, we haven’t been able to control all the steps of the production and check if the products were sustainable and responsible.We noticed that a few shoe brands exist which care about the environment, but not enough to be concerned about the quality and design as well.So we decided to create a brand new shoe, eco-friendly and sustainable to offer the coolest sustainable shoes ever!  Why Orangutans ?  It’s a topic that has been bothering us for several years. Palm oil production is directly responsible for Orangutan extinction.  That’s why we want to involve people and make them aware of the consequences of deforestation on the Orangutan Habitat.One of the triggers for our action is a video which appeared on YouTube a few months ago and shows an Orangutan trying all by himself to stop a bulldozer which was destroying his home. video here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R4zzbwM07bwWe were really shocked by that and decided not to be spectators any longer, but to be players and contribute to things changing! Established in 1991, the Borneo Orangutan Survival (BOS) Foundation is an Indonesian non-profit organization dedicated to the conservation of the Bornean Orangutan and its habitat, in co-operation with local communities, the Indonesian Ministry of Forestry and international partner organizations. BOS MISSIONSReintroducing :   Accelerating the release of Bornean orangutans from ex-situ to in-situ locationsProtecting :   Encouraging the protection of Bornean orangutans and their habitat.  Increasing the empowerment of communities surrounding orangutan habitatsCapacity Building :   Strengthening institutional capacityResearching :  Supporting research and education activities for the conservation of Bornean orangutans and their habitatPartnerships : Promoting the participation of and partnership with all stakeholdersTHANK YOU !!!A huge thank to all the backers who support us with this project. Thanks to you, it will allow us to set up our Eco-friendly brand on the market and above all, rescue a lot of Orangutans !!! Thanks a lot and see you guys soon !!

story:
FOUR was founded by two women: April-Aries, thinkers, mothers, artists, designers, readers, feminists, long-walkers, collaborators and experienced fashion-industry producers out to challenge the narrative around women's garments and to experiment with a business model that grows sustainably while dedicated to women, the environment, the producers and the wearers alike. 

​We're running this campaign because FOUR is an apparel brand with a wider vision for women, by women. We want to collaborate with you to openly challenge the notion that you need more and more. With you, we want to defy the business model that says profit at the expense of others. And together, we can laugh at the notion of an ideal body. We started by asking ourselves two questions: what would we want to keep and wear forever & what's a business model that reflects our values as women?

We began developing FOUR in April of 2017, and are LAUNCHING NOW WITH YOUR SUPPORT. All money earned towards reaching our goal will go towards the production of our website and the development of garments. 

The result is a single, inspired and sustainable collection complete in 2022. Help us build a community and support the FOUR project so that we can thoughtfully source materials, make enough prototypes to ensure a perfect fit and to help us manage inventory while we build a dialogue with you over the life of the project. 

Our first offering is the #rabbitjacket! We are currently shipping, sizes 1 (0-4), 3 (10-12) and 4(14-18). Size 2 (6-8) on pre-order, shipping in September.

For our first garment we wanted to create an entirely unique and extraordinary fabric. With the help of textile historian, master weaver and our jacket namesake, Rabbit Goody, we were able to achieve our mission on American power looms from the turn of the 19th century.

   

At Rabbit's studio, Thistle Hill Weavers, in Cherry Valley, NY, we were able to achieve a our dreams using an antique French upholstery technique resulting in a luxurious double-weave. For you and the environment, we've woven only the finest natural materials; raw silk & wool for a soft interior and hemp linen & organic cotton for a durable exterior. Forget dry cleaning, we want you to cherish this jacket for its beauty, comfort and functionality. This enduring jacket softens beautifully with washing and repeated wear.

Inspired by the traditional Japanese Hanten Jacket and the ritual of exchange between work and home, the #rabbitjacket is a three-season layering piece, consciously constructed in NYC. The generous fit easily transitions from the studio, kitchen, meeting or garden. No matter how you live your life, 3/4 sleeves stay out of the way while you get on with it. Feel like going out without a bag? The generous pockets fit your wallet, keys, phone and even a small notebook with a clean silhouette.

Each garment takes an average of $5000 of development costs from design through three prototypes. The money you provide will go towards the development of the next garment and our site development so that we can share your stories. 

We are giving three unique perks to our donors who don't pre-order a #rabbitjacket: a swatch of our unique, custom-made fabric from Thistle Hill Weavers,

a '4' embossed vintage laundry pin

and a framable artist print from the documentation at Thistle Hill Weavers by our videographer, Matthew Johnson. 

As the owners of FOUR, we are committed to funding the project until we have completed the collection in  2022. All funds will go towards this goal!

Donations aren't the only thing we love or need at FOUR! Please help us get the word out to those thoughtful people in your life who are passionate about sustainability, garments consciously made in America, women owned companies, and mother's who are making their own lives happen...you get it, shout it loud! And let Indiegogo help you do it :) 

And one last thing, before we go, we'd like to acknowledge all the generous support we've received thus far: Denise Cassano & Beverly Whitaker of AAS who helped us strategize a sustainable business model to be proud of. Rabbit Goody of Thistle Hill Weavers, a true inspiration for a working life. Matthew Johnson, brilliant photographer, who captured our vision with just the right amount of edge. Musician, Sarah K. Neufeld, who graciously lent us her song Chase The Bright And Burning. Artist, dancer, poet, Blaze Indigo Lamper, for helping us perfect the #rabbitjacket. Christiana Gozo, rock climber, gracious model and analyst who helped us organize our thoughts. And GiGi, painter, conservationist, great-grandmother and model. 

Have something to contribute? Let's collaborate! Write us info@fourobject.com.

story:
INTRODUCING WRIXO


 

WRIXO PROVIDES CRUCIAL MEDICAL INFORMATION DURING A MEDICAL EMERGENCY.

__________________________________
 

_________________________________

 

WHAT IS WRIXO?

We believe everyone deserves to receive the best care when it’s needed the most—during a medical emergency. Our mission is to provide an easy and comprehensive way for that to happen. That's why we developed WRIXO, a wearable device that provides crucial medical information during a medical emergency. It is ideal for elderly friends and family members or for a child with a medical condition. It can also be used as a medical ID. Embedded in WRIXO is an Near Field Communication (NFC) wireless chip that contains a unique patient ID. Emergency responders can tap into WRIXO by using an NFC-enabled mobile device or by scanning WRIXO’s QR matrix barcode (for non-NFC-enabled phones) and receive the latest medical information on the patient they are treating.

_________________________________
 

FEATURES

_________________________________

 

SHARE EMERGENCY MEDICAL INFO WITH JUST ONE TAP

____________________________________
 

NO APP REQUIRED

When every second counts, instant access to health information is crucial. WRIXO not only delivers secure access to vital health information, it also complies with HIPAA regulations. It's easy to use. EMTs or emergency medical personnel simply scan, enter their phone number to verify access, then view their patient's medical information.

__________________________________
 

WRIXO IS FOR ANYONE WHO HAD A MEDICAL CONDITION OR WANTS AN ID WRISTBAND

 

___________________________________
 

PROVIDE MEDICAL INFORMATION INSTANTLY

With one tap on a smartphone or tablet, first responders can receive medical documents, diagnoses, prescribed medications, and other patient-approved health information on the spot.
 

__________________________________
 

TAP WITH ANDROID NFC-ENABLED DEVICES

 

SCAN QR CODE WITH NON-NFC DEVICES


_________________________________
 

PRIVACY PROTECTION

The HIPAA-compliant WRIXO emergency wristband enables you to share only the information you choose, which your doctors can then upload to the WRIXO cloud. For added protection, EMTs and doctors need to enter their mobile phone number to receive a temporary PIN number to access your information. 

______________________________
 

INCLUDE EMERGENCY CONTACTS

WRIXO makes it easy for first responders to notify your emergency contacts quickly during an emergency. EMTs simply tap your emergency contact's phone number to instantly call and notify your loved one, friend, or doctor of the emergency.

________________________________
 

EASILY UPDATE YOUR INFORMATION

Tap or scan then update! You can access and update your medical information by tapping your mobile device or by logging into your account from your computer with your personal pass code. You can update your information any time, and the update will take effect immediately.You choose and approve what information you wish to share with first responders and medical personnel with just a click.

________________________________
 

INVITE YOUR DOCTOR TO UPLOAD YOUR MEDICAL RECORDS

Once you set up your WRIXO account, simply send an invitation to your doctors and invite them to upload any medical information that emergency personnel would need to know. Doctors can also upload medical images such as X-Rays and MRIs, prescription medication information, and any medical notes. Your doctor can also create a personal medical history that you can easily access and share with first responders.

______________________________
 

SEND YOUR PRESCRIPTION WITH JUST A CLICK

With WRIXO, getting your prescription filled is a snap! Simply take a picture of your prescription and fax  it to your pharmacy from your mobile device. When you’re ready to pick the prescription up, it will be ready for you.

______________________________
 

WRIXO WRISTBAND DESIGN

Wrixo is built with embedded wireless chip protected with layers of coating and UV resistant plastic. The Wrixo combines the hybrid function of NFC an QR code to connect to an EMT’s mobile device and instantly deliver critical health information. No battery required, no recharge, and it's waterproof.

_______________________________
 

WRIXO TAG

The NFC-embedded WRIXO tag is the perfect complement to the WRIXO wristband. You can attach it to your key chain or necklace. If you have a service dog, you can also attach the WRIXO Tag to his or her collar. It works just like the wristband - just tap or scan and first responders can instantly access vital health information.

_________________________________

 

WRIXO WORKS WITH ANY MOBILE DEVICE OR DESKTOP COMPUTER

WRIXO works with any mobile device or computer. No mobile APP is required. WRIXO offers a responsive interface, which automatically adjust to fit the size of the screen or browser you're using  for a better viewing experience.

______________________________
 

INSTANT ACCESS TO EMERGENCY CONTACT AND CRITICAL MEDICAL INFO

WRIXO allows EMTs or medical personnel to have instant access to a patient's ID, contact information, emergency contacts, medical conditions, doctor's contact information, and doctor's notes.

 

 

________________________________
 

WRIXO CLOUD SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS

WRIXO is available on a subscription basis. It comes with a standard life-time membership at no charge. You can update your information at any time and as often as you need. Users can upgrade to  WRIXO Premium edition for just $6.00 per month. The Premium Edition allows you to manage your doctor visits, medical documents, and prescription information and delivery.

__________________________________
 

WE ARE READY FOR MASS PRODUCTION

After several iterations of design, field tests, and modifications, the production mold is ready to go to work. The solid steel cavity mold not only produces a high quality product, it also allow us to mass produce them efficiently.

_________________________________
 

WHAT YOU GET WHEN YOU SUPPORT WRIXO

 

______________________________
 

WE ARE ON SCHEDULE!

 

___________________________________
 

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT?

We have been working on WRIXO for over three years, and we have come so far, but now we need your help. Your support will allow us to bring this lifesaving device to the market and make it available to you and the millions of people who suffer from chronic illnesses. Let's come together and help save lives.

Why should you support us?

  • You would be the first to get one.
  • You’ve never seen a more comprehensive medical wearable on the market.
  • You love peace of mind knowing that your medical information is safe, yet readily available during an emergency.

_____________________________________

story:
8 years ago we developed our first USA Hockey Sweater for the 2010 Olympics. My cousin was a member of the USA Women's Hockey Team. We did an initial run of the sweaters and people loved them! 4 years later we did it again!

This time around we have improved the fabric and quality and are getting ready to produce another successful batch of sweaters to friends, family, and fans of USA.

Well now is the time, and my cousin is still a member of Team USA! (I am very proud of her!).

story:
About De Vos by Amber De Vos

I am Amber De Vos and I am a celebrity and art photographer turned fashion designer.

The story goes that about a little over year ago, I realized how much I loved wearing leggings but that everything I shopped for was either really only suitable to wear to the gym or out clubbing. Neither style was versatile enough to wear all day or really went with anything in my closet.

I couldn't help but wonder why the only options available were either "too fitness" looking, or if they were "fashionable" the patterns were too loud and didn't go with anything I owned?!

Why, when I did find something truly fashionable, would it cost an arm and a leg and thus I'd never dare sweat in it?!

Why couldn't I have leggings that were comfortable AND stylish? Wearable in the gym AND on the street?

Why couldn't I combine my talents as a photographer and artist to create a whole new line of clothing that anyone could wear all day, in many different situations and that would make them feel exciting and appealing, instead of just fit?

To answer all these questions, I spent a year developing prototypes and learning about creating a new clothing line, harnessing my innate passion for fashion and making people feel foxy (at first in front of my camera, and now in my designs).

My first prototypes turned so many heads and I got so many compliments, I knew I had a product that people would really love.

So, today, I am very proud to bring you this innovative brand, saving you too from the monotony of all the boring products currently on the market,

What ultimately makes this brand different than all other "athleisure" options out there? Besides the versatility factor, what's truly special about De Vos are the original sublimated designs featured on the crop tops and leggings. Sublimation is the process of printing art or photographs directly on to fabric. So, you're literally wearing Art.

Now, I get to wear leggings everywhere and with everything, personally I like to pair my De Vos with sweaters, blazers, sheer tops, sneakers and high heels.

You can't get away with that wearing typical workout clothes!

About This Campaign

Already have buyers lined up and venues ready to host trunk shows with me!

But I wanted to give the general public an opportunity to be early adopters and get their hands on De Vos before everyone else does. They're available in limited quantities and for a limited time only.

I am pre-selling pieces and raising some capital to help grow my business!

What We Are Asking & What You Get

  • Our initial ask is that you take a look at the full capsule collection and pick your favorite perks!
  • Your contribution not only gets you pieces of De Vos merch and outfits, it will also help to expand our brand reach by funding our marketing efforts, such as:
    • Reaching out to influencers with product
    • Promoting and advertising on social media
    • Funding publicity for in-person experiential shopping events.

Product Features

Our first capsule collection is awesome! There are five sublimated designs based on Amber's original art photography, in a mostly subdued black/white palette with pops of fun color.

LEGGINGS AND CROP TOPS:

  • Made with durable performance fabrics, that will not fade, pill, stretch out, or sag
  • High quality 88% polyester/12% spandex to provide just the right amount of moisture wicking and compression
  • 1 in elastic waistband, typically lands just under the belly button *leggings only
  • 30 in inseam to wear long or scrunch up *leggings only
  • Comfortable enough to wear all day
  • Provocative original designed to flatter any body types. They sure to turn heads and attract compliments at the gym and on the street
  • Easy to pair with many things already in your closet
  • Look great with sneakers, casual flats or sexy high heels
  • All De Vos pieces are mix and matchable
  • Elegant, more fashion than fitness

TANK TOPS

  • Cut to hang at just the right length for front and back coverage
  • Made with high quality 96% viscose/ 4% spandex, to provide just the right amount of moisture wicking
  • Soft, durable fabric that will not fade pill, stretch out or sag
  • Sure to turn heads and attract compliments at the gym or on the street
  • A private messages in rose gold to inspire and empower you throughout the day.
  • Easy to pair with many things already in your closet
  • Looks great with sneakers, casual flats or sexy high heels
  • All De Vos pieces are mix and matchable

HOODIES

  • High quality 100% combed cotton, super soft on the inside, durable on the outside.
  • Cropped length keeps you warm, but doesn’t hide your outfit
  • So comfortable, you’ll want to wear it all day
  • Provocative length is designed to flatter any body types. It is sure to turn heads and attract compliments at the gym and on the street
  • Easy to pair with many things already in your closet

The complete outfits consist of four pieces total: cropped hoodie, tank top, cropped top and leggings. Each piece is also available separately.

All our pieces are made in North America.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. "Behind the Scenes" This image is from backstage before a Prada fashion show while Amber was on a freelance assignment. The lighting and set guys standing on bleachers make the mysterious silhouettes on these pieces. 

The tank top features the word "Invincible" - encouraging you that no matter what life may throw at you, you are resilient and will come out even stronger on the other side.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

2. "Chic Stripes" Amber is a huge New York Rangers hockey fan - this is a shot of the ceiling of the world famous Madison Square Garden during one of their Playoff games

The tank top features the word "Radiant"  - inspiring you to always shine bright.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

3. "Neon Stripes" This image is inspired by a very unique lighting installation in a New York City restaurant atop the Museum of Art and Design. If you look closer at the red dots on the front, you'll see that they are Exit signs. 

The tank top features the word "Visionary" - motivating you to always think big and bold.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

4. "Pretty Kitty" This pair is especially dear to Amber, as this is a portrait of her beloved Balinese cat, "Olive." Olive has Siamese features, but with long hair. Her seductive eyes and sweet face make her the perfect model for this daring look.

The tank top features the word "Worthy" - reminding you to never doubt that you deserve all the good things that life brings to you.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

5. "Peek a Boo" is an image of a lingerie model wearing incredibly sexy, thigh-high, cut-out boots, which is why it looks like you can see skin peeking through these leggings even though you actually can't.

The tank top features the word "Elegant" - as a statement of fact that every woman who values how she looks and feels is elegant in her own way.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Lastly, we're also offering these cool branded accessories, available as free gifts for contributions over $200

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Style Suggestions:

Your Impact

  • If you love these designs and features, then this brand is for you! Clothes aren’t meant to just cover your body, they’re also an expression of self! That is why I call it “artleisure.”
  • You get to be one of the first people wearing this exciting new brand
  • You get to wear your De Vos and getting a ton of compliments doing it.
  • You become an automatic brand ambassador and share with others about your favorite new brand
  • You are one of the first to invest and come in on the ground floor of exciting new company

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this page with your friends! We love love!
  • Post your contribution on your social media and encourage others to do the same
  • Reach out to us with any comments or questions, we’d love to hear from you :)
story_txt:
About De Vos by Amber De Vos
I am Amber De Vos and I am a celebrity and art photographer turned fashion designer.
The story goes that about a little over year ago, I realized how much I loved wearing leggings but that everything I shopped for was either really only suitable to wear to the gym or out clubbing. Neither style was versatile enough to wear all day or really went with anything in my closet.
I couldn't help but wonder why the only options available were either "too fitness" looking, or if they were "fashionable" the patterns were too loud and didn't go with anything I owned?!
Why, when I did find something truly fashionable, would it cost an arm and a leg and thus I'd never dare sweat in it?!
Why couldn't I have leggings that were comfortable AND stylish? Wearable in the gym AND on the street?
Why couldn't I combine my talents as a photographer and artist to create a whole new line of clothing that anyone could wear all day, in many different situations and that would make them feel exciting and appealing, instead of just fit?
To answer all these questions, I spent a year developing prototypes and learning about creating a new clothing line, harnessing my innate passion for fashion and making people feel foxy (at first in front of my camera, and now in my designs).
My first prototypes turned so many heads and I got so many compliments, I knew I had a product that people would really love.
So, today, I am very proud to bring you this innovative brand, saving you too from the monotony of all the boring products currently on the market,
What ultimately makes this brand different than all other "athleisure" options out there? Besides the versatility factor, what's truly special about De Vos are the original sublimated designs featured on the crop tops and leggings. Sublimation is the process of printing art or photographs directly on to fabric. So, you're literally wearing Art.
Now, I get to wear leggings everywhere and with everything, personally I like to pair my De Vos with sweaters, blazers, sheer tops, sneakers and high heels.
You can't get away with that wearing typical workout clothes!
About This Campaign
Already have buyers lined up and venues ready to host trunk shows with me!
But I wanted to give the general public an opportunity to be early adopters and get their hands on De Vos before everyone else does. They're available in limited quantities and for a limited time only.
I am pre-selling pieces and raising some capital to help grow my business!

What We Are Asking & What You Get

Our initial ask is that you take a look at the full capsule collection and pick your favorite perks!
Your contribution not only gets you pieces of De Vos merch and outfits, it will also help to expand our brand reach by funding our marketing efforts, such as:
Reaching out to influencers with product
Promoting and advertising on social media
Funding publicity for in-person experiential shopping events.



Product Features
Our first capsule collection is awesome! There are five sublimated designs based on Amber's original art photography, in a mostly subdued black/white palette with pops of fun color.
LEGGINGS AND CROP TOPS:

Made with durable performance fabrics, that will not fade, pill, stretch out, or sag
High quality 88% polyester/12% spandex to provide just the right amount of moisture wicking and compression
1 in elastic waistband, typically lands just under the belly button *leggings only
30 in inseam to wear long or scrunch up *leggings only
Comfortable enough to wear all day
Provocative original designed to flatter any body types. They sure to turn heads and attract compliments at the gym and on the street
Easy to pair with many things already in your closet
Look great with sneakers, casual flats or sexy high heels
All De Vos pieces are mix and matchable
Elegant, more fashion than fitness

TANK TOPS

Cut to hang at just the right length for front and back coverage
Made with high quality 96% viscose/ 4% spandex, to provide just the right amount of moisture wicking
Soft, durable fabric that will not fade pill, stretch out or sag
Sure to turn heads and attract compliments at the gym or on the street
A private messages in rose gold to inspire and empower you throughout the day.
Easy to pair with many things already in your closet
Looks great with sneakers, casual flats or sexy high heels
All De Vos pieces are mix and matchable

HOODIES

High quality 100% combed cotton, super soft on the inside, durable on the outside.
Cropped length keeps you warm, but doesn’t hide your outfit
So comfortable, you’ll want to wear it all day
Provocative length is designed to flatter any body types. It is sure to turn heads and attract compliments at the gym and on the street
Easy to pair with many things already in your closet

The complete outfits consist of four pieces total: cropped hoodie, tank top, cropped top and leggings. Each piece is also available separately.
All our pieces are made in North America.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. "Behind the Scenes" This image is from backstage before a Prada fashion show while Amber was on a freelance assignment. The lighting and set guys standing on bleachers make the mysterious silhouettes on these pieces. 
The tank top features the word "Invincible" - encouraging you that no matter what life may throw at you, you are resilient and will come out even stronger on the other side.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
2. "Chic Stripes" Amber is a huge New York Rangers hockey fan - this is a shot of the ceiling of the world famous Madison Square Garden during one of their Playoff games
The tank top features the word "Radiant"  - inspiring you to always shine bright.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
3. "Neon Stripes" This image is inspired by a very unique lighting installation in a New York City restaurant atop the Museum of Art and Design. If you look closer at the red dots on the front, you'll see that they are Exit signs. 
The tank top features the word "Visionary" - motivating you to always think big and bold.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
4. "Pretty Kitty" This pair is especially dear to Amber, as this is a portrait of her beloved Balinese cat, "Olive." Olive has Siamese features, but with long hair. Her seductive eyes and sweet face make her the perfect model for this daring look.
The tank top features the word "Worthy" - reminding you to never doubt that you deserve all the good things that life brings to you.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
5. "Peek a Boo" is an image of a lingerie model wearing incredibly sexy, thigh-high, cut-out boots, which is why it looks like you can see skin peeking through these leggings even though you actually can't.
The tank top features the word "Elegant" - as a statement of fact that every woman who values how she looks and feels is elegant in her own way.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Lastly, we're also offering these cool branded accessories, available as free gifts for contributions over $200

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Style Suggestions:

Your Impact

If you love these designs and features, then this brand is for you! Clothes aren’t meant to just cover your body, they’re also an expression of self! That is why I call it “artleisure.”
You get to be one of the first people wearing this exciting new brand
You get to wear your De Vos and getting a ton of compliments doing it.
You become an automatic brand ambassador and share with others about your favorite new brand
You are one of the first to invest and come in on the ground floor of exciting new company

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this page with your friends! We love love!
Post your contribution on your social media and encourage others to do the same
Reach out to us with any comments or questions, we’d love to hear from you :)

story:
On a visit to Mexico two years ago, we discovered and fell in love with the recycling process. 

After realizing the great social impact we could have, we started recycling cotton: manufacturing towels, blankets, bathrobes, and ponchos. It was after receiving great feedback, that we decided to explore new materials and processes to up-cycle. Naturally this led us to complete our beach line.

After researching the vast array of plastics that contaminate our oceans and environment, such as fishing nets and single-use plastics, we established which waste could be reduced and recycled into new products. The most exciting result of this process is the high-quality fabric we can manufacture. Ultra soft, durable, water repellent and bi-stretch, for a better and more comfortable fit.

 

Beach shorts/trunks manufactured using 100% recycled plastics and an eco-friendly printing process. We pay attention to every little detail, from the fabric to the design inspired by travel, all the while keeping a keen eye on the latest fashion trends. This is how La Palma Beachwear was born.
 
 

 

Reduce, Reuse and Recycle are most common methods to reduce landfill waste. Landfill waste poses a huge problem as it has economic and environmental impact and secondly, due to slow decomposition rate which takes thousands of years, several acres of land has already been virtually rendered useless that could have been actually used for setting more green areas.

 

(vía https://www.alansfactoryoutlet.com/how-long-doe...)

story:
In order to take K8 Swimwear to the next level, funding is crucial. Any amount contributed to this campaign will assist in sending K8 Swimwear to Miami Swim Week- The largest Swimwear showcase in the world, with the opportunity of exposure being the lead motive in showcasing. Funds will also contribute to having a factory made line, all production will be achieved locally in LA. The custom portion of the brand will still remain, handcrafted in house with a more user friendly purchasing deck on the K8 Swimwear website. A manufactured line will allow suits to be available to larger audience in a shorter amount of time, beneficial to the the growth of K8 Swimwear.

With your donation,  productivity will move at a MUCH faster, more efficient rate. 

Miami Swim Week Designer Fees for Group Show:

-    Buyer / Media Relations

-    Press Materials

-   Event Staffing

-   Runway / Lighting / Sound system

-   DJ / Models / Photographers

-   Hair / MUA

Production Costs:

-   Pattern-making / Grading

-   Sample Pieces / Inventory Cut & Sew

-   Tags / Trims

-   Packaging

Additional Costs:

-   Web Design / E-Commerce

-   Advertisement / Social Media Marketing

10% of every contribution will be donated to Dress for Success.

"Dress for Success is an international not-for-profit organization that empowers women to achieve economic independence by providing a network of support, professional attire and the development tools to help women thrive in work and in life. Since starting operations in 1997, Dress for Success has expanded to almost 145 cities in 20 countries. To date, Dress for Success has helped more than 925,000 women work towards self-sufficiency."

 

I am Kate Broadrick, Designer of K8 Swimwear. Creativity has been my main outlet since I can remember- creating garments began with safety pinning seams together, to where I am today, handcrafting swimsuits. My love for design dialed in on swimwear when I moved to Miami for school at 19 years old. Insecurities led me to only step foot on the beach if I could wear my push up bra. I began draping the bra in fabric and creating matching bottoms. With the help of Instagram, I began posting and before I knew it I was taking orders. Bless those of you who purchased the original K8 "flow top"- The construction was less than ideal. It wasn't until I was asked to create a full line for a fashion show that I really felt the fruits of my labor. I decided to let go of the push up bra and design off of the natural silloutte. When I saw these women lined up, all different body shapes, huge smiles, feeling incredibly sexy, I knew this was it. I wanted every woman to feel this, to feel honored, and celebrated in their skin. 

K8 Swimwear turned into a business in 2013, after completing school and receiving a Bachelor's Degree in Fashion Design from Miami International University of Art and Design, my skill set had become more refined, and the designs began to market themselves as special occasion swimsuits. K8 Swimwear's target customers include  brides, bachelorettes, festival goers, anyone anticipating a  special occasion that involves water. 

After graduation, I worked full time as graphic designer for a corporate company, which allowed very minimal time to run K8 Swimwear.  During this time, Monday-Friday, I would focus on learning additional skills such as packaging, project proposals, mood boards, working amongst a team, and weekends were dedicated to crafting custom swimsuits. As K8 Swimwear began gaining traction in 2016, I set out on my own and began working various freelance positions to fund all K8 Swimwear projects. The company has been completely self funded up until this point. 

Every aspect of K8 Swimwear from illustration, packaging, pattern making, production, graphic design, social media content has been done solely by myself with the help of many photographers/videographers/stylists assisting in creating content along the way. All swimsuits are handmade, one of a kind pieces crafted specifically to clients measurements and specifications. Clients typically choose an already existing style and are provided with a measurement form, as well as coverage/fabrication options to begin the custom swimsuit design process. The option to design a completely custom suit from scratch is available with additional charges. Because the suits are made custom to clients measurements, and given the 4-way stretch fabric, the possibility of a poor fit is very low. Alterations are offered, but rarely needed.  

K8 Swimwear has now moved into Southern California, operating locally in Los Angeles. The main goal for K8 Swimwear is to preserve the custom made element of the brand but to also create a manufactured line that can be accessible to a larger audience in hopes of expanding into upscale boutiques throughout Los Angeles and Miami. 

 

 

- Share this campaign on facebook

- Share this video with friends interested in finding the perfect suit

- Give us a follow on IG (@k8swimwear) and follow along on this Journey!

On behalf of K8 Swimwear, I appreciate your time in simply checking out this campaign, your support is so appreciated!

K8 Swimwear has now moved into Southern California, operating locally in Los Angeles. The main goal for K8 Swimwear is to preserve the custom made element of the brand but to also create a manufactured line that can be accessible to a larger audience in hopes of expanding into upscale boutiques throughout Los Angeles and Miami. 

 



 












- Share this campaign on facebook
- Share this video with friends interested in finding the perfect suit
- Give us a follow on IG (@k8swimwear) and follow along on this Journey!
On behalf of K8 Swimwear, I appreciate your time in simply checking out this campaign, your support is so appreciated!

story:
What We Need & What You Get

 

  • You can contrubute to creating a t-shirt that will fit all bodies and by selling it we will be able to give money to trans people to afford their therapy, get shelter, get surgery or start their own project. 

  • This t-shirt is my way to give back to my community and show support even more! 
  • Any dollar counts, and you will be part of something bigger that will help someone in the world who needs it so much. 

The Impact

  • You will give trans people a smile and it will be your simple way to say "you are enough, you are beautiful and I care about you"
  • We can change a person day and even life!

 

My Story

I am a 29 year old dad (to Elio, who is 1 month old), a husband and dog owner. I live in Copenhagen, Denmark, but grew up in the mountains in Italy, where I am from originally. And I happened to be trans. 

I discovered the gym and bodybuilding – it has been my sanctuary ever since. I am both marble and sculptor. Empowering – the power of the mind and the power of the body. All that needs to change is the mindset and it is this that I am trying to teach people. All bodies are beautiful. All minds.

As an alien on the wrong planet. As an albatross – elegant and majestic in the skies, but unsuited when on a boat among the fishermen. The dark years came when I became a teenager. Depression held me in its arms many times during those years.

Then this happened: at 17 years old, I found out that being trans is a thing and many feel the same way.

 At 23 years old, I moved to Copenhagen – thirsty for a more open-minded environment, full of opportunities.

After 2 years of sessions and physical checks, I got approved:

June 2015: testosterone started.

September 2015: top-surgery happened.

I came out in front of more than a hundred students on the first day of the semester at university – they told me I am brave. But is it to be brave when you need to do something? Is it courage when it’s about survival? Since then my strength has come back. My pride has grown, my self-esteem has sky-rocketed, my life has become something I love – not something I simply live.

I discovered the gym and bodybuilding – it has been my sanctuary ever since. I am both marble and sculptor. Empowering – the power of the mind and the power of the body. All that needs to change is the mindset and it is this that I am trying to teach people. 

 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you cannot contribute it would be amazing if you just share this campaign on your social media or any other way and spread the word!

story:
The Montero Philosophy

Our lives have changed in the last few years; we carry a lot more gadgets & accessories than we used to in the past. And we are always on the move. As a working professional, being able to stay organized with this growing number of gadgets, and accommodating them in the same bag was becoming a challenge. That is why we designed the Montero - a smart, elegant, everyday office bag to help you stay organized and keep up with the pace of growth.

Our philosophy of designing the Montero was to help working professionals to De-clutter, Stay organized and thus De-stress to have a good work-life balance.

"Get Organized. De-stress your life."

 

Our Story

We are a startup (www.urbanpik.com) founded by a group of friends who came together as thinkers, product designers, visualizers and craftsmen. It was on a coffee one evening we were discussing how, as working professionals, it is embarrassing to enter into a meeting, or land up at the office desk, and pull out a mesh of entangled cables from the bag, and then try to stay organized. That's when we decided to get ourselves organized, and thus, de-stress our lives. What culminated over the next few days was the Montero.

It took us 3 months to get our first prototype done. When we started using this prototype, we got more and more inquiries from friends, colleagues and well-wishers, to supply them with one. This is when we knew this was something which everyone needed. After 4 months of testing and collecting feedback, we knew what all needed to build into the Montero. With a few requests from friends for supplying the Montero to them, we set out to find the best partner who could produce this for us. 8 months and 15 prototypes later, we had the final product ready.

 

"Best companion to Work-from-anywhere"

 

Value, Style, Durability - The 3 pillars of our Design

During our journey of Montero, we relied on 3 design principles - to offer Value, make it Stylish and create a Durable product. This makes the Montero resilient, practically manufacturable at scale, usable by both women and men, and a product which can last really long.

 

The Value Montero Offers

With the changing times, there arose a need to design products for today and for the future. While everything around has changed and moves at pace, our bags had stayed the same. Montero is the bag of the future, which has been thoughtfully designed to accommodate all your everyday gadgets smartly into a well-organized way. Whether you work from home or go to office, the Montero is your way to stay organized and strike a work-life balance.

The Montero has been thoughtfully designed to address today's needs of working professionals:

  1. The Laptop section: This section fits a standard 14″ or 15″ laptop, charger, tablet and other accessories like mouse, etc.



     
  2. The Bagnizer section: The Bagnizer section is designed to organize and store all the everyday essentials. It has tabs to fit mobile phone charging cables & earphones, has a pen & watch holder, and contains pockets to house power bank and mobile phones designed in a way that the phone can be easily charged using the power bank.



     
  3. The Travelizer section: The Travelizer section has been designed for those on the move. It fits your Passport, glasses, A5 notebook, SIM & SD cards, Business Cards and other travel related stuff. It has a slip pocket to easily slide it over a standard trolley bag


     
  4. Magnetic Zip Snapper: The magnetic zip snapper holds the zip head in the right position, and ensures you find it at the right place all the time

 

"Smart, Spacious Bag. No frills."

 

Quality

Quality is extremely important in our quest to produce products which leave a lasting impression. It was for this that we took over a 12 months to finalize our product, carefully testing each feature we built into the bag. Some of the key quality aspects of Montero are:

  1. 100% Pure Leather for long-lasting bag life
  2. Hand Crafted: Hand-sewn and machine-stitched for extra durability. The Buckles, Zippers and Holders are Internally Lined with Strong nylon fabric that makes them highly durable and long lasting

  3. Stain and water-proof inner lining for rugged use
  4. Rust-proof hardware for all-weather use


     
  5. High quality YKK zipper for super-smooth performance: The bags are fitted with full-perimeter, high quality, YKK zipper to offer a super-smooth experience.

 

"Handcrafted Product Mastery"

 

Style

Elegance is the hallmark of our design. We just don't design products, but beautiful products. Especially keeping in mind the fact that your bag represents your personality, it has been designed eloquently to suit every personality, for both women and men.

 

 

"For HER. For HIM."

 

Working from Home or Commute to Office

Staying organized in your worklife is equally important as doing any other work in your job.  We spend a large part of our day trying to stay organized. Research shows that an unorganized environment can increase our stress levels and affect our work-life balance. 

Montero is your way to stay organized, regardless of whether you travel to office everyday, or work from home. 

 

"Designed for Work-from-Anywhere"

 

See it in 360

 

Product Specifications

  • Material: 100% Natural Cow-hide Vegetable-tanned Leather
  • Hardware: Rust-proof MS
  • Zipper: YKK
  • Tabs and Compartments:
    • 1 Laptop compartment
    • 1 Tablet compartment
    • 2 Medium pen holders
    • 1 Large pen holder
    • 1 Large spectacle holder
    • 4 Medium tab organizers
    • 1 Medium tab organizer with key ring
    • 2 Large tab organizers
    • 3 Slip pockets
    • 1 Zip pocket with translucent window
    • 1 Large zip pocket
    • 1 Business card compartment
    • 1 Slip pocket with pull tab
    • 1 Small D-ring attachment
    • 1 A5 notebook compartment
  • Buttons: Press Studs Snap Buttons
  • Thread: Filament Polyester Thread
  • Inner Lining: Microfiber Waterproof Nylon
  • Outside
    • 2 Large D-ring attachments
    • 1 Slip pocket with hidden magnetic closure - convertible to trolley slot strap
    • Strap: 1 detachable/adjustable soft-padded shoulder Strap
    • 1 Magnetic snap zipper puller
    • Handle Strap
  • Dimension: 37.5 × 10 × 29 cm
  • Weight: ~3.5 lbs

 

Colors

Montero is available in 4 colors:

  1. Vintage Tan
  2. Cross-Grain Midnight Black
  3. Midsummer Blue
  4. Cross-Grain Caramel Brown

 

"Sleek. Stylish. Comfortable."

 

Why Are We on Indiegogo?

After the initial rave reviews we received for the Montero, we wanted to take this product to the world In order to help us simplify and organize the working professional's everyday lives. And for this we need to raise $12,500 to produce this bag at commercial scale. This money will be used for us to carry out the tooling, further research and produce the bag the way we have envisaged it as a product.

During this journey, we also realized that there are other products which can be designed along the lines of Montero, and we have already started to explore those. Your support here will help us bring more of such products to life and help you de-stress, de-clutter and stay organized

In order for us to grow at scale, we need to buy a manufacturing capacity so that the products can be manufactured at scale. The money raised here shall be used partly to buy such a capacity.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have already completed the prototyping, production and dispatch of the first batch of Montero, which was primarily for a group of close friends and colleagues. The challenges faced in manufacturing have been ironed out. It is with this experience that we are coming to you and offering this product.

As of date, there is no risk related to manufacturing of Montero and other products being offered here; however, the only risk we foresee is force majeure  - a Covid-19 like lock-down which may delay the deliveries and which is beyond our control. To mitigate this risk to a certain extent, we have a small quantity of stock available, which has been manufactured from the earnings of our first batch. This is our faith in the product that we know there will be buyers for Montero across the world, and which is why we reinvested our earnings to produce more bags.

We have consciously ensured not to add any fancy frills or technology elements which usually take a long time to manufacture and are prone to higher risks. This has further elminated R&D, Manufacturing, Shipping and tech-failure risks.

 

The Factory Tour

We thought of showing you how Montero is manufactured so as to give you a sneak peek of our production facility

 

You Are Our Champions

We promise we will not let you down - from the time you pledge your support till the time you own and use the Montero, we will be with you. And we need your help in spreading the word. It will be with your support that the Montero will have a far outreach.

You may use the Indiegogo share tools and your personal network to help spread the word.

Sometimes, a small thought changes our lives for good. Montero is that thought, which was born to help us prepare for the future.

 

Thank you.

Team Urbanpik
story_txt:
The Montero Philosophy
Our lives have changed in the last few years; we carry a lot more gadgets & accessories than we used to in the past. And we are always on the move. As a working professional, being able to stay organized with this growing number of gadgets, and accommodating them in the same bag was becoming a challenge. That is why we designed the Montero - a smart, elegant, everyday office bag to help you stay organized and keep up with the pace of growth.

Our philosophy of designing the Montero was to help working professionals to De-clutter, Stay organized and thus De-stress to have a good work-life balance.
"Get Organized. De-stress your life."
 
Our Story
We are a startup (www.urbanpik.com) founded by a group of friends who came together as thinkers, product designers, visualizers and craftsmen. It was on a coffee one evening we were discussing how, as working professionals, it is embarrassing to enter into a meeting, or land up at the office desk, and pull out a mesh of entangled cables from the bag, and then try to stay organized. That's when we decided to get ourselves organized, and thus, de-stress our lives. What culminated over the next few days was the Montero.

It took us 3 months to get our first prototype done. When we started using this prototype, we got more and more inquiries from friends, colleagues and well-wishers, to supply them with one. This is when we knew this was something which everyone needed. After 4 months of testing and collecting feedback, we knew what all needed to build into the Montero. With a few requests from friends for supplying the Montero to them, we set out to find the best partner who could produce this for us. 8 months and 15 prototypes later, we had the final product ready.

 
"Best companion to Work-from-anywhere"
 
Value, Style, Durability - The 3 pillars of our Design
During our journey of Montero, we relied on 3 design principles - to offer Value, make it Stylish and create a Durable product. This makes the Montero resilient, practically manufacturable at scale, usable by both women and men, and a product which can last really long.
 
The Value Montero Offers
With the changing times, there arose a need to design products for today and for the future. While everything around has changed and moves at pace, our bags had stayed the same. Montero is the bag of the future, which has been thoughtfully designed to accommodate all your everyday gadgets smartly into a well-organized way. Whether you work from home or go to office, the Montero is your way to stay organized and strike a work-life balance.
The Montero has been thoughtfully designed to address today's needs of working professionals:


The Laptop section: This section fits a standard 14″ or 15″ laptop, charger, tablet and other accessories like mouse, etc. 

The Bagnizer section: The Bagnizer section is designed to organize and store all the everyday essentials. It has tabs to fit mobile phone charging cables & earphones, has a pen & watch holder, and contains pockets to house power bank and mobile phones designed in a way that the phone can be easily charged using the power bank. 

The Travelizer section: The Travelizer section has been designed for those on the move. It fits your Passport, glasses, A5 notebook, SIM & SD cards, Business Cards and other travel related stuff. It has a slip pocket to easily slide it over a standard trolley bag 

Magnetic Zip Snapper: The magnetic zip snapper holds the zip head in the right position, and ensures you find it at the right place all the time


 
"Smart, Spacious Bag. No frills."
 
Quality
Quality is extremely important in our quest to produce products which leave a lasting impression. It was for this that we took over a 12 months to finalize our product, carefully testing each feature we built into the bag. Some of the key quality aspects of Montero are:


100% Pure Leather for long-lasting bag life


Hand Crafted: Hand-sewn and machine-stitched for extra durability. The Buckles, Zippers and Holders are Internally Lined with Strong nylon fabric that makes them highly durable and long lasting


Stain and water-proof inner lining for rugged use


Rust-proof hardware for all-weather use 

High quality YKK zipper for super-smooth performance: The bags are fitted with full-perimeter, high quality, YKK zipper to offer a super-smooth experience.


 
"Handcrafted Product Mastery"
 
Style
Elegance is the hallmark of our design. We just don't design products, but beautiful products. Especially keeping in mind the fact that your bag represents your personality, it has been designed eloquently to suit every personality, for both women and men.

 

 
"For HER. For HIM."
 
Working from Home or Commute to Office
Staying organized in your worklife is equally important as doing any other work in your job.  We spend a large part of our day trying to stay organized. Research shows that an unorganized environment can increase our stress levels and affect our work-life balance. 
Montero is your way to stay organized, regardless of whether you travel to office everyday, or work from home. 

 
"Designed for Work-from-Anywhere"
 
See it in 360

Hardware: Rust-proof MS
Zipper: YKK

2 Medium pen holders

1 Large spectacle holder

Outside

Strap: 1 detachable/adjustable soft-padded shoulder Strap
1 Magnetic snap zipper puller
Handle Strap

Weight: ~3.5 lbs
